44005006	Onsay sukaaɓe ɓen immii waɗi kasannge e makko, ɓe naɓi mo, ɓe surroyi.
44005007	Ɓawto ɗun, ɓay wa saa'iiji tati feƴƴii, ɓeyngu makko ari e hoore o andaali kon ko waɗi.
44005008	Onsay Petruusu wi'i mo kanko debbo on: «Yeeto lan si tawii ko nguu coggu ɗoo yeeyuɗon ngesa mban.» Debbo on jaabii mo, wi'i: «Eyyo, ko nguu coggu ɗoo.»
44005009	Petruusu wi'i mo fahin: «Ko fii honɗun haldanɗon ndarndagol Ruuhu Joomiraaɗo on? Awa e hino surroyɓe moodi maa ɓen ka dambugal ɗaa. Ɓe naɓete an kadi.»
44005010	Ɗon kisan o yani e ley koyɗe Petruusu, o maayi. Wa ko sukaaɓe ɓen naatata, ɓe tawi kanko debbo on kadi o maayii. Ɓe naɓi mo, ɓe surroyi takko moodi makko.
44005011	Kulol moolanaangol kadi heɓi moftal ngal fow e kala nanunooɓe fii ɗun.
44005012	Tawi sahaabaaɓe ɓen no waɗude maandeeji e kaawakeeji moƴƴi ɗuuɗuɗi hakkunde jamaa on. Hari kamɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen fow hiɓe mottondiri e nder nanondiral maɓɓe ka Tungarru Sulaymaana.
44005013	Tawi jamaa on no mantude ɓe fota, kono hay gooto e maɓɓe suusataano ɓe ɓadaade.
44005014	Tawi ɲande woo wonɓe gomɗinde Joomi on no ɓeydaade fota, hara ko worɓe e rewɓe.
44005015	Awa kadi nawnuɓe no addetenoo ka sera ballaŋe, wallinee e buutuuji maa e gate, fii nde Petruusu no feƴƴa, hay si ko yo ɗowdi makko ndin hawru e goɗɗo e maɓɓe.
44005016	Lappi lappi yimɓe no wuggotonoo iwa e ɗeya ca'e heeduɗe e Yerusalaam, ɓe addora nawnuɓe ɓen e ɓe jinna tampini, ɓen fow sellinaa.
44005017	Onsay yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on e kala wondunooɓe e makko, ɗun ko ndee fedde ɓee Sadduusiyaaɓe, ɓe hawtodi e nawliigu timmungu.
44005018	Ɓe fawi sahaabaaɓe ɓen juuɗe, ɓe soki ɓe.
44005019	Kono e nder on jemma, malaa'ikaajo Joomiraaɗo on udditi baafe kaso ngon, o yaltini ɓe, o wi'i ɓe:
44005020	«Yahee wonoyon ka juulirde mawnde, feɲɲinanon jamaa on kala konguɗi fii ɗan ngurndan kesan.»
44005021	Ɓay ɓe nanii ɗun, no weetirnoo, ɓe naatoyi ka juulirde mawnde ɓe woni e waajagol. Onsay yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on e wondiɓɓe mun ɓen hewti, ɓe nodditi dental fewjooɓe ɓen, e dental mawɓe Banii-Isra'iila'en ɓen fow, ɓe immini ko yahana sahaabaaɓe ɓen ka kaso.
44005022	Ɓay ɓen suufaaɓe hewtii, laatii ɓe tawaali ɓeya ka kaso. Ɓe yiltitii ɓe hunitii ɓe, ɓe wi'i:
44005023	«Men yahuno, men tawi kaso ngon no sokiraa no holnori, ayninaaɓe dame ɗen kadi mo bee e ka woni. Kono ɓay men udditii, men tawaali hay gooto nder ton!»
44005024	Nde hooreejo aynooɓe juulirde nden e hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen nanirnoo ɗin konguɗi, ɓe jiɓii fii ɓen e ko honno fii ɗun sakkitoroyta.
44005025	Tun goɗɗo ari, wi'i ɓe: «E hino yimɓe ɓe sokunoɗon ka kaso ɓen ka waajotoo jamaa on ka juulirde mawnde too!»
44005026	Onsay hooreejo aynooɓe ɓen e suufaaɓe mun ɓen yahani ɓe, addi e ɓaawo doolugol ɓe, sabu hiɓe hulunoo wota jamaa on fiɗir ɓe kaaƴe.
44005027	Ɓay ɓe addii ɓe, ɓe darni ɓe yeeso dental fewjooɓe ɓen. Onsay yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on landori ɓe nii, wi'i:
44005028	«Hiɗon andi hari men haɗiino on few waajorgol ndee innde! Jooni non e hino on lannii lollinde waajuuji mon ɗin Yerusalaam. E hoore ɗun hiɗon faalaa fawude kii wonkii oo neɗɗo e hoore amen!»
44005029	Onsay Petruusu e sahaabaaɓe ɓen jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Ko Alla ɗoftetee edii yimɓe ɓen.
44005030	On Alla baabiraaɓe men ɓen immintinii Iisaa, on mo warirɗon fempugol e leggal, wenga.
44005031	Allaahu on ɓantirii mo ka sengo mun ɲaamo, waɗii mo Ardotooɗo e Dandoowo fii okkugol Isra'iila'en feere no ɓe tuubira e no ɓe yaaforanee junuubaaji.
44005032	Menen e Ruuhu Seniiɗo mo Allaahu on yeɗi ɓen ɗoftiiɓe mo, ko men seedee ɗun.»
44005033	Ɓay ɓen nanii ko ɓen sahaabaaɓe wi'i kon, ɓe hiɓɓii haa ɓe faalaa ɓe warude.
44005034	Kono Fariisiyaajo jannoowo fii Sariya on, wi'eteeɗo Gamaliyiila, mo jamaa on fow hoolii, hawtii ka nder dental, yamiri yo ɓen sahaabaaɓe yaltine ton taho.
44005035	Onsay o wi'i: «Ko onon yo Isra'iilayankeeɓe, wattanee yiila e ko miijiɗon waɗugol ɓee kon.
44005036	Ko fii hiɗon andi neeɓaali ko Teyodaasu, waɗitiiɗo ko tedduɗo, immii, mo wa yimɓe teemeɗɗe nayo iwtirnoo ɓaawo mun. Kanko Teyodaasu o waraa, ɗoftinooɓe mo ɓen fow lancaa. E hoore ɗun hay huunde nantaaka.
44005037	Ɓay feƴƴii e on, wi'eteeɗo Yudaasi, jeyaaɗo Jaliilu, immii ka fewndo windito. O ɗaɓɓi yimɓe ko iwtira ɓaawo makko, on kadi mulaa, ɗoftinooɓe mo ɓen fow kadi saakitaa.
44005038	Jooni min mi wi'ay on, tertee ɓee yimɓe, acciton ɓe, ɓe yaha. Si tawii ɗee eɓɓooje maa ɗee kuuɗe ko e neɗɗanke'en iwi, ɗe bonoyay.
44005039	Si tawii non ko e Alla iwri, haray on waawataa ɗe bonnude. Reenee fii wota on wonu haɓidooɓe e Alla!»
44005040	Ɓe fow ɓe iwtiri e ɓaawo ko o wi'i kon. Onsay ɓe nodditi sahaabaaɓe ɓen, ɓe focci ɓe, ɓe haɗi ɓe wowlugol innde Iisaa, ɓe acciti ɓe.
44005041	Kamɓe kadi ɓe yalti ka hakkunde dental e hoore hiɓe weltii ko tawi kon hiɓe foddi e aybineede fii innde Iisaa nden.
44005042	Tawi ɓe haaɓataano waajagol janna ka juulirde mawnde e ka cuuɗi fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo Iisaa Almasiihu on.
44006001	Nde tawnoo taalibaaɓe ɓen no ɓeydaade tun e ɗen balɗe ɗon, Yahuudiyankeeɓe wowlooɓe haala Gereeki wonɓe hakkunde maɓɓe ɓen woni e ŋurŋurtugol ɓeya Yahuudiyankeeɓe, sabu ko ɓe welsindii waɗangol keynguuɓe maɓɓe ɓen ko ɓen handi ɲande woo kon.
44006002	Onsay sahaabaaɓe ɓen sappoo e ɗiɗo nodditi taalibaaɓe ɓen no ɓe fotata fodde, ɓe wi'i ɓen: «Haanaa ka acciten daaluyee Alla on fii sendugol ɲaameteeji tun.
44006003	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe, suɓee hakkunde mon yimɓe njeeɗiɗo, hara ko holniiɓe, heewuɓe Ruuhu Allaahu on e faamu, ko halfinen ɗee golle.
44006004	Ɗun, menen men duumoto e toragol e kurkanagol daaluyee on.»
44006005	Ɗin konguɗi weli ɓe no ɓe fotata fodde. Onsay ɓe suɓii oo wi'eteeɗo Astefaana, on ko neɗɗo heewuɗo gomɗinal e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, e Filiipu e Porokoor e Nikanuura e Timuuna e Parmeena e Nikolaasi mo ka wi'etee ɗon Antiyoosi-Sirii, on ko naatunooɗo e diina Yahuudiyanke.
44006006	Onsay ɓe weeɓitani ɓe sahaabaaɓe ɓen, ɓen fawi juuɗe mun ɗen e hoore maɓɓe, du'anii ɓe.
44006007	Tawi daaluyee Alla on no layude tun, adadu taalibaaɓe ɓen no ɓeydaade fota e nder Yerusalaam. E hoore ɗun jamaa yottinooɓe sadaka ɗuuɗuɗo no ɗoftaade gomɗinal ngal.
44006008	Tawi Astefaana, on heewuɗo sulfu e bawɗe, no waɗaynoo kaawakeeji moƴƴi mawɗi e maandeeji e hakkunde jamaa on.
44006009	Onsay woɓɓe ɓe Sirenii e ɓe Aleksandiri e ɓee ɓe Silisii e ɓe Aazii, wonnooɓe ka juulirde wi'eteende Juulirde Rinɗinaaɓe, ɓe woni e yeddondirgol e Astefaana.
44006010	Kono tawi ɓe alaa kutu dartagol faamu makko ngun e konguɗi ɗi Ruuhu Allaahu on longinaynoo mo ɗin.
44006011	Onsay ɓe yeeni woɓɓe yo wi'u: «Men nanirii mo konguɗi hoynuɗi Muusaa e Alla!»
44006012	Ko nii ɓe ƴuuniri jamaa on e mawɓe ɓen e jannooɓe fii Sariya on, ɓen ari nangiri Astefaana doole, ɓe naɓi mo ka dental fewjooɓe ɓen.
44006013	Tawi hiɓe eɓɓi woɓɓe ko seeditoo fenaande, ɓen wi'i: «Oo neɗɗo no jokki aybingol nokkuure hormorde nden e Sariya on.
44006014	Ko fii men nanii himo wi'a wonde, Iisaa, oo jeyaaɗo Naasirata, lancay ndee nokkuure, o wayla kadi naamuuji ɗi Muusaa waɗani en ɗin.»
44006015	Onsay ɓen wonnooɓe ka dental ɗon ndaari mo kanko Astefaana, tawi yeeso makko ngon wa'itii wa yeeso malaa'ikaajo.
44007001	Onsay yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on landii mo, wi'i: «Hara ɗun ko non woniri?»
44007002	Astefaana jaabii, wi'i: «Ko onon yo musiɓɓe an e baabiraaɓe an, heɗitee! Alla Jom Mangural on feeɲanno Ibraahiima ben men fewndo ko o wonnoo Mesopotamii, ɗun ko ado o hoɗoyde Haraana.
44007003	O daalanno mo, o wi'i: «Yaltu ka leydi maa e ka bolondaa maa, yahaa haa e leydi ndi mi holloyte.›
44007004	Kanko Astefaana o wi'i kadi: «Onsay o yalti e ndin leydi ɓen Kaldiyankeeɓe, o hoɗoyi Haraana. Ɓay ben makko faatike, Allaahu on addi mo kanko Ibraahiima haa e ndii leydi ndi wonɗon e mun jooni.
44007005	E hoore ɗun o yeɗaali mo ndondi woo e ndii leydi, hay non yeru ka o tippa koyngal. Kono o fodi mo okkugol mo ndi, ndi wona halal makko kanko e jurriya makko aroyoowo ɓaawo makko on. Wa fewndo ko Alla daalani mo ɗun, hari o maraa ɓiɗɗo.
44007006	Allaahu on daalani mo kadi wondema jurriya makko on aroyay nde daakoyii e leydi jananiri, wonɓe e ndin leydi kurkoya ɓe, tampina e nder duuɓi teemeɗɗe nay.
44007007	Kono o daalani mo kadi, o wi'i: ‹Ko min ɲaawata on jamaa kurkoyɗo ɓe. Ɓawto ɗun, ɓe yaltoya ton, ɓe rewoyammi e ndee nokkuure ɗoo.›
44007008	E hoore ɗun Allaahu on ƴettodi e makko ahadi ndi maande mun woni sunninegol. Ko e nder ɗun Ibraahiima daɲi Issaaqa, o sunnini mo ka ɲalaande jeetataɓere. Issaaqa waɗiri non Yaaquuba, Yaaquuba kadi waɗiri non e maamiraaɓe men ɓen, ɗun ko ɓiɓɓe makko ɓen sappoo e ɗiɗo.
44007009	«Ɓen maamiraaɓe men nawli Yuusufu, ɓe yeeyi mo fii naɓegol Misira.
44007010	Kono tawi Alla no wondi e makko, o sorti mo e nder ɗin tampereeji makko fow, Alla okki mo sulfu e faamu yeeso Fir'awna. On lanɗo Misira waɗi mo ardotooɗo leydi Misira ndin, e ka galle makko kanko lanɗo on.
44007011	Ɓawto ɗun, heege waɗi e nder leydi Misira ndin fow haa hewtoyi Kanaana, tampere nden tiiɗi, tawi ɓen maamiraaɓe men alaa heɓude ko ɲaama.
44007012	Yaaquuba nani wonde ɲaametee no woodi Misira. Ka laawol aranol, o immini fayɓe makko ɓen, ɗun ko maamiraaɓe men ɓen.
44007013	Ka laawol ɗimmol, Yuusufu andintinii ben-gootooɓe mun ɓen, ko onsay Fir'awna andi iwdi Yuusufu ndin.
44007014	Onsay Yuusufu immini ko yahana ben makko Yaaquuba e ɓeynguure mun nden fow, tawi ɓen no yonunoo cappanɗe njeeɗiɗo e njowo.
44007015	Kanko Yaaquuba o yahi Misira. Ko ɗon kanko e ɓen maamiraaɓe men ɓe faatii.
44007016	Ɓe naɓaa Sakiima, ɓe wattinoyaa ka berɗe ɗe Ibraahiima ittunoo kaalisi soodi Sakiima ɗon e juuɗe ɓiɓɓe Hamuura ɓen.
44007017	«Nde tawnoo saa'i on ɓadike ka Allaahu on hunna ko o fodunoo Ibraahiima kon, tawi jamaa makko wonɗo Misira on, no ɓurtude tun ɗuuɗude,
44007018	haa nde goɗɗo mo andaano Yuusufu laamii Misira.
44007019	On lanɗo ɗayni leɲol men ngol, o tampini maamiraaɓe men ɓen haa o hawkini ɓe ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen fii wota ɓen wuuru.
44007020	Ko fewndo on saa'i ɗon Muusaa jibinaa, tawi himo labaa yeeso Alla. O muyninaa lebbi tati ka galle ben makko.
44007021	Ɓay o accaama ka yaasi, jiwo Fir'awna on hocci mo, ne'iri mo wa ɓiɗɗo mun.
44007022	Onsay Muusaa jannaa gande Misirayankooɓe ɓen fow, o woni tiiɗa-konguɗi e kuuɗe.
44007023	«Ɓay wonii o timminii duuɓi cappanɗe nay, o miijii e ɓernde makko fii ƴewtoyagol musiɓɓe makko ɓen, ɗun ko Banii-Isra'iila'en.
44007024	O yi'i goɗɗo e ɓen musiɓɓe makko no tampinee. O ari dandugol mo, o yottanii mo, o wari Misirayankoojo on.
44007025	Tawi himo sikka musiɓɓe makko ɓen faamay wonde Allaahu on yeɗii ɓe kisiyee tippude e sookeeje makko ɗen, kono kamɓe ɓe faamaali ɗun.
44007026	Bimbi nden ɲande, o yaltiti e hakkunde woɓɓe e ɓen musiɓɓe makko ka piirata, o woni e moƴƴintingol hakkunde maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: ‹Ko onon woni musiɓɓe, ko fii honɗun mo kala e mon no tampina oya?›
44007027	«Kono wonnooɗo tampinde ɲokondo mun on wiggii Muusaa, wi'i: ‹Ko hombo waɗu-maa lanɗo e ɲaawoowo e hoore amen?
44007028	Kaa a faalaa lan warude, wano warirɗaa Misirayankoojo on non hanki?›
44007029	Sabu ngol kongol, Muusaa dogi, yahi daakoyii e ndii leydi wi'eteendi Midiyaani, o daɲi ɗon ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo.
44007030	«Duuɓi cappanɗe nay ɓawto ɗun, malaa'ikaajo feeɲani mo e loyngol yiite ka pitahun woni sumude ka wulaa fello Sinaayi.
44007031	Ɓay o yi'ii ɗun, kanko Muusaa o ŋalɗi fii kon ko o yi'i. Nde tawnoo himo ɓadaade fii tenƴingol, o nani Joomiraaɗo on no wi'a:
44007032	‹Ko min woni Alla Joomiraaɗo baabiraaɓe maa ɓen, Alla Ibraahiima e Issaaqa e Yaaquuba.› Onsay Muusaa diwni, tawi suusataa ndaarirde ton.
44007033	«Joomiraaɗo on daalani mo kadi, wi'i: ‹Solu paɗe maa ɗen, ko fii ndee nokkuure nde wonɗaa e mun ko nokkuure hormorde.›
44007034	O daalani mo kadi, o wi'i: ‹Mi yi'ii tampere jamaa maa wonɗo Misira on, mi nanii woytaango maɓɓe ngon, mi jippike fii jattingol ɓe.› O daalani mo kanko Muusaa, o wi'i: ‹Miɗo imminde ma Misira.›
44007035	Kanko Astefaana o wi'i kadi: «Ko Muusaa on mo ɓe hayfinnoo ɓe wi'i: ‹ko hombo waɗu-maa lanɗo maa ɲaawoowo?›, ko on Alla immini tippude e ballal malaa'ikaajo feeɲannooɗo mo ka pitahun on fii wonugol lanɗo e sottoowo.
44007036	Ko on yaltini ɓe e hoore waɗugol kaawakeeji e maandeeji e nder leydi Misira, haa naɓani ka Baharu Boɗeejo e ka wulaa e nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay.
44007037	Ko Muusaa wi'unoo Banii-Isra'iila'en wonde: ‹Alla yaltinanoyay on annabaajo wa'uɗo wa an min e hakkunde musiɓɓe mon ɓen.›
44007038	Fewndo ko jamaa on mottondirnoo ka wulaa, ko kanko wondunoo e malaa'ikaajo yewtaynooɗo mo on ka fello Sinaayi, wondude kadi e maamiraaɓe men ɓen. Ko kanko kadi Alla yeɗi daaluyeeji ngurndan ɗin fii hewtingol en ɗi.
44007039	Kono tawi maamiraaɓe men ɓen faalaaka mo ɗoftaade, ɓe bugitii mo, tawi ɓerɗe maɓɓe ko Misira fewti.
44007040	Ɓe wi'i Haaruuna: ‹Moƴƴinan men allaaji ko ardoo men. Ko fii men andaa ko heɓi Muusaa oo yaltinɗo men leydi Misira.›
44007041	E nder ɗen balɗe ɗon ɓe moƴƴini nandolla ga'un nagge, ɓe addani ndun nandollaaru sadaka, ɓe weltori kon ko ɓe moƴƴiniri juuɗe maɓɓe.
44007042	Onsay Allaahu on hucci ɓe, o accidi ɓe e rewugol koode ɗen ka kammu, wano windori non ka deftere annabaaɓe ɓen, ka o daali ɗon: ‹Ko onon yo bolondaa Isra'iila, fewndo hirsaynoɗon waɗon sadakaaji ka wulaa e nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay, hara ko min waɗanaynoɗon ɗun?
44007043	Kono ɓay on rewii oo allaajo wi'eteeɗo Muluuka, on rewii kadi ndee hoodere oo allaajo mon wi'eteeɗo Ronfa, ɗin nandollaaji ɗi moƴƴinɗon fii ko rewon, min kadi mi bugoto on toonin Baabiila.›
44007044	«Tawi maamiraaɓe men ɓen no wondi e rewirdu ndu seeditoore nden woni e mun ndun ka wulaa ton, wano yewtidaynooɗo e Muusaa on yamirirnoo mo yo ndu moƴƴinire non, e sifa no o hollirnoo mo non kadi.
44007045	Ɓay maamiraaɓe men hikkiiɓe e ɓenɗon ɓen ƴettitii ndu, ɓe yaadi e mayru, tippude e yamiroore Yaasuwa, e ndii leydi ɗii leƴƴi ɗi Alla bugitinoo yeeso maɓɓe, ndu lutti ɗon haa hewti e Daawuuda,
44007046	on mo Allaahu on yeɗi sulfu, o torii ka o darnana Alla Yaaquuba on suudu,
44007047	kono ko Sulaymaana wonnoo ko darnani mo suudu.
44007048	E hin-le Jom Ɓural on hoɗataa e ko goɗɗo mahiri juuɗe, wano annabaajo on holliri non wonde, Alla daali:
44007049	‹Ko kammu ngun woni jullere laamu an nden, leydi ndin wonanimmi ka mi tippa.› Joomiraaɗo on daaluno: ‹Ko suudu hondu darnanton mi, maa ko nokkuure honde wonantammi fowtorde?
44007050	E hara hinaa bawgal an mi warri ɗun fow?›
44007051	«Ko onon yo yimɓe yoora-hooreeɓe, ɓe ɓerɗe mun e ɓe noppi mun uddi, onon non ko on dartotooɓe soono woo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, wano baabiraaɓe mon ɓen dartoraynoo non!
44007052	E hara, ko hombo e annabaaɓe ɓen wonnoo mo baabiraaɓe mon ɓen ɓittinaano? Hay ɓe warno ɓen adinooɓe hiitaade fii arugol Feewuɗo on, on mo janfiɗon warɗon,
44007053	ɗun ko onon ɓe huutoraali Sariya mo malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen hewtinnoo on on!»
44007054	Ɓay ɓen nanii ɗun, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen sokii, ɓe ŋatindiri ɲiiƴe maɓɓe ɗen, monee makko kanko Astefaana.
44007055	Kono kanko Astefaana o ɓurti heewude Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, o tiggitii ka kammu, o yi'i annoora Alla on, o yi'i kadi Iisaa no darii ka sengo ɲaamo Alla.
44007056	Kanko Astefaana, o wi'i: «Mi yi'ii kammu ngun no udditii. E hino ka Ɓii-Aaden on darii ka sengo ɲaamo Alla!»
44007057	Onsay ɓe fow ɓe uddi noppi, ɓe sonki e makko, ɓe wubbani mo.
44007058	Ɓe raɗii mo haa ka ɓaawo saare, ɓe wariri mo kaaƴe. Seedeeɓe ɓen acci conci mun ɗin e ley koyɗe suka no wi'ee Saawulu.
44007059	Wa fewndo ko ɓe fiɗata mo kanko Astefaana kaaƴe, tawi himo tororde nii, wi'a: «Ko an yo Joomi an Iisaa, jaɓɓo wonkii an kin!»
44007060	Onsay o jiccii kadi, o ewnii ko tiiɗi, o wi'i: «Joomi, wota a faw oo junuubu e hoore ɓee!» No o gaynirnoo wowlude ɗun, o timmi.
44008001	Tawi Saawulu no wonani fii mayde Astefaana nden. Nden ɲande jokkere mawnde heɓi dental gomɗinɓe wongal ngal Yerusalaam haa ɓe fow ɓe saakitii ɓe yaari e ngal diiwal Yahuuda e Samariiya, si wonaa sahaabaaɓe ɓen.
44008002	Onsay yimɓe ɓe dewal ɓen surri Astefaana, ɓe fesi mo kadi fota.
44008003	Tawi Saawulu kaɲun ko lancaynooɗo moftal gomɗinɓe ɓen, ko fii himo naataynoo e cuuɗi fii wippitugol gomɗinɓe ɓen, worɓe e rewɓe, o feroo ka kaso.
44008004	Ko ɓen saakitanooɓe yahaynoo nokkeeli fow waajoo fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
44008005	Filiipu kadi yahi e saare jeyaande e diiwal Samariiya, o waajii ɗon fii Almasiihu on.
44008006	Ɓay jamaa on nanii ko Filiipu yewtata kon, ɓe yi'ii kadi maandeeji ɗi o woni waɗude ɗin, ɓe haɓɓitii e konguɗi ɗi o woni yewtude ɗin.
44008007	Sabu tawde jinnaaji no yaltaynoo e yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe ɓe ɗi wonnoo e mun, e hoore hiɗi haaca ko tiiɗi, awa kadi maaya-ɓanduuɓe buy e boofooɓe sellinaama.
44008008	Onsay welo-welo moolanaango waɗi e nden saare.
44008009	Kono tawi ado ɗun, gorko wi'eteeɗo Sim'uunu no e nden saare, waɗaynooɗo mbilankaaku ŋalɗina jamaa Samariiya on, waɗitiiɗo ko tedduɗo.
44008010	Hari ɓe fow, gila e tosooko on haa e ɓurɗo mawnude on, hiɓe haɓɓii e makko, hiɓe wi'a: «Oo ko bawgal Alla wi'eteengal Mawngal ngal!»
44008011	Tawi hiɓe haɓɓinoo e makko sabu tawde gila neeɓii himo ŋalɗiniraynoo ɓe mbilankaakuuji makko.
44008012	Kono ɓay ɓe hoolike Filiipu on feɲɲinanɗo ɓe innde Iisaa Almasiihu on e Kibaaru Moƴƴo fii laamu Alla ngun, onsay worɓe e rewɓe lootaa maande kisiyee.
44008013	Sim'uunu kadi gomɗini. Ɓay o lootaama maande kisiyee, tawi o seedataa e Filiipu. O watti yi'ude maandeeji mawɗi e kaawakeeji moƴƴi ka waɗata, o ŋalɗi fii ɗun.
44008014	Nde ɓee sahaabaaɓe wonɓe Yerusalaam nanirnoo wonde hoɗuɓe Samariiya ɓen jaɓii daaluyee Alla on, ɓe imminani ɓe Petruusu e Yuuhanna.
44008015	Ɓen ari ka maɓɓe, ɓe toranii ɓe fii yo ɓe heɓu Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
44008016	Ko fii hari Ruuhu Allaahu on jippaaki e hoore hay gooto e maɓɓe taho, hari ko maande kisiyee tun ɓe lootaa e innde Iisaa Joomi on.
44008017	Onsay Petruusu e Yuuhanna fawi juuɗe mun ɗen e hoore maɓɓe, ɓen heɓi Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
44008018	Ɓay Sim'uunu ndaarii tawii ko nde sahaabaaɓe ɓen fawunoo juuɗe mun ɗen e hoore maɓɓe si ɓe okkaa Ruuhu Allaahu on, onsay o addani ɓe mbuuɗi, o wi'i ɓe:
44008019	«Yeɗee lan min kadi ngal bawgal, fii yo tawu kala mo mi fawi juuɗe an ɗen e hoore mun heɓay Ruuhu Seniiɗo on!»
44008020	Kono Petruusu wi'i mo: «Yo kaalisiiji maa ɗin halkodu e maa, ɓay hiɗa sikka dokkal Alla ngal ko kaalisi heɓorta!
44008021	Ko fii a alaa geɓal, a alaa ndondi e nder ɗun, ɓay ɓernde maa nden laaɓaa yeeso Alla.
44008022	Tuubu fii ɗii miijooji bonɗi wonɗi ka ɓernde maa, toroɗaa Joomiraaɗo on no ɗi yaaforee si no gasa.
44008023	Ko fii mi yi'ii hiɗa tumbii e nder hahhannde, hiɗa humondiri e angal peewal.»
44008024	Onsay Sim'uunu jaabii, wi'i: «Onon tigi toranee lan Joomiraaɗo on fii kon ko wi'uɗon wota hewtan.»
44008025	Ɓay ɓen ɗiɗo ɓe sahaabaaɓe ɓen imminnoo gaynii feɲɲinde daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on e seeditanagol mo, ɓe yiltitii Yerusalaam. E nder yiltitagol maɓɓe ton, ɓe waajii fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e nder koɗooli Samariyankeeɓe ɗuuɗuɗi.
44008026	Malaa'ikaajo Joomiraaɗo on feeɲani Filiipu, wi'i mo: «Immo jokkaa laawol iwungol Yerusalaam yaari Gaaza, ɗun ko ngol ka sengo ley, yaarungol ngol ka wulaa.»
44008027	Onsay o immii o yahi, o haccii gorko nuunaaɗo mo Ecopii toowa ndarndeejo e nder laamateeri ndi debbo wi'eteeɗo Kandaas laamii e mun Ecopii. Tawi ko on gorko halfinaa ngaluuji on debbo fow, tawi on no arnoo Yerusalaam fii rewugol Alla.
44008028	Ko on yiltitotoo Ecopii, tawi himo jooɗii e hoore giri-giriwal makko ngal pucci pooɗata, himo jangora deftere annabi Isaaya nden.
44008029	Onsay Ruuhu Allaahu on yamiri Filiipu, wi'i: «Wuggo, hewtitoɗaa oo mo giri-giriwal.»
44008030	Onsay Filiipu dogi. Ɓay o ɓadike on mo Ecopii, o nani on no janga deftere annabi Isaaya nden. O landii mo, o wi'i: «Hara hiɗa faamude koo ko wonɗaa jangude?»
44008031	On gorko jaabii, wi'i: «Ko honno mi faamirta si goɗɗo sifanaaki lan?» Onsay o noddi Filiipu yo o ƴawu, o jooɗoo takko makko.
44008032	Tawi ko oo aaya ɗoo o wonnoo jangude: «Himo ɗowiraa wa baalii hirsoyteengii, hara o udditaali hunduko, wa baalun mbobiɗankun taƴoowo kun leeɓi.
44008033	E nder ko o hayfinaa kon, ɓe fanni mo goonga. Hara non ko hombo fillitotoo fii jamaanu makko ngun? Ko fii ngurndan makko ɗan taƴaama ka hoore leydi.»
44008034	Ɓay kanko nuunaaɗo on o gaynii jangude ɗun, onsay o wi'i Filiipu: «Mi torike ma, andinan ko hombo oo annabaajo wowli fii mun, si ko kanko tigi maa si ko goɗɗo goo?»
44008035	Onsay Filiipu ƴetti haala kan, o fuɗɗorani mo on aaya mo o jangi, o feɲɲinani mo Kibaaru Moƴƴo Iisaa on.
44008036	-
44008037	E nder yaadu maɓɓe ndun, ɓe yi'oyi ka ndiyan woni. Onsay nuunaaɗo on wi'i: «E hino ndiyan, ko honɗun haɗatammi looteede maande kisiyee?»
44008038	Onsay on nuunaaɗo yamiri yo giri-giriwal ngal darne, o ukkodi e Filiipu ka ndiyan, on looti mo ɗon maande kisiyee.
44008039	Ɓay ɓe ƴawii ka ndiyan, Ruuhu Joomiraaɗo on jilii Filiipu, nuunaaɗo on yiitaali mo hande kadi. O jokkiti laawol makko e hoore himo weltii.
44008040	Filiipu kaɲun taw tun no Asduuda. Gila ɗon o waajii fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e ca'e ɗe o rewi e mun ɗen fow haa o hewti Seezariiya.
44009001	Kono tawi Saawulu kaɲun no waɗi ka wonkii mun kambirangol taalibaaɓe Joomi on mayde. Kanko Saawulu o yahi ka yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on,
44009002	o wi'i on yo o windu ɓataake haa e ɗee juulirɗe Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɗe Damaasi, fii no o andira si tawii no woodi ton worɓe maa rewɓe jokkuɓe laawol Iisaa ngol, o yaha o haɓɓoya ɓe, o adda Yerusalaam.
44009003	Ɓawto ɗun, ɓay o yahii haa o ɓadike Damaasi, tun nde wootere ndaygu iwri ka kammu ari, hundi mo.
44009004	O yani kisan ka leydi, o nani hawa no wi'a mo: «Saawulu, Saawulu, ko fii honɗun wonɗaa mi cukkanaade?»
44009005	On jaabii, o wi'i: «Ko an hombo nii, yaa an Joomi an?» Onsay kanko Joomi on o jaabii mo, o wi'i: «Ko min woni Iisaa on mo wonɗaa cukkaade.
44009006	Immo naataa e ndee saare ɗoo, ɓen yeetoto ma ko haanuɗaa waɗude.»
44009007	Tawi ɓen ɓe o yaadaynoo no darii mbobiɗi hakkee kulol. Hiɓe nanaynoo kadi kan hawa, kono ɓe alaa yi'ude hay gooto.
44009008	Onsay Saawulu immii ka leydi. Fii kala gite makko ɗen no udditinoo, kono tawi o alaano yi'ude hay huunde. Ɓe ɗowiri mo juuɗe makko ɗen haa Damaasi.
44009009	O woniri non balɗe tati o yi'aali, e hoore ɗun o ɲaamaa, o yaraa.
44009010	Kono tawi taalibaajo no Damaasi ɗon wi'eteeɗo Hanaaniiya. Joomi on feɲɲinani mo, wi'i: «Hanaaniiya!» O jaabii: «Naamu, yaa an Joomi!»
44009011	Kanko Joomi on o wi'i mo: «Immo yahaa e ngal ɗatal wi'eteengal Feewungal, landoɗaa fii oo wi'eteeɗo Saawulu mo Tarsiisu wonɗo ka galle Yahuuda, himo toraade ɗon.
44009012	E nder ko o torotoo kon, o feɲɲinanaa, o yi'i goɗɗo no wi'ee Hanaaniiya, on no naata fawa juuɗe mun ɗen e hoore makko fii yo o wuntu.»
44009013	Hanaaniiya jaabii, wi'i: «Joomi an, mi nanirii buy no wi'a wonde on neɗɗo waɗii boneeji ɗuuɗuɗi e hoore laaɓuɓe maa ɓen Yerusalaam.
44009014	Awa ɗoo kadi hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen no newnani mo haɓɓugol kala jantotooɗo innde maa nden.»
44009015	Kono Joomi on wi'i mo: «Yahu, ko fii on neɗɗo ko aala mo mi suɓii fii ko lollina innde an nden yeeso ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen e lamɓe ɓen e yeeso Banii-Isra'iila'en.
44009016	Awa kadi mi hollay mo ko ittiri haa honto o tampirta innde an nden.»
44009017	Onsay Hanaaniiya yahi. Ɓay o hewtii e ndun suudu ka on woni ɗon, o fawi juuɗe makko ɗen e hoore Saawulu, o wi'i: «Ko an yo Saawulu musiɗɗo an, ko Joomi Iisaa, on feeɲanɗo ma ka laawol fewndo arataa, woni ko imminimmi fii yo a wuntu, awa kadi fii yo a heewu Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.»
44009018	Ɗon kisan ko wa'itata wa koɓolle iwi ka gite makko, saami, o wunti, o immii, o lootaa maande kisiyee.
44009019	Ɓawto ɗun ɓay o ɲaamii, o hetti doole makko ɗen. O wontidi e taalibaaɓe wonnooɓe Damaasi ɗon ɓen e nder balɗe.
44009020	O fuɗɗii kisan waajaade fii Iisaa ka juulirɗe, o wi'a jaka ko oo nun woni Ɓiɗɗo Alla on.
44009021	Nanunooɓe ɗun ɓen fow ŋalɗi fota, ɓe wi'i: «Hinaa oo giddanaynoo mulugol ɓen jantotooɓe ndee innde Yerusalaam? Hinaa ko addunoo mo kadi ko fii nangugol ɓen wonnooɓe jantaade nde, naɓa ɓe yeeso hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen?»
44009022	Tawi kanko Saawulu himo ɓurtude tun ɓeydaade, himo ŋalɗiniraynoo Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonnooɓe Damaasi ɓen e dow ɓanginirangol ɓe pellital wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on.
44009023	Ɓay wontii ɗon haa neeɓii, Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen diisondiri fii warugol mo.
44009024	Kono Saawulu humpitii fii kan janfa maɓɓe. Tawi ɓen no aynunoo dame ɗen jemma e ɲalorma fii no ɓe warira mo.
44009025	Onsay taalibaaɓe ɓen ƴettiri mo jemma, tumbi e nder debeere, ɓe yawtini mo maadi ndin.
44009026	Ɓay kanko Saawulu o hewtii Yerusalaam, o ɗaɓɓi no o wontidira e taalibaaɓe ɓen, kono tawi fow no hulunoo mo, awa kadi hari ɓe hoolaaki o wontii taalibaajo.
44009027	Onsay Barnabaasi ƴetti mo, naɓi takko sahaabaaɓe ɓen. O sifanii ɓe ko honno kanko Saawulu o yiidiri e Joomi on fewndo o yahata Damaasi e ko honɗun Joomi on yewti mo e ko pellital hongal o waajori Damaasi e innde Iisaa.
44009028	Gila ɗun, tawi o hayloday e maɓɓe Yerusalaam, o yewtira kadi pellital e innde Joomi on.
44009029	Tawi himo yewtidaynoo kadi, yeddondira e Yahuudiyankeeɓe wowlooɓe haala Gereeki ɓen, kono tawi ɓen kadi no ɗaɓɓude no warira mo.
44009030	Ɓay kamɓe siɓɓe wonɓe e laawol gootol ɓen ɓe humpitike ɗun, ɓe nawri mo Seezariiya, ɓe itti mo ɗon kadi, ɓe naɓi mo Tarsiisu.
44009031	Tawi ɓuttu no wonani moftal ngal e nder ɗee leyɗe ɗoo fow, ɗun ko ɗee diiwe Yahuuda e Jaliilu e Samariiya. Tawi hiɓe mawnude e nder gomɗinal ngal, awa kadi hiɓe wuuri e nder yankinaare Joomiraaɗo on, hiɓe ɓeydorde kadi ballal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
44009032	E nder ko Petruusu jindata e nokkeeli ɗin fow kon, o yahi ka ɓee gomɗinɓe hoɗuɓe Lidaa.
44009033	O tawi ɗon goɗɗo, maaya-ɓanduujo, no waalii e danki gila duuɓi jeetati, on no wi'ee Iiniiya.
44009034	Kanko Petruusu o wi'i mo: «Iiniiya, Iisaa Almasiihu on sellinii ma! Immo an tigi, weƴƴitaa danki maa kin!» O immii kisan.
44009035	Ɓay hoɗuɓe Lidaa ɓen e ɓee ka hollaande Saruuna fow yi'ii ɗun, ɓe gomɗini Joomi on.
44009036	Tawi kadi debbo okkaynooɗo fota, waɗa kuuɗe moƴƴe, no hoɗunoo Jaffaa, on no wi'ee Taabiita. (Ko woni firo ɗun e haala Gereeki ko Dorkaas.)
44009037	On debbo nawni e ɗen balɗe ɗon, o maayi. Ɓay ɓe gaynii fewnude mo, ɓe naɓi mo, ɓe wallinoyi e nder suudu goo ka koore dow.
44009038	Nde tawnoo Lidaa e Jaffaa woɗɗondiraa, awa kadi hari taalibaaɓe ɓen andii wonde Petruusu no Lidaa ɗon, ɓe immini yimɓe ɗiɗo ko yahana mo, wi'a: «Yandi men torike ma arugol tinna, hara a neeɓaali.»
44009039	Onsay Petruusu immii, yaadi e maɓɓe. Ɓay o hewtii, ɓe ƴawni mo ka koore e ndun suudu. Rewɓe keynguuɓe ɓen fow ɓadii mo no wulla, e hoore hiɓe holla mo dolokkaaji e burmusuuji ɗi kanko Dorkaas o moƴƴinaynoo wa fewndo ko o wondi e maɓɓe.
44009040	Onsay kanko Petruusu o yaltini ɓe fow ka yaasi, o jiccii, o torii. Ɓawto ɗun o fewtiti furee on, o wi'i: «Taabiita, immo!» Onsay kanko Taabiita o udditi gite ɗen, o yi'i Petruusu, o immii, o jooɗii.
44009041	Kanko Petruusu o nangi mo jungo ngon, o immini, o noddi gomɗinɓe ɓen e keynguuɓe ɓen, o watti mo e juuɗe maɓɓe e hoore ko o wurɗo.
44009042	Ɗun andii e nder Jaffaa fow, buy gomɗini Joomi on.
44009043	Kanko Petruusu o weeri Jaffaa ɗon seeɗa ka garankeejo no wi'ee Sim'uunu.
44010001	Tawi goɗɗo no Seezariiya ɗon kadi wi'eteeɗo Korneliyuusu, on ko yeesoojo goo e nder dental suufaaɓe wi'eteengal dental ɓe Italii.
44010002	Tawi on ko dewo, kanko e yimɓe suudu makko ndun fow hiɓe hulaynoo Alla, awa kadi himo wallaynoo miskinɓe fota, duumoo e toragol Alla.
44010003	Fewndo ka ɓaawo fanaa, o feɲɲinanaa, o yi'i ko laaɓi poy, malaa'ikaajo Alla no naata ka makko. On malaa'ikaajo noddi mo, wi'i: «Korneliyuusu!»
44010004	Kanko Korneliyuusu o punnii mo e hoore himo huli. O wi'i malaa'ikaajo on: «Ko honɗun waɗi Koohoojo?» Kaɲun malaa'ikaajo on wi'i mo: «Torndeeji maa ɗin e dokke ɗe okkorɗaa miskinɓe ɓen ƴentinaama fii ko anditee yeeso Alla.
44010005	Jooni immin woɓɓe ko yaha Jaffaa addanoye goɗɗo no ton no wi'ee Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Petruusu.
44010006	Himo weeri ka garankeejo wi'eteeɗo kadi Sim'uunu, on no hoɗi ka daande baharu.»
44010007	Nde on malaa'ikaajo yewtuɗo mo ɗun yahirnoo, kanko Korneliyuusu o noddi kisan kurkaaduuɓe makko ɗiɗo e suufaajo dewo Alla goo tawanooɗo e ɓen ɓe o halfinaa.
44010008	Ɓay o gaynii ɓe sifanaade ɗun fow, o immini ɓe Jaffaa.
44010009	Bimbi nden ɲande nde tawnoo hiɓe ka laawol, awa kadi ɓe ɓadike saare nden, Petruusu kadi ƴawi ka fowtorde hoore suudu tumbere ɲalorma fii toragol Alla.
44010010	O weelaa, o faalaa ko o ɲaama. Wa fewndo ko o defantee, o feɲɲinanaa goɗɗun,
44010011	o yi'i kammu ngun no udditii, o haynii huunde nanditaynde e sollewol fontiingol njanol jogaangol e coɓɓi ɗin nay no tippoo waaloo ka hoore leydi.
44010012	Tawi no e maggol kulle yaarayɗe koyɗe nay ɗen fow e kala kulle daasotooɗe ka hoore leydi e colli wiirooji ɗin fow.
44010013	O nani hawa no wi'a mo: «Petruusu! Immo waraa, ɲaamaa!»
44010014	Kono kanko Petruusu o wi'i: «Oo'o Joomiraaɗo! Ko fii mi ɲaamaali haa hande ko tuuni maa ko laaɓaa!»
44010015	Ka ɗimmun o nani hawa kan no wi'a mo: «Wota a jogor ko Allaahu on laɓɓini kon wa ko tuuni.»
44010016	Ɗun waɗiri non haa laabi tati. Ɓawto ɗun, nden huunde ƴentinaa kisan ka kammu.
44010017	Wa fewndo ko kanko Petruusu o jiɓii fii ko o feɲɲinanaa kon, tawi e hino yimɓe ka dambugal, ɗun ko ɓee ɓe Korneliyuusu immini, humpitiiɓe fii nduu suudu Sim'uunu.
44010018	Ɓe noddi, ɓe landii si ko ɗoo oo wi'eteeɗo Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Petruusu weeri.
44010019	Fewndo ko Petruusu miijotoo fii ko o feɲɲinanaa kon, Ruuhu Allaahu on wi'i mo: «E hino yimɓe tato ka landotoo fii maa.
44010020	Immo tippoɗaa, yaadaa e maɓɓe, hara a sikkitaaki, ko fii ko min immini ɓe.»
44010021	Onsay kanko Petruusu o tippii, o wi'i ɓe: «E hino lan. Ko min wonɗon landaade fii mun. Ko fii honɗun addi on ɗoo?»
44010022	Ɓe jaabii mo, ɓe wi'i: «Ko hooreejo dental suufaaɓe wi'eteeɗo Korneliyuusu, aaden feewuɗo, huloowo Alla, mo jamaa Yahuudiyanke fow joganii kongol moƴƴol, woni ko malaa'ikaajo laaɓuɗo andini wonde yo o adde ka suudu makko fii heɗagol konguɗi maa ɗin.»
44010023	Onsay kanko Petruusu o werni ɓe. Bimbi nden ɲande, o immii, o yaadi e maɓɓe. Siɓɓe goo ɓe Jaffaa ɗowti mo.
44010024	Bimbiti nden ɲande o hewtoyi Seezariiya, tawi kanko Korneliyuusu himo habbii ɓe, tawi himo nodditi siɓɓe makko ɓen e yiɓɓe makko hiɓɓuɓe ɓen ka makko.
44010025	Ɓay kanko Petruusu o hewtii, Korneliyuusu yahi jaɓɓagol mo, yani ka ley koyɗe makko, o sujjani mo.
44010026	Kono kanko Petruusu o ɓanti mo, o wi'i: «Immo, min kadi ko mi neɗɗo!»
44010027	E nder ko o yewtidata e makko kon, ɓay ɓe naatii, ɓe tawi yimɓe buy no mooɓii ton.
44010028	Onsay kanko Petruusu o wi'i ɓe: «Hiɗon andi Yahuudiyankeejo no toŋanaa ka takkondira e mo wonaa Yahuudiyanke maa ka on naata ka makko. Kono min, Alla hollii lan, haanaa ka goɗɗo wi'a hay gooto no tuuni maa laaɓaa.
44010029	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay on imminii ko yahanammi, mi arii e hoore mi sattinaali. Jooni non mi landike on, ko fii honɗun addirɗon mi?»
44010030	Korneliyuusu wi'i mo: «Hari miɗo toroo Alla ka suudu an ka ɓaawo fanaa, mi yi'i gorko ɓorniiɗo conci jalbuɗi no darii yeeso an, gila ɗun waɗii nii balɗe nay.
44010031	On wi'immi: ‹Korneliyuusu, torndeeji maa ɗin jaɓaama, Alla kadi maanditike dokke ɗe okkorɗaa miskinɓe ɓen.
44010032	Jooni immin ko yaha Jaffaa, addane oo wi'eteeɗo Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Petruusu. On no weeri e suudu garankeejo no wi'ee kadi Sim'uunu ka daande baharu.›
44010033	Ɗon kisan mi immini ko yahane, an kadi a moƴƴinii ko arɗaa kon. Jooni non, men fow meɗen ɗoo yeeso Alla fii heɗagol ko Joomiraaɗo on yamir-maa kon fow.»
44010034	Onsay Petruusu ƴetti haala kan, wi'i: «Ka haqiiqa mi faamii ɗun, fow no fota yeeso Alla.
44010035	E nder leƴƴi ɗin fow, kala huluɗo mo, jokki peewal, o jaɓanay ontigi.
44010036	O tippinanii Banii-Isra'iila'en daaluyee on, fii ko feɲɲinana ɓe Kibaaru Moƴƴo wonduɗo e ɓuttu on, rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on Joomi yimɓe ɓen fow.
44010037	Onon tigi hiɗon andi ko feƴƴunoo kon Jaliilu, haa hewtoyi diiwal Yahuuda ngal fow, ɓawto lootagol maande tuubuubuyee ko Yaayaa waajinoo fii mun kon.
44010038	E ko honno Allaahu on yeɗiri Iisaa, oo jeyaaɗo Naasirata, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wondude e bawgal, ɗun ko on yahaynooɗo hen fow, waɗa moƴƴere, sellina ɓe jinna nangunoo fow, sabu tawde Alla no wondunoo e makko.
44010039	«Ko men seedee kadi ko o waɗi kon fow e nder ndii leydi Yahuudiyankeeɓe haa naɓani Yerusalaam. Ɓe wariri mo fempugol mo e leggal, wenga.
44010040	Allaahu on immintini mo ka ɲalaande tammere, o newnani mo kadi hollitagol,
44010041	hinaa non e yimɓe ɓen fow, kono e seedeeɓe ɓe Allaahu on suɓinoo aranun ɓen, ɗun ko menen ɓee ɲaamiduɓe e makko, yaridi ɓawto immintineede makko e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.
44010042	Kanko Iisaa o yamiri men waajagol jamaa on, fellintinana ɓe wonde Allaahu on toɗɗike mo kanko tigi ɲaawoowo wurɓe e mayɓe.
44010043	Awa kadi annabaaɓe ɓen fow seeditaninoke mo wonde kala gomɗinɗo mo heɓay yaafuyee junuubaaji e innde makko.»
44010044	Nde tawnoo Petruusu no waajaade fii ɗun, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on tippii e ɓen wonnooɓe heɗaade ngol kongol ɗon fow.
44010045	Gomɗinnooɓe sunninaa ɓen fow, ɗun ko ɓee ɓe Petruusu ardii, ŋalɗi fii ko ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen okkaa kon Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
44010046	Ko fii hari hiɓe nanaynoo hiɓe wowla e haalaaji janani, manta Alla. Onsay Petruusu ƴetti haala kan, wi'i:
44010047	«E hara en salanto ɓee heɓuɓe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on ndiyan ko ɓe lootora maande kisiyee wano heɓirɗen non enen kadi?»
44010048	Onsay o yamiri yo ɓe loote maande kisiyee e innde Iisaa Almasiihu on. Kamɓe kadi ɓe torii mo wondugol e maɓɓe e nder balɗe.
44011001	Sahaabaaɓe wonɓe ka diiwal Yahuuda ɓen e ɓe ɓe wondi e laawol gootol ɓen, nani wonde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen jaɓii daaluyee Alla on.
44011002	Ɓay kanko Petruusu o yahii Yerusalaam, gomɗinɓe sunninaa ɓen ɓanniti mo, feli, ɓe wi'i:
44011003	«A naatii ka ɓe sunninaaka ɓen, awa kadi a ɲaamidii e maɓɓe!»
44011004	Onsay Petruusu nangi ɓe sifanagol fii ɗun,
44011005	o wi'i: «Fewndo ko mi woni ka saare Jaffaa, hari miɗo toroo Alla, mi feɲɲinanaa goɗɗun. E nder ɗun, mi yi'i huunde nanditaynde e sollewol fontiingol njanol jogaangol e coɓɓi ɗin nay no tippoo tawammi.
44011006	Ɓay mi ndaarii ɗun, mi tenƴinii, mi yi'i ton kulle yaarayɗe koyɗe nay ɗen ka hoore leydi e kulle buruure ɗen e kulle daasotooɗe ɗen e colli wiirooji ɗin.
44011007	Mi nani hawa no wi'ammi: ‹Petruusu, immo waraa, ɲaamaa!›
44011008	Kono mi wi'i: ‹Oo'o Joomiraaɗo! Ko fii haa hande ko tuuni maa ko laaɓaa naataali ka hunduko an!›
44011009	Ka ɗimmun hawa kan fillitii ka kammu, wi'immi: ‹Wota a jogor ko Allaahu on laɓɓini kon wa ko tuuni.›
44011010	Ɗun warri non haa laabi tati, onsay fow ƴentinaa ka kammu.
44011011	«Tun mi yi'i yimɓe tato imminaaɓe e an iwruɓe Seezariiya no ara ka suudu ka men woni ɗon.
44011012	Ruuhu Allaahu on yamirimmi yaadugol e maɓɓe, hara mi sikkitaaki. Ko ɓee musiɓɓe ɗoo njeegoo ɗowtimmi haa men naatoyi ka galle Korneliyuusu.
44011013	On sifanii men ko honno o yiiri malaa'ikaajo on no darii ka suudu makko, e ko o wi'i mo: ‹Immin ko yahana oo wi'eteeɗo Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Petruusu wonɗo on Jaffaa.
44011014	On yeetoto ma konguɗi ɗi daɗirtaa ɗin, an e ɓeynguure maa nden fow.›
44011015	«Ɓay min kadi mi nanganii yewtugol, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on tippii e wonɓe ɗon ɓen wano o tippornoo non e men ka fuɗɗoode.
44011016	Onsay mi anditi ngol daalol ngol Joomi on wi'unoo wonde: ‹Yaayaa kaɲun ko ndiyan lootiraynoo, kono onon ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on lootirteɗon.›
44011017	Ɓay Allaahu on yeɗii ɓe kamɓe kadi ko o yeɗunoo en kon, enen ɓee gomɗinɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, hari ko mi hombo haa ka mi dartoo Alla?»
44011018	Ɓay gomɗinɓe sunninaa ɓen nanii ɗun, ɓe fanki, ɓe manti Alla, e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Allaahu on yeɗii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen tuubuubuyee fii no ɓe heɓira ngurndan!»
44011019	Saakitinooɓe ɓen sabu ɓittineede ɓawto waregol Astefaana, ɓe yahi haa Fenisii e ka suriire Siipuru e haa Antiyoosi-Sirii. Tawi ɓe alaa ɓanginande hay gooto daaluyee on si wonaa Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
44011020	Heɓii ton e hakkunde ɓen saakitinooɓe, ɓe Siipuru e ɓe Sirenii, arɓe Antiyoosi-Sirii, yewti ɓee Gereekiyankeeɓe, feɲɲinani ɓe fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo Iisaa Joomi on.
44011021	Tawi jungo Joomiraaɗo on no e hoore maɓɓe, yimɓe buy gomɗini, jaɓi Joomi on.
44011022	Nde moftal ngal Yerusalaam humpitinoo ɗun, ɓen kadi immini Barnabaasi ko yaha Antiyoosi-Sirii.
44011023	Ɓay o hewtii, o yi'ii moƴƴere Alla nden, o weltii, o wakkilini ɓe fow catorgol e Joomi on ɓernde tabitunde,
44011024	ko fii hari on ko aaden moƴƴo heewuɗo gomɗinal e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on. Konu yimɓe ɗuuɗungu jokki Joomi on.
44011025	Onsay Barnabaasi yaari Tarsiisu fii yahangol Saawulu.
44011026	Ɓay o tawii mo, o ardi e makko Antiyoosi-Sirii. E nder hitaande fow hiɓe tawdeede e tumbondire moftal ngal, e hoore ɗun hiɓe jannude jamaa yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe. (Ko Antiyoosi-Sirii ɗon taalibaaɓe ɓen attaa noddeede Almasiiyaaɓe.)
44011027	E nder ɗen balɗe ɗon, haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun iwi Yerusalaam, ari Antiyoosi-Sirii.
44011028	Goɗɗo e ɓen no wi'ee Agabuusi, on immii hiitii tippude e Ruuhu Allaahu on, o wi'i wonde heege moolanaange waɗay e aduna on fow. (Ɗun waɗi-le e fewndo laamu Kuloodiyuusu.)
44011029	Taalibaaɓe ɓen anniyii wonde mo bee e maɓɓe wallitoto musiɓɓe maɓɓe wonɓe ɓen ka diiwal Yahuuda embere taaqa maɓɓe on.
44011030	Ɓe waɗi ɗun, ɓe watti e juuɗe Barnabaasi e Saawulu yo ɓen naɓu, jonna ardotooɓe moftal ngal ɓen.
44012001	Ko e fewndo on saa'i, oo lanɗo wi'eteeɗo Heroodu nangi woɓɓe e moftal ngal fii lettugol ɓe.
44012002	O wariri Yaaquuba kaafa, ɗun ko oo kotiraawo Yuuhanna.
44012003	Nde o ndaarunoo o tawi ɗun no wela Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, o nangi Petruusu kadi. Ɗun hawrondiri e Juldeere Bireedi ɗe Aldaa e Lewen nden.
44012004	Ɓay o nangii mo, o ferii mo ka kaso, o itti mojobe nay ko ayna mo, mojobere kala suufaaɓe nayo. Hari e miijo makko ko si Juldeere Yawtaneede nden feƴƴii o ɲaawa mo yeeso jamaa on.
44012005	Ko kanko Petruusu o woni ka kaso, moftal ngal duumii e toranagol mo Alla.
44012006	Weetaynoo Heroodu ɲaawa mo, e on jemma mun, tawi kanko Petruusu himo jolkaa jolokooje ɗiɗi, ɗaanii hakkunde suufaaɓe ɗiɗo, tawi aynooɓe kaso ngon no dartori ka dambugal.
44012007	Onsay malaa'ikaajo Joomiraaɗo on feeɲani mo, ka o wonnoo ɗon ndaygi. O findiniri mo kanko Petruusu mbaɓɓugol mo ka becce, o wi'i mo, «Immo tinna!» Jolokooje wonnooɗe ka juuɗe makko ɗen yani.
44012008	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'i mo kadi: «Haɓɓu duhol maa ngol, wattoɗaa paɗe maa ɗen.» O waɗi ɗun. Malaa'ikaajo on wi'i mo: «Waano burmusu maa on, jokkaa mi.»
44012009	Petruusu yalti, jokki mo, tawi o andaa si ballal malaa'ikaajo on ko goonga, tawi himo sikka ko feɲɲinannde tun o heɓi.
44012010	Ɓay ɓe feƴƴii ayninaaɓe yeeso ɓen e hikkuɓe ɗon ɓen, haa ɓe hewtii ka baafal njandi feƴƴeteengal si yahee ka saare, onsay ngal udditanii hoore maggal yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe yalti, ɓe yaadi haa e laawol. Tun malaa'ikaajo on seedi e makko.
44012011	Kanko Petruusu o hetti non hakkil, o wi'i: «Jooni non, ka haqiiqa, mi andii wonde Joomiraaɗo on imminii malaa'ikaajo mun on, o sortii lan e juuɗe Heroodu e kala ko jamaa Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen tijjinoo e hoore an.»
44012012	Ɓay o faamii ko waɗi kon, o yahi ka galle Mariyama yumma Yuuhanna jammaaɗo Markuusa, ka woɓɓe mooɓinoo no toroo.
44012013	Ɓay o hoɗɗike baafal ngal ka naatirgal, jiwo kurkaaduujo no wi'ee Rodaasi ɓadoyii fii andugol ko hombo.
44012014	Ɓay o anditii hawa Petruusu kan, hakkee ko o weltii, ɗoo yo o udditu baafal ngal, o yahi taho, o andinoyi ɓeya wonde Petruusu no ka naatirgal.
44012015	Ɓen wi'i mo: «A feetii!» Kono o wi'i ko goonga. Ɓen wi'i: «Awa ko malaa'ikaajo makko on!»
44012016	Kono tawi Petruusu no jokki tun hoɗɗagol. Ɓay ɓe udditoyii, ɓe yi'ii mo, ɓe ŋalɗi fota.
44012017	O fankiniri ɓe yeƴangol ɓe juuɗe makko ɗen, o sifanii ɓe ko honno Joomiraaɗo on yaltiniri mo ka kaso. O yamiri ɓe, o wi'i: «Andinee ɗun Yaaquuba e musidal ngal.» Onsay o yalti ɗon, o yaari nokku goo.
44012018	Ɓay weetii, jiiɓoldu tiiɗundu waɗi e hakkunde suufaaɓe ɓen, ɓe woni e landondirgol ko honto Petruusu woni.
44012019	Heroodu kadi ɗaɓɓiti mo, kono o yi'aali mo. O landii suufaaɓe ɓen, o yamiri yo ɓe ware. Onsay kanko Heroodu o iwi ka diiwal Yahuuda ɗon, o yaari Seezariiya fii wonugol ton.
44012020	Tawi kanko Heroodu himo haɓidi e Tiiriyankooɓe ɓen e Siduunayankooɓe ɓen. Ɓe ari ɓe tawi mo e nder nanondiral maɓɓe. Ɓay ɓe hettii Balastuusa oo dankotooɗo kaybonru lanɗo on, ɓe torii ɓuttu, sabu tawde ko leydi on lanɗo tambitinoo leydi maɓɓe ndin.
44012021	Ɓay ɲalaande nde ɓe haldunoo nden hewtii, kanko Heroodu o ɓornii conci makko laamu ɗin, o jooɗii ka jullere makko laamu, o yewti ɓe kamɓe jamaa on.
44012022	Jamaa on nangi ewnagol wi'a: «Kaa hawa ko hito allaajo nii, hinaa hawa neɗɗo!»
44012023	Ɗon kisan malaa'ikaajo Joomiraaɗo on liɓi nawnaare e makko, sabu tawde o jonnitaali Alla mangural ngal, o yilmi, o maayi.
44012024	Kono daaluyee Alla on ɓurti yaajude.
44012025	Ɓay Barnabaasi e Saawulu gaynii golle mun ɗen Yerusalaam, ɓe yiltitii Antiyoosi-Sirii, ɓe naɓori Yuuhanna oo jammaaɗo Markuusa.
44013001	Tawi haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun e jannooɓe no e nder moftal wongal ngal Antiyoosi-Sirii, ɓen-le ko Barnabaasi e Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Ɓaleejo, e Lukiyuusi, oo mo Sirenii, e Saawulu e Manayiina, ɗun ko oo ne'idaaɗo e Heroodu lanɗo diiwal ngal.
44013002	E nder ko ɓe rewaynoo Joomiraaɗo on kon, ɓe hoora, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wi'i ɓe: «Waɗanee lan Barnabaasi e Saawulu feere fii golle ɗe mi noddiri ɓe ɗen.»
44013003	Ɓay ɓe gaynii hoorude toroo, ɓe fawi juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen e hoore Barnabaasi e Saawulu, ɓe nuli ɓe.
44013004	Ɓen ɓe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on immini, ɗun ko Barnabaasi e Saawulu, ɓe yahi Seluusi, ɓe bakii ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Siipuru.
44013005	Ɓay ɓe hewtii Saalamini, ɓe feɲɲini daaluyee Alla on ka juulirɗe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen. Tawi hiɓe wondi e oo wi'eteeɗo Yuuhanna jammaaɗo Markuusa fii ko wallitoo ɓe.
44013006	Ɓawto ɗun, ɓay ɓe taƴitoyii ndee suriire fow haa ɓe hewtoyii Paafuusa, ɓe tawi ɗon mbileejo goo, tawi on ko Yahuudiyankeejo waɗitiiɗo annabaajo, tawi on no wi'ee Bar-Iisaa.
44013007	Tawi himo wondi e on addaaɗo lamminaa ngal diiwal, ɗun ko oo wi'eteeɗo Sargiisu Puulusa, tawi on lanɗo ko jooma-hakkiljo. On lanɗo noddi Barnabaasi e Saawulu ɓay himo faalanoo nanude daaluyee Alla on.
44013008	Kono oo wi'eteeɗo Elimaasi, ɗun ko mbileejo on, (ko fii ko non innde makko nden firiraa), o dartii ɓe, tawi himo ɗaɓɓude fii no o bonnira gomɗinal lanɗo on.
44013009	Onsay Saawulu, himo wi'ee kadi Puulusa, heewuɗo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, tenƴini on mbileejo, o wi'i:
44013010	«Ko an yo heewuɗo kala noone ƴoyre e bonki, ɓiɗɗo Ibuliisa, gaɲo kala peewal, a accataa bonnugol laawi feewuɗi Joomiraaɗo on?
44013011	Jooni non heɗo! Joomiraaɗo on fawete jungo, wumaa, wona e saa'i mo a yi'ataa naange ngen.» Ɗon kisan niɓɓitani mo, niwre tiiɗunde yani e makko, o woni e memugol, tawi himo ɗaɓɓa woɓɓe ko ɗowa mo.
44013012	Ɓay on lanɗo yi'ii kon ko waɗi, o ŋalɗi fii jannde Joomi on, o gomɗini.
44013013	Ɓay kanko Puulusa e wondiɓɓe makko ɓen ɓe iwii Paafuusa, ɓe bakii ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Pergii, ɗun ko e nder ndii leydi wi'eteendi Pamfilii. Ɓay ɓe hewtii ɗon, Yuuhanna jammaaɗo Markuusa on seedi ɗon e maɓɓe, o yiltitii Yerusalaam.
44013014	Ɓay ɓe iwii Pergii, ɓe jokkitii laawol maɓɓe haa ɓe hewti ka saare Antiyoosi-Pisidii. Ɓe naati ɗon e nder juulirde, ɓe jooɗii, ɗun hawri e ɲalaande fowteteende, ɗun ko e aseweere nden.
44013015	Ɓay fii Sariya on e fii annabaaɓe ɓen gaynaama jangeede, yeesooɓe juulirde nden immini woɓɓe e maɓɓe ko wi'a ɓe: «Musiɓɓe, si tawii hiɗon mari konguɗi wakkilinayɗi jamaa on, haray yewtee.»
44013016	Onsay kanko Puulusa o immii, o townani ɓe jungo, o wi'i: «Ko onon yo Banii-Isra'iila'en e onon ɓee hulooɓe Alla, heɗitee!
44013017	Alla oo jamaa Isra'iilayankeeɓe suɓike baabiraaɓe men ɓen, on Yaɲɲuɗo kadi oo jamaa fewndo ko ɓe woni tuŋarankeeɓe e nder ndii leydi Misira, o yaltiniri ɓe ton kadi sookewo makko dolnungo ngon.
44013018	O muɲɲanii ɓe kadi wa telen duuɓi cappanɗe nay ka wulaa.
44013019	Onsay ɓay o mulii leƴƴi jeeɗiɗi e nder ndii leydi Kanaana, o yeɗi baabiraaɓe men ɓen laral leydi ɓen ndin.
44013020	Ɗun fow waɗi e nder duuɓi teemeɗɗe nay e cappanɗe jowi. «Ɓawto ɗun o addani ɓe hooreeɓe, haa e fewndo annabi Samu'iila.
44013021	Ɓawto ɗun ɓe torii heɓugol lanɗo. Onsay Alla addani ɓe Saawulu ɓiɗɗo Kiisi on, jeyaaɗo e oo bolondaa Buniyamiinu, ko laamoo ɓe e nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay.
44013022	Ɓay o follii onɗon, o lamminani ɓe Daawuuda, ɗun ko on mo o seeditornoo ɗunɗoo, o daali: ‹Mi taw Daawuuda mo Yassaa'u ko neɗɗo waalaniiɗo lan e ɓernde, timminoowo faaleeji an ɗin fow.›
44013023	Kanko Puulusa o wi'i kadi: «Ko tippude e fodoore makko nden kanko Alla waɗi si Iisaa jibinaa e nder bolondaa Daawuuda on, fii ko wonana Isra'iila'en dandoowo.
44013024	Ado o arude, hari Yaayaa waajike jamaa Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen fow fii lootagol maande tuubuubuyee.
44013025	Fewndo kanko Yaayaa o timminaynoo golle makko ɗen, o wi'uno: ‹Hinaa min woni on mo sikkuɗon, kono on no ara ɓaawo an ɗoo, on mo mi hewtaa hay firtugol ɓoggi paɗe mun!›
44013026	Kanko Puulusa o wi'i kadi: «Ko onon yo musiɓɓe an, ɓiɓɓe bolondaa Ibraahiima, e hulooɓe Alla wonɓe hakkunde mon, ko haa e men enen ngol daalol kisiyee addaa.
44013027	Ko fii yimɓe Yerusalaam ɓen e lamɓe mun ɓen andaali ko hombo woni Iisaa, awa kadi ɓe faamaali konguɗi annabaaɓe wonaaɗi jangeede ɗin asewe kala, ɓe laatiniri ɗi ɲaawugol mo.
44013028	E hoore ɓe heɓaali hujja happanɗo mo wareede, kono ɓe torii Pilaatu yo o waru mo.
44013029	Ɓe laatiniri nii ko windinoo kon fii makko. Onsay ɓe tippini mo ka leggal altindiraangal, ɓe wallini mo e nder qaburu.
44013030	Kono Allaahu on immintini mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.
44013031	Ɓen yaadaynooɓe e makko gila Jaliilu haa Yerusalaam, yi'itike mo e nder balɗe buy, ɓen ko seedeeɓe makko jooni yeeso jamaa on.
44013032	-
44013033	«Menen, meɗen feɲɲinande on wonde: Alla hunnii ko o fodunoo baabiraaɓe men ɓen kon e fayɓe maɓɓe ɓen, ɗun ko enen. O hunniri ɗun immintingol Iisaa, tippude e ko windii kon ka beytol ɗimmol Zabuura, ka o wi'i ɗon: ‹Ko an woni Ɓiɗɗo an on, hande a wonii mo an.›
44013034	«Kon ko Alla immintini Iisaa e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, hara o luttaali ka ɲolu, ko ɗun o daalunoo, o wi'i: ‹Mi yeɗay on barkiiji laaɓuɗi holniiɗi ɗi mi fodunoo Daawuuda ɗin.›
44013035	Kanko Puulusa o wi'i: «E hoore ɗun, no wi'aa nokku goo kadi: ‹Yaa an Alla, a jaɓataa Seniiɗo maa on laatoo ɲolɗo.›
44013036	Puulusa wi'i fahin: «Kono nde Daawuuda waɗunoo faaleeji Alla ɗin e nder jamaanu makko ngun, o maayuno, o tawtinaa baabiraaɓe makko ɓen, o ɲoli.
44013037	Kono on mo Allaahu on immintini laataaki ɲolɗo.
44013038	«Ko onon non, yo musiɓɓe amen, andee dey ko sabu makko kanko Iisaa feɲɲiniranaɗon yaafuyee junuubaaji ɗin.
44013039	Kala on hooliiɗo mo jogorte feewuɗo e hoore kala ko on waawetanooke jogoreede feewuɗo e nder Sariya Muusaa on.
44013040	Ko ɗun waɗi si men wi'ay on, reenee fii wota ko wi'aa kon ka defte annabaaɓe ɓen hawru e mon, ɗun-le ko ɗunɗoo:
44013041	‹Ndaaree onon ɓee yawitiiɓe, wonee ŋalɗuɓe, mulon! Ko fii e fewndo mon, mi waɗay kuugal ngal on sikkataano hay si on sifanaama!› »
44013042	Ɓay Puulusa e Barnabaasi fokkitii yaltude ka juulirde ɗon, ɓe saatinaa e aseweere aroore nden, ɗun ko ɲalaande fowteteende nden, fii yewtugol fii ɗun.
44013043	Ɓay mottondiral ngal lannii, Yahuudiyankeeɓe buy e naatuɓe e diina Yahuudiyanke buy jokki Puulusa e Barnabaasi, ɓe yewtidi e maɓɓe. Onsay Puulusa e Barnabaasi wakkilini ɓe fii tabitugol, haɓɓitoo e moƴƴere Alla nden.
44013044	E aseweere hikkunde ɗon nden, fayda saare nden fow mottondiri fii heɗagol daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on.
44013045	Ɓay Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen yi'ii on jamaa, ɓe nawli, ɓe yeddi ko Puulusa yewtaynoo kon, ɓe hoyni mo.
44013046	Onsay Puulusa e Barnabaasi yewtiri pellital, wi'i ɓe: «Hari ko e mon taho daaluyee Allaahu on haananoo yottineede. Kono ɓay on bugitike, awa kadi on waɗaali hoore mon handuɓe e ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan, men yaaray ka ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
44013047	Ko fii, ko nii Joomiraaɗo on yamiriri men, o daali: ‹Mi suɓike on fii yo on wonan leƴƴi ɗin ndaygu, e naɓugol kisiyee on haa ka kattudi leyɗe.› »
44013048	Ɓay ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen nanii ɗun, ɓe weltii, ɓe manti daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on, tawnooɓe no muuyanaa ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan ɓen fow gomɗini.
44013049	Tawi daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on no layude e nder leydi ndin fow.
44013050	Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen ƴuuni e maɓɓe rewɓe teddinaaɓe rewooɓe Alla, e mokobaaɓe saare nden, ɓen waɗi jokke e hoore Puulusa e Barnabaasi, ɓe raɗii ɓe ka diiwal maɓɓe.
44013051	Ko ɗun waɗi si Puulusa e Barnabaasi honki mbullaari paɗe mun ɗen e Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɓe ton ɓen, ɓe yaari Ikoniim.
44013052	Fii kala ɗun waɗii, tawi taalibaaɓe wonɓe Antiyoosi-Pisidii ɓen kan no heewi weltaare e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
44014001	Ɓay Puulusa e Barnabaasi hewtii Ikoniim, ɓe naatiri ka juulirde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen. Noone no ɓe yewtiri non waɗi haa Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɗuuɗuɓe e Gereekiyankeeɓe gomɗini.
44014002	Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓe gomɗinaali ɗun ɓen ƴuuni ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen fii yo ɓen waɗu gomɗinɓe ɓen bone.
44014003	Kono laatii, ɓe woni Ikoniim ko neeɓi, tawi hiɓe yewtiraynoo pellital fii Joomiraaɗo on, on Seeditantooɗo daaluyee mun sulfu on, himo newnannoo ɓe waɗirgol juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen maandeeji e kaawakeeji moƴƴi yi'otooɗi.
44014004	Onsay yimɓe saare nden senditii, woɓɓe wontidi e Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, woɓɓe kadi wontidi e sahaabaaɓe ɓen.
44014005	-
44014006	Ɓay Puulusa e Barnabaasi humpitike wonde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen wondude e yeesooɓe maɓɓe ɓen immanike ɓe e feragol ɓe kaaƴe, ɓe tawi yo ɓe yahu, ɓe fattoyoo e ɗee ca'e jeyaaɗe e ndii leydi wi'eteendi Likayonii, ɗun ko Listaara e Derbata, e ca'e heeduɗe ɗon ɗen,
44014007	ɓe woni e waajagol ton fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
44014008	Tawi maaya-koyɗeejo no Listaara ɗon, heɓidaaɗo e boofoyaagal, mo yahaali haa hande,
44014009	tawi on no heɗii ko Puulusa yewtaynoo kon. Puulusa tenƴini mo, ndaari tawi himo mari gomɗinal sellinayngal mo.
44014010	Onsay kanko Puulusa o ewnii, o wi'i: «Immo daroɗaa e hoore koyɗe maa ɗen!» Tun o hawtii nde wootere, o nangi jindugol.
44014011	Ɓay ɓe yi'ii kon ko Puulusa waɗi, jamaa on ewnii e haala Likayonii, ɓe wi'i: «Allaaɓe ɓe mbaadi neɗɗanke tippike e men!»
44014012	Ɓe inni Barnabaasi Zafsa, Puulusa kaɲun Hermiisi, ɓay ko kanko joginoo kongol ngol.
44014013	Onsay oo waɗoowo sadakaaji fii nduu allaaru maɓɓe wi'eteendu Zafsa, wondu ka yeeso saare, addi ga'i e meetelli telen ka dambuɗe saare, tawi kanko e jamaa on hiɓe woniri waɗangol Puulusa e Barnabaasi sadaka.
44014014	Ɓay sahaabaaɓe ɓen nanii ɗun, ɗun ko Barnabaasi e Puulusa, ɓe seeki dolokkaaji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓe wubbi, ɓe ukkitoyii e hakkunde jamaa on e hoore hiɓe sonkana yimɓe ɓen, wi'a:
44014015	«Ko honɗun waɗanton ɗun? Menen kadi ko men yimɓe wano mo'on! Meɗen waajorde on wa Kibaaru Moƴƴo fii ittugol on e ɗii piiji mehi, ruttoɗon e Alla Wuuruɗo on, on Taguɗo kammu e leydi e baharu e kala ko woni e mun.
44014016	E ɗii jamaanuuji feƴƴuɗi, o accuno leƴƴi ɗin fow jokki faaleeji mun,
44014017	e hoore o accaali seeditorgol moƴƴere nde o waɗata nden, ɗun ko yeɗugol on ndiyan saaƴoojan iwrude ka kammu e saa'iiji moƴƴooji fii demal, e timminangol on neemaaji e hebbingol ɓerɗe mon ɗen welo-welo.»
44014018	Fii kala ɓe yewtirii non, ko karahan ɓe waawiri haɗirde ɓen yimɓe waɗangol ɓe sadakaaji.
44014019	Onsay Yahuudiyankeeɓe iwri Antiyoosi-Pisidii e Ikoniim, ɓe murtini jamaa on, ɓe hawtiti, ɓe fiɗi Puulusa kaaƴe haa ɓe sikki o maayii, ɓe daasi mo, ɓe naɓi ka ɓaawo saare.
44014020	Kono taalibaaɓe ɓen hundi mo, o immii, o naatiti ka saare. Bimbi nden ɲande kanko Puulusa e Barnabaasi ɓe yahi Derbata.
44014021	Ɓay Puulusa e Barnabaasi waajike fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e nden saare haa ɓe heɓii taalibaaɓe ɗuuɗuɓe, onsay ɓe yiltitii e ɗee ca'e ɗoo, ɗun ko Listaara e Ikoniim e Antiyoosi-Pisidii.
44014022	Ɓe wallitii taalibaaɓe ɓen fii tiiɗingol ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe wakkilini ɓe e duumagol e gomɗinal ngal, ɓe wi'i ɓe: «Ko e nder tampereeji buy naateten ka laamu Alla!»
44014023	Ɓe toɗɗanii moftal kala ko wonana ɗun ardotooɓe. Ɓay ɓe gaynii hoorude toroo, ɓe halfini ɓe Joomiraaɗo mo ɓe gomɗini on.
44014024	Ɓawto ɗun, ɓe taƴitoyi ngal diiwal Pisidii, ɓe yahi Pamfilii.
44014025	Ɓay ɓe waajike fii daaluyee Alla on ka saare Pergii, onsay ɓe yahi Atalii.
44014026	Ɓe bakii ɗon e laana fii yiltitagol Antiyoosi-Sirii, ka ɓe ƴettanoo ɗon ɓe halfinaa sulfu Alla on fii ɗee golle ɗe ɓe ari e laatinde ɗoo.
44014027	Ɓay ɓe hewtii, ɓe mottindiri moftal ngal, ɓe fillitanii ɓe ko Alla waɗini ɓe kon fow, e ko honno o udditirani ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen dambugal gomɗinal ngal.
44014028	Onsay ɓe wontidi e taalibaaɓe ɓen ɗon ko neeɓi.
44015001	Onsay woɓɓe iwri ka diiwal Yahuuda ari e jannugol musiɓɓe ɓen, wi'a: «Si on sunninaaka tippude e aada Muusaa on, haray on waawetaake dandeede.»
44015002	Ɓay yeddondiral njanal e yewtere tiiɗunde wonii hakkunde maɓɓe e Puulusa e Barnabaasi fii ɗun, onsay musiɓɓe ɓen aadii yo Puulusa e Barnabaasi e woɓɓe goo hakkunde maɓɓe yaadu Yerusalaam, ɓe tawoya sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal fii nden huunde.
44015003	Ɓay moftal ngal wattii ɓe e laawol, ɓe yahi ɓe taƴitoyi Fenisii e Samariiya, e hoore hiɓe fillitanoo ɓen musiɓɓe wonɓe e ɗen ca'e, ɓe fensita ko honno ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen jaɓiri laawol ngol. Ɗun wonani musiɓɓe ɓen fow weltaare njande.
44015004	Ɓay ɓe hewtii Yerusalaam, moftal ngal e sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal tolni ɓe, kamɓe kadi ɓe fillitanii ɓen ko Allaahu on waɗini ɓe kon fow.
44015005	Onsay woɓɓe e fedde Fariisiyaaɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen hawtii, wi'i: «No haani ka ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen sunninee, ɓe yamiree ɗoftagol Sariya Muusaa on.»
44015006	Onsay sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal yiitidi fii ndaarangol ndun muraadu.
44015007	Ɓay yeddondiral ngal tiiɗii hakkunde maɓɓe, onsay Petruusu hawtii, wi'i ɓe: «Musiɓɓe, hiɗon andi wonde, gila ka ɲalaaɗe arane, Allaahu on suɓino lan e hakkunde mon fii no ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen nanira daaluyee Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ɓe gomɗina.
44015008	Alla, on Anduɗo ko woni e ɓerɗe, o seeditoranike ɓe yeɗugol ɓe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wano men non.
44015009	O waɗaali hay fus ko serti hakkunde men e maɓɓe, ko fii ko gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal o laɓɓiniri ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen.
44015010	Jooni non, ko honɗun ndarndoranton Alla rondugol taalibaaɓe ɓen dongal ngal enen tigi e baabiraaɓe men ɓen en waawaali townude?
44015011	Kono ko moƴƴere Iisaa Joomi on tanƴinorɗen dandeede, kamɓe kadi-le wano non.»
44015012	Onsay mbatu ngun fow deƴƴiti, ɓe heɗii Barnabaasi e Puulusa, ɓen fillitanii ɓe kala maandeeji e kaawakeeji moƴƴi ɗi Allaahu on waɗini ɓe e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
44015013	Ɓay ɓe gaynii yewtude, Yaaquuba kadi ƴetti haala kan, wi'i: «Heɗee lan yo musiɓɓe an!
44015014	En nanii ko Sim'uunu Petruusu fillitanii en kon, ko honno Allaahu on haajiraa e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen gila ka fuɗɗoode, o ƴetti jamaa e hakkunde maɓɓe ko wona e innde makko.
44015015	Konguɗi annabaaɓe ɓen no fotti e ɗun-le, ko fii no windii:
44015016	‹Ɓawto ɗun mi artoyay, mi ɓanta suudu laamu Daawuuda yanunoondu ndun, mi ɓanta kadi ko yirbi kon, mi fewna,
44015017	fii no yimɓe heddiiɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓira Joomiraaɗo on, e kala leƴƴi ɗi innde an nden jantaa e mun.
44015018	Ko Joomiraaɗo on daali ɗun, on Waɗunooɗo ɗii piiji andanooɗi gila ko ɓooyi.› »
44015019	Yaaquuba wi'i kadi: «Ko ɗun waɗi si mi miijii wonde moƴƴaa ka sincanen ɓen ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke tuubanɓe Alla satteende.
44015020	Kono windanen ɓe tun, wi'en ɓe yo ɓe terto tuunintinorgol sanamuuji e jinaa e ɲaamugol jiibe e ƴiiƴan.
44015021	Ko fii, gila e ɗiya jamaanuuji feƴƴuɗi, Muusaa no mari yimɓe e saare kala ko waajoo fii makko, ɓay hiɗen jangude fii ɗun e aseweere kala ka juulirɗe.»
44015022	Onsay sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal e moftal ngal fow ndaari tawi no moƴƴi ka ɓe suɓa woɓɓe e hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe wattida ɓe e Puulusa e Barnabaasi fii ko yaha Antiyoosi-Sirii. Onsay ɓe suɓii Yahuuda, jammaaɗo Barsabaa, e Silaasi, tawi ɓen ɗiɗo ko ɓe ɓe musiɓɓe ɓen teddini fota.
44015023	Ɓe wattidi ɓe e ɓatakuru ndu tawata ko ɗunɗoo windii ton: «Menen ɓee musiɓɓe mon, ɗun ko sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal, men salminii on onon ɓee musiɓɓe amen wonɓe e hakkunde ɓee ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, hoɗuɓe Antiyoosi-Sirii e Sirii e Silisii.
44015024	«Men nanii wonde woɓɓe e amen jiiɓiroyii on konguɗi maɓɓe haa ɓe aaninii wonkiiji mon ɗin, ɓen-le wonaa menen yamiri ɓe ɗun.
44015025	Men taw no moƴƴi, e nder nanondiral amen, ka men suɓoo woɓɓe, men immindinana on ɓe e ɓee yiɓɓe amen, ɗun ko Barnabaasi e Puulusa,
44015026	ɗun ko ɓee weeɓituɓe ngurndan mun ɗan fii innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on haa takko mayde.
44015027	Ko men imminiri Yahuuda e Silaasi, ko ko yewta on e hunduko fii ko woni kon ka ɓatakuru.
44015028	Ko fii menen e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on men taw no moƴƴi ka men ronka on fawude dongal goo, si hinaa ɗii haanuɗi ɗoo:
44015029	ɗun non ko yo on terto tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji e ƴiiƴan e mummunteeji jiibuɗi e jinaa. Si on reenike e ɗun, haray on waɗii ko moƴƴi. Yo jam wonu e mon!»
44015030	Onsay kamɓe imminaaɓe ɓen ɓe waynii, ɓe yahi Antiyoosi-Sirii, ɓe wattoyi ɓatakuru ndun e juuɗe mbatu mooɓiingu ɗon ngun.
44015031	Ɓay ɓatakuru ndun jangaama, ɓe weltori kon ko ɓe wakkilinaa.
44015032	Nde tawnoo Yahuuda e Silaasi ko haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun, ɓe ɓeydi wakkilinde musiɓɓe ɓen, ɓe tiiɗiniri ɓe kadi konguɗi buy.
44015033	Ɓay ɓe neeɓidii e maɓɓe seeɗa, musiɓɓe ɓen newnitani ɓe ruttagol ka imminnooɓe ɓe ɓen e dow ɓuttu.
44015034	Kono Silaasi kaɲun tawi luttugol mo ton no moƴƴi.
44015035	Puulusa kadi e Barnabaasi lutti koɗaade Antiyoosi-Sirii ɗon e jannugol feɲɲindina e yimɓe buy fii daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on.
44015036	Balɗe seeɗa ɓawto ɗun, Puulusa wi'i Barnabaasi: «Yiltitoɗen, ndartoyen musiɓɓe ɓen e nder ca'e ɗe waajiɗen fii daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on e mun ɗen fow, fii andugol ko honno ɓe fewndori.»
44015037	Tawi Barnabaasi no faalaa yo ɓe yaadu e Yuuhanna jammaaɗo Markuusa.
44015038	Kono Puulusa ndaari tawi haanaa ka ɓe yaada e on yiltinooɗo ɓaawo maɓɓe gila Pamfilii, salii ɓe ɗowtude ka golleeji maɓɓe.
44015039	Hakkee yeddondiral ngal tiiɗii hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe sakkitori seedugol. Onsay Barnabaasi ƴetti Markuusa, ɓe bakii ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Siipuru.
44015040	Puulusa kaɲun suɓii Silaasi ko o yaada, ɓawto musiɓɓe ɓen halfinde mo kanko Puulusa sulfu Joomiraaɗo on.
44015041	Onsay ɓe yahi, ɓe taƴitoyi Sirii e Silisii, e hoore hiɓe tiiɗina mofte ɗen.
44016001	Kanko Puulusa o hewtoyi kadi Derbata e Listaara, o tawi no ɗon taalibaajo wi'eteeɗo Timotee. Tawi on yumma mun ko Yahuudiyankeejo gomɗinɗo, kono ben makko ko Gereekiyankeejo.
44016002	Tawi musiɓɓe ɓe Listaara e ɓe Ikoniim ɓen no joganii mo kanko Timotee kongol moƴƴol.
44016003	Tawi Puulusa no faalaa naɓorde mo. Onsay o ƴetti mo, o sunnini sabu Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɓe e ɗin nokkeeli ɗon ɓen, ko fii hari fow no andi wonde ben makko kanko Timotee ko Gereekiyankeejo.
44016004	Tawi kanko Puulusa e Timotee, hiɓe hollitude e nder ca'e ɗe ɓe rewi e mun ɗen, pehe ɗe sahaabaaɓe ɓen e ardotooɓe moftal ngal Yerusalaam ƴetti ɗen fii yo ɗe huutore.
44016005	Tawi mofte ɗen no tiiɗude tun e nder gomɗinal ngal, awa kadi hiɓe ɓeydaade ɗuuɗugol ɲande woo ɲande.
44016006	Nde tawnoo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on newnanaali ɓe feɲɲinoygol daaluyee on e nder Aazii on, ɓe yahi ɓe taƴitoyi Firgii wondude e leydi Galaasi ndin.
44016007	Ɓay ɓe hewtii takko Misii, ɓe etii fii yahugol Bitinii, kono laatii Ruuhu Iisaa on newnanaali ɓe.
44016008	Onsay ɓe taƴitiri Misii ɗon, ɓe yahi Turuwaasi.
44016009	E nder jemma on, kanko Puulusa o yi'i e nder koyɗol, goɗɗo mo Masedonii no darii no jeeja mo, wi'a: «Rewu Masedonii gaa, faaboɗaa men!»
44016010	Ɓawto ngol koyɗol Puulusa, men ɗaɓɓi kisan feere no men hewtira Masedonii, sabu meɗen felliti ko Alla noddi men ton, fii yo men waajo fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
44016011	Ɓawto ɗun, men bakii Turuwaasi ɗon e laana ndiyan, men sutori Samotiraasi. Bimbi nden ɲande kadi men sutori Neyapolii.
44016012	Ɓay men iwii ɗon, men yahi Filipii, ɗun ko saare wonde e diiwal aranal ngal ka leydi Masedonii, jeyaande e ley laamu Roomu, men woni Filipii ɗon e nder balɗe.
44016013	Ɲande ɲalaande fowteteende nden, ɗun ko aseweere nden, men yahi e binde caangol, ɗun ko ka ɓaawo saare, ka men tanƴininoo ko ɗon wonnoo ka juuletee. Ɓay men jooɗike, men yewti rewɓe mooɓinooɓe ɗon ɓen.
44016014	Tawi no e ɓen debbo rewoowo Alla, on no wi'ee Linda, jeyaaɗo e ndee saare wi'eteende Saayatiira, yeeyoowo gaara baka. Tawi himo heɗinoo, Joomiraaɗo on kadi udditi ɓernde makko nden fii yo o wonan ko Puulusa yewtaynoo kon.
44016015	Ɓay o lootidaama e ɓeynguure makko nden maande kisiyee, o saatini men e hoore himo wi'a: «Si tawii hiɗon jogori lan wa gomɗinɗo Joomi on, haray naatee ka suudu an, weeron ka ɓeynguure an ɗoo.» O jeeji men e ɗun haa men jaɓi.
44016016	Ɓawto ɗun, ko men yahata ka juuletee ɗon, korɗo mo jinnawii hiitinoowii nangi, ari fotti e amen, tawi kon ko o hiitotonoo no okkoraynoo jeyɓe mo ɓen jawle buy.
44016017	O woni e jokkugol men, menen e Puulusa, e hoore himo ewnoo, wi'a: «Ɓee yimɓe ko kurkaaɗi Alla Jom Ɓural on, awa hiɓe feɲɲinande on laawol kisiyee on!»
44016018	O waɗi ɗun e nder balɗe buy. Ɓay Puulusa haaɓii ɗun, o yeƴƴitii, o wi'i ngin jinnawii: «Mi yamirii ma e innde Iisaa Almasiihu on, yaltu e oo debbo!» Jinnawii ngin yalti e makko e on saa'i tigi.
44016019	Ɓay jeyɓe kurkaadu ndun tawii ka ɓe tanƴininoo heɓugol ɗon bonii, ɓe nangi Puulusa e Silaasi, ɓe pooɗi ɓe, ɓe addi yeeso hooreeɓe ɓen ka nokkuure fottirde.
44016020	Onsay ɓe addi ɓe ka ɲaawooɓe ɓen, ɓe wi'i: «Ɓee yimɓe ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe, hiɓe jiiɓude saare men nden,
44016021	ɓe janna naamuuji ɗi en newnanaaka jaɓugol maa waɗugol, enen ɓee jeyaaɓe e laamateeri Roomu!»
44016022	Jamaa on kadi immanii ɓe kamɓe ɗiɗo. Ɓay ɲaawooɓe ɓen waɗii haa ɓe ɓortii ɓe dolokkaaji ɗin, ɓe yamiri yo ɓe luubor ɓe bedi.
44016023	Ɓay ɓe gaynii ɓe luubaade, ɓe bugii ɓe ka kaso. Ɓe yamiri aynuɗo kaso on yo o jogo ɓe, o ayna fota.
44016024	On yamiraaɗo ɗun bugii ɓe ka nder kaso nder-nderwo, o dumbi ɓe ka koyɗe.
44016025	Ɓay wonii tumbere jemma, Puulusa e Silaasi woni e toragol Alla, beytana mo. Tawi kasooɓe ɓen no heɗii ɓe.
44016026	Tun, nde wootere leydi ndin dimbii ko tiiɗi, didoodi kaso ngon yergi. E on saa'i tigi baafe kaso ngon fow udditii, jolokooje ɗe kasooɓe ɓen jolkanoo ɗen kadi jolkitii.
44016027	Aynuɗo kaso ngon fini. Ɓay o yi'ii baafe kaso ngon udditike, o sorti kaafa makko kan fii wartagol, ko fii hari himo sikka kasooɓe ɓen dogii.
44016028	Kono Puulusa ewnii mo e hawa tiiɗuka, wi'i: «Wota a waɗito bone woo! Men fow meɗen ɗoo!»
44016029	Onsay kanko aynuɗo kaso ngon o torii ndaygu, o wubbi o naati, o yani yeeso Puulusa e Silaasi e hoore himo diwna.
44016030	Onsay o yaltini ɓe ka yaasi, o wi'i: «Koohooɓe, ko honɗun mi waɗata fii yo mi dande?»
44016031	Ɓe jaabii mo, ɓe wi'i: «Gomɗin Iisaa Joomi on, ɗun a dandete, an e ɓeynguure maa nden.»
44016032	Onsay ɓe feɲɲindinani mo e kala wonɗo ka suudu makko daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on.
44016033	Kanko kadi o ƴetti ɓe e on saa'i tigi e nder on jemma, o lootani ɓe barmeeji maɓɓe ɗin. E on saa'i tigi kanko kadi o lootaa maande kisiyee, kanko e yimɓe suudu makko ndun fow.
44016034	O werni ɓe ka suudu makko, o ɓannani ɓe ɲaametee, o weltodi e ɓeynguure makko nden fow fii ko ɓe gomɗini Alla kon.
44016035	Ɓay weetii, ɲaawooɓe ɓen immini mbatulaaɓe mun ɓen ko yaha wi'a aynuɗo kaso on: «Accitu ɓen yimɓe.»
44016036	Onsay aynuɗo kaso on fillitanii Puulusa kon ko ɓe wi'i, o wi'i mo: «Ɲaawooɓe ɓen imminii woɓɓe ko wi'ammi yo mi accitu on. Jooni yaltee, yahon e hoore ɓuttu.»
44016037	Kono Puulusa wi'i ɓen mbatulaaɓe: «Ɓay ɓe foccii men ka tumbere mbatu e ɓaawo ɲaawugol men, menen ɓee jeyaaɓe e laamateeri Roomu, e hoore ɗun ɓe bugike men ka kaso, e hara jooni ɓe yaltinay men ka kene e dow gundoo? Waawaa wonude! Kamɓe tigi yo ɓe aru, ɓe yaltina men!»
44016038	Onsay ɓen mbatulaaɓe yahi hollitoyi ɗun ɲaawooɓe ɓen. Ɓen huli ɓay ɓe andii ɓen ko jeyaaɓe e laamateeri Roomu.
44016039	Onsay ɓen ari, ɓe jeeji ɓe, ɓe acciti ɓe, ɓe torii ɓe kadi yaltugol saare nden.
44016040	Ɓay ɓe yaltii ka kaso, ɓe naatiri ka oo debbo wi'eteeɗo Linda, ɓe yiidi e musiɓɓe ɓen, ɓe wakkilini ɓe. Onsay ɓe yahi.
44017001	Ɓe rewoyi Amfipolii e Apolonii, ɓe hewti Tesalonii ka Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen mari juulirde ɗon.
44017002	Puulusa naati ɗon wano woowirani mo non, o wondi e maɓɓe e nder aseweeje tati, himo yewtidude e maɓɓe fii ko bindi ɗin wi'i kon.
44017003	O sifii, o weeɓiti wonde Almasiihu on no haanunoo tampude e immintineede kadi e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, o wi'i ɓe: «Iisaa oo mo mi woni on wowlande fii mun, ko on woni Almasiihu on.»
44017004	Woɓɓe e maɓɓe hoolii ɗun, ɓe tawti Puulusa e Silaasi, e hoore ɗun Gereekiyankeeɓe ɗuuɗuɓe rewooɓe Alla, e rewɓe buy jeyaaɓe e ɓurɓe teddude ɓen kadi hoolii.
44017005	Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen nawli ɗun, ɓe ƴetti woɓɓe e bonɓe wonɓe ka fottirde ɓen, ɓe wattidi e maɓɓe, ɓe waɗi haa sonko waɗi e nder saare nden e haa yimɓe ɓen dilliri hen fow. Ɓe yahi ka suudu oo wi'eteeɗo Yaasuunu fii ɗaɓɓitugol Puulusa e Silaasi ɓe adda ɓe e yeeso jamaa on.
44017006	Laatii ɓe tawaali ɓe ton. Onsay ɓe pooɗi Yaasuunu e musiɓɓe goo, ɓe addi ɓe yeeso hooreeɓe saare nden, e hoore hiɓe sonka, wi'a: «Ɓee jiiɓuɓe aduna on fow arii ɗoo kadi,
44017007	Yaasuunu wernii ɓe! Ɓe fow hiɓe dartaade yamirooje lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on, e hoore hiɓe wi'a lanɗo goo no woodi wi'eteeɗo Iisaa.»
44017008	Ɗin konguɗi jiɓi jamaa on e ɲaawooɓe ɓen.
44017009	Laatii ɓe accitude Yaasuunu e ɓeya woo nde ɓe yoɓunoo alamaani.
44017010	E on jemma kisan musiɓɓe ɓen watti Puulusa e Silaasi e laawol Biriyata. Ɓay ɓen hewtoyii, ɓe naatiri ka juulirde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
44017011	Tawi ɓerɗe ɓen ɗen no ɓuri ɓe Tesalonii ɓen udditaade. Ɓe jaɓiri daaluyee on heɲaare tiiɗunde e hoore hiɓe taskotonoo ɲande woo bindi ɗin fii andugol ko ɓe wi'aa kon si ko non woniri.
44017012	Onsay buy e hakkunde maɓɓe gomɗini, ɓe gomɗindini e rewɓe Gereekiyankeeɓe tedduɓe e worɓe Gereekiyankeeɓe ɗuuɗuɓe.
44017013	Kono nde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓe Tesalonii ɓen andunoo wonde Puulusa no feɲɲinde kadi daaluyee Alla on Biriyata, ɓen kadi ari, ɓe memmini jamaa on, ɓe jiiɓindiri.
44017014	Kisan, musiɓɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen waɗi feere no Puulusa yaara ka daande baharu, kono Silaasi e Timotee kaɲun lutti ɗon.
44017015	Ɓen wonnooɓe ɗowtude Puulusa, ɓe ardii mo haa Atiina. Onsay ɓen yiltitii, ɓay ɓe yamiraama wi'ugol Silaasi e Timotee wonde yo ɓen tawtoy mo ko yaawi.
44017016	Nde tawnoo Puulusa no habbii ɓeya Atiina, tawi ɓernde makko nden no aani fota kon ko o yi'aynoo saare nden no jokki sanamuuji.
44017017	Onsay o yewtidi e Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e rewooɓe Alla ɓen ka juulirde e yimɓe fottaynooɓe ɓen ka nokkuure fottirde nden, ɗun non tawi ko ɲande woo.
44017018	Faamuɓe goo e nder fedde Epikuriiɓe ɓen e fedde Sitoyikiiɓe ɓen nangi e yewtidugol e makko. Onsay woɓɓe e maɓɓe wi'i: «Ko honɗun oo wowloowo faalaa wowlude?» Tawi woɓɓe e maɓɓe no wi'a: «Himo wa'i wa waajotooɗo fii allaaɓe jananɓe goo.» Tawi ɗun fow ko fii himo waajaade fii Iisaa e kibaaru mun moƴƴo on e fii ummutal ngal.
44017019	Onsay ɓe ƴetti mo, ɓe naɓi ka mbatirde wi'eteende Areyopaasi, ɓe wi'i mo: «A waaway men andinde ko honɗun woni ndee jannde heyre nde wonɗaa wowlude fii mun?
44017020	Ko fii hiɗa waɗude e noppi amen piiji ɗi men woowaa nanude, meɗen faalaa andude ko honɗun woni ɗun.»
44017021	Tawi ɓe Atiina ɓen fow e hoɓɓe wondunooɓe e maɓɓe ɓen ko jokkunoo woo ko wowlugol maa heɗagol piiji hesi.
44017022	Onsay Puulusa darii ka tumbo mbatirde, o wi'i: «Ko onon yo ɓe Atiina, mi ndaarii e cenɗe ɗen fow, mi tawii ko on ɓe diina fota.
44017023	Awa kadi e nder ko mi feƴƴata kon, mi yi'ii kala ko rewoton, e hay mi yi'ii layyorde ka ɗunɗoo windii: ‹Ko ko allaajo mo andaaka.› Ɗun ko on mo wonɗon teddinde, mo tawata on andaa, mi woni on feɲɲinande.
44017024	Ɗun ko on Alla taguɗo aduna on e kala ko woni e mun, on wonɗo Joomiraaɗo kammuuli ɗin e leyɗeele ɗen, on ko mo hoɗataa e nder juulirɗe ɗe yimɓe moƴƴiniri juuɗe mun.
44017025	Hinaa neɗɗanke waɗanta mo, wa si tawii himo hatonjini e goɗɗun, ko on woni Yeɗoowo mo kala ngurndan e poopaali e kala huunde.
44017026	Ko immorde e aaden gooto o tagiri leƴƴi neɗɗanke ɗin fow, yo ɓen hoɗu e hoore ndelo leydi ndin fow. Awa o happiino saa'iiji maɓɓe ɗin e ittiri ko ɓe hoɗata e mun kon,
44017027	fii no ɓe ɗaɓɓira Alla, ɓe yi'a mo si no hawri e nder memugol, fii kala o woɗɗaaki hay gooto e men.
44017028	Ko fii ko kanko heɓirɗen ngurndan, waawirɗen memminaade, ko e makko kadi woodaɗen. Ko ɗun yuɓɓooɓe gimɗi mon goo no wi'i: ‹Ko en fayɓe makko kadi.›
44017029	«Ɓay non ko en fayɓe Alla, haanaa ka miijoɗen wonde Alla no nandi e kaŋŋe e kaalisi maa e kaaƴe lesaaɗe fotinaa, hara ko e immorde e miijo neɗɗanke.
44017030	Hari Allaahu on jogoraano yimɓe ɓen ko ɓe andaano mo kon, kono jooni o daalanii yimɓe ɓen fow e nder nokkeeli ɗin fow yo ɓe tuubu.
44017031	Ko fii o happii ɲalaande nde o ɲaawirta aduna on peewal, rewrude e on neɗɗo mo o toɗɗii, ɗun ko on mo o waɗirani fow seedee timmuɗo immintingol mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.»
44017032	Nde ɓe nanunoo himo wowla fii ummutal mayɓe ɓen, woɓɓe e maɓɓe jali mo, woɓɓe ɓen wi'i: «Men heɗoto ma ɲande goo fii ɗun.»
44017033	Onsay kanko Puulusa o sortii hakkunde maɓɓe.
44017034	Kono fow e mun, ɗun haɗaali woɓɓe humoo e makko, gomɗina. Tawi no tawaa e ɓen oo wi'eteeɗo Denuusi, tawdaaɗo e dental fewjooɓe Areyopaasi ɓen, e debbo no wi'ee Damaari, kaɲun e woɓɓe goo kadi.
44018001	Ɓawto ɗun, Puulusa iwi Atiina, o yahi Korenti.
44018002	O tawi ɗon Yahuudiyankeejo wi'eteeɗo Akiila, mo iwdi mun woni Pontii, tawi neeɓaali ko on yaltidi e sonna mun Piriskiila leydi Italii, sabu ko Kuloodiyuusu lanɗo Roomu on yamiri Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fow yaltugol Roomu kon. Onsay Puulusa yahi yiidoyi e maɓɓe,
44018003	ɓay tawii ko mecce goote ɓe mari, o weeri ka maɓɓe, ɓe woni e gollidugol. Tawi ko wonnoo mecce maɓɓe ko moƴƴingol cuuɗi bagi.
44018004	Tawi kanko Puulusa himo yewtaynoo yewtereeji e aseweere kala ka juulirde fii fellintingol Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen.
44018005	Kono ɓay Silaasi e Timotee iwii Masedonii hewtii, Puulusa jokkii e daaluyee on tun e seeditanagol Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on.
44018006	Kono nde tawnoo Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen no liddaade mo, hoyna, o fiɗɗi conci makko ɗin, o wi'i ɓe: «Yo ƴiiƴan mon ɗan yantu e hoore mon, min mi laaɓii. Kono gila jooni ko ka ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen mi yaarata.»
44018007	O iwi ɗon, o yahi e suudu aaden rewoowo Alla no wi'ee Titiyuusu Yustuusa, tawi kadi suudu makko ndun no ɓadondiri e juulirde nden.
44018008	Onsay oo wi'eteeɗo Kirispuusa, ɗun ko ardiiɗo juulirde nden, kaɲun e ɓeynguure mun nden fow gomɗini Joomi on. Korentiyankooɓe ɗuuɗuɓe kadi heɗotonooɓe Puulusa gomɗini, lootaa maande kisiyee.
44018009	Ɓawto ɗun, Joomiraaɗo on daalani Puulusa e nder jemmaare goo e nder koyɗol, o wi'i mo: «Wota a hulu, yewtu, wota a fanku.
44018010	Ko fii min miɗo wondi e maa, gooto fawataa ma jungo fii waɗugol ma ko boni, ko fii miɗo mari jamaa ɗuuɗuɗo e nder ndee saare ɗoo.»
44018011	Onsay kanko Puulusa o daakii hakkunde maɓɓe e nder hitaande e lebbi jeegoo, himo janna daaluyee Alla on.
44018012	Wa fewndo on saa'i tawi ko Galiyuunu lamminaa Akaaya. Onsay Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen immanii Puulusa e nder nanondiral maɓɓe, ɓe addi mo ka yeeso ɲaawirdu,
44018013	e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Oo neɗɗo no fellintinde yimɓe ɓen no ɓe rewira Alla e noone no woopondiriri e Sariya on!»
44018014	Fewndo ko Puulusa udditata hunduko mun kon, tawi Galiyuunu wi'ii Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen: «Ko onon yo Yahuudiyankeeɓe, si tawiino ko angal peewal goo maa bonnere goo, mi heɗotono on e hoore no newori.
44018015	Kono ɓay ko yeddondiral fii haalaaji e fii inɗe e sariyaaji mon onon tigi, yo ɗun wonu haaju mon. Mi faaletaake wonande on ɲaawoowo ɗun.»
44018016	Onsay o yaltini ɓe ka ɲaawirdu.
44018017	Tun, ɓe fow ɓe nangi Sosteene, ɗun ko ardiiɗo juulirde nden, ɓe woni e piyugol mo ka yeeso ɲaawirdu. Tawi Galiyuunu haajaaka e ɗun.
44018018	Laatii Puulusa daakii Korenti ɗon kadi ko neeɓi. Ɓawto ɗun, o waynitii musiɓɓe ɓen. Onsay o fembii ka wi'etee ɗon Kenkere, sabu himo woondunoo woondoore. Ontuma o bakodi e Piriskiila e Akiila e laana ndiyan fii Sirii.
44018019	Ɓe hewti Efeesi. Puulusa acci ɗon ɓe o wondunoo ɓen, o naatoyi ka juulirde, o yewtidi e Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
44018020	Ɓen torii mo wonugol ɗon seeɗa, kono laatii o jaɓaali.
44018021	O waynitii ɓe, o wi'i: «Mi aroyay ka mon si Allaahu on jaɓii.» Ɓay o iwii Efeesi ɗon e laana ndiyan,
44018022	o tippoyii Seezariiya. O yahi, o hiwroyii moftal ngal, onsay o yahi Antiyoosi-Sirii.
44018023	Ɓay o wonii ɗon seeɗa, o yiltitii, o jindi e ca'e Galaasi e Firgii ɗen, o wakkilini taalibaaɓe ɓen fow.
44018024	Ɓawto ɗun, Yahuudiyankeejo waawuɗo haala, anduɗo kadi bindi daaluyee on, wi'eteeɗo Apoloosi jeyaaɗo Aleksandiri hewti Efeesi.
44018025	Tawi on no jangi fii laawol Joomi on, himo wowliraynoo jiɲo tiiɗungo, himo feɲɲinaynoo kadi janna no feewiri fii Iisaa, tawi e hoore ɗun fow ko ko Yaayaa lootaynoo kon tun o andi.
44018026	Onsay o yewtiri pellital ka nder juulirde. Ɓay Piriskiila e Akiila heɗike mo, ɓe yaadi e makko, ɓe feɲɲinanoyi mo no woniri non tigi fii laawol Alla ngol.
44018027	Kono ɓay tawii Apoloosi no faalanoo yahugol Akaaya, musiɓɓe ɓen wakkilini mo, ɓe windani kadi taalibaaɓe ɓen wonde yo ɓe wernu mo no moƴƴiri. Ɓay o hewtii ɗon, o nafi ɓen gomɗinirɓe sabu sulfu Alla on,
44018028	e hoore himo yeddondiraynoo e Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen ka tumbondiral no tiiɗiri, e himo ɓanginira bindi ɗin wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on.
44019001	Fewndo ko Apoloosi on woni Korenti, tawi Puulusa kaɲun taƴitoyii leyɗe dowje ɗen, haa o hewtoyii Efeesi, o fotti ɗon e taalibaaɓe goo.
44019002	O wi'i ɓen: «Hara on heɓii Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wa ko gomɗinɗon?» Ɓen jaabii mo, ɓe wi'i: «Menen hari hay men nanaali wonde Ruuhu Seniiɗo no woodi.»
44019003	Onsay o wi'i ɓe: «Awa ko honno lootiranoɗon?» Ɓen kadi jaabii mo, wi'i: «Ko no Yaayaa lootiraynoo non.»
44019004	Puulusa wi'i: «Yaayaa ko fii tuubuubuyee looti, e hoore ɗun himo wi'aynoo yimɓe ɓen yo ɓe gomɗin aroyoowo ɓaawo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa.»
44019005	Ɓay ɓe nanii ɗin konguɗi makko, ɓe lootaa maande kisiyee e innde Iisaa Joomi on.
44019006	Onsay Puulusa fawi juuɗe mun ɗen e hoore maɓɓe, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on ari e maɓɓe, ɓe woni e wowlugol e haalaaji janani, wowla ko Alla longini ɓe.
44019007	Tawi ɓen yimɓe ko wa ɓe sappoo e ɗiɗo.
44019008	Onsay Puulusa naati ka juulirde, o yewtiri ɗon pellital. E nder lebbi tati himo yewtidude e maɓɓe o fellintinana ɓe ko yowitii e fii laamu Alla ngun.
44019009	Kono ɓay woɓɓe wonii e sattinkinagol e angal gomɗingol e aybingol laawol Joomi on e hakkunde jamaa on, o sortii hakkunde maɓɓe, o ƴetti taalibaaɓe ɓen o waɗi ɓe feere, o woni e yewtidugol e maɓɓe ɲande woo ka duɗal oo wi'eteeɗo Tiranuusu.
44019010	Ɗun neeɓi yeru duuɓi ɗiɗi, haa kala hoɗuɗo Aazii humpitii fii daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen fow.
44019011	Tawi Allaahu on no waɗaynoo kaawakeeji moƴƴi hawniiɗi rewrude e Puulusa,
44019012	haa ka tawata hiɓe yahaynoo ɓe ƴetta disaaje maa lince ɗe Puulusa meemaynoo ɗen, ɓe adda, ɓe waɗa e nawnuɓe ɓen, ɓen ndikka, jinnaaji bonɗi ɗin kadi yalta e maɓɓe.
44019013	Yahuudiyankeeɓe goo, jindaynooɓe wi'a no raɗoo jinna, woni e jantagol e hoore ɓen ɓe jinnaaji woni e mun innde Iisaa Joomi on, hara hiɓe wi'a: «Mi yamirii on yaltugol e innde Iisaa, on mo Puulusa woni waajaade fii mun!»
44019014	Tawi ɓen waɗaynooɓe ɗun ko ɓe njeeɗiɗo, ɓen-le ko ɓe ɓiɓɓe oo wi'eteeɗo Sekubaa, tawaaɗo e hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
44019015	Ngin jinnawii jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Miɗo andi Iisaa, miɗo andi kadi ko hombo woni Puulusa, kono onon ko on homɓe?»
44019016	Onsay on neɗɗo mo ngin jinnawii woni e mun yani e maɓɓe, o waawi ɓe fow e hoore doole tiiɗuɗe, haa ɓen dogi yalti e ndun suudu ɓe ɓornaaki, e hoore hiɓe barminaa.
44019017	Kala Yahuudiyankeejo e Gereekiyankeejo hoɗuɗo Efeesi andi fii ɗun, kulol nangi ɓe ɓe fow, onsay innde Iisaa Joomi on mawninaa.
44019018	Onsay buy e aruɓe e gomɗinde ari qirritii, weeɓiti boneeji ɗi ɓe waɗunoo.
44019019	Ɓawto ɗun, yimɓe buy waɗaynooɓe mbilankaaku, addi defte mun, ɓe sunni ɗe yeeso fow. Coggu majje on jittaa, tawaa ko tammaaji kaalisi guluuji cappanɗe jowi.
44019020	Ko nii, daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on woni layirde semba e hoore doole.
44019021	Ɓawto ɗun Puulusa eɓɓani fii yahugol Yerusalaam, hara ko Masedonii e Akaaya o rewri. O wi'i: «Si mi iwii ɗon, bee mi hewtoya Roomu.»
44019022	Onsay o immini wallindirteeɓe makko ɗiɗo Masedonii, ɗun ko Timotee e Arastuusa, kanko o luttiti Aazii ɗon seeɗa.
44019023	Onsay jiiɓoldu tiiɗundu waɗi sabu laawol Joomi on.
44019024	Tawi no e nden saare siyaakeejo wi'eteeɗo Dimitiriyuusu, tafaynooɗo rewirkoy tosokoy tafiraakoy kaalisi, hara ko nandintinaakoy e rewirdu allaajo maɓɓe debbo wi'eteeɗo Artemiisi on. Tawi ɗun no wondannoo e ɓe o tafidaynoo ɓen tono tiiɗuɗo.
44019025	On mooɓindiri ɓe o tafidaynoo ɓen, kamɓe e ɓe ɓe kafidunoo mecce goote ɓen, o wi'i ɓe: «On fow hiɗon andi, fii men on ko e ɗee golle ɗoo humii,
44019026	awa kadi hiɗon yi'ude, hiɗon nanude ko woni feƴƴude kon, hara hinaa Efeesi ɗoo tun, fayda ko e nder Aazii on fow wonde, oo wi'eteeɗo Puulusa no murtinde jamaa ɗuuɗuɗo, fellintinira ɓe wi'ugol wonde allaaji moƴƴiniraaɗi juuɗe neɗɗanke wonaa allaaji.
44019027	Ɗun non hinaa fii hayfingol mecce men ɗen tun, kono ko liɓugol fii nduu rewirdu oo allaajo debbo mawɗo wi'eteeɗo Artemiisi e ɓoorugol teddungal makko ngal, on mo Aazii fow e aduna on fow woni rewude.»
44019028	Ɓay ɓe nanii ɗin konguɗi, ɓe heewi tikkere, ɓe nangi e ewnagol, wi'a: «Artemiisi Efeesiyankooɓe ɓen ko mawɗo!»
44019029	Onsay saare nden fow jiiɓondiri, ɓe wubbidi, ɓe saalori ɓee Masedoniyankooɓe ɓe Puulusa jindidaynoo, ɗun ko Gayuusi e Aristarke, ɓe naɓori ɓe ka fijirde mawnde.
44019030	Puulusa kadi faalaa hollitaade jamaa on, kono laatii taalibaaɓe ɓen jaɓaali.
44019031	Hay woɓɓe e hooreeɓe Aazii ɓen, ɓe tawata ko yiɓɓe makko kanko Puulusa, ɓe nuli woɓɓe e makko ko jeeja mo fii wota o yahu ka fijirde mawnde.
44019032	Tawi woɓɓe no ewnoo goɗɗun goo, ɓeya kadi no ewnoo goɗɗun goo, ko fii jiiɓaare nden no woni hakkunde dental ngal, e hoore ɗun ɓurɓe ɓen andaa wuren ko honɗun mooɓindiri ɓe.
44019033	Onsay woɓɓe e hakkunde jamaa on lowi oo wi'eteeɗo Aleksander mo Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen feƴƴini yeeso dental ngal. Kanko Aleksander o towni jungo, tawi himo faalaa sifanaade jamaa on.
44019034	Ɓay ɓeya andii ko o Yahuudiyankeejo, fow ewnodi wa saa'iiji ɗiɗi, hiɓe wi'a: «Artemiisi Efeesiyankooɓe ɓen ko mawɗo!»
44019035	Onsay hoore kaydi on ɗahi yimɓe ɓen, o wi'i ɓe: «Ko onon yo Efeesiyankooɓe, hara ko hombo woni andaa wonde saare Efeesi nden ko ngaynaakoore rewirdu oo allaajo debbo mawɗo wi'eteeɗo Artemiisi, awa kadi ko nde ngaynaakoore nandolla makko iwruɗo ka kammu on?
44019036	Ɓay ɗun hinaa ko yeddinii, wonee deeƴuɓe, hara on waɗiraali huunde hawjere.
44019037	Ko fii on addii ɓee yimɓe, ɓe tawata bonnaa ka hormorde, ɓe hoynaa kadi allaajo men debbo on.
44019038	Si tawii non Dimitiriyuusu oo, e siyaakeeɓe ɓe o kafidi mecce ɓen no galdidi e goɗɗo, haray no woodi ɲaawirɗi e ɲaawooɓe lamminaaɓe fii mun, yo ɓe wullito e ɓen.
44019039	Si tawii non hiɗon mari goɗɗun ko ɓeyditii e ɗun, haray ko ka dental ardinaangal ngal ɗunɗon moƴƴintee.
44019040	-
44019041	Ko fii hiɗen waawi heɓude feloore fii nduu murtaldu waɗundu hande, ɓay dalil woo alaa mo holloyen ko honɗun waɗirɗen nduu jiiɓoldu.» Ɓay o gaynii wowlude ɗun, o yilti jamaa on.
44020001	Ɓay murtaldu ndun accii, Puulusa ɓanniti taalibaaɓe ɓen. Ɓay o gaynii ɓe wakkilinde, o waynii ɓe, o immii, o fokkitani yahugol Masedonii.
44020002	O taƴitoyi ɗen leyɗe e hoore himo yewta yimɓe ɓen nooneeji no ɓe wakkilora, onsay o hewtoyi Gereesi.
44020003	Onsay o koɗii ɗon lebbi tati, hari himo woniri ƴettugol ɗon laana ndiyan, yaara Sirii. Kono nde tawnoo Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen no eɓɓani mo janfa, o aadii yiltitagol Masedonii.
44020004	Hari ko o wondi ko ɗowta mo, ko oo ɓiɗɗo Piruusi mo Biriyata wi'eteeɗo Sopateere, e Aristarke e Sekondiisu, on ko mo Tesalonii, e Gayuusi, on kadi ko mo Derbata, e Timotee e Tikiiki e Torofiimi, ɓee fow ko ɓe iwdi Aazii.
44020005	Ɓen woni yeeso, ɓe habboyii men Turuwaasi.
44020006	Menen kadi, ɓay Juldeere Bireedi ɗe Aldaa e Lewen nden feƴƴii, men bakii e laana ndiyan Filipii. E nder balɗe jowi men tawoyi ɓe Turuwaasi, men waɗi ɗon balɗe jeeɗiɗi.
44020007	E asewe kiikiiɗe, men mooɓondiri fii ɲaamidugol. Nde tawnoo Puulusa ruttoto bimbi nden ɲande, o yewtidi e tawanooɓe ɓen, o junni yewtere makko nden haa tumbere jemma.
