44020008	Tawi lampuuji ɗuuɗuɗi no ka suudu dow-dowru ka men mottondirnoo ɗon.
44020009	Tawi kadi suka no wi'ee Etikuusi no jooɗinoo e damun tosokun e on koore tammo. O ƴetti ɗoyngol luggungol e nder ko Puulusa juutini yewtere nden kon, o accitii ka koore ton sabu ɗoyngol ngol, o yani. O imminaa, tawi o maayii.
44020010	Onsay Puulusa tippii, o ugginii e hoore makko, o ƴetti mo, o tambii, o wi'i: «Wota on aanu, ko fii himo wuuri.»
44020011	Ɓay kanko Puulusa o ƴawitoyii, o taƴiti bireedi on, o ɲaami. Ɓawto ɗun, o yewti kadi ko juuti haa wa ka peeral fajiri. Onsay o yahi.
44020012	Ɓawto ɗun, suka on nattaa ko o wurɗo, ɗun wonani ɓe welo-welo mawngo.
44020013	Onsay menen men hikkanii men yeeso, men bakii ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Asoosi ka men haanunoo yiitidude e Puulusa ɗon, ɓay hari kanko o aadike wonde o seppay.
44020014	Ɓay o tawoyii men Asoosi, men ƴawni mo ka laana fii yaadugol e makko Mitileeni.
44020015	Ɓay men iwii ɗon, men jokki baharu on haa men hewtoyi bimbi nden ɲande yeeso Kiyoo. E ɲallal hikkungal ɗon ngal kadi, men meemoyi ka wi'etee ɗon Samoosi. Ɓawto ngal ɲallal ɗon kadi, men hewtoyi Miletii.
44020016	Tawi Puulusa no miijinoo feƴƴugol Efeesi tun hara daraaki, fii wota o tongo e nder Aazii on. Ko fii hari himo hawji hewtoygol Yerusalaam fii Juldeere Pentakosta nden, si tawii ɗun no waawi mo gasande.
44020017	Ko onsay, ko o woni Miletii ɗon, kanko Puulusa o immini ko yahana ardotooɓe moftal ngal Efeesi.
44020018	Ɓay ɓen arii, o wi'i ɓe: «Hiɗon andi ko honno mi wondiri e mo'on yeru ko mi woni ɗoo kon, gila ɲande mi tippi Aazii.
44020019	E hoore ɗun mi kurkanike Joomiraaɗo on, e hoore yankinaare fow, e nder gonɗi, e hakkunde ndarndeede wonanɗun lan janfaaji immorde e Yahuudiyanke'en.
44020020	E ɓaawo suuɗugol on hay huunde, miɗo feɲɲinande on, janna on e hakkunde fow e ka cuuɗi kala ko wondani on e nafa,
44020021	e seedintinangol Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen fii tuubangol Alla e gomɗingol Iisaa Joomi men on.
44020022	«Jooni yo mi yahu Yerusalaam, ɓay Ruuhu Allaahu on no haɓɓitii e ɗun, e hoore mi andaa ko heɓoytammi ton.
44020023	Ko woni tun, gila saare heɓi e saare, Ruuhu Seniiɗo on no seedintinande lan wi'ammi wonde, kaɓɓi e satteendeeji no sabbii lan.
44020024	Kono mi waɗaa ngurndan an ɗan ko goɗɗun, wa si tawii hiɗan hitti e an, fii tun yo mi timmin jinduruuji an ɗin e golle ɗe mi heɓiri Iisaa Joomi on ɗen, ɗun ko seeditagol fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo fii moƴƴere Alla nden.
44020025	«Jooni miɗo andi, on yi'itataa lan hande kadi, ɗun ko onon ɓee ɓe mi rewi hakkunde mun, mi waajii fii laamu Alla ngun.
44020026	Ko ɗun waɗi, miɗo seedaade hande wonde si goɗɗo e mon halkike, haray wonaa min waɗi.
44020027	Ko fii mi suuɗaali on hay huunde, mi ɓanginanii on eɓɓoore Alla nden fow.
44020028	Jooni reenee, reenidon hoore mon e wuro ngo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on waɗi on e hoore mun ngon, fii no ayniron moftal Alla ngal o heɓiri ƴiiƴan ɓiɗɗo makko on tigi.
44020029	Miɗo andi si mi iwoyii ɗoo, caapaali hunƴuɗi aroyay hakkunde mon ɗi tawata accoytaa wuro ngon.
44020030	Awa kadi woɓɓe hawtoyto e hakkunde mon, hara hiɓe wowla haalaaji ɓoyliiɗi fii pooɗugol taalibaaɓe ɓen e maɓɓe.
44020031	Awa on wattanoyay yiila, anditon, e nder duuɓi tati jemma e ɲalorma mi accaali waajagol mo kala e mon e hoore gonɗi.
44020032	«Jooni mi ƴettii on, mi halfinii Alla e daaluyee moƴƴere makko nden, ko on mari bawgal fii mawningol on e yeɗugol on ndondi wondude e yimɓe Alla ɓen fow.
44020033	Mi himmanaali kaalisi e kaŋŋe e conci hay gooto.
44020034	Onon tigi hiɗon andi ko juuɗe an ɗen mi golliri fii ko mi hatonjini e mun kon e ko wondiɓɓe an ɓen hatonjini e mun kon.
44020035	E nder ɗun fow, mi hollii on yo on gollir nii fii yo on wallito lo'uɓe ɓen, anditon kadi konguɗi Iisaa Joomi on ko o wi'i kon kanko tigi wonde: ‹Ko okkugol ɓuri moƴƴude edii okkoreede.› »
44020036	Ɓay o gaynii yewtude ɗun, onsay o jiccii fii du'ondirgol e maɓɓe ɓe fow.
44020037	Onsay ɓe fow ɓe hirbii mo kanko Puulusa, ɓe lunnii e hoore gonɗi tiiɗuɗi.
44020038	Ko ɓurnoo ɓe sokolinde kon, ko ko o wi'unoo ɓe kon wonde ɓe yi'itataa mo hande kadi. Onsay ɓe ɗowtiti mo haa ka laana ndiyan.
44021001	Ɓay men sertii e maɓɓe, men bakii ɗon e laana ndiyan, men fewni haa Koosi. Bimbi nden ɲande men yahi Rodeesi. Ɓay men iwii ɗon kadi, men yahi Patara.
44021002	Ɓay men tawii ɗon laana lumbooha yaara Fenisii, men bakii ɗon, men yahi.
44021003	Ɓay men ɓattike Siipuru, onsay men acciri ɗon ka nano, men yaari telen Sirii fii tippinoygol ko laana kan rondii kon Tiiri.
44021004	Ɓay men tawii taalibaaɓe ɓen ɗon, men woni balɗe jeeɗiɗi. Immorde e Ruuhu Allaahu on ɓe wi'i Puulusa: «Wota yahu Yerusalaam.»
44021005	Ɓay ɗen balɗe jeeɗiɗi timmii, men yahi. Onsay kamɓe fow e rewɓe maɓɓe ɓen e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen, ɓe ɗowtiti men, men yaadi haa men yalti saare nden, ɗun ko ka sera ndiyan, men jiccii, men du'ondiri.
44021006	Onsay men waynondiri e maɓɓe, men bakii ka laana, kamɓe ɓe yiltitii ka maɓɓe.
44021007	Ɓay men gaynii ko yaaretee laana ndiyan kon, ɗun ko gila Tiiri haa Potolemaayi, men hiwrondiri e musiɓɓe gomɗinɓe wonɓe ɗon ɓen, men wondi e maɓɓe ɲallal.
44021008	Bimbi nden ɲande, men yahi men hewtoyi Seezariiya, men naatiri ka suudu Filiipu oo waajotooɗo fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, tawdaaɗo e njeeɗiɗooɓe ɓen, men weeri ka makko.
44021009	Tawi himo mari jiwɓe nayo haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun ɓe andaali gorko.
44021010	Nde tawnoo men waɗii ɗon balɗe buy, haaloowo ko Alla longini ɗun wi'eteeɗo Agabuusi, iwruɗo ka diiwal Yahuuda, ari tawi men.
44021011	O ƴetti dattol Puulusa ngol, o haɓɓitii juuɗe e koyɗe, o wi'i: «E hino ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wi'i kon: ‹Oo neɗɗo jeyɗo ngol dattol, Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen haɓɓiray mo nii Yerusalaam, ɓe watta mo e juuɗe ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.› »
44021012	Ɓay menen e ɓen yimɓe hoɗuɓe e nden nokkuure men nanii ɗun, men jeeji Puulusa fii wota o yahu Yerusalaam.
44021013	Kono Puulusa jaabii men, wi'i: «Ko honɗun wulloton, bonnon mi ɓernde? Ko fii min hinaa fii haɓɓegol tun mi hebulanii, kono ko hay maayugol Yerusalaam fii innde Iisaa Joomi on.»
44021014	Nde tawnoo o jaɓaali yilteede e ko o anniyii kon, men haɓɓitaaki hande kadi, kono men wi'i: «Yo kodduruyee Joomiraaɗo on waɗu!»
44021015	Ɓay ɗen balɗe ɗon feƴƴii, men eɓɓindii, men yahi Yerusalaam.
44021016	Taalibaaɓe goo ɓe Seezariiya ɗowti men ka goɗɗo no wi'ee Manasuuna mo Siipuru, on ko taalibaajo gila ko neeɓi, fii ko werna men.
44021017	Ɓay men hewtii Yerusalaam, musiɓɓe ɓen jaɓɓori men weltaare.
44021018	Bimbi nden ɲande menen e Puulusa men ari ka Yaaquuba, ardotooɓe moftal ngal kadi fow ari ɗon.
44021019	Ɓay Puulusa gaynii ɓe hiwraade, o nangi e fillitanagol ɓe, fensita ko Allaahu on waɗi e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen e nder golle makko ɗen.
44021020	E nder ko ɓe heɗii mo kon, ɓe mawnini Alla, e hoore ɗun ɓe wi'i mo: «Musiɗɗo, a yi'ii ittiri guluuje guluuje Yahuudiyankeeɓe ko gomɗini, e hoore ɓe fow hiɓe haɓɓitii e Sariya on.
44021021	E hoore ɓe yeetaama wonde hiɗa jannude Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɓe e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen fow wota ɓe jokku Sariya Muusaa on, ɗun ko wi'ugol ɓe wota ɓe sunnin fayɓe maɓɓe ɓen e wota ɓe jokku naamuuji ɗin.
44021022	Hara ko honɗun waɗeten? Ko fii pellet ɓe anday wonde a arii.
44021023	Ko ɗun waɗi si men wi'ete yo a waɗu ko men wi'u-maa kon. No e hakkunde amen yimɓe nayo woonduɓe woondoore.
44021024	Ƴettu ɓen, laɓɓindinoɗaa e maɓɓe, fawtoɗaa njoddi fembagol maɓɓe ngol, ɗun fow anday goonga alaa e ko ɓe wowlanaa kon fii maa, kono an kadi hiɗa ɗoftii Sariya on.
44021025	Kono fii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, gomɗinɓe ɓen, men tawi no moƴƴi ka men windana ɓe, yo ɓe reeno e tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji e ƴiiƴan e mummunteeji jiibuɗi e jinaa.»
44021026	Bimbi nden ɲande, Puulusa ƴetti ɓen yimɓe nayo, o laɓɓindinodi e maɓɓe, o naati ka juulirde mawnde. O feɲɲini ko honde tuma e ɲalaaɗe ɗen laɓɓinagol maɓɓe ngol timmata, sadaka mo bee e maɓɓe waɗee.
44021027	Ka balɗe jeeɗiɗi ɗen timmata ɗon, ɓay Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓe Aazii ɓen yi'ii mo ka juulirde mawnde, ɓe ƴuuni jamaa on fow, ɓe fawi mo juuɗe,
44021028	e hoore hiɓe ewnoo, wi'a: «Isra'iilayankeeɓe, wallee men! E hino neɗɗo wonɗo jannude fow on nokku woo nokku fii liddagol jamaa on, liddoo Sariya on, liddoo kadi ndee nokkuure. E hay o naadii Gereekiyankeeɓe ka juulirde mawnde, o tuuninii ndee nokkuure hormorde!»
44021029	(Ko woni sabu ɗun ko tawde hari ɓe yiidiino mo e oo Efeesiyankoojo wi'eteeɗo Torofiimi ka saare, haa ɓe sikki wonde Puulusa naadii mo ka juulirde mawnde.)
44021030	Onsay saare nden fow memminii, yimɓe ɓen dogi iwri e cenɗe ɗen fow, ɓe nangi Puulusa, ɓe pooɗi mo, ɓe itti ka juulirde mawnde, baafe ɗen ombaa kisan.
44021031	Wa ko ɓe eɓɓata fii warugol mo, tawi hooreejo dental suufaaɓe Roomu ɓen nanii wonde jiiɓoldu waɗii e nder Yerusalaam fow.
44021032	Ɗon kisan, o ƴetti suufaaɓe e yeesooɓe mun, ɓe wubbani ɓen eɓɓunooɓe warugol Puulusa. No ɓe yiirunoo on hooreejo e ɓen suufaaɓe, ɓe acciti piyugol mo.
44021033	Onsay on hooreejo ɓadii mo kanko Puulusa, o nangi mo, o yamiri yo ɓe jolku mo jolokooje ɗiɗi. O landii non ko hombo woni oo e ko honɗun o waɗi.
44021034	Kono tawi e nder jamaa on, woɓɓe no ewnoo wi'a goɗɗun, ɓeya kadi no wi'a goɗɗun goo, tawi kanko hooreejo on o waawaali andude ko woni haqiiqa fii murtaldu ndun. Onsay o yamiri yo ɓe naɓu mo ka daaka suufaaɓe ɓen.
44021035	Wa ko Puulusa ƴawata ɓorɗi ɗin, suufaaɓe ɓen kutii mo tambii sabu hunƴeendi jamaa on.
44021036	Ko fii hari konu yimɓe ɓen no jokki mo, no ewnoo, wi'a: «Waree mo!»
44021037	Wa ko kanko Puulusa o naadetee ka daaka suufaaɓe ɓen, o landii hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen, o wi'i: «E hara a newnanay lan yeetagol ma goɗɗun?» On jaabii mo, wi'i: «Hiɗa waawi haala Gereeki?
44021038	E hara hinaa an woni oo Misirayankoojo, wonuɗo sabu nduu murtaldu ko feƴƴi koo, dogidi e ɓee ittooɓe ko'e guluuje nayo ka wulaa?»
44021039	Kanko Puulusa o wi'i mo: «Min, ko mi Yahuudiyankeejo mo Tarsiisu, ɗun ko e nder Silisii, jeyaaɗo e saare nde tawata wonaa hayfunde. Mi jeejii ma newnanan yewtugol jamaa on.»
44021040	Onsay on hooreejo newnani mo. Kanko Puulusa o immii, o darii ka hoore ɓorɗi, o yeƴani jamaa on jungo, deeƴaango tiiɗungo waɗi. Onsay o hewtini ɓe yewtere nden e haala Yahuudiyanke, o wi'i:
44022001	«Ko onon yo musiɓɓe an e baabiraaɓe an, jooni heɗee mi yewta on fii jaabannde an nden.»
44022002	Nde ɓe nanunoo ko e haala Yahuudiyanke o woni ɓe yewtude, deeƴaango ngon ɓurti kadi. Onsay Puulusa wi'i:
44022003	«Min ko mi Yahuudiyankeejo heɓaaɗo Tarsiisu, ɗun ko e nder Silisii, kono ko e nder ndee saare ɗoo mi ne'aa. Ko e fee Gamaliyiila kadi mi jangi fii jokkugol Sariya baabiraaɓe men ɓen tigi. Hari miɗo huminoo e Alla fota wano wonirɗon non on fow hande.
44022004	Miɗo cukkotonoo ɓen jokkuɓe laawol Iisaa haa woɓɓe maayori, mi haɓɓa, mi soka worɓe e rewɓe.
44022005	Yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on e dental mawɓe ɓen fow ko seedee an e ɗun. Mi hendorii ɓe hay ɓataake fii musiɓɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɓe Damaasi ɓen. Onsay mi yahi fii haɓɓugol jokkuɓe ngol laawol wonɓe ton ɓen, mi adda Yerusalaam fii donkingol ɓe.
44022006	«Wa fewndo ko mi woni ka ɗatal, ɓay mi ɓadike Damaasi, ɗun ko wa naange e hoore, tun ndaygu moolanaangu iwri ka kammu, hunditi lan.
44022007	Mi yani ka leydi, onsay mi nani hawa no wi'ammi: ‹Saawulu! Saawulu! Ko fii honɗun wonɗaa mi cukkanaade?›
44022008	«Mi jaabii: ‹Ko an hombo nii Joomi an?› «O wi'immi: ‹Ko min woni Iisaa jeyaaɗo Naasirata, on mo wonɗaa cukkaade.›
44022009	Ɓen wondunooɓe e an yi'uno ngun ndaygu, kono ɓe alaano nanude hawa on Wonɗo lan wowlande.
44022010	«Onsay mi wi'i: ‹Ko honɗun mi waɗata, yaa an Joomi?› «Joomi on jaabii lan, wi'i: ‹Immo yahaa Damaasi, ko ɗon ɓe yeetoto-maa kala ko haanuɗaa waɗude.›
44022011	«Tawi mi alaa yi'ude han kadi, ko fii hari jalbeendi ngun ndaygu wuminii lan. Onsay wondunooɓe e an ɓen ɗowimmi haa mi hewti Damaasi.
44022012	«Tawi goɗɗo no ɗon no wi'ee Hanaaniiya, on ko gorko dewo ɗoftotooɗo Sariya on, mo Yahuudiyankeeɓe wonɓe Damaasi ɓen fow joganii kongol moƴƴol.
44022013	On ari darii takko an, wi'immi: ‹Ko an yo Saawulu musiɗɗo an, wuntu!› E on saa'i tigi mi wunti, mi yi'i mo.
44022014	«O wi'immi kadi: ‹Alla baabiraaɓe men ɓen suɓike ma fii yo a andu faale makko on e fii yo a yi'u Feewuɗo on, nanaa konguɗi iwruɗi ka hunduko makko ɗin.
44022015	Ko fii a wonay seeditantooɗo mo e yeeso yimɓe ɓen fow fii ko yi'uɗaa kon e ko nanuɗaa kon.
44022016	Jooni non ko honɗun wonɗaa nennanaade? Immo looteɗaa maande kisiyee, laɓɓineɗaa junuubaaji maa ɗin e nder jantagol innde makko nden.› »
44022017	Puulusa wi'i kadi: «Ɓay mi yiltitike Yerusalaam, e nder ko mi torotoo Alla kon ka juulirde mawnde, mi feɲɲinanaa goɗɗun.
44022018	Onsay mi yi'i Joomi on, o wi'immi: ‹Hittin yaltugol Yerusalaam, ko fii ɓe jaɓataa seeditoore maa nden fii an.›
44022019	Kono mi wi'i: ‹Joomi an, hiɓe andi kamɓe tigi wonde mi yahayno gila e juulirde heɓi e juulirde fii piyugol soka ɓen gomɗinɓe ma.
44022020	Awa fewndo kadi ɓe hibbi ƴiiƴan Astefaana ɗan, ɗun ko on seeditantonooɗo ma, hari min tigi miɗo ɗon e miɗo jaɓi ɗun. Awa kadi hari miɗo joganii ɓen wonɓe mo warude conci mun ɗin.›
44022021	Kono o wi'immi, ‹Yahu, ko fii mi imminte ka woɗɗi, ɗun ko haa e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.› »
44022022	Laatii ɓe heɗii mo kanko Puulusa haa e ngol kongol ɗon, onsay ɓe ewnii, ɓe wi'i: «Yo sifa oo neɗɗo itte aduna! O haanaa wuurude!»
44022023	Ɓe ɓeydi sonko, ɓe ferii kadi conci maɓɓe ɗin, e hoore hiɓe bugoo kadi mbullaari dow.
44022024	Onsay hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen yamiri yo ɓe naadu Puulusa ka nder daaka suufaaɓe ɓen, ɓe landora mo cabbi fii andugol ko honɗun wonaa sonkireede nii fii makko.
44022025	E nder ko ɓe haɓɓata mo kon fii foccugol mo, kanko Puulusa o wi'i yeesoojo sufaaɓe wonnooɗo ɗon on: «E hara hiɗon newnanaa foccugol jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu, mo on ɲaawaali toode?»
44022026	Ɓay on yeesoojo nanii ngol kongol, o yahi, o wi'oyi hooreejo dental ngal: «Ko honno gerdataa, ko fii oo neɗɗo ko jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu.»
44022027	Onsay on hooreejo ari wi'i mo kanko Puulusa: «Yeeto lan, e hara ko a jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu?» O jaabii: «Hiiyii, ko mi ɗun.»
44022028	Kanko hooreejo on o wi'i mo: «Min ko kaalisi buy mi itti fii yo mi wonu jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu.» Puulusa kadi wi'i mo: «Min non mi jibina ko mi ɗun.»
44022029	Onsay kisan landotonooɓe mo ɓen diri, hooreejo dental ngal kadi huli, ɓay o andii Puulusa ko jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu, awa kadi o waɗii haa o haɓɓaama.
44022030	Jango mun, nde tawnoo kanko hooreejo dental suufaaɓe Roomu ɓen himo faalaa andude e haqiiqa ko honɗun Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wonnoo mo tooɲirde, o hoynitani mo, o yamiri kadi hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen e dental fewjooɓe ɓen fow mottondirgol. Onsay o addi Puulusa, o joɗɗini mo yeeso maɓɓe.
44023001	Ɓay Puulusa tenƴinii dental fewjooɓe ɓen, o wi'i: «Musiɓɓe, ko e hoore ɓernde laaɓunde mi wonirani Alla haa handeere ndee.»
44023002	Tun yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on, ɗun ko Hanaaniiya, yamiri wonɓe takko makko ɓen bantagol mo.
44023003	Puulusa kadi wi'i mo: «An kadi, Allaahu on bantoto ma yo maadi rawninaandi! Hiɗa jooɗii ɲaawirgol lan Sariya on, e hin-le a bonnirii Sariya on ko yamirɗaa yo ɓe banto lan kon!»
44023004	Wonnooɓe ɗon ɓen wi'i: «A hoynii yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka fii Alla on!»
44023005	Onsay Puulusa jaabii, wi'i: «Musiɓɓe, hari mi andaa wonde ko yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on nii, ko fii no windii: Wota mo wowla yeesoojo jamaa mun on ko boni.»
44023006	Ɓay kanko Puulusa o faamii wonde feccere e wonnooɓe ɗon ɓen ko fedde Sadduusiyaaɓe e ndeya feccere kadi ko fedde Fariisiyaaɓe, onsay kanko Puulusa o ewnii ka hakkunde dental fewjooɓe ɓen, o wi'i: «Musiɓɓe, min ko mi Fariisiyaajo ɓii Fariisiyaajo kadi. Ko sabu tanƴinaare ummutal mayɓe ɓen waɗi si miɗo ɲaaweede.»
44023007	Ɓay kanko Puulusa o wi'ii ɗun, yeddondiral waɗi hakkunde Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen e Sadduusiyaaɓe ɓen, onsay mbatu ngun senditii.
44023008	(Tawi Sadduusiyaaɓe ɓen no wi'a ummutal alaa, malaa'ika alaa, awa kadi ruuhu alaa. Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen kaɲun no wi'a ɗun fow no woodi.)
44023009	Sonko njano waɗi, woɓɓe e yeesooɓe dental Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen hawtii, ɓe immini yewtoore tiiɗunde, ɓe wi'i: «Men yi'aali bone woo e hoore oo neɗɗo. No gasa non hara ko ruuhu maa malaa'ika wowlani mo.»
44023010	Nde tawnoo yeddondiral ngal no tiiɗude tun, hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen huli wota ɓe seekitu Puulusa. O yamiri suufaaɓe ɓen tippagol, ittoya mo hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe naɓa mo ka daaka suufaaɓe ɓen.
44023011	E on jemma hikkiiɗo ɗon, Joomi on ɓadii Puulusa, wi'i mo: «Wakkilo, ko fii wano seeditorɗaa non fii an Yerusalaam, bee seeditoroyaa non kadi Roomu.»
44023012	Ɓay weetii, Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen waɗi janfa, ɓe woondi wota ɓe ɲaamu hay huunde maa ɓe yara, ɗoo e ɓe warude Puulusa.
44023013	Ɓen eɓɓunooɓe kan janfa no ɓurnoo cappanɗe nayo.
44023014	Ɓe yahi, ɓe tawoyi hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen e mawɓe ɓen, ɓe wi'i ɓe: «Men aadike e hoore woondoore tiiɗunde wonde, men ɲaamataa men yarataa hay huunde fannin men waraali Puulusa.
44023015	Jooni nanondiree e dental fewjooɓe ɓen, yiidon e hooreejo suufaaɓe ɓen, faaminanon mo wonde on ndaaray fii nduu muraadu Puulusa hara ko no woniri non, fii no o addira mo yeeso mon. Menen haray meɗen hebulii warugol mo ɗoo yo o hewtu.»
44023016	Kono laatii ɓiɗɗo bandiraawo Puulusa on nani hiɓe yewta fii kan janfa, o yahi o naatoyi ka daaka suufaaɓe ɓen, o humpiti ɗun Puulusa.
44023017	Puulusa kadi noddi goɗɗo e yeesooɓe suufaaɓe ɓen, o wi'i on: «Ɗowtu oo ka hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen, ko fii himo jogii ko o hollita mo.»
44023018	On yeesoojo kadi ƴetti mo, ɗowti mo ka on hooreejo, o wi'i mo: «Ko oo kasoojo wi'eteeɗo Puulusa noddimmi wi'immi yo mi ɗowtu oo suka ka mon, himo mari goɗɗun ko o yeetoo on.»
44023019	On hooreejo kadi jogii mo jungo ngon, ɓe pottitii sera, o wi'i mo: «Ko honɗun jogiɗaa ko yeetoɗaa mi?»
44023020	On suka jaabii mo, wi'i: «Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen nanondirii fii toragol on yo on naɓan ɓe Puulusa jango ka yeeso dental fewjooɓe ɓen, wa si tawii hiɓe faalaa humpitaade ko laaɓi fii nduu muraadu makko.
44023021	Awa wota on jaɓu ko ɓe toroytoo on kon, ko fii ɓuri yimɓe cappanɗe nayo hakkunde maɓɓe no eɓɓi janfa e hoore makko. Hiɓe aadii e nder woondoore wonde ɓe ɲaamataa ɓe yarataa ɗoo e ɓe warude mo. Hiɓe hebulanii non ɗun. Jooni ko newnugol mon ngol tun ɓe heɗii.»
44023022	Onsay hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen newnitani suka on, e hoore o wi'i mo wota o wowlan hay gooto kon ko o humpiti mo ɗon.
44023023	Kanko hooreejo on o noddi kadi ɗiɗo e hakkunde yeesooɓe suufaaɓe ɓen, o wi'i ɓe: «Hebulinee suufaaɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e doginooɓe pucci cappanɗe njeeɗiɗo e ɓe conkenje teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo fii ko yaha Seezariiya hande jemma ka saa'i jeenayaɓo.
44023024	Eɓɓon kadi pucci ka Puulusa ƴawa, naɓon mo lawnon haa ka Felikiisa yeesoojo diiwal ngal.»
44023025	O windirani nii kadi lanɗo on ɓatakuru, o wi'i:
44023026	«Salminaango an min Kuloodu Lisiyaasi, haa e mo'on onon Felikiisa, yo yeesoojo tedduɗo.
44023027	«Awa oo neɗɗo mo mi naɓani on, ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wonnoo ko nangi mo fii warugol. Nde mi humpitinoo wonde ko o jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu, mi ardi e mojobere suufaaɓe, mi jattini mo ɓe.
44023028	Nde tawnoo miɗo faalaa andude ko e hoore honɗun ɓe wonnoo mo tooɲirde, mi naɓi mo e yeeso dental fewjooɓe maɓɓe ɓen.
44023029	Mi tawi tooɲe maɓɓe ɗen ko e baŋŋe yeddondire fii Sariya maɓɓe on. Kono tawi ella woo fawaaki mo fodduɗo e wareede maa sokeede.
44023030	Ɓay mi andinaama janfa no eɓɓaa e hoore oo neɗɗo, mi imminani on mo kisan, mi yamiri ɓen tooɲuɓe mo yo ɓe wullito e hoore makko ka mon.»
44023031	Onsay, suufaaɓe ɓen waɗi ko ɓe yamiraa kon, ɓe ƴetti Puulusa, ɓe nawri mo jemma haa Antipatiri.
44023032	Bimbi nden ɲande ɓe yiltitii ka daaka suufaaɓe ɓen e hoore ɓe accu ɓe pucci ɓen yaadii e makko.
44023033	Ɓay ɓen hewtii Seezariiya, ɓe jonni yeesoojo diiwal ngal ɓatakuru ndun, ɓe watti Puulusa e juuɗe makko.
44023034	Ɓay kanko yeesoojo on o jangii ɓatakuru ndun, o landii Puulusa ko mo o diiwal hongal. Ɓay o andii ko mo o Silisii,
44023035	o wi'i: «Nde tooɲuɓe ma ɓen aroyi woo mi heɗoyto ma.» Onsay o yamiri yo ɓe maroy Puulusa ka suudu laamu Heroodu lanɗo on.
44024001	Balɗe jowi ɓawto ɗun, yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on, ɗun ko Hanaaniiya, ardi e mawɓe seeɗaaɓe e yewtoowo no wi'ee Tertuula. Ɓe wullitii e hoore Puulusa ka yeesoojo on.
44024002	-
44024003	Ɓay kanko Puulusa o noddaama, oo wi'eteeɗo Tertuula nangi tooɲirde mo nii, wi'a: «Yaa an Felikiisa lanɗo tedduɗo, ko sabu mon men heɓiri oo ɓuttu timmuɗo, ko faamu mon ngun kadi woni sabu si ɗee waylanɗe fii nafa oo jamaa waɗi. Meɗen jaɓidi ɗi, ɗi fow ka woni woo e hoore anditangol on fota.
44024004	Kono fow e mun, men faalaaka on tongude haa neeɓa, mi torike on tun, tippude e newaare mon nden, yo on newnan men heɗitoɗon men seeɗa.
44024005	«Men taw oo neɗɗo ko gerenteejo, memminoowo yeddondire e hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe aduna on fow. Ko o yeesoojo fedde Naasirayaaɓe ɓen kadi.
44024006	-
44024007	O etike hay no o tuuninira juulirde mawnde nden. Onsay men nangi mo.
44024008	Onon tigi Felikiisa hiɗon waawi mo landaade kanko Puulusa, andon fii ko men tooɲiri mo kon fow.»
44024009	Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen bambani mo kanko Tertuula, ɓe wi'i: «Ko nii tigi woniri!»
44024010	Onsay Puulusa ƴetti haala kan, ɓay yeesoojo on jonnirii mo haala kan ɓaaƴugol mo, o wi'i: «Miɗo andi waɗii nii duuɓi buy ko onon woni ɲaawoowo e hoore oo jamaa. Awa ko e nder hoolaare mi weeɓitirta jaabannde an nden.
44024011	Waɗaali nii ɓuri balɗe sappoo e ɗiɗi gila mi yahi Yerusalaam fii rewoygol Alla, hiɗon waawi tefude ɗun non onon tigi.
44024012	E hoore ɗun ɓe tawaali miɗo yeddondira e goɗɗo maa miɗo ƴuuna yimɓe, ɗun non woni ka juulirde mawnde, maa e ɗeya juulirɗe, maa ka nder saare.
44024013	Ɓe waawataa kadi hollude ko honɗun ɓe tooɲirimmi.
44024014	Miɗo qirritaade yeeso mon wonde ko Alla baabiraaɓe an ɓen mi woni rewude, e hoore jokkugol laawol ngol ɓe wi'i ko fedde ngol. Miɗo gomɗini kadi kala ko windii ka Sariya e ka defte annabaaɓe ɓen.
44024015	Awa kadi miɗo mari on tama'u e fee Alla, wano kamɓe kadi ɓe tijjori non: on-le ko fii ummutal feewuɓe ɓen e ɓoyliiɓe ɓen.
44024016	Ko ɗun waɗi si min kadi mi etoto fii heɓugol ɓernde nde aldaa e feloore yeeso Alla e yeeso yimɓe ɓen.
44024017	«Ɓay waɗii duuɓi buy mi artaali ka leydi an, mi arti fii addangol yimɓe an ɓen kaalisi fii ko ɓe wallitora, e fii weeɓitangol Alla dokke.
44024018	Ko onsay ɓe tawimmi ka juulirde mawnde e hoore ko mi laɓɓiniiɗo. Mi wondaa kadi e yimɓe maa murtaldu.
44024019	Kono ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓe Aazii goo haanunoo arude hollitoo yeeso mon, ɓe liɓa haala e an, si tawii hiɓe jogii goɗɗun ko ɓe fawa e an.
44024020	Si hinaa ɗun, yo ɓee ɗoo wowlu ko ella hombo ɓe tawi miɗo waɗi wa fewndo ko mi addaa yeeso dental fewjooɓe ɓen.
44024021	Si hinaa taw hara ko fii ngol kongol ngol mi ewninoo e hakkunde maɓɓe tun, mi wi'i: Ko sabu ummutal mayɓe ɓen waɗi si mi waɗaa ɲaaweteeɗo yeeso mon hande!»
44024022	Nde tawnoo Felikiisa no humpitii fii laawol ngol moƴƴa, o yamiri ɓe yiltagol taho, o wi'i: «Nde hooreejo dental suufaaɓe ɓen ari woo, ɗun ko Lisiyaasi, mi ndartay muraadu mon ndun.»
44024023	O yamiri kadi yeesoojo suufaaɓe ɓen yo o maroy Puulusa e hoore hoynangol mo seeɗa, hara o salaaki kadi ɓe Puulusa ɓen kurkanoo mo.
44024024	Ɓay balɗe seeɗa feƴƴii, kanko Felikiisa o ardi e ɓeyngu makko, ɗun ko Duruusiila, tawi on debbo ko Yahuudiyankeejo. Kanko Felikiisa, o immini ko yahana Puulusa, o heɗii mo fii ko yowitii e gomɗingol Iisaa Almasiihu on.
44024025	Nde tawnoo Puulusa ko fii peewal e waawugol hoore mun e fii ɲaawoore aroyaynde nden wonnoo yewtude, kulol heɓi Felikiisa, o wi'i: «Hiɗa waawi yahude taho! Nde mi hettindoyii woo, mi noddete.»
44024026	E himo tanƴininoo kadi wonde Puulusa yeenay mo, ko ɗun waɗi si himo imminaynoo ko yahana mo soono woo fii yo ɓe yewtidu.
44024027	Duuɓi ɗiɗi feƴƴiri nii. Ɓawto ɗun Felikiisa lontiniraa Perkuusi Festuusa. Nde tawnoo kanko Felikiisa himo faalaa sulfinande Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, o acci Puulusa ka kaso.
44025001	Ɓay kanko Festuusa o hewtii e ngal diiwal Seezariiya, o woni ɗon balɗe tati si o yahi Yerusalaam.
44025002	Onsay hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen e mokobaaɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen yahi ka makko, wullitii e hoore Puulusa.
44025003	Ɓe torii mo, ɓe jeeji yo o sulfinan ɓe, o addana ɓe Puulusa Yerusalaam, tawi hiɓe eɓɓunoo janfa no ɓe warira mo ka laawol.
44025004	Kono Festuusa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Puulusa no sokii Seezariiya, awa min kadi mi yiltoto ton ko neeɓaa.»
44025005	O wi'i kadi: «Miɗo waawi yaadude e woɓɓe e hooreeɓe mon ɓen, si on neɗɗo no waɗi bone, ɓe wullitoo e hoore makko!»
44025006	Laatii kanko Festuusa o wondaali e maɓɓe ɓuri balɗe jeetati haa sappo, onsay o yiltitii Seezariiya. Bimbi nden ɲande ɓay o jooɗike ka ɲaawirdu, o yamiri yo Puulusa adde.
44025007	Ɓay on addaama, Yahuudiyankeeɓe iwruɓe Yerusalaam ɓen hundi mo, ɓe liɓi e hoore makko tooɲe ɗuuɗuɗe tiiɗuɗe, ɗe ɓe waawataa fensitude fii mun.
44025008	Puulusa jaabori nii, wi'i: «Mi waɗaali ella liddiiɗo Sariya Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, maa juulirde mawnde nden, maa lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on.»
44025009	Nde tawnoo kanko Festuusa himo faalaa sulfinande Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, o jaabii Puulusa, o wi'i mo: «Hiɗa faalaa yahude Yerusalaam ɲaaweɗaa ton e tawnde an?»
44025010	Puulusa jaabii mo, wi'i: «Miɗo ka yeeso ɲaawirdu lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on, ko ton mi haanaa ɲaaweede. Mi waɗaali Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen ella woo, wano gelorɗon non onon tigi fota.
44025011	Kono si miɗo mari ellaaji, e si mi waɗii kuuɗe fodduɗe e mayde, haray mi salotaako wareede. Kono si tawii goonga woo alaa e tooɲe ɗe ɓe tooɲimmi ɗen, haray hay gooto waawataa lan wattude e juuɗe maɓɓe. Ɗun haray yo mi feƴƴu ka Seezar lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on.»
44025012	Ɓay Festuusa yewtidii e ɓe o fewjodata ɓen, o jaabii Puulusa, o wi'i: «Ɓay a feƴƴinii hoore maa ka Seezar, a yahay yeeso Seezar.»
44025013	Balɗe seeɗa ɓawto ɗun, Agiriipa lanɗo on e Bereniise hewti Seezariiya fii hiwragol Festuusa.
44025014	Nde tawnoo ɓe wonay ɗon balɗe buy, Festuusa weeɓitani on lanɗo muraadu Puulusa ndun, o wi'i: «Felikiisa no accunoo ɗoo goɗɗo ka kaso.
44025015	Fewndo non ko mi yahi Yerusalaam, hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen e dental mawɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wullitino e hoore makko kanko Puulusa, tawi hiɓe landii happangol mo.
44025016	Kono mi jaabii ɓe, mi wi'i: ‹Roomiyankooɓe ɓen woowaa warirgol nii tun, ado ɓe tumbindirde tooɲuɓe ɓen e tooɲaaɗo on, e newnangol on tooɲaaɗo fii no o jaabora ɗen tooɲe maɓɓe.›
44025017	Onsay mi ardi e maɓɓe ɗoo, tawi mi faalaaka juutinde muraadu ndun. Bimbi nden ɲande kisan mi joɗɗini ɲaawoore nden, mi yamiri yo on neɗɗo adde.
44025018	Ɓay tooɲuɓe mo ɓen hewtii, laatii ɓe fawaali mo kuuɗe bonɗe woo, wano mi sikkirnoo non.
44025019	Tawi yeddondiral wongal hakkunde maɓɓe e makko ngal ko yuɓɓondirngal e fii diina maɓɓe kan tun, e aaden mayɗo goo kadi no wi'ee Iisaa, mo Puulusa kaɲun wi'i no wuuri.
44025020	Tawi min miɗo jiɓii fii sifa nden yewtere. Onsay mi landii mo si tawii himo faalaa yahude Yerusalaam, o ɲaawoyee ton fii ɗun.
44025021	Kono Puulusa feƴƴini nden yewtere yeeso fii yo muraadu makko ndun wonu e andal lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on. Onsay mi yamiri yo ɓe maru mo haa nde miɗo feƴƴina mo ka lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on woo.»
44025022	Onsay Agiriipa wi'i Festuusa: «Min kadi miɗo faalaa heɗaade on neɗɗo.» Festuusa kadi jaabii mo: «A heɗoto mo jango.»
44025023	Bimbi nden ɲande Agiriipa e Bereniise ardi e hollitaare mawnde, ɓe naatidi e hooreeɓe suufaaɓe toowuɓe ɓen e mokobaaɓe saare nden ka suudu tolnirdu. E yamiroore Festuusa, Puulusa addaa.
44025024	Onsay Festuusa wi'i: «Ko an yo Agiriipa lanɗo, e onon fow yo wonduɓe e amen, on yi'ii oo neɗɗo mo fii mun waɗi haa jamaa Yahuudiyanke on Yerusalaam fow e ɗoo kadi ari toriimi, hara hiɓe wi'a wonde o haanaa hande kadi wuurugol.
44025025	Kono min mi faamii o waɗaali hay huunde ko foddi e wareede, kono laatii kanko tigi o feƴƴini hoore makko ka laamu dow-dowwu, mi tawi no moƴƴi naɓugol mo.
44025026	Kono mi tawi, mi alaa hay huunde ko mi windana hooreejo dow-dowjo on, hara ko ko haqinqini fii makko. Ko ɗun waɗi si mi weeɓiti mo yeeso mon, tentinii yeeso mon onon Agiriipa yo lanɗo on, fii heɓugol goɗɗun ko mi winda nde lande ɗen lanni.
44025027	Ko fii mi taw wa si tawii no ɓoylii ka naɓa kasoojo, hara hollaali ko ella honɗun woni e hoore makko.»
44026001	Onsay Agiriipa wi'i Puulusa: «Hiɗa newnanaa yewtangol hoore maa.» Ontuma Puulusa towni jungo, o fuɗɗii jaabaade, o wi'i:
44026002	«Hande miɗo weltori heɓugol feere weeɓitangol on jaabannde an nden, yo onon Agiriipa Lanɗo, fii ɗee tooɲe ɗe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen liɓi e hoore an fow.
44026003	Ko fii hiɗon andi haa yaltoyi naamuuji Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fow e yeddondire maɓɓe ɗen fow. Ko ɗun waɗi si mi torike on, jebbilagol heɗoo lan.
44026004	«Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fow no andi ko honno mi wuurirnoo Yerusalaam e ka leydi an gila ka fuɗɗoode cukaaku an.
44026005	Hiɓe andunoo lan gila ko neeɓi, hiɓe waawi non seeditaade. Miɗo wuurirnoo wa Fariisiyaajo, mo fedde mun ɓurnoo cataade e diina amen kan.
44026006	Jooni non, miɗo ɲaaweede sabu tama'u fodaari ndi Allaahu on fodi baabiraaɓe amen ɓen ndin.
44026007	Bolondaaji amen ɗin sappoo e ɗiɗi, ɗin duumiiɗi e rewugol Alla jemma e ɲalorma, no tanƴinii yi'ugol laatagol ndin fodaari. Yaa an Lanɗo, ko fii nden tanƴinaare Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen tooɲirimmi.
44026008	Ko honno waawuɗon miijorde wonde Alla immintintaa mayɓe ɓen?
44026009	«Min tigi hari miɗo miijoo wonde miɗo haani rewude pehe ɗen fow fii liddagol ndee innde Iisaa, oo jeyaaɗo Naasirata.
44026010	Ko ɗun mi waɗi Yerusalaam. Min tigi mi sokii gomɗinɓe mo buy ka kasooji, wano hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen newniranimmi non. Nde ɓe ɲaawetenoo fii wareede woo, min kadi tawayno miɗo wonani nden fewjoore.
44026011	Awa kadi mi jokkayno ɓe soono woo e juulirɗe ɗen fow fii donkingol ɓe, miɗo ɓittinaynoo ɓe fii no ɓe yeddira gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal. E nder ko mi monantoo ɓe haa feƴƴita kon kadi, mi cukkotono ɓe haa ka ca'e janane.
44026012	«Ko e nder ɗun mi yahi Damaasi e hoore nelal e yamiroore hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen.
44026013	E nder yaadu ndun tumbere ɲalorma, mi yi'i jalbeendi no hundi lan, min e ɓe mi yaadaynoo ɓen ka ɗatal, ɗun ko ndaygu iwrungu ka kammu, ɓurngu naange ngen jalbude, yo Lanɗo on.
44026014	Men fow men yani ka leydi. Onsay mi nani hawa no wi'ammi e haala Yahuudiyanke: ‹Saawulu! Saawulu! Ko fii honɗun wonɗaa mi cukkanaade? Ko fii no mettan-maa fii dartorgol wa ngaari dartotoondi soggirdu jom mun.›
44026015	«Mi jaabii mo: ‹Ko an hombo nii, yaa an Joomi an?› «Joomi on jaabii lan, wi'i: ‹Ko min woni Iisaa, on mo wonɗaa cukkaade.
44026016	Kono immo daroɗaa e hoore koyɗe maa ɗen. Ko fii e hino ko mi feeɲiran-maa kon: Miɗo suɓaade ma fii yo a wonu kurkaadu an, e yo a wonu seedee piiji ɗi yi'uɗaa ɗin e hoore an, e ɗi mi hollay-maa ɗin.
44026017	Mi jattinoyte e hakkunde oo jamaa Yahuudiyanke, e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe mi imminoyay maa haa e mun, kamɓe ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen,
44026018	fii udditugol gite maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe yiltoo ka niɓe, ɓe arda ka ndaygu, ɓe iwa e laamu Ibuliisa, ɓe fewta Alla, ɓe heɓa yaafuyee junuubaaji, ɓe tawdee e yimɓe Alla ɓen, ɓay ɓe gomɗinii lan.›
44026019	«Ko ɗun waɗi yo Agiriipa Lanɗo on, si mi salaaki ɗoftaade ko mi feɲɲinanaa iwrude ka kammu kon.
44026020	Mi fuɗɗorani feɲɲinangol ɓee ɓe Damaasi taho, si mi arani ɓee ɓe Yerusalaam, haa naɓani e diiwal Yahuuda ngal fow, e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, fii yo ɓe tuubu, ɓe ruttoo e Alla, ɓe waɗa kuuɗe holluɗe wonde ɓe tuubii.
44026021	Awa ko fii ɗunɗoo Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen yaniri e an ka juulirde mawnde, haa ɓe etii no ɓe mulirammi.
44026022	«Kono haa hande Alla no wallimmi, ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo darii, miɗo seeditaade e yeeso sewɓe ɓen e mawɓe ɓen, e hoore mi alaa wowlude hay huunde ko wonaa ko Muusaa e annabaaɓe ɓen wi'unoo waɗay kon
44026023	wonde Almasiihu on tampoyay, awa kadi o attee immintineede e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, o ɓanginana jamaa Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, ndaygu ngun.»
44026024	Nde tawnoo ko nii o wonnoo jaaborde, Festuusa ewnii no tiiɗiri, o wi'i: «Puulusa a feetii! Gandal maa tiiɗungal ngal feetinii ma!»
44026025	Puulusa jaabii mo, wi'i: «Yaa an Festuusa tedduɗo, mi feetaa. Ko konguɗi goongaaji holniiɗi mi yewti.
44026026	Lanɗo on no humpitii fii koo ko waɗi, mi yewtiray mo woni pellital. Ko fii miɗo hoolii o majjaaka huunde, ɓay ɗun wonaa e qunuutu waɗi.
44026027	Agiriipa Lanɗo on, wonaa hiɗon gomɗini annabaaɓe ɓen? Miɗo andi pellet hiɗon gomɗini ɓe.»
44026028	Onsay Agiriipa wi'i Puulusa: «Hiɗa sikka ko e nder saa'ihun nii waawataami wattude Almasiiyaajo?»
44026029	Puulusa kadi jaabii mo, wi'i: «Woni ko jooni woni ko onsay, ko mi torii Alla, ko yo onon e heɗiiɓe lan ɓen fow hande, on wa'u wano mi wa'i nii, hara hinaa e sifa ɗee jolkanɗe ɗoo.»
44026030	Onsay lanɗo on e yeesoojo diiwal ngal e Bereniise e jooɗodunooɓe e maɓɓe ɓen immii.
44026031	Ko ɓe pottitotoo, ɓe woni e wi'indirgol: «Oo neɗɗo waɗaali hay huunde ko foddi e wareede maa jolkeede.»
44026032	Agiriipa kadi wi'i Festuusa: «Si oo neɗɗo feƴƴinaano hoore mun ka lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on, hanno himo haanaa acciteede.»
44027001	Ɓay wonii aadaama men bakoto ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Italii, ɓe ƴetti Puulusa e kasooɓe goo, ɓe watti e juuɗe Yuliyuusu, ɗun ko yeesoojo dental suufaaɓe jeyaangal ka lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on.
44027002	Men bakii ɗon e laana iwruka Adiramiyuuna rewoyayka Aazii. Men yahi, tawi meɗen wondi e Masedoniyankoojo wi'eteeɗo Aristarke mo Tesalonii.
44027003	Bimbi nden ɲande, men hewti Siduuna. Sabu ko Yuliyuusu jogornoo Puulusa no moƴƴiri non, o newnani mo kanko Puulusa yahugol ka yiɓɓe makko ɓen, ɓen waɗana mo faale makko on.
44027004	Ɓay men iwii ɗon, men takkii suriire Siipuru nden, ko fii hari hendu ndun no alindaade men.
44027005	Ɓay men takkike daande baharu hunduɗo Silisii e Pamfilii on, men hewti Miira, ɗun ko e nder Lisii.
44027006	Yeesoojo konu on tawi ɗon laana iwruka Aleksandiri, yahayka Italii, o ƴawni men ɗon.
44027007	Tawi e nder balɗe buy ko doy men woni yaarude, men ɓattori ndee saare Kinidii karahan. Kono nde tawnoo hendu ndun jaɓaali men jokka ngol laawol, onsay men takkii soɓɓundu Salamonee ndun, men acciri Kereeti ka ɲaamo.
44027008	Ɓay men serindorii ɗon karahan, men hewti e nokkuure no wi'ee Darorɗe Labaaɗe, ɗun ko takko ndee saare wi'eteende Lasaayata.
44027009	Ɓay saa'i juutuɗo feƴƴii, tawi yaadu amen ndun ka nder ndiyan wondii e nawaare, ko fii hari saa'i korka kan feƴƴii. Ko ɗun waɗi si Puulusa hajii ɓe,
44027010	wi'i: «Mi yi'ii wonde nduu yaadu nder ndiyan gasataa e ɓaawo masiibo e kasaara, ɗun non hinaa fii laana kan e dolle ɗen tun, kono fii wonkiiji men ɗin enen kadi.»
44027011	Kono yeesoojo dental suufaaɓe ɓen hoolori doginoowo laana kan e yeesoojo makka on edii o heɗaade yewtereeji Puulusa ɗin.
44027012	Nde tawnoo ngal dingiral laaɗe ndiyan moƴƴaa ndungu, ɓurɓe ɓen e maɓɓe aadii yo ɓe yahu ɓe hettoya si tawii no gasa, ka wi'etee ɗon Feniika, e ngal dingiral laaɗe wongal Kereeti hikkorngal hirnaange ɲaamo e hirnaange nano, fii yo ɓe feƴƴin ɗon ndungu ngun.
44027013	Onsay kenun wifi iwri ka sengo ɲaamo, ɓe sikki wonde ɓe heɓii ko ɓe faandinoo kon. Onsay ɓe towni darnirɗun laana kan, ɓe serindii binde Kereeti.
44027014	Kono ɓawto ɗun seeɗa, kenii moolanaangii wifi sortori ka suriire, ngin no wi'ee kenii funnaange nano.
44027015	Laatii laana kan waawaali tiindaade hendu ndun, ndu naɓi ka, menen kadi men acci ka naɓi men.
44027016	Men yaari non haa men bakitori ka sengo ɲaamo wirnitorngo surihun tosokun no wi'ee Kawda, ka men wawtii laakun danditorkun kun ɗon e hoore karahan.
44027017	Ɓay kun ƴawnaama, men heɓi feere ƴettugol ɓoggi ɗin, haɓɓa laana kan. Nde tawnoo kadi meɗen hulnoo saggoygol ka njaareendi Sirtisi, onsay men tippini darnirɗun laana kan ka nder ndiyan, ko nii men yaari.
44027018	Nde tawnoo kenii ngin no yeƴude men fota, bimbi nden ɲande men woni e bugagol dolle ɗen ka ndiyan.
44027019	Ɲande timmunoo nden balɗe tati, gollooɓe ɓen ƴettani hoore mun aalaaji gollirɗi ka laana ɗin, ɓe bugii ka ndiyan.
44027020	Tawi e nder balɗe buy, hinaa naange hinaa koode woni ko yalti. Tawi kenii ngin ɓurtu tabitude tiiɗa haa men taƴii hisugol few.
44027021	E hoore ɗun, tawi neeɓii men ɲaamaali. Onsay Puulusa hawtii darii e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen, o wi'i: «On jaɓanayno lan, hara en iwaali Kereeti, ɗun on daɗayno oo masiibo e oo kasaara.
44027022	Jooni mi ɓeydii on wakkilinde, ko fii on fow wonkiiji mon ɗin daɗay, ko laana kan tun woni daɗataa.
44027023	Ko fii oo Alla Jeyɗo lan, on mo mi rewata, malaa'ikaajo mun on arii e an e oo jemma,
44027024	o wi'immi: ‹Wota a hulu yo Puulusa, ko fii bee daroɗaa yeeso lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on. Awa kadi Alla yeɗete sulfu fii ɓe wonduɗaa ka ndiyan ɓen fow.›
44027025	Ko ɗun waɗi, si mi wi'ay on wakkilee, ko fii miɗo hoolii ko Alla wi'immi kon waɗiray non.
44027026	Kono fow e mun, bee saggoyen e suriire.»
44027027	Ka jemmaare sappoo e nayaɓere gila hendu ndun woni men bugondirde e on baharu Adriyatiika, gollooɓe ka laana ɓen sogitii ɓadagol amen leydi ndin tumbere jemma.
44027028	Onsay ɓe yolli sawru eɓɓirdu ndun, ɓe tawi luggeendi ndin ko sogone cappanɗe jeetati. Ɓay men woɗɗitike ɗon seeɗa, ɓe yolliti ndu kadi, ɓe tawi luggeendi ndin ko sogone cappanɗe jeegoo.
44027029	Nde tawnoo hiɓe hulunoo yi'ugol ka laana kan lancotoo e kaaƴe, onsay ɓe bugori darnirɗe nay laana kan ɓaawo, tawi ko ɓe habbii woo ko weetugol ngol.
44027030	Tawi gollooɓe ka laana ɓen no ɗaɓɓude no seedira e makka. Onsay ɓe tippini laakun danditorkun kun ka nder ndiyan, wa si tawii hiɓe yahude waɗoya darnirɗe laana kan yeeso makka.
44027031	Onsay Puulusa wi'i yeesoojo suufaaɓe ɓen e suufaaɓe ɓen: «Wattanee yiila, ko fii si ɓee yimɓe wonaali ka nder laana gaa, haray on waawataa daɗude hande kadi.»
44027032	Onsay suufaaɓe ɓen taƴi ɓoggi laakun danditorkun kun, ɓe acci kun yoolii.
44027033	Ado weetude, Puulusa wakkilini fow fii ɲaamugol e hoore himo wi'a ɓe: «Ko hande woni ɲalaande sappoo e nayaɓere nden hiɗon habbii e hoore on ɲaamaali hay huunde haa jooni.
44027034	Mi wakkilinii on jooni ɲaamugol, ko fii ɗun no haani fii no daɗiron, awa kadi hay gooto e mon cukulol hoore mun hayrataa.»
44027035	Ɓay o gaynii wi'ude ɗun, o ƴetti bireedi on, o jarni Alla yeeso maɓɓe ɓe fow. Onsay o senditi, o nangani ɲaamugol.
44027036	Ɓay ɓe wakkilinaama, ɓe fow ɓe ɲaami.
44027037	Tawi wonnooɓe ka laana ɓen fow ko ɓe yimɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njeeɗiɗo e njeegoo.
44027038	Ɓay wonii ɓe ɲaamii haa, ɓe hayfiniri laana kan bugagol ɲaametee on ka baharu.
44027039	Ɓay weetii, laatii ɓe anditaali leydi ndin, kono ɓe haccii salndu baharu on e pencen mun, ɓe fottani nawrugol ton laana kan si no hawri.
44027040	Onsay ɓe taƴi ɓoggi darnirɗe laana kan ɗin, ɓe acci ɗe ka ndiyan, ɓe acciti kadi kaɓɓi ardorɗe laana kan. Onsay ɓe fonti bagi wonɗo on ka leggal laana kan, ɓe fewtini e hendu ndun, ɓe yaari ka pencen salndu baharu on.
44027041	Kono ɓe hawroyi e mowre njaare e hakkunde waameeji ɗiɗi, ɓe acci laana kan saggi ɗon. Hakkee ko yeeso laana kan irii, tawi ka waawataa dillude, awa kadi hakkee ko morlooɗe ndiyan ɗen tiiɗunoo ɓaawo laana kan lancii.
44027042	Tawi kadi suufaaɓe ɓen no miijinoo warugol kasooɓe ɓen, fii wota hay gooto e maɓɓe fubbo laawoo.
44027043	Kono tawi yeesoojo suufaaɓe ɓen no aadii dandugol Puulusa, o falli ɓe waɗugol kon ko ɓe eɓɓi. O yamiri yo wawɓe fubbaade ɓen atto ukkaade fii hettoygol gaɗa,
44027044	heddiiɓe ɓen kadi huutora pecce maa goɗɗun e kunte laana kan. Ko nii fow hewtiroyi gaɗa e hoore jam.
44028001	Ɓay men daɗii, men andi wonde suriire nde men woni e mun nden ko Malta wi'etee.
44028002	Yimɓe hoɗuɓe ɗon ɓen holli men teddungal mawngal, ɓe ɓanniti men fow, ɓe huɓɓi yiite sabu ndiyan ɗan e jaangol ngol.
44028003	Onsay Puulusa ƴetti donkun leɗɗe, ukki ka yiite. Kono sabu nguleendi yiite ngen, kuuraari sortii ton siŋii jungo makko ngon.
44028004	Ɓay ɓen yimɓe nden suriire yi'ii ngin kullii no siŋii mo jungo ngon, ɓe wi'indiri: «Wa jooni oo neɗɗo ko ittoowo hoore, ko fii ko karahan o daɗiri ka baharu, kono ɲaawoore nden accataa o wuura.»
44028005	Kono laatii Puulusa piɗɗii kullii ngin ka nder yiite e hoore o heɓaali bone woo.
44028006	Tawi ɓen yimɓe ko habbii woo ko yi'ugol ka o ɓuuti maa ka o yanata, o maaya kisan. Kono ɓay ɓe habbike haa, ɓe yi'aali hay huunde ko heɓi mo, ɓe yiltitii, ɓe wi'i ko o allaajo.
44028007	Tawi nokkuure no moggo ɗon, nde ɓurɗo teddude e suriire nden no wi'ee Pubiliyuusa jeyi. On jaɓɓii men, o werni men ɗon e hoore giggol e nder balɗe tati.
44028008	Tawi ben Pubiliyuusa no nawni, waalii nguli-ɓandu e dogu-reedu. Onsay Puulusa naati ka makko, fawi juuɗe ɗen e hoore makko, o toranii mo Alla, o ndikkini mo.
44028009	Ɓawto ɗun nawnuɓe ɓen ka suriire fow ari e makko, o ndikkini ɓen kadi.
44028010	Onsay ɓe waɗani men teddungal njanal. Ɓay wonii men fokkitii kadi, ɓe waɗani men dokke ɗe men handi e mun.
44028011	Ɓawto koɗagol amen e nder lebbi tati, men ƴawi ɗon e laana iwruka Aleksandiri, ruumunooka e nden suriire, maandiniranooka sanamuuji funeeji ɗin.
44028012	Ɓay men hewtoyii Sirakuusa, men woni ɗon balɗe tati.
44028013	Ɓay men iwii ɗon, e nder ko men takkotoo kon, men hewti Regiyuuna. Bimbi nden ɲande hendu ndun immori ka ɲaamo ɓaawo amen, e nder balɗe ɗiɗi tawi men hewtii Pusolii.
44028014	Men tawi ɗon musiɓɓe goo, ɓen torii men wondugol e maɓɓe ɗon balɗe jeeɗiɗi, ko nii men yaari Roomu.
44028015	Musiɓɓe wonɓe e nden saare, humpitinooɓe fii amen ɓen, ari haa e ndee nokkuure fottirde wonde Apiyuusu e haa e ngoo hoɗo wi'eteengo Cuuɗi Tati Hoɓɓe, fii fottugol e amen. Ɓay Puulusa yi'ii ɓe, o jarni Alla, o ɓeydi wakkilaare.
44028016	Ɓay men hewtii Roomu, Puulusa newnanaa wonugol feere wondude e suufaajo goo ko ayna mo.
44028017	Balɗe tati ɓawto ɗun, kanko Puulusa o nodditi mokobaaɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen. Ɓay wonii ɓe mooɓondirii, onsay o hewtini ɓe ndee yewtere ɗoo, o wi'i: «Musiɓɓe, e ɓaawo waɗugol an jamaa on hay huunde maa dartagol aadaaji maamiraaɓe men ɓen, mi wattaama e juuɗe Roomiyankooɓe ɓen, mi sokaa gila Yerusalaam.
44028018	Ɓay ɓen gaynii landaade lan, ɓe faalaa lan accitude, ɓay ɓe yi'aali e an huunde ko foddi e mayde.
44028019	Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen dartii. Mi tawi min kadi bee mi hewta lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on e hoore mi miijaaki tooɲude jamaa an on.
44028020	Ko fii ɗun mi faaliranoo on yiirude, mi yewta on, ko fii ko sabu tanƴinaare Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen mi jolkiraa ngal jolokowal.»
44028021	Ɓen kadi jaabii mo, wi'i: «Men hendaaki ɓataake woo iwruɗe ka diiwal Yahuuda fii maa, awa kadi hay gooto e musiɓɓe ɓen araali hewtini men goɗɗun maa wowlu-maa ko boni.
44028022	Kono meɗen faalaa andirde ma ko miijiɗaa. Ko fii meɗen andi ndee fedde ko liddondirteende ka woni woo.»
44028023	Onsay ɓe bugitii e ɲalaande goo. Ɓay wonii nden ɲalaande nde ɓe haldi hewtii, ɗuuɗuɓe ari ka makko ɓuri aranun. E nder ko o sifotoo kon, tawi himo seeditaade fii laamu Alla ngun, awa kadi himo rewrude e Sariya Muusaa on e defte annabaaɓe ɓen fii holnugol ɓe fii Iisaa, ɗun waɗi gila bimbi haa kiikiiɗe.
44028024	Woɓɓe felliti sabu ko o wowli kon, woɓɓe ronki hoolaade.
44028025	Ɓay wonii ɓe fokkitii e ɓaawo nanondiral maɓɓe, Puulusa ɓeyditi ɗii konguɗi ɗoo, o wi'i: «Ruuhu Seniiɗo on yewtiri baabiraaɓe mon ɓen haqiiqa, rewrude e annabi Isaaya, o wi'i:
44028026	‹Yahu e oo jamaa, wi'aa: On nanay, kono on faamataa, on ndaaray kadi, kono on yi'ataa.
44028027	Ko fii ɗee ɓerɗe oo jamaa wonii yooruɗe, ɓe uddii noppi maɓɓe ɗin, awa kadi ɓe ombii gite ɗen, sakko ɓe yiira gite maɓɓe ɗen, maa ɓe nanira noppi maɓɓe ɗin, maa ɓe faamira ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen haa ɓe tuuba, mi sellina ɓe.›
44028028	-
44028029	Kanko Puulusa o ɓeyditi, o wi'i: «Andee, oo kisiyee Alla addanaama ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, awa-le kamɓe ɓe heɗoto mo.»
44028030	Ɓawto ɗun, Puulusa daakii ka o woni ɗon e nder duuɓi ɗiɗi timmuɗi, e hoore himo tolna kala araynooɗo ka makko.
44028031	O waajoo fii laamu Alla ngun, o jannira kadi fii Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on pellital timmungal e ɓaawo haɗeede woo kadi.
45001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, nduu kurkaadu Iisaa Almasiihu on, noddaaɗo wonugol sahaabaajo, waɗaaɗo feere fii yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo Alla on.
45001002	Hari Allaahu on fodiriino oo Kibaaru immorde e annabaaɓe ɓen e nder bindi seniiɗi ɗin.
45001003	Tawi ko on Kibaaru sifii ko fii Ɓiɗɗo makko on: ka baŋŋe ɓandu ko e bolondaa Daawuuda o jibinaa,
45001004	ka baŋŋe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, immintineede makko e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen ɓanginirii bawgal ko o Ɓiɗɗo Alla, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
45001005	Ko kanko men heɓiri moƴƴere e sahaabankaaku fii ardagol yimɓe e nder leƴƴi ɗin fow e innde makko fii gomɗingol mo e ɗoftagol mo.
45001006	Onon kadi hiɗon tawdaa e maɓɓe, onon ɓee ɓe Alla noddi yo wonu ɓe Iisaa Almasiihu on.
45001007	Onon wonɓe Roomu ɓen fow, noddaaɓe wonugol ɓe Alla yiɗi e jeyaaɓe Alla: yo ɓuttu e moƴƴere wonan on immorde e Alla, on Baabaajo men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
45001008	Miɗo jarnude taho on Alla an, immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii mon on fow, ko fii gomɗinal mon ngal ko lollungal e aduna on fow.
45001009	Alla, on mo mi rewirta ruuhu an on e nder yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ko seedee an wonde miɗo maandinde fii mon ɲande woo ka toraaje an.
45001010	Awa kadi miɗo toraade Alla soono woo, si tawii ko faale makko heɓugol feere no mi yaara ka mon jooni.
45001011	Ko fii miɗo faalaa yi'ude on fota fii hewtingol on dokkal goo iwrungal e Ruuhu Alla on fii no tabitiron,
45001012	maaɗun fii no wakkilindiriren ka mon, mo kala e men wakkilora gomɗinal oya ngal.
45001013	Mi faalaaka yo on ronku andude, yo musiɓɓe an, wonde soono woo mi eɓɓay yahugol yi'a on, fii no mi soɲitira battane moƴƴe hakkunde mon, onon kadi, wano ɓeya ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke heddiiɓe non. Kono haa jooni mi heɓaali feere.
45001014	Ko fii no farlii mi andingol Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen e leƴƴi ɗi finaa ɗin, e faamuɓe ɓen e njofooɓe ɓen.
45001015	Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo faalaa yottingol e mon Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, onon wonɓe Roomu ɓen kadi.
45001016	Ko fii mi hersiraa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ɗun ko bawgal Alla fii kisiyee wonannde kala gomɗinɗo, ko adii kon taho ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, hikki ɗon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
45001017	Ko ɗun waɗi, peewal Alla ngal no ɓanginireede Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, gila ka gomɗinal fuɗɗi haa ka ngal hatti, wano windori non: «Feewuɗo on wuuriray gomɗinal ngal.»
45001018	Tikkere Alla nden no ɓangi iwrude ka kammu e hoore kala junuubu e kala bone ko yimɓe suuɗirayɓe goonga on kuuɗe mun bonɗe waɗata.
45001019	Ko fii ko waawaa andeede e Alla kon no feeɲani ɓe kamɓe, ɓay Alla feɲɲinanii ɓe ɗun.
45001020	Ɓay, ko yi'otaako kon e Alla, ɗun ko bawgal makko poomayankewal ngal e allankaaku makko ngun, kuuɗe makko ɗen no ɓangini ɗun fota gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna. Ɓe alaa lamitorgal.
45001021	Ko fii nde ɓe andunoo Alla, ɓe ronki mo mawninirde wa Alla, awa kadi ɓe jarnaali mo, kono ɓe majjiri haalaaji mehi, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗe alaa faamu ɗen kadi yollii ka nder niɓe.
45001022	E nder ko ɓe mantorta ko ɓe faamuɓe kon, ɓe laatii njofooɓe.
45001023	Ɓe lontiniri mangu Alla, mo maayataa on, mbaadiiji lontiiɗi neɗɗanke maayayɗo e colli e kulle yaarooje koyɗe nay e kulle daasotooɗe.
45001024	Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla accidi ɓe e himmeeji ɓerɗe maɓɓe e angal laaɓal, fii no ɓe hayfinira ɓalli maɓɓe ɗin kamɓe tigi.
45001025	Ɗun ko ɓen lontinirɓe goonga Alla on fenaande, yanganiiɓe rewi ko tagaa kon, ɗoo e ɓe yanganaade rewa Taguɗo on, on mo mantoore wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
45001026	Ko ɗun si Alla accidi ɓe e himmeeji maɓɓe hersiniiɗi ɗin. Ko fii rewɓe maɓɓe ɓen lontinirii dewle mun ɗen e kuuɗe harmuɗe.
45001027	Worɓe ɓen kadi wano non, ɓe seli yiidugol e rewɓe ɓen, hiɓe huɓɓani faaleeji hakkunde maɓɓe kamɓe worɓe ɓen, hiɓe yiida hakkunde maɓɓe e mbalndi, hiɓe hettude njoddi handundi e majjere maɓɓe nden.
45001028	Ɓay ɓe sikkii moƴƴaa ka ɓe anda Alla, Alla accidi ɓe e ngun faamu ɓoyliingu, fii waɗugol piiji ɗi haanaa.
45001029	Ko ɓe heewuɓe nooneeji ɗi feewaa e bonkiiji e miile e bone e nawliigu e warugol e yeddondiral e kippugu e hunƴeendi e baddi.
45001030	Ko ɓe ɲo'ooɓe, aɲuɓe Alla, yennooɓe. Ko ɓe mawnintiniiɓe e mantiiɓe e sincooɓe ko boni e murtanɓe mawɓe mun,
45001031	ɓe aldaa e faamu, ɓe sellaa kongol, ɓe aldaa e giggol, ɓe aldaa e yurmeende.
45001032	Fii kala hiɓe andi yamiroore Alla feewunde nden ko wi'i kon wonde ɓen waɗayɓe ɗin piiji ko fodduɓe e mayde, hiɓe waɗude ɗun, hiɓe jaɓani kadi ɓen wonɓe waɗude ɗun.
45002001	An kadi non, oo feloowo, a maraa lamitorgal woo. Ko fii nde hiɗa fela ɓeya, haray hiɗa fawude hoore maa ɲaawoore an tigi. Ko fii an, wonɗo felude on, hiɗa waɗirde wa maɓɓe.
45002002	Hiɗen andi, ɓen warrooɓe non, Alla ɲaawiray ɓe goonga on.
45002003	An oo feloowo ɓen waɗirooɓe non, hara hiɗa waɗira non tigi, a sikku a daɗay ɲaawoore Alla nden?
45002004	Kaa a yawiti ngaluuji moƴƴere makko nden e muɲal makko ngal e yondinaare makko nden, e ɓaawo andugol wonde moƴƴere Alla nden no pooɗude ma e tuubuubuyee?
45002005	Kono sabu sattere maa fii nden e ɓernde maa yoorunde nden, hiɗa mooɓa tikkere fii ɲalaande tikkere nden, ɗun ko fii ɲande feeɲugol ɲaawoore Alla feewunde nden,
45002006	on Jonnitoyoowo mo kala njoddi kuuɗe mun ɗen.
45002007	Ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan wonanay ŋaɲɲiiɓe e waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ɗaɓɓa darja on e teddungal e ngurndan ɗan lannataa ɗan,
45002008	kono wonduɓe e haasidi ɓen, salii ɗoftaade goonga on fii ɗoftagol angal peewal ngal: tikkere e monee no maranaa ɓe.
45002009	Satteende e annde wonanii kala waɗoowo ko boni, ko adii kon ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, hikki ɗon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
45002010	Kono darja e teddungal e ɓuttu wonanii kala on waɗoowo ko moƴƴi, ko adii kon ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, hikki ɗon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
45002011	Ko fii giɗaale alaa ka Alla.
45002012	Kala ɓen waɗuɓe junuubu e ɓaawo andugol Sariya on, mulay e ɓaawo Sariya on. E kala non kadi waɗuɗo junuubu e hoore andugol Sariya on, ɲaawirte Sariya on.
45002013	Ko ɗun waɗi, hinaa heɗotooɓe Sariya on woni feewuɓe yeeso Alla, kono ko ɗoftotooɓe Sariya on jogortee feewuɓe.
45002014	Si tawii non ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, ɓen ɓe maraa Sariya, waɗii ko Sariya on wi'i kon tigi, ɗun ko ɓen ɓe maraa Sariya, haray hiɓe mari sariya fii maɓɓe kamɓe tigi.
45002015	Ɗun haray ɓe ɓanginii wonde kuugal Sariya on no windii ka ɓerɗe maɓɓe, fondo maɓɓe ngon no seeditaade ɗun, miijooji maɓɓe ɗin kadi no felude ɓe e saa'i goo, e saa'i goo no dandude ɓe.
45002016	Ko ɗun fow feeɲoyta ɲande Alla ɲaawoyta miijooji ɓerɗe yimɓe suuɗiiɗi ɗin, o ɲaawiroya ɗi Iisaa Almasiihu on, wano Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo mi yottini on holliri non.
45002017	An oo wi'itiiɗo Yahuudiyanke, hoolorɗo Sariya on, wonɗo mantorde Alla,
45002018	anduɗo faale makko on, waawuɗo sendindirde ko ɓuri moƴƴude kon, ɓay ko a jangirɗo Sariya on,
45002019	an oo hooliiɗo wonay ardotooɗo bumɓe, hoolii kadi wonanay ɓen wonɓe ka niwre ndaygu,
45002020	andinoowo ɓen ɓe alaa faamu, karamokoojo fayɓe, ɓay hiɗa mari gandal timmungal e goonga selluɗo ka nder Sariya:
45002021	awa an, oo wonɗo jannude ɓeya, e hara a alaa jannitaade an tigi? An, oo waajotooɗo wota wujje, hinaa hiɗa wujjude?
45002022	An, oo wonɗo wi'ude wota jeene, hinaa hiɗa jeenude? An, oo aɲuɗo sanamu, hinaa hiɗa wujjude ɗi, huutoraa?
45002023	An, oo darjinorɗo Sariya on, hinaa hiɗa hayfinirde Alla bonnugol Sariya on?
45002024	Ko fii no windii: «Sabu mon innde Alla nden no hoyneede e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.»
45002025	No fellitaa wonde sunninegol no hitti, si tawii a huutorii Sariya on, kono si a bonnii Sariya on, haray ko sunninaɗaa kon wonii meere.
45002026	Si tawii non mo sunninaaka on ɗoftike yamirooje Sariya on, hara angal sunninegol makko ngol jaɓirtaake wa sunninaaɗo?
45002027	Awa, on neɗɗo mo sunninaaka e ɓandu, timminɗo Sariya on, ɲaawete an oo mo ɗoftaaki Sariya on, fii kala hiɗa wondi e bindi ɗin e sunninannde nden.
45002028	Yahuudiyankeyaagal wonaa ka kene, sunninannde kadi hinaa feeɲunde e ɓandu nden.
45002029	Kono Yahuudiyankeejo, ko wonɗo ɗun ka nder. Sunninannde haqiiqaare nden ko nde ka ɓernde, yaadunde e Ruuhu Allaahu on, hara hinaa yaadunde e bindi nden. Mantoore sifa on Yahuudiyankeejo wonaa e yimɓe ɓen iwrata, kono ko e Alla.
45003001	Ko ɓural hongal Yahuudiyanke mari? E ko honɗun woni nafa sunninegol?
45003002	No mari nafa e ɗi fow. Ko adii kon, daaluyeeji Alla ɗin ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen halfinaa.
45003003	E ko honɗun si woɓɓe e maɓɓe wonaali sella-findeeɓe? E hara ngal angal sella-findeyaagal maɓɓe ɗuytay goɗɗun e sella-findeyaagal Alla ngal?
45003004	Pellet hinaa non! Hay si yimɓe ɓen fow ko fenooɓe, Alla kan ko goongaajo, wano windori non wonde: «Peewal maa ngal no feeɲira konguɗi maa ɗin, nde ɲaawaɗaa woo wonaa fooluɗo.»
45003005	Si tawii non angal peewal men ngal feɲɲinii wonde Alla ko feewuɗo, haray ko honɗun wi'eten? Kere si Alla tippinii tikkere makko nden, haray hinaa o Feewuɗo? (Ɗun ko haala neɗɗanke non!)
45003006	Pellet hinaa non! Si hinaa ɗun, ko honno Alla ɲaawirta aduna on?
45003007	E si tawii fenaande an nden no ɓurtude ɓanginde goonga Alla on fii darja makko on, haray ko fii honɗun min tigi mi ɲaawirtee wa junuubankeejo haa jooni?
45003008	Awa ko honɗun haɗi wi'en, wano aybinooɓe goo wi'irta wonde hiɗen wi'a: «Waɗen ko boni, fii ko moƴƴi yo yaltu.»? Donkineede ɓen yimɓe ko ko feewi!
45003009	Awa, enen Yahuudiyankeeɓe, ko honɗun ɓurɗen ɓeya? Hay fus! Ko fii en ɓanginii wonde kala Yahuudiyankeejo e mo wonaa Yahuudiyanke no e nder junuubu,
45003010	wano windori non: «Feewuɗo alaa, hay e gooto non!
45003011	Hay gooto alaa faamu, hay gooto alaa ɗaɓɓude Alla.
45003012	Fow ko huccuɓe Alla, awa kadi ɓe fow ko ɓe ɓoyliiɓe, hay gooto alaa wonɗo waɗude ko moƴƴi, hinaa non hay e gooto!
45003013	Kononɗi maɓɓe ɗin ko genaale udditiiɗe, hiɓe huutora ɗenɗe maɓɓe ɗen fii janfagol, tuutaaɗe toni maɓɓe ɗin ko tooke mboddi.
45003014	Kundule maɓɓe ɗen no heewi kuddi e hahhannde,
45003015	koyɗe maɓɓe ɗen no hawjani hibbugol ƴiiƴan,
45003016	yeebaare e tampere no ka ɗate maɓɓe.
45003017	Ɓe andaali ɗatal ɓuttu ngal,
45003018	awa kadi kulol Alla alaa e gite maɓɓe.»
45003019	Hiɗen andi wonde ko Sariya on wi'i kon fow ko wonɓe e ley Sariya on wi'aa, fii no kala hunduko ombiree, e no Alla ɲaawira yimɓe aduna on fow.
45003020	Ko fii hay gooto jogortaake feewuɗo yeeso Alla fii ko o ɗoftii Sariya on kon, ko fii ko immorde e Sariya on junuubu andori.
45003021	Kono jooni, Alla feɲɲinii ko honno goɗɗo waawetee jogoreede feewuɗo yeeso Alla e ɓaawo Sariya on, wano Sariya on e annabaaɓe ɓen seeditori non.
45003022	Alla jogoray yimɓe ɓen feewuɓe sabu ko ɓe gomɗini Iisaa Almasiihu on kon, ɗun ko gomɗinɓe ɓen fow. Ko fii sendondiral alaa:
45003023	fow waɗii junuubu, ɓe waawataa hewtude mangu Alla ngun.
45003024	Awa ko tippude e dokkal moƴƴuki makko kin ɓe jogoraa feewuɓe rewrude e cottudi wondi e Iisaa Almasiihu on ndin,
45003025	on mo Alla toɗɗii wonugol sadaka fii, rewrude e ƴiiƴan makko ɗan, no gomɗinɓe mo ɓen heɓira yaafuyee junuubaaji. Alla waɗi ɗun fii ɓangingol peewal mun ngal, ko fii o donkinaali ɓee waɗunooɓe junuubi feƴƴunooɗi ɗin fewndo muɲal makko ngal.
45003026	O faalaama ɓanginde peewal makko ngal e oo saa'i fewndiiɗo, ɗun fow ko fii no andiree ko o Feewuɗo, o jogitora on gomɗinɗo Iisaa wa feewuɗo.
45003027	Ko dalil honɗun non mantortee? Dalil woo alaa! Maa ko sabu honɗun? Hara ko kuuɗe ɗen? Oo'o, kono ko gomɗinal ngal.
45003028	Ko fii hiɗen wi'a wonde ko sabu gomɗinal ngal neɗɗo jogoraa feewuɗo, e ɓaawo ɗoftagol Sariya on.
45003029	Kaa hara Alla ko Alla Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen tun? E hinaa o Alla ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen kadi? Hiiyii, ko o Alla ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen kadi!
45003030	Ɓay ko Alla gooto woni jogorɗo sunninaaɓe ɓen feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal, o jogora ɓe sunninaaka ɓen kadi feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal mun ngal.
45003031	E hara ɗun no firi wonde en bonnitirii Sariya on gomɗinal ngal? Pellet wonaa non! Ka liddu ɗun, hiɗen tambitaade Sariya on!
45004001	Awa ko honɗun wi'eten fii Ibraahiima, oo maamiraawo amen iwrude ka ƴiiƴan? Ko honɗun o heɓi?
45004002	Si tawno ko sabu kuuɗe ɗen Ibraahiima jogoranoo feewuɗo, harayno himo mari feere mantagol. Kono hinaa non woniri yeeso Alla!
45004003	Ko honɗun bindi ɗin wi'i e ɗun? «Ibraahiima gomɗini Alla, ngal gomɗinal makko jogoranaa mo peewal.»
45004004	E hin-le, on mo golli, njoddi makko ndin jogitoranaaka mo wa dokkal, kono ko ko haani.
45004005	On mo gollaali non, kono gomɗini Alla on Jogoroowo ɓe feewaa ɓen feewuɓe, haray gomɗinal makko ngal no jogoranaa mo peewal.
45004006	Daawuuda kadi no haali fii maloore neɗɗo mo Allaahu on jogitori feewuɗo e ɓaawo kuugal:
45004007	«Maloore wonanii ɓen ɓe bonkiiji mun ɗin yaafaa, ɓe tawata junuubaaji mun ɗin montaama.
45004008	Maloore wonanii on neɗɗo, mo Joomiraaɗo on jogoraali junuubu mun.»
45004009	E hara nden maloore ko fii sunninaaɓe ɓen tun, kaa ko fii ɓe sunninaaka ɓen kadi? Ko fii hiɗen wi'a: «Ibraahiima gomɗini Alla, ngal gomɗinal makko jogoranaa mo peewal.»
45004010	Ko honno o wa'unoo kanko Ibraahiima fewndo ngal jaɓanaa mo? Hari o teddinaama, kaa o teddinaaka? Hari o teddinaaka taho, ko mo o teddinaaka wonnoo
45004011	fewndo o hendii maande sunninegol ngol, wa ɓattatere peewal ngal o heɓiri gomɗinal ngal, fewndo ko o teddinanooka. Ko non o woniri ben kala gomɗinɗo, hay ɓe sunninanooka ɓen, fii no ɓe jogoree feewuɓe.
45004012	O laatii kadi ben sunninaaɓe ɓen, hinaa non sunninaaɓe ɓen tun, kono kadi ko o ben ɓen jokkuɓe laawi gomɗinal ngal kanko ben men Ibraahiima o heɓunoo ngal wa fewndo ko o teddinanooka taho.
45004013	Ko ɗun waɗi, hinaa tippude e Sariya on Ibraahiima e jurriya mun on fodiraa ronugol aduna on, kono ko tippude e peewal iwrungal e gomɗinal ngal.
45004014	Si tawno ko tippude e Sariya on ronirten, harayno gomɗinal ngal ko fus, awa kadi harayno fodaari ndin firtaama.
45004015	Ko fii Sariya on ko tikkere rimata. Ka Sariya on non alaa ɗon, haray bonnugol Sariya on alaa.
45004016	Awa, ko ɗun waɗi ko gomɗinal ngal fodaari ndin ronirtee, fii no laatora dokkal moƴƴere, fii no jurriya on fow hendora fodaari ndin, wonaa non jogiiɓe Sariya on tun, kono ko hay jogiiɓe gomɗinal Ibraahiima maama men ngal en fow,
45004017	wano windori non: «Mi waɗii ma maamaajo leƴƴi ɗuuɗuɗi.» Ko o maama men en fow yeeso Alla, on mo o gomɗini, on Yeɗoowo mayɓe ɓen ngurndan, on Woodinoowo ko woodanooka.
45004018	O tanƴinii ka tama'u alaa, o gomɗini. Ko nii o woniri maamaajo leƴƴi ɗuuɗuɗi, wano daaliranoo non: «Ko nii jurriya maa on ɗuuɗiroyta!»
45004019	E ɓaawo lo'angol gomɗinal ngal, o tawi ɓandu makko ndun fayda ko mayndu, ko fii hari moggo o teeminii, awa kadi hari dimdimol Saarata ngol ko mayngol.
45004020	Awa o hutitoraali fodaari Alla ndin sabu angal gomɗinal, kono o wonti tiiɗa-gomɗinaljo, o mawnini Alla.
45004021	O felliti wonde Alla no mari bawgal hunnugol ko o fodi kon.
45004022	Ko ɗun waɗi si gomɗinal makko ngal jogoranaa mo peewal.
45004023	Hinaa fii makko kanko tun ɗun windiraa,
45004024	kono ko fii men, enen kadi, enen ɓee jogorteeɓe feewuɓe, gomɗinɓe on Immintinɗo Joomi men on Iisaa e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen,
45004025	ittaaɗo sadaka fii bonnereeji men ɗin, e immintinaaɗo fii yo en jogoree wa feewuɓe.
45005001	Nde tawnoo en jogoraama feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal men ngal, hiɗen mari ɓuttu e Alla rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
45005002	Ko sabu makko heɓirɗen, iwrude e gomɗinal ngal, naatirgal e oo sulfu, mo wonɗen e mun, tabituɗen. Hiɗen mantorde on tama'u mo marɗen fii mangural Alla ngal.
45005003	Ko ɓeyditii e ɗun, hiɗen mantorde hay e nder tampereeji ɗin, e hoore andugol wonde tampereeji ɗin rimay ŋaɲɲagol,
45005004	ŋaɲɲagol ngol kadi ardoo haa e jikku timmuɗo, jikku timmuɗo on kadi adda tama'u.
45005005	E hin-le tama'u on hersinoytaa, ko fii Alla juuriri giggol makko ngol ka ɓerɗe men Ruuhu Seniiɗo mo yeɗaɗen on.
45005006	Ko fii fewndo tawnoo en maraa doole, e saa'i toɗɗaaɗo on Almasiihu on mayno fii ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen.
45005007	Ko karahan goɗɗo jaɓirta maayande aaden feewuɗo, kono no gasa ka goɗɗo wakkiloo maayangol neɗɗo moƴƴo.
45005008	Kono e nder ɗun, Alla ɓanginii giggol mun ngol fii men: wa fewndo wonnoɗen junuubankeeɓe, Iisaa Almasiihu on mayno fii men.
45005009	Jooni, ɓay en jogoraama feewuɓe sabu ƴiiƴan makko ɗan, haray ko honno ronkirten dandireede tikkere nden sabu makko?
45005010	Si tawii fewndo wonnoɗen ayɓe makko kanko Alla, o moƴƴintinirii hakkunde men e makko sabu mayde Ɓiɗɗo makko on, haray ko haa honto non dandirteɗen ngurndan makko ɗan, enen moƴƴintinidaaɓe e makko kanko Alla ɓen!
45005011	Ko ɓeyditii e ɗun, hiɗen mantorde Alla sabu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on wonɗo sabu moƴƴintingol hakkunde men e Alla.
45005012	Ko ɗun waɗi, ko wano non, sabu aaden gooto, junuubu naatiri e aduna on, e sabu on junuubu kadi mayde nden ari, ko wano non kadi mayde nden rewiri e hoore yimɓe ɓen fow, ko fii fow waɗii junuubu.
45005013	Ko fii, haa fewndo addegol Sariya on, hari junuubu on no e nder aduna on, kono junuubu ndaaretaake si sariya alaa.
45005014	Kono mayde nden laamii gila e Aadama haa e Muusaa, hay e hoore ɓe waɗaano junuubu ɓen wa bonnere Aadama nden, on mo tawata ko mbaadi Aroyoowo on.
45005015	Kono bonnere Aadama nden e dokkal Alla ngal wonaa gootun. Si tawii buy maayii sabu bonnere aaden gooto, ɗun ko Aadama, haray ko haa honto non moƴƴere Alla nden, e dokkal iwrungal e moƴƴere on aaden gooto, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, layirta haa heewa e hoore ɗuuɗuɓe!
45005016	Ko wano non, battane junuubu aaden gooto e dokkal Alla ngal wonaa gootun. Ko fii ɲaawoore nden ɓawto junuubu gooto ko addi ko donkineede, e hin-le dokkal ngal ɓawto bonnereeji ɗuuɗuɗi ko addi ko jogoreede wa feewuɓe.
45005017	Si tawii, sabu bonnere aaden gooto, ɗun ko Aadama, mayde nden laamorii immorde e makko kanko tun, haray ko haa honto heɓuɓe moƴƴere heewunde e dokkal peewal ɓen laamotoo ka ngurndan, sabu oo gooto, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on!
45005018	Ko ɗun waɗi, si tawii donkinannde bonnere aaden gooto hewtii yimɓe ɓen fow, ko wano non kadi, ko sabu kuugal feewungal gootal, peewal yeɗayngal ngurndan ngal hewtiri yimɓe ɓen fow.
45005019	Nde tawnoo ɗuuɗuɓe laatike junuubankeeɓe sabu angal ɗoftaare aaden gooto, ɗun ko Aadama, ko wano non kadi ɗuuɗuɓe laatortoo feewuɓe sabu ɗoftaare aaden gooto, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
45005020	E hin-le ko Sariya on arani, ko fii yo bonnereeji ɗin ɓeydo. Kono ka junuubu on ɓeydii ɗon, ko ɗon sulfu on ɓeydii ɓeydaadee.
45005021	Ko wano junuubu on ɓanginiri bawgal mun mayde non, ko wano non kadi sulfu Alla on ɓanginiri bawgal mun ngal peewal nawrayngal e ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
45006001	Awa ko honɗun wi'eten? En duumoto e waɗugol junuubu on fii yo sulfu on ɓeydo?
45006002	Pellet hinaa non! Enen, ɓee mayɓe e telen-ma junuubu, ko honno non wuurirten e nder junuubu kadi?
45006003	E on andaa wonde, enen ɓee lootaaɓe maande kisiyee e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on fow, ko e mayde makko nden tawdaɗen?
45006004	Awa, en surridaama e makko ka nder mayde rewrude e looteede maande kisiyee nden, fii, wano Almasiihu on imminiraa non e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen rewrude e mangu Baabaajo on, enen kadi, yo en wuuru ngurndan kesan.
45006005	Ko ɗun waɗi, si en yuɓɓondirii e makko ka mayde makko, pellet en woniray kadi wano non ka immintineede makko.
45006006	Ko fii hiɗen andi ngurndan men kiɗɗan ɗan fempidaama e makko, fii no ndun ɓandu junuubankeeru muliree, fii wota en laato hande kadi maccuɓe junuubu.
45006007	Ko fii kala mayɗo fuutike bawgal junuubu.
45006008	Si tawii en maayidii e Almasiihu on, haray hiɗen gomɗini wonde en wuuriday e makko.
45006009	Ko fii hiɗen andi wonde Almasiihu on immitike e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, o maayataa hande kadi, mayde nden maraa doole hande kadi e hoore makko.
45006010	Nden mayde nde o maayi, ko e telen-ma junuubu o maayi, nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa. Jooni non himo wuuri, ko Alla o wuurani.
45006011	Onon kadi wano non, jogoree hoore mon wa mayɓe e telen-ma junuubu, e wa wuuranɓe Alla e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
45006012	Awa, wota junuubu laamo ɓalli mon maayayɗi ɗin, e wota on ɗofto himmeeji majji ɗin.
45006013	Wota on weeɓitan tere mon ɗen junuubu, wa aala fii angal peewal, kono wattee hoore mon onon tigi e Alla, wa wuuruɓe iwɓe e mayde, sakkanoɗon Alla tere mon ɗen wa aalaaji fii peewal ngal.
45006014	Ɗun, junuubu foolataa on, ko fii hinaa e ley Sariya on wonɗon, kono ko e ley sulfu on.
45006015	Jooni non, ko honno? E hara en jokkay waɗugol junuubu, ɓay hinaa e ley Sariya on wonɗen, kono ko e ley sulfu Alla on? Pellet waawataa wonde!
45006016	E on andaa, si on waɗii hoore mon maccuɗo goɗɗo fii ɗoftagol mo, haray on wonii maccuɗo on mo ɗoftiɗon? Ko si on wonu maccuɓe junuubu nawroowo e mayde, maa si on wonu maccuɓe ɗoftaare nawraynde e peewal.
45006017	Kono ko yettude Alla, ɓawto on wonude maccuɓe junuubu on, on ɗoftorii ɓernde noone jannde nde hewtinaɗon nden.
45006018	Ɓay on jattinaama junuubu on, on wontii maccuɓe peewal ngal.
45006019	(Ko wano neɗɗanke'en nii mi woni yewtirde, sabu lo'ere ɓalli mon ɗin.) Wano waɗirnoɗon tere mon ɗen wa kurkantooɗe angal laaɓal e angal peewal, fii sakkitorgol ka angal peewal, jooni kadi waɗiree wano non tere mon ɗen wa kurkantooɗe peewal ngal fii sakkitorgol laaɓal ngal.
45006020	Ko fii, fewndo wonnoɗon maccuɓe junuubu, hari on alaa kurkanaade peewal ngal.
45006021	Ko honɗun heɓunoɗon e ɗen kuuɗe ɗe waɗunoɗon, ɗen ɗe tawata hiɗon hersiri jooni? Ko fii sakkitoode majje on ko mayde.
45006022	Jooni non, onon jattinaaɓe junuubu ɓen, ko on maccuɓe Alla, ko marɗon tono ko laaɓal, sakkitoode nden kadi ko ngurndan poomayankejan.
45006023	Ko fii, njoddi junuubu ko mayde, kono dokkal Alla ngal ko ngurndan poomayankejan e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
45007001	E on andaa yo musiɓɓe wonde Sariya on ardoto goɗɗo fannin himo wuuri? (Miɗo yewtude on wano mi yewtirta yimɓe anduɓe Sariya on.)
45007002	Ko sariya on humindiri debbo ƴettaaɗo e moodi mun, yeru on no wuuri. Kono si moodi makko maayii, haray on debbo seedii e on sariya humindirnooɗo mo e moodi makko.
45007003	Si tawii non e nder ngurndan moodi makko, o wonii ɓeyngu gorko goo, haray o wontii jeenoowo. Kono si tawii moodibbo on maayii, haray o sendaama e sariya on. Ɗun, si goɗɗo goo ƴettii mo, haray hinaa o jeenoowo.
45007004	Onon kadi ko wano non, yo musiɓɓe an, on maayii e telen-ma Sariya on wondude e ɓandu Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii no jeyireɗon e goɗɗo goo, on immintinaaɗo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, fii no waɗiren kuuɗe welayɗe Alla.
45007005	Ko fii, fewndo jokkunoɗen mbeleeɗe ɓandu men ndun, hari faaleeji bonɗi yaaduɗi e junuubu immorde e Sariya on no ardotonoo tere men ɗen, fawa en kadi kuuɗe nawrayɗe e mayde.
45007006	Kono jooni, en seedii e Sariya on, ko fii en maayii e telen-ma kon ko waɗunoo en maccuɓe. Ko ɗun waɗi, jooni hiɗen kurkorande Alla noone keso tippude e Ruuhu makko on, hara hinaa e oya noone kiɗɗo mo Sariya.
45007007	Awa ko honɗun wi'eten jooni: Sariya on ko junuubu? Pellet hinaa ɗun! Kono ko sabu Sariya on mi andiri junuubu. Ko fii mi andataano ko woni himme si Sariya on wi'aano «wota mo himma!»
45007008	Onsay junuubu on ɓaarori yamiroore nden, o waɗi e an kala noone himme. Ko fii, si Sariya on araano, hanno junuubu on ko mayɗo.
45007009	E telen-ma an min, si Sariya on alaano, hanno miɗo wuuri. Kono ɓay yamiroore nden arii, junuubu on wuuri, min mi maayi.
45007010	Onsay yamiroore nawraynde e ngurndan nden nawrimmi ka mayde.
45007011	Ko fii junuubu on ɗaynimmi ɓaarori yamiroore nden, warimmi.
45007012	Ɗun non, Sariya on ko seniiɗo, yamiroore nden kadi ko seniinde, feewunde moƴƴere.
45007013	Awa hara ko moƴƴi kon wonanii lan mayde? Pellet oo'o! Kono ko junuubu on, fii yo o feeɲu junuubu, o waɗirii e an mayde rewrude e ko moƴƴi kon, fii yo junuubu on feeɲir no laaɓiri poy junuubu sabu yamiroore nden.
45007014	E hoore ɗun, hiɗen andi wonde Sariya on ko e Alla iwri, kono min, ko mi neɗɗanke maccinaniiɗo junuubu.
45007015	Ko fii mi faamaa ko mi woni waɗude kon. Ko mi yiɗi kon kadi mi alaa waɗude ɗun, kono ko ko mi aɲi kon mi woni waɗude.
45007016	Si tawii miɗo waɗude ko mi faalaaka kon, haray miɗo jaɓi wonde Sariya on ko moƴƴo.
45007017	Jooni non, hinaa min han kadi woni waɗude ɗun, kono ko junuubu wonɗo e an on.
45007018	Ko fii miɗo andi wonde ko moƴƴi kon alaa e an, e maanaa ka ɓandu an. Ko fii min tigi miɗo wondi e faale waɗugol ko moƴƴi, kono mi alaa waɗude ɗun.
45007019	Mi alaa waɗude moƴƴere nde mi faalaa nden, kono miɗo waɗude bone mo mi faalaaka on.
45007020	Si tawii miɗo waɗude ko mi faalaaka, haray hinaa min tigi hande kadi woni waɗude ɗun, kono ko junuubu wonɗo e an on.
45007021	Awa e hino sariya mo mi tawi on: tuma mi faalaa waɗude ko moƴƴi woo, haray bone on no e an.
45007022	Ko fii Sariya Alla on no welammi ka ɓernde,
45007023	kono miɗo yi'ude ka tere an sariya goo, wonɗo dartaade sariya faamu an ngun, wonɗo lan e wattude maccuɗo sariya junuubu, wonɗo e tere an ɗen.
45007024	Min e tampere an! Hara ko hombo jattintammi e nduu ɓandu maayooru?
45007025	Ko yettude Alla, immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on! Ko ɗun waɗi, si ka ɓernde an ko mi maccuɗo Sariya Alla on, fii kala ka ɓandu an ko mi maccuɗo sariya junuubu on.
45008001	Jooni donkinannde woo alanaa ɓen humondirɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
45008002	Ko fii sariya Ruuhu ngurndan wonɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on jattinii lan sariya junuubu e mayde on.
45008003	Ko fii Alla timminii ko Sariya on ronki kon, ɓay lo'ere neɗɗanke nden mehinɗinii mo. Alla muncii bawgal junuubu on ka ɓandu e nder addirgol Ɓiɗɗo makko on ɓandu nanditayndu e junuubankeeru neɗɗanke ndun.
45008004	Alla waɗiri ɗun fii no peewal Sariya on timmira e men, enen wonɓe jokkude Ruuhu Allaahu on, hara hinaa e mbeleeɗe ɓandu.
45008005	Ko ɗun waɗi, wuurirɓe mbeleeɗe ɓandu ɓen ko fii mayru miijotoo, kono wuurirɓe Ruuhu Allaahu on no miijoo fii faale Ruuhu Allaahu on.
45008006	Jokkugol mbeleeɗe ɓandu ko mayde, jokkugol non faaleeji Ruuhu Allaahu on ko ngurndan e ɓuttu.
45008007	Ko fii mbeleeɗe ɓandu no aɲi Alla, ɓay ɓandu ndun yankinantaako Sariya Alla on, ko ɓay non ndu waawataa!
45008008	Ko fii wonɓe e ley mbeleeɗe ɓandu ndun waawataa welude Alla.
45008009	Onon non, on alaa e ley mbeleeɗe ɓandu han kadi, kono ko e ley faale Ruuhu on, ɓay Ruuhu Allaahu on no e mon. Ko fii on mo Ruuhu Almasiihu on alaa e mun, haray hinaa mo makko.
45008010	Si tawii Almasiihu on no e mon, haray ɓandu ndun maayii sabu junuubu on, kono haray ruuhu on no wuuri sabu peewal ngal.
45008011	E si tawii Ruuhu makko kanko Immintinɗo Iisaa e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen no e mon, haray on Immintinɗo Iisaa Almasiihu on e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen yeɗay ɓalli mon mayooji ɗin ngurndan immorde e Ruuhu makko Wonɗo e mon on.
45008012	Ɗun haray, yo musiɓɓe, no woodi ko fawii en, hara hinaa wuurirgol mbeleeɗe ɓandu.
45008013	Si tawii ko mbeleeɗe ɓandu wuurirɗon, on maayay. Kono si tawii ko Ruuhu Allaahu on warirɗon mbeleeɗe ɓandu ɗen, on wuuray.
45008014	Ko fii kala ɓe Ruuhu Alla on ardii, ko ɓiɓɓe Alla.
45008015	Awa Ruuhu mo heɓuɗon on hinaa ruuhu maccangaaku fii wonugol fahin e nder kulol, kono ko Ruuhu Waɗuɗo on ɓiɓɓe Alla. Immorde e makko kanko Ruuhu on en ewnoto Alla «Abba!», ɗun ko «Baaba!»
45008016	Ruuhu Allaahu on tigi no seeditanaade ruuhu men on wonde ko en ɓiɓɓe Alla.
45008017	Ko ɗun waɗi, si tawii ko en ɓiɓɓe makko, haray kadi ko en ronooɓe mo kanko Alla, ronidooɓe e Almasiihu on, si tawii e nder haqiiqa hiɗen tampidude e makko fii no tawireɗen e mangural makko ngal.
45008018	Miɗo felliti tampereeji oo saa'i fewndiiɗo foddaa eɓɓindireede e mangu aroyoowu feɲɲinanoyteengu en ngun.
45008019	Awa kadi tageefo ngon no habbori no tiiɗiri fii feɲɲineede ɓiɓɓe Alla ɓen.
45008020	Ko fii tageefo ngon ko e ley ɓitteende waɗaa, hinaa tippude e yiɗi maggo, kono ko tippude e yiɗi Waɗuɗo ngo e ley ɓitteende on, e hoore tanƴinagol wonde
45008021	ngon tageefo tigi jattinte maccangaaku mayde e ɲolugol, ngo heɓa geɓal ka ndimu ɓiɓɓe Alla darjinngu ngun.
45008022	Ko fii hiɗen andi tageefo ngon fow no woytaade tampere haa hande wa muuseendi ŋata.
45008023	Ko ɓeyditii e ɗun, enen kadi, ɓee adiiɓe hendaade Ruuhu Allaahu on, hiɗen woytaade ka ɓerɗe men e nder ko habbiɗen haa Alla waɗa en ɓiɓɓe makko, o sotta ɓalli men ɗin.
45008024	Ko fii ko e nder ndee tanƴinaare dandaɗen. E hin-le si en yi'ii ko tanƴiniɗen kon, haray ɗun wonaa tama'u hande kadi. E hara ko hombo tanƴinortoo ko yi'i kon?
45008025	Kono si hiɗen tanƴinii ko en yi'aali, haray hiɗen habbori ɗun ŋaɲɲaare.
45008026	Ko wano non kadi Ruuhu Allaahu on wallitorta en tuma lo'uɗen. Ko fii en andaa ko haanuɗen toraade Alla e nder torndeeji men ɗin, kono on Ruuhu tigi faaboto en e fee woytaangooji ɗi waawotaako sifaade.
45008027	Ko fii Liɲoowo ɓerɗe on no andi ko honɗun woni miijo Ruuhu mun on, ɓay ko e yiɗi Alla, on Ruuhu fattoranta gomɗinɓe ɓen.
45008028	Hiɗen andi wonde piiji ɗin fow no yaadude fii moƴƴere ɓen yiɗuɓe Alla, noddiraaɓe sabu eɓɓoore makko nden.
45008029	Ko fii, ko ɓen ɓe o andunoo, ko ɓen o muuyani nandugol e mbaadi Ɓiɗɗo makko on, fii no on Ɓiɗɗo wonira Afo e hakkunde musiɓɓe ɗuuɗuɓe.
45008030	Ɓen ɓe o muuyannoo, o noddi ɓe. Ɓen ɓe o noddi, o jogori ɓe kadi feewuɓe. Ɓen ɓe o jogori feewuɓe non, o darjini ɓe kadi.
45008031	Ko honɗun non wi'eten e ɗun? Si tawii Alla no wonani en, haray ko hombo dartotoo en?
45008032	On mo salanaaki en Ɓiɗɗo mun Bajjo on, kono o itti mo sadaka fii men en fow, ko honno o ronkirta en okkirde piiji ɗin fow wondude e Ɓiɗɗo on, sabu moƴƴere makko nden!
45008033	Ko hombo tooɲata suɓaaɓe Alla ɓen? Hay gooto, ɓay ko Alla woni Jogoroowo wa feewuɗo.
45008034	Ko hombo donkinta ɓe? Hay gooto, ɓay ko Iisaa Almasiihu on woni maayunooɗo on, e hoore ɗun o immintinaama, himo ka sengo ɲaamo Alla, himo tefande en.
45008035	Ko hombo sendindirta en e giggol Almasiihu on? Hara ko tampereeji ɗin, kaa ko annde nden, kaa ko jokkereeji ɗin, kaa ko heege ngen, kaa ko kolngal ngal, kaa ko masiibo ngon, kaa ko kaafa kan?
45008036	Wano windori non: «Ɲallal ngal fow meɗen weeɓitanii mayde fii maa, men jogoree wa baali hirseteeɗi!»
45008037	Kono e nder ɗun fow, ko en fooluɓe, hiɗen ɓuri fooluɓe kadi, sabu Yiɗuɗo en on.
45008038	Ko fii miɗo felliti, hinaa mayde nden, hinaa ngurndan ɗan, hinaa malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, hinaa mbawdiiji ɗin, hinaa ko fewndii kon, hinaa ko aroyta kon, hinaa doole ɗen,
45008039	hinaa tagoore nden ka dow, hinaa tagoore nden ka ley, hinaa tagu goo kadi woo waawata en sendude e giggol Alla wongol e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on!
45009001	Miɗo wowlude goonga e nder humondiral an e Almasiihu on, mi fenataa, fondo an ngon no seeditorande lan Ruuhu Seniiɗo on:
45009002	miɗo wondi e sokola tiiɗuɗo e muuseendi duumiindi ka ɓernde.
45009003	Ko fii mi yeloyto wonugol min tigi malkisaaɗo, sendee e Almasiihu on fii musiɓɓe an ɓen, ɗun ko musidal an ngal ka ƴiiƴan,
45009004	ɓen ɓe tawata ko Isra'iilayankeeɓe. Ko kamɓe Alla jogori wa ɓiɓɓe. Ko ɓen mangu ngun e ahadiiji ɗin e Sariya on e dewal ngal e fodaariiji ɗin,
45009005	e maamankaaku Isra'iila'en ngun wonani. Awa kadi Almasiihu on ko ƴiiƴan maɓɓe, on Wonɗo Alla e dow kala huunde, mo mantoore wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
45009006	Hinaa fii daaluyee Alla on ko meereejo. Ko fii hinaa jurriya Isra'iila ndin fow woni Isra'iilayanko.
45009007	Wonaa jurriya Ibraahiima on fow woni ɓiɓɓe makko, kono no windii: «Ko e Issaaqa jurriya maa on nodditirtee.»
45009008	E maanaa, hinaa ɓiɓɓe ɓen ka ƴiiƴan woni fayɓe Alla, kono ko ɓiɓɓe fodaari ndin toɗɗaa wonugol jurriya.
45009009	Awa e hino kongol fodaari ndin: «E oo saa'i tigi mi aray, Saarata heɓa ɓiɗɗo.»
45009010	Ko ɓeyditii e ɗun, Rifqatu siwti ɗiɗo, ɓe tawata ko oo maamiraawo men wi'eteeɗo Issaaqa woni ben maɓɓe.
45009011	-
45009012	Hay fewndo tawnoo fayɓe ɓen heɓaaka taho, sakko ɓe waɗa ko boni maa ko moƴƴi, Alla daalanno Rifqatu wonde: «Ko mawɗo on kurkanoytoo tosooko on», fii no eɓɓoore Alla nden fii suɓagol tabitira, ɗun non wonaa e kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen tippi, kono ko e kanko Alla, Noddoowo on,
45009013	wano no windori non: «Mi yiɗii Yaaquuba, mi aɲii Iisu.»
45009014	Ko honɗun wi'eten jooni? Hara angal peewal no e Alla? Pellet oo'o!
45009015	Ko fii himo daalani Muusaa wonde: «Mi yurmete on mo mi faalaa yurminde, mi moƴƴoo e on mo mi faalaa moƴƴaade e mun.»
45009016	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɗun hinaa immorde e faale neɗɗanke, maa e wakkilaare makko, kono ko immorde e Alla, on Yurmeteeɗo.
45009017	Ko fii bindi ɗin no wi'i Fir'awna: «Mi ɓantii ma tun fii ɓangingol bawgal an ngal e hoore maa, e fii no innde an nden lolliniree e hoore leydi ndin fow.»
45009018	Awa ɗun no holli wonde himo yurmina on mo o faalaa, o sattina ɓernde on mo o faalaa.
45009019	Miɗo andi a wi'ay lan: «Ɓay ko nii, ko honɗun Alla feliranta yimɓe ɓen? Ko fii ko hombo waawi dartaade faale makko on?»
45009020	An non taho, ko hombo wonu-maa ka yeddondiraa e Alla? E hara loonde wi'ay moƴƴinɗo nde on: «Ko honɗun moƴƴiniranɗaa mi nii?»
45009021	E hara daaloyankeejo waawataa mahirgol loopal no o faaliraa woo, o moƴƴina ngal loopal gootal looɗe: wonde nden fii haaju hittuɗo, ndeya fii haajuhoy tosokoy?
45009022	E si tawii, e nder ko Alla faalaa hollude tikkere mun nden e ɓangingol bawgal makko ngal kon, o muɲɲanike ɗen looɗe handunooɗe e tikkere makko nden e nder muɲal tiiɗungal, ɗun ko ɗen eɓɓananooɗe fii hayrannde nden?
45009023	E si tawii non o faalaama andinde ɗen looɗe ɗe o yurmaa ngalu darja makko on, ɗen ɗe o eɓɓannoo fii darja makko on,
45009024	e maanaa ɗun ko enen ɓe o noddi ɓen, hinaa non tun e hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, kono kadi e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen?
45009025	Wano o daaliri non ka deftere oo wi'eteeɗo Husaa'a: «On mo wonaano jamaa an, mi nodday mo jamaa an, on mo wonaano kadi giɗo an, mi nodday mo giɗo an»,
45009026	e: «Ka ɓe wi'anoo ɗon tigi: ‹hinaa on jamaa an!› ko ɗon ɓe noddoytee ɓiɓɓe Alla Wuuruɗo on.»
45009027	Isaaya kadi no wi'i fii Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen: «Nde adadu Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen ɗuuɗiroyi wa njaareendi ndin ka baharu, ko heddiiɓe seeɗaaɓe tun dandetee,
45009028	ko fii Joomiraaɗo on laatinay kongol ɲaawoore mun nden ka hoore leydi no yaawiri haa timma!»
45009029	Wano Isaaya wiirunoo non: «Si tawno Joomiraaɗo Jom Bawɗe on accanaano en jurriya, hanno en wa'iino wa ɗee ca'e ɗiɗi, ɗun ko Saduuma e Amuura!»
45009030	Ko honɗun non wi'eten jooni? Ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe ɗaɓɓataano peewal ngal ɓen, ɓe heɓii peewal, ngal peewal iwrungal e gomɗinal ngal.
45009031	E hin-le Isra'iilayankeeɓe, ɗaɓɓaynooɓe peewal iwrungal e Sariya on ɓen, ɓe laatinaano waɗugol ko Sariya on yamiri kon fow.
45009032	Fii honɗun? Ko fii Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen hinaa gomɗinal ɗaɓɓiraynoo peewal ngal, kono ko wa si tawii ko kuuɗe ɗen peewal heɓorta. Ɓe buɓɓii e hayre fegginaynde nden,
45009033	wano windori non: «Miɗo tippinde ka hoore Fello Siyuuna hayre fegginaynde, e fetere liɓaynde. Kala gomɗinɗo e makko hersinoytaake.»
45010001	Musiɓɓe an, faale ɓernde an nden, e ko mi woni toraade Alla fii Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen, ko yo ɓe dande.
45010002	Kono miɗo seeditanaade ɓe ɗunɗoo: hiɓe himmani fii Alla, kono hinaa tippude e gandal.
45010003	Ɓay ɓe andaali peewal iwrungal e Alla ngal, e ɓay ɓe ɗaɓɓii no ɓe tabintinira peewal maɓɓe ngal kamɓe tigi, ɓe ronki yankinanaade peewal Alla ngal.
45010004	Ko fii, ko Almasiihu on woni timmoode Sariya on fii no kala gomɗinɗo heɓira peewal.
45010005	Ko ɗun waɗi, Muusaa no windi fii peewal iwrungal e Sariya on ngal, o wi'i: «Kala ɗoftiiɗo ɗee yamirooje, o wuuriray ɗe.»
45010006	Kono e hino ko peewal iwrungal e gomɗinal ngal wi'i kon: «Wota a miijo ka ɓernde maa: ‹ko hombo ƴawata ka kammu?› » (ɗun haray ko tippingol Almasiihu on),
45010007	«maa: ‹ko hombo tippotoo ka gaygii ngii alaa kattudi ngin?› » (ɗun haray ko suutugol Almasiihu on e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen).
45010008	Awa ko honɗun bindi ɗin wi'i? Ko: «Daaluyee on no takko maa, ɗun ko ka nder hunduko maa e ka ɓernde maa.» On-le ko daaluyee gomɗinal ngal, on mo men woni yottinde
45010009	wonde: si a qirritorii hunduko maa kon ko Iisaa woni Joomi on, e si a gomɗinii ka ɓernde maa wonde Allaahu on immintinii mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, a dandete.
45010010	Ko fii ko ɓernde nden gomɗinirtee, ontigi jogoree wa feewuɗo, ko hunduko kon qirritortee, ontigi dandee.
45010011	Wano bindi ɗin wi'iri non: «Kala gomɗinɗo e makko hersinoytaake.»
45010012	Awa, alaa ko sendindiri Yahuudiyanke e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe fow ko Joomiraaɗo gooto ɓe mari, on Alɗanɗo kala jantiiɗo mo.
45010013	Ko fii: «Onsay kala jantotooɗo innde Joomiraaɗo on dandoyte.»
45010014	Ko honno non ɓe jantoroyta innde on mo ɓe gomɗinaali? E ko honno ɓe gomɗinirta on mo ɓe nanaali fii mun no wowlee? E ko honno ɓe nanirta fii makko no wowlee e ɓaawo waajotooɗo?
45010015	E ko honno ɓe waajorta si ɓe imminaaka? Ko fii no windii: «Emba teppe yottinooɓe Kibaaru Moƴƴo on no labaa!»
