45010016	Kono hinaa fow ɗoftii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on. Ɓay Isaaya wi'uno: «Joomiraaɗo, ko hombo gomɗini waaju amen ngun?»
45010017	Ko ɗun waɗi, gomɗinal ko e nanugol iwata, ko nanetee kon kadi ko e kongol Almasiihu on iwi.
45010018	Kono mi wi'i: hara ɓe nanaali? Oo'o: «Hito kammuuli ɗin yahii e leydi ndin fow, e konguɗi majji ɗin yottoyike haa ka kattudi leydi.»
45010019	Kono mi wi'i: e hara Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen faamaali ɗun? Ko Muusaa adii wi'ude wonde Allaahu on daalii: «Mi nawliniray on ɓe wonaa jamaa tigi, mi moninira on jamaa mo alaa faamu.»
45010020	Awa Isaaya heɓuno cuucal haa o wi'i wonde Allaahu on daalii: «Ɓe alaa lan ɗaɓɓude ɓen heɓii lan, mi feeɲanii ɓe alaano landaade fii an ɓen.»
45010021	Kono e telen-ma Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen, o daali: «Ɲallal ngal fow miɗo fontande juuɗe an ɗen jamaa murtuɗo yeddi.»
45011001	Awa miɗo landoo: e hara Alla bugitike jamaa mun on? Pellet oo'o! Ko fii min kadi ko mi Isra'iilayankeejo, jurriya Ibraahiima, ko mi jeyaaɗo e oo bolondaa Buniyamiinu.
45011002	Alla bugitaaki jamaa makko mo o andunoo ko adii fow. E on andaa ko bindi ɗin wi'i kon ka cortewol ka Iiliiya wullitii e Alla ɗon e hoore Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen?
45011003	O wi'i: «Joomiraaɗo, ɓe warii annabaaɓe maa ɓen, ɓe waylitii layyorɗe maa ɗen! Jooni ko min tun lutti, awa kadi hiɓe ɗaɓɓa no ɓe ittirammi e oo aduna!»
45011004	Ko honɗun woni jaabannde Alla nden? O daali: «Miɗo maritori yimɓe guluuje njeeɗiɗo, ɓe sujjanaali sanamuuru wi'eteendu Baalu ndun.»
45011005	Ko wano non kadi e oo saa'i fewndiiɗo, no woodi heddiiɓe ɓe Alla suɓori sulfu mun on.
45011006	Si tawii non ko sulfu on o suɓori ɓe, haray hinaa rewrude e kuuɗe ɗen hande kadi. Si hinaa ɗun, haray sulfu on wonaa sulfu.
45011007	Awa ko honɗun? Ko Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓaynoo kon ɓe heɓaali, kono suɓaaɓe ɓen hendike ɗun. Ɓeya, ɓerɗe mun ɗen sattinaa,
45011008	wano windori non: «Alla yeɗii ɓe hakkillaaji ɗaaniiɗi, e gite ɗe yi'ataa, e noppi ɗi nanataa, haa weetaango hande ngoo.»
45011009	Daawuuda kadi wi'i: «Yo ndaɗɗule ka ɓe ɲaamata ɗon wonan ɓe pircol e ngantan, e peggal e njoddi kuuɗe!
45011010	Yo gite maɓɓe ɗen niɓɓitu haa tawa ɓe yi'ataa, e yo ɓe laato saa'i kala turiiɓe!»
45011011	Awa miɗo landoo: Ɓay ɓe feggike, ɓe yanuno, ngal ɓe immotaako? Pellet oo'o! Kono ko sabu bonnere maɓɓe nden kisiyee on yeɗiraa ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen fii memmingol nawliigu Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen.
45011012	E hin-le, si tawii bonnere maɓɓe nden ko ngalu oo aduna, e si tawii faɗannde maɓɓe nden ko ngalu ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, haray ko ittiri ngalu hongu ɓeydotoo ka tawdegol maɓɓe e kisiyee on.
45011013	Awa mi andinii on, onon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, min oo sahaabaajo fii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, min miɗo teddini fii golle an ɗen,
45011014	fii, si tawii no gasa, memmingol nawliigu e hakkunde leɲol an ngol, e dandugol woɓɓe ɓen.
45011015	Si tawii waɗeede maɓɓe sera addii moƴƴintingol hakkunde aduna on e Alla, ko honɗun artireede maɓɓe nden wonoyta si hinaa immintineede ka mayde?
45011016	E hin-le, si tawii bireediije arane ɗen ko Alla wonani, haray farin piyaaɗo on men. Si tawii kadi ɗaɗol ngol ko Alla wonani, haray calɗi ɗin men.
45011017	Si tawii non goɗɗi e calɗi ɗin saltaama, e an non, ki zaytuunihi buruurehi, a tokkaama batte majji, haa tawii a tawdaama e ɗaɗol ngol e enɗan zaytuuni ɗan,
45011018	wota a mantor calɗi ɗin. Si tawii a mantoray, andu tun wonde hinaa an jogii ɗaɗol ngol, kono ko ɗaɗol ngol jogi-maa.
45011019	Haray ko wi'ataa: «Calɗi saltaama fii min yo mi tokke.»
45011020	Andaa fota wonde ko ɗi taƴiraa ko angal gomɗinal majji on. An, a siŋorii ɗon sabu gomɗinal maa ngal. Awa wota a mawnintino, kono hulu.
45011021	Ko fii, si Allaahu on accaali calɗi ko ngal wondunoo kon, an kadi o accataa ma.
45011022	Awa anditu fii moƴƴere Alla nden e yagginannde makko nden, yagginannde makko nden e hoore yanuɓe ɓen, e moƴƴere Alla nden e hoore maa, si a duumike e nder nden moƴƴere. Si hinaa ɗun, an kadi, a soppete.
45011023	Kamɓe kadi wano non. Si ɓe duumaaki e angal gomɗinal ngal, ɓe tokkete, ko fii Alla no mari bawgal tokkugol ɓe kadi.
45011024	Si tawii an a soppaama e zaytuunihi buruurehi, a tokkaama e zaytuunihi tutaaki, woopondirki e mbaadi maa ndin, ittii e sikke si kamɓe ɓe tokkete e mbaadi maɓɓe ndin, e zaytuunihi maɓɓe kin tigi.
45011025	Ko fii, yo musiɓɓe an, mi yiɗaa yo on ronku andude oo gundoo ɗoo fii wota on sikku hiɗon mari faamu feƴƴitungu: sattere ɓernde no e hoore woɓɓe e jamaa Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen haa yeru ko timmi e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen naata.
45011026	Ontuma non Isra'iilayanko fow wonay dandaaɓe, wano windori non: «Jattinoowo on iwray Siyuuna, o pottina e bolondaa Yaaquuba on kala ko yaadaa e faale Alla on.
45011027	Ko ɗun wonoyta ahadi an ndin hakkunde an e maɓɓe nde mi ɓooroyi junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin.»
45011028	E telen-ma Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ko ɓe ayɓe sabu mon, kono e telen-ma suɓeede nden, ko ɓe yiɓɓe Allaahu on sabu baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen.
45011029	Ko fii, dokke Alla ɗen e noddaandu makko ndun hinaa ko jaɓitotoo.
45011030	Hari on ɗoftanooki Alla, kono jooni on heɓirii yurmeende sabu angal ɗoftaare Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
45011031	Ko wano non jooni, kamɓe kadi ɓe wontiri ɓe ɗoftotaako Alla fii no ɓe heɓiroya yurmeende nden kamɓe kadi, sabu yurmeende nde waɗanaɗon nden.
45011032	Ko fii Alla dumbii yimɓe ɓen fow e nder geddi fii no o yurmiree fow.
45011033	Ko haa honto ngalu Alla ngun e faamu makko ngun e gandal makko ngal luggi! Hay gooto waawataa sifaade ɲaawooje makko ɗen, hay gooto waawataa andude eɓɓooje makko ɗen!
45011034	Ko fii ko hombo andi miijo Joomiraaɗo on, maa ko hombo woni waajotooɗo mo on,
45011035	ko hombo adii mo okkorde, si o yoɓita mo?
45011036	Ko fii fow ko immorde e makko, tippude e makko, e fii makko. Ko kanko mangu wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
45012001	Awa mi wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe an, sabu yurmeende Alla nden, okkitirgol ɓalli mon ɗin wa sadaka wurɗo laaɓuɗo, weloowo mo, ko ɗun wonanoyta on dewal haanungal.
45012002	Wota on ɲembu aduna fewndiiɗo on, kono wonee waylaaɓe, ɓe hakkillaaji mun heyɗintinaa, fii no andiron ko honɗun woni faale Alla on: ɗun ko ko moƴƴi kon e ko welata mo kon e ko timmi kon.
45012003	Tippude e moƴƴere nde o yeɗimmi nden, mi wi'ay kala e mon wota o miijo himo hitti haa feƴƴiti, kono yo o miijito fii hoore makko wano haaniri non, mo kala embere gomɗinal ngal Alla yeɗi ɗun ngal.
45012004	Wano tawiri non hiɗen mari tere buy e nder ɓandu wooturu, awa kadi tere ɗen fow hinaa golle goote mari,
45012005	ɗun non, fii kala hiɗen ɗuuɗi, en fow ko en ɓandu wooturu e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on, en fow ko en tere jogondirɗe.
45012006	Kono hiɗen mari dokke seeduɗe, wano Alla yeɗiri mo kala e men moƴƴere non. Si tawii ko dokkal haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun, yo taw ko ko yaadi e gomɗinal.
45012007	Si ko dokkal fii wallugol, yo o wallu, si ko dokkal jannugol, yo o jannu.
45012008	Mo no mari kadi dokkal wakkilingol, yo o wakkilin. On marɗo kadi dokkal okkugol, yo o okkir no yaajiri. On marɗo dokkal ardagol kadi, yo o ardor no kelɗiri. On marɗo dokkal yurmeende kadi, yo o waɗir ɗun weltaare.
45012009	Yo giggol ngol wonu sellungol. Aɲon ko boni kon, humoɗon no tiiɗiri e ko moƴƴi kon.
45012010	Yiɗindiron giggol siɗɗankaaku, mo kala e mon jogitora oya wa burɗo ɗun teddude.
45012011	Wakkiloɗon hara on aamaali, kurkoranon Joomiraaɗo on ɓerɗe mon ɗen fow.
45012012	Weltee e hoore tanƴinagol, ŋaɲɲoɗon tampereeji ɗin, duumoɗon e toraare Alla.
45012013	Faaboron gomɗinɓe ɓen ko ɓe handi kon, newanoɗon wernugol.
45012014	Du'anoɗon cukkotooɓe on ɓen, du'ee, wota on huɗu.
45012015	Weltodee e ɓen wonɓe weltaade, wullidon e wonɓe wullude ɓen.
45012016	Miijondiranee miijo wooto, wota on mawnintino, kono jaɓon jippinde hoore mon. Wota on waɗu hoore mon faamuɓe.
45012017	Wota on yoɓitir gooto bone bone. Waɗee ko yimɓe ɓen fow ndaarata tawa no moƴƴi.
45012018	Si tawii no gasa, yeru hiɗon waawi, wondee e yimɓe ɓen fow e nder ɓuttu.
45012019	Wota on yottano hoore mon onon tigi, yo yiɗaaɓe an, kono accee tikkere Alla nden yottoo, ko fii no windii: «Joomiraaɗo on wi'i: Ko min yottannde wonani, ko min woni Yoɓoowo.»
45012020	Ko fii no windii kadi: «Si gaɲo maa no weelaa, okkor mo, o ɲaama, si himo ɗonɗaa, okkor mo, o yara. Ko fii warrugol non, haray no wa'i wa si ko ƴulɓe yiite mooɓuɗaa ka hoore makko.»
45012021	Wota bone foolu on, kono fooliree bone on moƴƴere.
45013001	Yo kala neɗɗo yankinano laamuuji ɗin, ko fii alaa laamu ngu tawata hinaa e Alla iwri, ko fii laamuuji wooduɗi ɗin, ko Alla joɗɗini ɗi.
45013002	Ko ɗun waɗi, kala on dartiiɗo laamu ngun, haray dartike yamiroore Alla nden, ɓen dartiiɓe non, haray fawii hoore mun ɲaawoore.
45013003	Laamiiɓe ɓen hulɓinaaki si tawii ko ko moƴƴi wonaa waɗeede, kono ko si tawii ko ko boni. Si a faalaaka hulude laamu ngun, waɗu ko moƴƴi, ɗun a heɓay kuluujaa maggu on.
45013004	Ko fii ko kangu woni kurkaadu Alla fii nafa maa kan. Kono si hiɗa waɗude ko boni, haray wonu e nder kulol, ɓay hinaa meere ngu jogori kaafa, ko fii ko kangu woni kurkaadu Alla fii yottingol tikkere makko nden e hoore on waɗoowo ko boni.
45013005	Awa jaka yankinanagol laamu ngun no hitti, hinaa fii nden tikkere tun non, kono kadi ko sabu ɓernde ontigi nden.
45013006	Ko sabu ɗun kadi hiɗon yoɓa sagalle, ko fii laamiiɓe ɓen ko liggantooɓe Alla, duumiiɓe e waɗugol ɗen golle no moƴƴiri.
45013007	Jonnitee mo kala ko handi kon, jonniton sagalle ɗen on mo haanuɗon jonnude, hulon on mo haanuɗon hulude, teddinon on mo haanuɗon teddinde.
45013008	Wota ɲamaande woo wonu hakkunde mon e goɗɗo si wonaa yiɗindirgol, ko fii kala yiɗuɗo wondiɓɓe mun ɓen, haray timminii Sariya on.
45013009	Ko fii yamirooje ɗen, ɗun ko «wota mo jeena», «wota mo itta hoore», «wota mo wujja», «wota mo seeditoo fenaande», «wota mo himmana ko goɗɗo jeyi», e ɗeya yamirooje fow no ɲoggaa e nder ngol daalol ɗoo: «Yo a yiɗir ɲokondo maa on wano yiɗirɗaa hoore maa non.»
45013010	Giggol waɗataa ɲokondo mun ko boni, awa jaka ko giggol woni timmoode Sariya on.
45013011	Ɓay hiɗon andi ko e saa'i hombo wonɗen, awa immee, hinaa saa'i ɗaanagol nii! Ko fii jooni kisiyee on ɓurtii en ɓattaade edii fewndo arɗen e gomɗinde.
45013012	Jemma on muutike, ɓadike weetude, awa ɓortoɗen kuuɗe niwre nden, ɓornoɗen aalaaji ndaygu ngun.
45013013	Wuuriren no feewiri, wa tumbere ɲalorma, e ɓaawo fasaadu e mandilugol e jinaa e jiiɓaare e yeddondiral e nawliigu.
45013014	Kono ɓornoɗon Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, hara on ɗaɓɓaali mbeleeɗe ɓandu fii weltingol himmeeji.
45014001	Jaɓee on mo tiiɗaa gomɗinal e ɓaawo feloore.
45014002	Goɗɗo on no sikka no waawi ɲaamude ko woni woo, oya mo tiiɗaa gomɗinal kadi ko ɓiɓɓe naakoo tun ɲaamata.
45014003	On ɲaamoowo ko woni woo, wota ɲiddin few mo ɲaamataa ko woni woo on. On mo ɲaamataa kadi, wota felu ɲaamoowo on, ko fii Alla no jaɓi mo kala.
45014004	Ko hombo wonu-maa an, oo feloowo kurkaadu goɗɗo goo? Si tawii himo darii maa si himo yani, ɗun ko jeyɗo mo on wonani. Kono o daroto, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on no mari bawgal tambitagol mo.
45014005	Woɓɓe no wi'i wonde ɲalaaɗe ɗen no ɓurdi, woɓɓe ɓen no jogitii ɗe fow hiɗe fota. Awa yo mo kala hoolor ko miijii kon.
45014006	On mo ɓurdindini ɲalaaɗe ɗen, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on o waɗiri ɗun. On mo no ɲaama kadi, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on o woni ɲaamande, ko fii himo jarnude Alla. On mo alaa ɲaamude, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on haɗi o ɲaama, ko fii kanko kadi himo jarnude Alla.
45014007	Ko ɗun waɗi, hay gooto e men alaa wuurande hoore mun tigi, e hay gooto alaa maayande hoore mun tigi.
45014008	Ko fii si en wuuru, haray ko Joomiraaɗo on wuuranɗen, si en maayu, haray ko Joomiraaɗo on maayanɗen. Woni en wuuru maa en maayu, ko Joomiraaɗo on jeyi en.
45014009	Ko ɗun waɗi si Almasiihu on maayi, o immitii, fii wonugol Jom mayɓe ɓen e wurɓe ɓen.
45014010	Kono an, ko honɗun felantaa musiɗɗo maa on? Maa an, ko honɗun ɲiddinantaa musiɗɗo maa on? Ko fii en fow en daroyto yeeso ɲaawoore Alla nden.
45014011	Ko fii no windii wonde, Joomiraaɗo on no daali: «Fodde ko goonga miɗo wuuri, kala howru jiccoto yeeso an, kala ɗenngal mantay Alla.»
45014012	Ko ɗun waɗi, mo kala e men qirritoto yeeso Alla fii hoore mun tigi.
45014013	Awa, wota en ɲaawindir hande kadi, ɗun-le wuren ardinee hakkil, fii wota on waɗu yeeso musiɗɗo mon on hayre fegginaynde maa wonon sabu yanal.
45014014	Miɗo andi, miɗo felliti e nder humondiral an ngal e Iisaa Joomi on, huunde alaa ko tuunani hoore mun, kono si goɗɗo no miijii wonde goɗɗun laaɓaa, haray ɗun laaɓanaa mo.
45014015	Si tawii musiɗɗo maa aanii sabu ko ɲaamataa kon, haray a woniraa giggol hande kadi. Wota ko ɲaamataa kon wonu sabu hayrannde on mo Almasiihu on maayi fii mun.
45014016	Wota ko moƴƴani on kon wowlire wa ko boni.
45014017	Ko fii laamu Alla ngun hinaa ɲaametee maa njaram, kono ko peewal e ɓuttu e weltaare ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on yeɗata kon.
45014018	On mo kurkorani nii Almasiihu on, haray no wela Alla, no mari kadi teddungal yimɓe ɓen.
45014019	Awa ɗaɓɓen ko ɓeydata ɓuttu e ko tiiɗinta hakkundeeji men e nder gomɗinal ngal.
45014020	Wota a bonnir golle Alla ɗen ɲaametee. Ka haqiiqa, ɲaameteeji ɗin fow no laaɓi, kono moƴƴanaa neɗɗo ka o ɲaama goɗɗun ko wonata sabu feggingol goɗɗo.
45014021	No moƴƴani goɗɗo hara o ɲaamaali teewu, o yaraali njaram mandilinayɗan, maa waɗugol kala ko fegginta musiɗɗo mun.
45014022	Ngal gomɗinal ngal marɗaa, maru ngal fii maa yeeso Alla. Maloore wonanii on mo fawaali hoore mun ɲaawoore e nder anniyeeji mun.
45014023	Kono on ɲaamuɗo ko sikkitii, haray fawtike ɲaawoore, ko fii ɗun hinaa e gomɗinal ngal iwri. Ko fii kala ko iwraa e gomɗinal ngal, haray ko junuubu.
45015001	Enen tiiɗuɓe e gomɗinal ɓen, hiɗen haani tambitaade lo'ereeji ɓen ɓe tiiɗaa ka gomɗinal, e wota en ɗaɓɓu ko welata en kon.
45015002	Yo mo kala e men weltinir ɲokondo mun on ko moƴƴi fii tiiɗingol mo ka gomɗinal.
45015003	Ko fii Almasiihu on ɗaɓɓaano ko welata mo kon, kono wano bindi ɗin holliri non: «Hoyreeji wonɓe ma hoynude ɓen yanii e hoore an.»
45015004	E hin-le ko adanoo windeede kon fow wonanii en jannde, fii no heɓiren tama'u on sabu ŋaɲɲaare nden e wakkilaare iwrunde e bindi ɗin.
45015005	Yo Alla, Jom ŋaɲɲaare nden e Jom wakkilaare nden, yeɗu on wonugol miijo wooto, e nder jokkugol misal Iisaa Almasiihu on,
45015006	fii no mawniniron Alla, on Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, e nder nanondiral e kongol gootol.
45015007	Jaɓɓondiree no moƴƴiri, wano Almasiihu on jaɓɓori on non, fii mangu Alla ngun.
45015008	Ko mi woni wi'ude, ko Almasiihu on wonii kurkaadu Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fii ɓangingol goonga Alla on, e nder haqinqingol fodaariiji waɗanaaɗi baabiraaɓe ɓen,
45015009	fii no ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen mawninira Alla fii yurmeende makko nden, wano windori ka Zabuura non: «Mi mantete e hakkunde leƴƴi ɗin, mi beyta fii teddingol innde maa nden.»
45015010	No windii ton kadi: «Ko onon, yo leƴƴi, weltodee e jamaa makko on!»
45015011	No windii ton kadi fahin: «Onon leƴƴi ɗin fow, jarnee Joomiraaɗo on, awa kadi yo jamaaji ɗin fow mantu mo!»
45015012	Isaaya kadi no wi'i: «Geeƴol Yassaa'u ngol feeɲoyay, ko ngol immoytoo fii ardagol leƴƴi ɗin, leƴƴi ɗin tanƴinora ngol.»
45015013	Yo Alla, Jom tama'u on, hebbin on weltaare e ɓuttu fow e nder gomɗinal ngal, fii no heewiron tanƴinaare immorde e bawgal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
45015014	E telen-ma mon, yo musiɓɓe an, min tigi miɗo felliti hiɗon heewi moƴƴere e faamu timmungu, e hiɗon waawi waajondirde.
45015015	Ko ɗun waɗi, e nooneeji goo mi windiranii on cuucal, fii andintingol on toɓɓe goo ɗe jangunoɗon, sabu moƴƴere nde Alla waɗanimmi nden
45015016	wonangol Iisaa Almasiihu on kurkaadu fii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, e nder ko Alla toɗɗii mi kon fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo makko on, fii no ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen wonirana mo sadaka weloowo mo, laɓɓiniraaɗo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
45015017	Sabu humondiral an e Iisaa Almasiihu on, miɗo waawi mantorde golle ɗe mi woni gollande Alla ɗen.
45015018	Ko fii mi suusataa wowlude si wonaa ko Almasiihu on waɗiri e an kon fii addugol ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen ɗoftorgol Alla kongol e kuugal,
45015019	tippude e doole maandeeji e kaawakeeji moƴƴi e bawgal Ruuhu Alla on. Ko wano non, gila Yerusalaam mi taarori non haa hewti Iliriiya, mi yottini Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on fow.
45015020	Awa anniyee an on ko feɲɲingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on nokku ka tawata Almasiihu on andaaka, fii wota mi darnu e hoore didol goɗɗo.
45015021	Kono wano windori non: «Ɓen ɓe feɲɲinananooka yi'oyay, e ɓen ɓe nanaano kadi faamoyay.»
45015022	Ko ɗun wonnoo mi haɗude soono woo yahugol ka mon.
45015023	Kono jooni mi gaynii golle an ɗen e ɗii nokkeeli. Gila duuɓi buy miɗo faalanoo yahude ka mon.
45015024	Nde miɗo yaha Espaaɲi, miɗo tanƴinii yiidugol e mon e nder ko mi rewata ɗon kon, mi weltora wondugol e mon seeɗa. Onsay, wallon mi no yahugol e ndin leydi neworanammi.
45015025	Fewndo ɗoo miɗo yahude Yerusalaam fii kurkanagol yimɓe Alla ɓen.
45015026	Ko fii ɓe Masedonii ɓen e ɓe Akaaya ɓen no faalaa mooɓindirde goɗɗun e nder jawle maɓɓe ɗen fii miskinɓe wonɓe e hakkunde yimɓe Alla ɓen Yerusalaam.
45015027	Awa, hiɓe weltori waɗugol ɗun, ɓay hiɓe haani ɓe waɗande. Ko fii, si ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen heɓirii barkiiji Alla ɗin sabu Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, kamɓe ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen kadi hiɓe haani ɓe wallirde keyeeji aduna.
45015028	Si mi gaynii jonnude ko mooɓindiraa kon haanuɓe hendaade ɓen, mi rewoyay ka mon, nde miɗo yaha Espaaɲi.
45015029	Miɗo andi, nde miɗo yaha ka mon, mi yaaday e barki timmuki Almasiihu on.
45015030	Mi wakkilinii on sabu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on yo musiɓɓe an, e sabu giggol Ruuhu Alla on, dartodugol e an e nder fewtingol Alla toraaje fii an,
45015031	fii no mi hettora e juuɗe yedduɓe wonɓe ka diiwal Yahuuda ɓen, e fii no gomɗinɓe ɓen jaɓira dokke, ɗe mi naɓata Yerusalaam ɗen, no moƴƴiri.
45015032	Ɗun, mi hewtiday ka mon e weltaare, si tawii ko ɗun woni faale Alla on, hara en fow en heyɗintinoday.
45015033	Yo Alla Jom ɓuttu on wondu e mon on fow. Aamiina!
45016001	Mi halfinii on oo bandiraawo men wi'eteeɗo Fibii, wallitotooɗo ka moftal wongal Kenkere,
45016002	fii no jaɓɓoron mo e innde Joomiraaɗo on, e noone no haanirani gomɗinɓe ɓen. Wattitoɗon e juuɗe makko fii kala huunde nde haaju makko yanoyi e mon, ko fii o wallitike ɗuuɗuɓe, min kadi men o wallitike lan.
45016003	Hiwranee lan Piriskiila e Akiila, ɓen wondiɓɓe an e golle e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on,
45016004	ɓen weeɓituɓe ngurndan mun fii hiwugol ngurndan an ɗan. Hinaa min tun non weltanii ɓe, kono ko mofte ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen fow kadi.
45016005	Salminanee lan kadi moftal wongal ka suudu maɓɓe ngal. Salminanon mi kadi oo giɗo an wi'eteeɗo Apayniiti, on adiiɗo gomɗinde Almasiihu on e hakkunde ɓe Aazii ɓen.
45016006	Salminanon mi Mariyama, on gollannooɗo on fota.
45016007	Salminanon mi kadi Andoroniiki e Yuniyaasi, ɗun ko ɓee musiɓɓe an e wondiɓɓe an ka kaso, ɗun ko ɓen ɓe sahaabaaɓe ɓen hoolii fota, adiiɓe lan jeyeede e Almasiihu on.
45016008	Salminanon mi kadi Ampiliyaasi, on giɗo an e nder humondiral e Joomiraaɗo on.
45016009	Salminanon mi kadi Urbaanu, ɗun ko oo wondiɗɗo men e golle e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on, e oo giɗo an wi'eteeɗo Astakiisi.
45016010	Salminanon mi kadi Apeliisi, on mo gomɗinal mun e Almasiihu on seeditaa fii mun. Salminanon mi ɓee jeyaaɓe e nduu suudu oo wi'eteeɗo Aristobuulu.
45016011	Salminanon mi oo musiɗɗo an wi'eteeɗo Herodiyuuna. Salminanon mi kadi ɓee jeyaaɓe e nduu suudu oo wi'eteeɗo Narkiisu, humondirɓe e Joomiraaɗo on.
45016012	Salminanon mi kadi Tarifayna e Tarifuusa, ɗun ko ɓee rewɓe gollanooɓe Joomiraaɗo on. Salminanon mi kadi Persiisa, giɗo an on, on kadi gollanii Joomiraaɗo on fota.
45016013	Salminanon mi kadi Rufuusa, oo suɓaaɗo Joomiraaɗo on. Salminanon mi kadi yumma makko, on mo tawata kadi ko yumma an.
45016014	Salminanon mi kadi Asinkiriiti e Filiguuna e Hermiisi e Patrobaasi e Hermasa e musiɓɓe wonduɓe e maɓɓe ɓen fow.
45016015	Salminanon mi kadi Filolooge e Yuliyaa e Niriyuusa, wondude e bandiraawo makko on, e Olimpaasi e wondiɓɓe maɓɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen fow.
45016016	Salmondiree, hirbondiron hirbondiral laaɓungal. Mofte Almasiihu on ɗen fow salminii on.
45016017	Mi wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe an, e reenagol ko wonata sabu sendondire e pegge ko luutondiri e jannde nde hendiɗon nden. Woɗɗitee ɓen wonayɓe sabu ɗun.
45016018	Ko fii sifa ɓen yimɓe kurkantaako Almasiihu on, on Joomi men, kono ko deedi maɓɓe ɗin tun ɓe kurkantoo. Ɓe faljinira ɓerɗe ɓen ɓe bonnaa, konguɗi maɓɓe welɗi e waccooje.
45016019	Onon non, ɗoftaare mon nden ko nde yimɓe ɓen fow andi. Awa miɗo weltori fii mon on, e miɗo yiɗi yo on wonu faamuɓe e telen-ma ko moƴƴi kon, e ɗayɓe e telen-ma ko boni kon.
45016020	Alla Jom ɓuttu on muncay Ibuliisa ka ley koyɗe mon ko neeɓaa. Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Joomi men on wonu e mon.
45016021	Timotee, oo wondiɗɗo an e golle, salminii on, wondude e Lukiyuusi e Yaasuunu e Sosipaate, ɓee musiɓɓe an.
45016022	E innde Joomiraaɗo on, min oo wi'eteeɗo Tertiyuusi, mi salminii on, ɗun ko min oo winduɗo nduu ɓatakuru.
45016023	Gayuusi wernuɗo lan on, werni moftal ngal fow kadi, salminii on. Arastuusa kadi, ɗun ko halfinaaɗo jawdi saare nden, salminii on, wondude e oo musiɗɗo wi'eteeɗo Kawartuusu.
45016024	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on wonu e mon on fow. Aamiina!
45016025	Mangu wonanii Alla, on Waawuɗo tabintinde on, immorde e Kibaaru Moƴƴo an on e waajuuji fii Iisaa Almasiihu on, ko yaadi e feɲɲinannde gundoo suuɗinooɗo on gila ka fuɗɗoode saa'iiji ɗin,
45016026	kono o feɲɲiniraama jooni defte annabaaɓe ɓen, wano Alla poomayankeejo on yamiri non, o feɲɲinanaama leƴƴi ɗin fow fii yo ɓe gomɗin mo, ɓe ɗoftoo mo.
45016027	Mangu wonanii on Alla Bajjo, Jom Faamu, immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu on haa poomaa. Aamiina!
46001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla noddiri kodduruyee mun on fii wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, e oo musiɗɗo wi'eteeɗo Sosteene,
46001002	haa e ngal moftal Alla wongal Korenti, suɓiraaɓe humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on, noddaaɓe wonugol yimɓe Alla, wondude e kala jantotooɓe innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on nokku kala ka ɓe woniri, ɗun ko on Joomi maɓɓe e Joomi men.
46001003	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on, immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
46001004	Miɗo duumii e jarnugol Alla fii mon, fii moƴƴere nde Alla yeɗi on nden sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on,
46001005	ɗun ko e nder humondiral e makko alɗirɗon kala huunde e kala kongol e kala gandal.
46001006	Ko fii seeditoore Almasiihu on tabintinaama few e mon.
46001007	Ko ɗun waɗi jooni, dokkal woo ŋakkanaa on e nder ndee habbannde nde wonɗon e mun fii feeɲoygol Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
46001008	O tiiɗinay on kadi haa ka rawnoode, fii wota on laatoyo felniiɓe ɲande ardu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
46001009	Alla ko Sella-Findeejo, ɗun ko on Nodduɗo on fii yuɓɓondirgol e Ɓiɗɗo makko on, Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
46001010	Mi wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe, e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on fow jogee kongol gootol fii wota sendondiral wonu hakkunde mon, e maanaa fedde-fedde, kono wonee e nder nanondiral tiiɗungal e nder miijo wooto e hakkille goote.
46001011	Ko fii, yo musiɓɓe an, ɓee yimɓe oo debbo wi'eteeɗo Kuluyee humpitii lan fii mon wonde, yeddondire no hakkunde mon.
46001012	Mi nanii wonde mo kala e mon no wi'a «min, ko mo mi Puulusa», oya kadi wi'a «ko mo mi Apoloosi», goɗɗo on kadi wi'a «ko mo mi Petruusu», oya on wi'a «ko mo mi Almasiihu on!»
46001013	E hara Almasiihu on senditino? Kaa Puulusa fempano fii mon? Kaa ko e innde Puulusa lootiraɗon maande kisiyee?
46001014	Awa mi weltanike Alla ko tawi kon mi lootaali hay gooto e mon maande kisiyee, si hinaa Kirispuusa e Gayuusi.
46001015	Ko ɗun waɗi, hay gooto waawataa wi'ude ko e innde an lootiraɗon maande kisiyee.
46001016	Mi lootii kadi ɓeynguure Astefaana nden, ko heddii kon, mi andaa si mi lootii goɗɗo goo.
46001017	Ko fii Almasiihu on nulaali lan fii lootugol maande kisiyee, kono ko fii feɲɲingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on. Ɗun non, hinaa immorde e konguɗi faamu neɗɗanke, fii wota leggal altindiraangal Almasiihu on meerine.
46001018	Ko fii kibaaru leggal altindiraangal ngal no wa'ani wonɓe mulude ɓen wa feetere. Kono enen, wonaaɓe dandeede ɓen, ko o bawgal Alla.
46001019	Ko fii no windii: «Mi mulay faamu faamuɓe ɓen, mi mehinɗina hakkillaaji jooma-hakkil en.»
46001020	Awa ko honto woni faamuɗo on, maa fensitoowo on, maa liddondirteeɗo e nguu jamaanu on woni? E hara Alla waylaali faamu aduna on, watti feetere?
46001021	Ko fii, ɓay aduna on e faamu mun ngun andaali Alla e nder faamu Alla ngun, tawi no wela Alla ka o dandira gomɗinɓe ɓen waaju men wa'ungu wa feetere ngun.
46001022	Tawi Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen no landoo fii maandeeji hawniiɗi, Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen kaɲun no ɗaɓɓa faamu ngun,
46001023	kono enen hiɗen waajaade fii Almasiihu fempaaɗo on. Ɗun no wonani Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen peggal, wa'ani ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen wa feetere,
46001024	kono noddaaɓe ɓen, woni ko Yahuudiyanke, woni ko Gereekiyanke, Almasiihu on ko bawgal Alla e faamu makko kanko Alla.
46001025	Ko wa'i wa feetere iwrunde ka Alla nden no ɓuri faamu yimɓe ɓen. Awa kadi, ko wa'i wa lo'ere iwrunde ka Alla nden no ɓuri doole yimɓe ɓen.
46001026	Miijitee, yo musiɓɓe, no wonirnoɗon fewndo noddaɗon. E yeeso neɗɗanke, tawi buy e hakkunde mon wonaa faamuɓe, maa marɓe doole, maa rimɓe.
46001027	Kono Alla suɓike piiji wa'uɗi wa feetuɗi e nder oo aduna fii hersingol faamuɓe ɓen, Alla suɓii kadi piiji wa'uɗi wa lo'uɗi e nder oo aduna fii hersingol dolnuɗi ɗin.
46001028	Alla suɓii kadi piiji kaanuɗi ɗin e oo aduna, ɗin aɲaaɗi, ɗin ɗi wonaano huunde, fii mehinɗingol woodaaɗi ɗin,
46001029	fii wota hay gooto mawnintino yeeso Alla.
46001030	E hin-le, ko kanko humindiri on e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo tawata ko e immorde e Alla waɗiraa fii men faamu e peewal e senaare e cottudi,
46001031	fii, wano windori non: «On mo no mantoo, yo mantor Joomiraaɗo on.»
46002001	Min non, yo musiɓɓe an, fewndo mi yahunoo ka mon fii feɲɲinangol on goonga Alla wirninooɗo on, hinaa ɓurnondiro konguɗi maa faamu mi yaari.
46002002	Ko fii mi taw moƴƴaa ka mi ndaara goɗɗun goo hakkunde mon, si hinaa Iisaa Almasiihu, fempaaɗo on.
46002003	Min tigi miɗo wonirnoo takko mon e noone no lo'iri e kulol e diwnol tiiɗungol.
46002004	Kongol an ngol e waaju an ngun aldaano e konguɗi welɗi e faamu neɗɗanke, kono ko wondunooɗi e maandeeji ɓanginɗi bawgal Ruuhu Alla on,
46002005	fii wota gomɗinal mon ngal iwru e faamuuji yimɓe ɓen, kono e bawgal Alla ngal.
46002006	Kono fow e mun, ko faamu men waajotoo mokobaaɓe ɓen, hara ko faamu ngu tawata hinaa ngu oo aduna, hinaa ngu laamuuji oo aduna kadi muloyteeɗi.
46002007	Ko faamu Alla wonɗen waajaade, ɗun ko ngun wirninoongu e nder gundoo, ngu Alla eɓɓannoo fii darja men on ado aduna on tageede.
46002008	Laamu woo e ɗii laamuuji oo aduna andaano ɗun. Ko fii si ɓe anduno, ɓe fempataano on Jom mangural.
46002009	Kono ko wano windori non: «Ko Alla eɓɓani yiɗuɓe mo ɓen kon, ko ɗun woni yiitere yi'aali, nowru nanaali, e ko ɓernde neɗɗanke miijaaki.»
46002010	Ko e men Alla ɓanginiri ɗun Ruuhu mun on. Ko fii Ruuhu on hollay ko woni woo, hay piiji Alla lugguɗi ɗin.
46002011	Ko hombo e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen andi ko woni e neɗɗo, si hinaa ruuhu wonɗo e makko on. Ko wano non kadi, gooto waawataa andude ko woni e Alla, si wonaa Ruuhu Allaahu on.
46002012	E hin-le enen, hinaa ruuhu oo aduna hendiɗen, kono ko Ruuhu iwruɗo e Alla, fii no andiren ko Alla yeɗiri en sulfu makko on kon.
46002013	En alaa wowlirde ɗun yewtereeji ɗi faamu neɗɗanke jannata, kono ko ɗi Ruuhu Allaahu on jannata ɗin, e nder sifanagol yimɓe ɓe on Ruuhu woni e mun ɓen haqiiqaaji iwruɗi e on Ruuhu.
46002014	Kono neɗɗo mo aldaa e Ruuhu Allaahu on jaɓataa piiji Ruuhu Alla ɗin, ko fii ko ɗi feetere e makko, o waawataa ɗi andude, ko fii ko Ruuhu Allaahu on ɗi taskortee.
46002015	Kono neɗɗo mo Ruuhu Allaahu on woni e mun on taskoto ko woni woo, kono kanko hay gooto hewtaa taskagol mo.
46002016	E hoore ɗun: «Ko hombo andi miijo Joomiraaɗo on fii jannugol mo?» E hin-le enen ko miijo Almasiihu on jogiɗen.
46003001	Kono min non, yo musiɓɓe, mi waawaali on yewtirde wa yimɓe ɓe Ruuhu Allaahu on woni e mun, kono ko wa jokkuɓe mbeleeɗe ɓandu, e boobooɓe e telen-ma gomɗinal Almasiihu on.
46003002	Ko ɓiraaɗan mi jonnunoo on, hinaa ɲaametee tedduɗo, ko fii on waawataano mo townude. Hay fewndo ɗoo non on waawataa mo townude.
46003003	Ko fii haa jooni ko on jokkuɓe mbeleeɗe ɓandu. Ɓay nawliigu e yeddondiral no hakkunde mon, taw si hinaa on jokkuɓe mbeleeɗe ɓandu? Kaa hinaa no neɗɗanke fow wonirta non wonirɗon?
46003004	Si goɗɗo e mon wi'ii: «min ko mo mi Puulusa», oya on wi'a: «ko mo mi Apoloosi», taw si hara on gerdaali wa yimɓe aduna?
46003005	Awa ko honɗun woni Apoloosi? E ko honɗun woni Puulusa? Ko kurkaaduuɓe ɓe gomɗinirɗon sabu mun. Mo kala e maɓɓe kurkorani Joomiraaɗo on golle ɗe o halfini mo ɗen.
46003006	Min mi tutu, Apoloosi yarni, kono ko Allaahu on mawnini.
46003007	Ko ɗun waɗi hinaa tutuɗo on woni goɗɗun, hinaa kadi yarnuɗo on, kono ko Alla mawninɗo on.
46003008	Tutuɗo on e yarnuɗo on no fota, mo kala e maɓɓe hendoto njoddi mun ndin tigi tippude e golle ɗe ontigi waɗi ɗen.
46003009	Ko fii, ko men gollidooɓe fii Alla, onon ko on ngesa Alla, ko on darnoodi makko kadi.
46003010	Wano Alla yeɗirimmi moƴƴere non, mi golliri wa faamuɗo fii darnugol, mi waɗii ndelo ngon. Goɗɗo kadi darnii e hoore mun, kono yo mo kala reeno e noone no darnirta e hoore mun non.
46003011	Fii ndelo ngon kan, hay gooto waawataa moƴƴinde ndelo goo si wonaa wongo ɗon ngon, e maanaa ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
46003012	E hin-le, si goɗɗo aru e darnirde e hoore ngon ndelo ɗon maadi kaŋŋe maa kaalisi maa kaaƴe hittuɗe maa leɗɗe maa huɗo kalin maa foron foɲɲe,
46003013	haray kuugal mo kala feeɲay. Ɲalaande nden ɓanginay ɗun, ko fii yiite ngen feɲɲinoyay ngal, nge ndarndoo kadi noone kuugal mo kala.
46003014	Si tawii kuugal ngal goɗɗo darni e hoore ndelo ngon tabitii, ontigi heɓay njoddi.
46003015	Si tawii kuugal goɗɗo sumii, haray o faɗii, kono kanko tigi o daɗiray wa fuutiiɗo yiite.
46003016	E on andaa ko onon woni suudu Alla ndun, awa kadi Ruuhu Allaahu on no hoɗi e mon?
46003017	Kala bonnuɗo suudu Alla ndun, Alla bonnay fii makko, ko fii suudu Alla ndun ko hormordu. Awa ko onon woni ndun.
46003018	Wota gooto ɗaynito. Si goɗɗo e mon miijike wonde ko o faamuɗo e oo aduna fewndiiɗo, haray yo o laato ‹feetuɗo› fii yo o wonu faamuɗo.
46003019	Ko fii faamu oo aduna ko ‹feetere› yeeso Alla. Ko fii no windii: «O nangiray faamuɓe ɓen ƴoyreeji maɓɓe ɗin.»
46003020	No windii kadi: «Joomiraaɗo on no andi miijooji faamuɓe ɓen, himo andi kadi ko ɗi meere.»
46003021	Awa wota hay gooto mantor yimɓe ɓen. Ko fii fow ko onon jeyi:
46003022	woni ko Puulusa, woni ko Apoloosi, woni ko Petruusu, woni aduna on, woni ngurndan ɗan, woni mayde nden, woni piiji fewndiiɗi ɗin, woni piiji aroyooji ɗin, fow ko onon wonani.
46003023	Awa kadi, ko on ɓe Almasiihu on, Almasiihu on kadi ko mo Alla.
46004001	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo men jogore wa kurkaaɗi Almasiihu on e halfinaaɓe goongaaji Alla wirniiɗi ɗin.
46004002	Awa halfinaaɓe ɓen non no toraa wonugol sella-findeeɓe.
46004003	Min non ɲaawoore nde ɲaawotommi nden e nde yimɓe ɓen ɲaawatammi nden hittaa e an, min tigi toode mi ɲaawitotaako.
46004004	Ko fii fondo an ngon ko laaɓungo, fii kala hinaa ɗun hollata ko mi feewuɗo, ɲaawoowo lan on ko Joomiraaɗo on.
46004005	Ko ɗun waɗi, wota on ɲaawu huunde ɗoo e saa'i on, maa ɗoo e ardu Joomi on, on Weeɓitoowo ka ndaygu ko suuɗii kon ka niɓe, feɲɲina eɓɓooje ɓerɗe ɗen. Ko fii mantoore mo kala aroyay immorde e Alla.
46004006	Musiɓɓe, mi huutorii ɗii nooneeji ɗoo fii waɗangol on misal e hoore an min e Apoloosi. Ko nii andirton e amen wota mo yawtu ko windii kon, e wota gooto e mon mantor bambindirangol.
46004007	Ko fii ko hombo ɓurnu-maa? E ko honɗun jogiɗaa ko a okkaaka? E si a okkaama, ko fii honɗun mantantoɗaa, wa si tawii hinaa a okkaaɗo?
46004008	Ɗun-le wuren on haarii, awa kadi on alɗii, on fuɗɗike laamaade e ɓaawo amen! Pellet mi faaleteno hara nun ko on lamɓe fii menen kadi no men laamodira e mon!
46004009	Ko fii no wa'animmi wa si tawii Alla wattirii men, menen sahaabaaɓe ɓen ɓaawo, wa ɲaawaaɓe happanaa wareede e yeeso dental ngal fow, ko fii men wonanii aduna on fow e malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen e yimɓe ɓen jalnori.
46004010	Ko men jogoraaɓe wa feetuɓe sabu Almasiihu on, kono onon ko on faamuɓe sabu Almasiihu on! Ko men jogoraaɓe wa lo'uɓe, kono onon ko on dolnuɓe. Ko on teddinaaɓe, kono menen ko men hayfinaaɓe!
46004011	Haa jooni meɗen tampiri heege e ɗonka e kolngal e piggal e yiilagol.
46004012	Meɗen golliri juuɗe amen ɗen tigi haa meɗen ronki. Tuma men hoynaa woo, men du'anoo. Tuma men cukkaa woo, men wakkiloo.
46004013	Tuma men ɲo'aa woo, men jaabora no newori. Men woni tuundi oo aduna, men hawkaa e ɗi fow, haa weetaango hande ngoo.
46004014	Hinaa fii hersingol on mi windiri ɗun, kono miɗo hajorde on wa fayɓe an ɓe mi yiɗi.
46004015	Ko ɗun waɗi, hay si on heɓoyii guluuje sappo ardotooɓe on fii no jokkiron laawol Almasiihu on, haray on alaa baabaaɓe buy. Ko fii, e telen-ma humondiral mon e Iisaa Almasiihu on, ko min wonti baaba mon e nder ko mi feɲɲinani on Kibaaru Moƴƴo on kon.
46004016	Awa mi wakkilinii on yo on wonu ɲembooɓe lan.
46004017	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi imminanii on Timotee, on mo tawata ko paykun an mo mi yiɗi, e sella-findeejo e telen-ma Joomiraaɗo on. O andintinay on laawi an ɗin fow e telen-ma Almasiihu on, wano mi janniri ɗi non hen fow e nder mofte ɗen fow kadi.
46004018	Woɓɓe e mon mawnintinike wa si tawii mi yiltitotaako ka mon.
46004019	Kono mi yahay ka mon ko neeɓaa, si Joomiraaɗo on jaɓii. Hinaa konguɗi mawnintiniiɓe ɓen tun mi andoyta, kono ko bawgal maɓɓe ngal kadi.
46004020	Ko fii laamu Alla ngun wonaa haalaaji, kono ko bawgal.
46004021	Ko honɗun faalaɗon? Ko yo mi yaadu ka mon e sawru, kaa ko giggol e newaare?
46005001	Awa saa'i woo jiiɓaare goo no naneede hakkunde mon, hara ko jiiɓaare nde yi'etaake hay ka ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hay goɗɗo e mon no murtini ɓeyngu ben mun!
46005002	Onon e ndee mawnintinaare mon! Hiɗon haanunoo yoomude! Suuton on waɗuɗo ngal kuugal e hakkunde mon.
46005003	Min oo mo wondaa e mon ka ɓandu, kono wonduɗo e mon ka ɓernde, mi ɲaawirii waɗuɗo sifa ngal kuugal on toode wa si miɗo wondi e mon.
46005004	Awa fewndo mottondirɗon e innde Iisaa Joomi on, tawi miɗo wondi e mon ka ɓernde, wondude e bawgal Iisaa Joomi men on,
46005005	yo on neɗɗo accide e Ibuliisa fii no jikku makko junuubankeejo on halkiree, e fii no ruuhu makko on dandiree ɲande ardu Joomi men on.
46005006	Nden mawnintinaare mon moƴƴaa. E hara on andaa lewen seeɗa nii no ƴurina farin jiiɓaaɗo fow?
46005007	Seedee e lewen kiɗɗo on, fii no laatoron farin jiiɓaaɗo keso, ɓay ko on ɓe aldaa e lewen. Ko fii Almasiihu on, ngin baalii men layya fii Juldeere Yawtaneede nden, hirsaama.
46005008	Awa wota en waɗir juldeere nden lewen kiɗɗo, maa lewen bonki e bone, kono waɗiren nde bireedi laaɓal e goonga, ɗe aldaa e lewen.
46005009	Mi windanii on ka nder ɓatakuru an wonde, wota on humondir e jeenooɓe ɓen.
46005010	Kono hinaa fii miɗo faalaa wi'ude bee tun selon ɓee yimɓe oo aduna, jeenooɓe, maa reereɗuɓe, maa jattooɓe, maa rewooɓe sanamuuji. Si hinaa ɗun, haray bee yalton e oo aduna.
46005011	Ko mi windani on kon jooni, ko wota on humondir e goɗɗo wi'uɗo ko musiɗɗo mon e gomɗinal, hara ko jeenoowo, maa ndeereero, maa rewoowo sanamu, maa hoynoowo, maa mandiloowo, maa jattoowo, e hay wota on ɲaamidu toode e sifa on neɗɗo.
46005012	Ko fii honɗun mi ɲaawanta ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen? Hinaa onon woni ɲaawooɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen?
46005013	Ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen kan, Alla ɲaaway ɓe. Awa yaltinee bonɗo on hakkunde mon.
46006001	Si goɗɗo e mon lurridii e goɗɗo, e hara o suusay wullitaade e ɓe feewaa ɓen, o acca yimɓe Alla ɓen?
46006002	E on andaa yimɓe Alla ɓen ɲaawoyay oo aduna? Si tawii ko onon haani ɲaawude aduna on, hara on waawataa ɲaawugol haajuuji ɗi hittaa ɗin?
46006003	E on andaa en ɲaawoyay malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen? E ko honɗun non haɗata ɲaawen haajuuji oo aduna?
46006004	Awa si tawii hiɗon mari lurral hakkunde mon fii haajuuji aduna ɗin, hara ko yimɓe ɓe moftal ngal hayfini ɓen waɗoton ɲaawooɓe?
46006005	Ko fii hersingol on mi wowliri ɗun. Taw si hay gooto faamuɗo, waawuɗo ɲaawude hakkunde musiɓɓe mun alaa hakkunde mon?
46006006	E hin-le goɗɗo no wullitaade e hoore musiɗɗo mun yeeso ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen!
46006007	Onon non, ko ko waɗi haa ɲaawindirɗon kon holli wonde on foolaama few. Sitta nde waɗaɗon bone, maa hippaɗon.
46006008	Kono ko onon woni waɗude angal peewal ngal, jatta ɓeya, e hin-le ko musiɓɓe mon.
46006009	Wota on ɗaynito! E on andaa ɓoyliiɓe ɓen maraa geɓal ka laamu Alla? Hinaa jiiɓiiɓe ɓen, hinaa kadi rewooɓe sanamu ɓen e jeenooɓe ɓen e worɓe waɗitiiɓe rewɓe ɓen e worɓe jinooɓe worɓe ɓen
46006010	e wuyɓe ɓen e himmuɓe ɓen e mandilooɓe ɓen e hoynooɓe ɓen e jattooɓe ɓen, woni ko mari geɓal ka laamu Alla.
46006011	Awa ko ɗun woɓɓe e mon wonnoo. Kono Ruuhu Alla men on lootii on, laɓɓinii on, o jogorii on feewuɓe e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
46006012	Miɗo newnanaa fow, kono hinaa fow nafata. Miɗo newnanaa fow, kono mi accataa ko woni woo waawammi.
46006013	Neemaaji ɗin ko fii reedu, reedu ndun kadi fii neemaaji ɗin, Alla kadi mulay ɗi fow. Awa kadi ɓandu ndun hinaa fii jinaa, kono ko ndu fii Joomiraaɗo on, Joomiraaɗo on kadi fii ɓandu ndun.
46006014	Awa kadi Alla, on Immintinɗo Joomi on, immintiniray en bawgal makko ngal.
46006015	E hara on andaa wonde ko ɓalli mon ɗin woni tere Almasiihu on? E hara mi ƴettay tere Almasiihu on, mi yuɓɓindira e cagaajo? Pellet oo'o!
46006016	E on andaa kadi, mo yuɓɓindiri hoore mun e cagaajo, haray kanko e makko ko ɓe ɓandu wooturu? Ɓay no windii: «Kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe wonay gooto.»
46006017	Kono, on humondirɗo e Joomiraaɗo on, haray kanko e makko ko ɓe ruuhu gooto.
46006018	Woɗɗitee jinaa on! E junuubu goo mo neɗɗo waɗata, hara on junuubu hinaa tabitoowo ka ɓandu. Kono on jokkuɗo jinaa, haray ko ɓandu makko ndun tigi o woni waɗande junuubu.
46006019	E hari on andaa ɗunɗoo? Ko ɓandu mon ndun woni suudu Ruuhu Seniiɗo wonɗo e mon on, on mo Alla okki on. Hinaa onon jeyi hoore mon,
46006020	ko fii on sooditaama coggu sattungu. Awa teddiniree Alla ɓalli mon ɗin.
46007001	Jooni feƴƴen e ko windanɗon mi kon. No moƴƴani gorko hara o meemaali debbo.
46007002	Kono non fii reenagol e jinaa, yo mo kala heɓu ɓeyngu, debbo kala heɓa moodi.
46007003	Gorko on jonnita ɓeyngu mun ko handi kon, debbo on kadi wano non e telen-ma moodi mun.
46007004	Ko fii debbo on jeyaa ɓandu mun ndun, kono ko moodibbo on, gorko on kadi wano non, o jeyaa ɓandu makko ndun, kono ko ɓeyngu makko jeyi ndu.
46007005	Wota on salondir, si hinaa e saa'i nanondiral mon, fii no heɓiron saa'i no tororon Alla. Ɓawto ɗun yiitidon, fii wota Ibuliisa foolir on angal waawugol hoore mun.
46007006	Kono mi wowliraali ɗun wa si ko yamiroore, kono ko ko newnaa.
46007007	Miɗo yelii yo neɗɗo fow wa'u wa an min, kono mo kala no mari dokkal feerewal, ngal Alla yeɗi ɗun, mo kala e noone goo.
46007008	Ɓe resaa ɓen non e keynguuɓe ɓen, mi wi'ay no moƴƴani ɓe no ɓe wa'ira wa an min.
46007009	Kono si ɓe waawataa hoore maɓɓe, ko yo ɓe resu, ko fii ko resugol ɓuri ɓittorgol faale feƴƴituɗo.
46007010	E telen-ma ƴettindirɓe ɓen non, e hino ko mi wi'ata kon, (hinaa non min yamiri, kono ko Joomiraaɗo on), wota debbo sertu e moodi mun.
46007011	Si kanko debbo on non o aru e serteede, yo o jooɗo hara o ƴettaaka, maa o moƴƴintinida e moodi makko. Awa kadi wota gorko jonnitu ɓeyngu mun.
46007012	Fii ɓeya, (ɗunɗoo ko min wowli, hinaa Joomiraaɗo on), si musiɗɗo goo no mari debbo mo gomɗinaa, hara on debbo no yiɗi wondugol e makko, wota o seedu e makko.
46007013	Si tawii kadi debbo no mari moodibbo mo gomɗinaa, hara on gorko no yiɗi wondude e on debbo, wota o seedu e moodi makko.
46007014	Ko fii moodibbo mo gomɗinaa ko jeyaaɗo Alla sabu debbo makko gomɗinɗo on, debbo mo gomɗinaa on kadi ko jeyaaɗo Alla sabu moodibbo makko gomɗinɗo on. Si hinaa ɗun, ɓiɓɓe mon ɓen wonay woɗɗondirɓe e Alla, e hara-le wurin ko ɓe ɓadondirɓe e Alla.
46007015	Si tawii mo gomɗinaa on no catii e seedugol, yo gomɗinɗo on newnan mo ɗun. Ko fii hay huunde waɗɗaaki musiɗɗo gomɗinɗo e ɗun, Alla ko noddiri en ko wuurugol e nder ɓuttu.
46007016	E hoore ɗun, ko honno debbo andirta si o danday moodi makko? Maa si gorko danday ɓeyngu mun?
46007017	Ko woni tun, yo mo kala jokkir no Joomiraaɗo on waɗirani ɗun non, e noone noddaandu ndu o heɓiri Alla ndun. Ko nii mi yamiriri e nder mofte ɗen fow.
46007018	On mo noddeede mun tawi sunninaama, yo o wonir no o sunniniraa non. On mo noddeede mun tawi sunninaaka, wota o eto sunnineede.
46007019	Sunninegol ngol wonaa huunde, angal sunninegol kadi wonaa huunde, kono ko ɗoftagol yamirooje Alla ɗen woni goɗɗun.
46007020	Yo mo kala wonir no wonirnoo non fewndo o noddaa.
46007021	Si tawii fewndo noddaɗaa ko a jiyaaɗo, wota a aanu, kono si tawii hiɗa waawi rinɗude, haray eto.
46007022	Ko fii jiyaaɗo mo Joomiraaɗo on noddi, haray o wonii mo Joomiraaɗo on rinɗini. Ko wano non kadi, dimo mo Joomiraaɗo on noddi, haray o wonii jiyaaɗo Almasiihu on.
46007023	Awa on sottiraama coggu sattungu, wota on wontu maccuɓe yimɓe ɓen.
46007024	Yo mo kala, yo musiɓɓe, woniran Alla noone no wonirnoo non wa fewndo ko o noddaa.
46007025	E telen-ma ɓe ƴettaali ƴettaaka ɓen, wonaa yamiroore Joomiraaɗo on mi hendii. Kono ko fewjoore an nden mi woni on jonnude, wa neɗɗo sella-findeejo sabu yurmeende Joomiraaɗo on.
46007026	E hino ko mi miijii no moƴƴi kon, sabu satteendeeji fewndiiɗi ɗin: no moƴƴani neɗɗo ka o wonira no o woniri non.
46007027	Si hiɗa tiggunoo, wota a ɗaɓɓu seedigal. Si a tiggaa, wota a ɗaɓɓu tiggugol.
46007028	Kono, si a resii, haray a waɗaali junuubu. Si jiwo kadi resaama, haray o waɗaali junuubu. Kono non yimɓe resindirɓe ɓen fottay e tampereeji, mi faalaa on dandude ɗi.
46007029	E hino ko mi wi'ata kon, yo musiɓɓe an: saa'i on ko raɓɓiɗuɗo. Jooni, on mo no mari suddiiɗo, yo wa'u wa mo alaa.
46007030	Ɓen wonɓe wullude, yo wa'u wa si ɓe alaano wullude. Ɓen wonɓe kadi weltaade, yo wa'u kadi wa si ɓe alaano weltaade. Soodooɓe ɓen kadi, yo wa'u wa si ɓe maraano,
46007031	e ɓen wonɓe huutorde oo aduna, ka haqiiqa, yo wa'u wa si tawii ɓe alaano huutorde. Ko fii mbaadi oo aduna feƴƴay.
46007032	E hin-le mi faalaaka yo on wondu e annde. On mo tiggaali, ko fii haajuuji Joomiraaɗo on hittini, no o weltinira Joomiraaɗo on.
46007033	On resuɗo non, ko fii haajuuji aduna hittini, no o weltinira ɓeyngu makko.
46007034	Haray himo senditii. Wano non, debbo mo resaaka maa jiwo, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on hittini, fii no o laatora laaɓuɗo ka ɓandu e ka ruuhu. Debbo resaaɗo on non ko fii haajuuji oo aduna hittini, no o weltinira moodi makko.
46007035	Ko nafa mon mi wowliri ɗun, hinaa fii faaɗinangol on, kono ko fii addugol on e ko haani kon e ko laaɓi kon, e no humoron e Joomiraaɗo on, hara on dillaali.
46007036	On mo no tanƴinii ko lo'uɗo e fee jiwo mo o ƴami, feƴƴuɗo duuɓi kellefuyee, o tawi ƴettindirgol e makko no moƴƴi, yo o waɗu ko o faalaa kon, haray o waɗaali junuubu si ɓe resindirii.
46007037	Kono on anniyiiɗo ka ɓernde mun haa tabiti wonde o tiggataa on jiwo, hara ko e yiɗi makko kanko tigi, e hoore himo wawti faaleeji makko, haray o waɗii ko moƴƴi.
46007038	Awa ko nii woniri: on tigguɗo jiwo mo o ƴami on, haray o waɗii ko moƴƴi, on mo tiggaali jiwo mo o ƴamaynoo on kadi, ɓurtu moƴƴinde.
46007039	Debbo no humondiri e moodi mun fannin moodi makko no wuuri. Kono si gorko on maayii, haray no newanii mo reseede ka o faalaa woo, ko woni tun, ko yo taw ko no yaadiri e faale Joomiraaɗo on.
46007040	E miijo an, ka o ɓurata hettaade, ko si o wonirii wano o woniri non, ɓay min kadi miɗo tanƴinii Ruuhu Allaahu on no e an.
46008001	E telen-ma tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji, hiɗen andi wonde en fow hiɗen mari gandal, e hin-le gandal adday mawnintinaare, kono giggol tiiɗinay.
46008002	On mo no sikki no andi goɗɗun, haray fahin o andaali ko honno haanaa andireede.
46008003	Kono si goɗɗo yiɗii Alla, haray Alla no andi mo.
46008004	Fii telen-ma huutorgol tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji ɗin, hiɗen andi wonde sanamu wonaa goɗɗun tigi e oo aduna, ko Alla gooto tun woodi.
46008005	Pellet no woodi piiji reweteeɗi ɗuuɗuɗi ka kammu e ka leydi, jogoraaɗi wa si tawii ko allaaɓe maa joomiraaɓe.
46008006	Kono enen ko Alla gooto marɗen, on Baabaajo, on mo kala huunde iwri e mun, e on mo wonanɗen, e Joomi gooto, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo piiji ɗin fow woniri, e on mo wonirɗen.
46008007	Kono fow alaa ngal gandal. Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓen wowtuɓe sanamuuji, haa jooni si no ɲaamude ngun teewu anditay fii ko sakkaa kon. Nde tawnoo ɓernde maɓɓe nden no lo'i, ɗun tuuninay ɓe.
46008008	Hinaa neema ɓannata en e Alla. Si en ɲaamaali, ɗun ɗuytataa en huunde, si en ɲaamii kadi, ɗun ɓeydataa en huunde.
46008009	Ko woni tun, reenee fii wota ko newnanaɗon waɗugol kon wonan lo'uɓe ɓen peggal.
46008010	Ko fii si goɗɗo aru e yi'ude ma, an oo jooma gandal, hiɗa nafoo e nder juulirde ka sanamuuji rewetee, taw si nden ɓernde makko lo'unde pooɗataa mo ɲaamugol tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji?
46008011	Ɗun haray on lo'uɗo mulirii sabu ‹gandal› maa ngal, ɗun ko on musiɗɗo mo Almasiihu on maayi fii mun!
46008012	Si on waɗirii non junuubu e telen-ma musiɓɓe ɓen, e nder barmingol ɓernde maɓɓe lo'unde nden, haray on waɗii junuubu e telen-ma Almasiihu on.
46008013	Ko ɗun waɗi, si tawii ɲaametee wonay sabu peggal musiɗɗo an, haray mi ɲaamataa teewu hande kadi, fii wota mi liɓu musiɗɗo an on.
46009001	E hara hinaa mi dimo? Kaa hinaa mi sahaabaajo? Kaa mi yi'aali Iisaa Joomi men on? Kaa hinaa on kuugal an e telen-ma Joomi on?
46009002	Hay si tawii hinaa mi sahaabaajo fii woɓɓe ɓen, onon bete ko mi sahaabaajo fii mon. Ko fii ko on maande sahaabankaaku an ngun e telen-ma Joomi on.
46009003	E hino ɗoo ko mi jaaborta ɲaawooɓe lan ɓen kon:
46009004	E hara haananaa men ka men ɲaama men yara?
46009005	Kaa haananaa men ka men yaada e debbo amen mo men kafidi diina, wano ɓeya sahaabaaɓe woni warrude non, e musiɓɓe Joomi men on, e Petruusu?
46009006	Kaa ko min tun e Barnabaasi haani gollude fii no men wuurira?
46009007	Ko suufaajo hombo fawtotoo hoore mun e nder suufayaagal mun? Ko hombo tutata leggal wiiɲu, hara ɲaamataa ɓiɓɓe maggal on? Ko ngaynaako hombo aynata wuro, ronka yarude ɓiraaɗan ɗin daabeeji?
46009008	Ko mi wowlata kon wonaa ko iwri e miijooji neɗɗanke, ko fii Sariya on kadi ko ɗun wi'i.
46009009	Ko fii no windii ka Sariya Muusaa: «Wota mo buuma hunduko ngaari ndin nde hindi yaaɓana ɗun maaro.» E hara Alla no aanidi e ga'i ɗin?
46009010	Kaa ko fii men o wowlirani nii? Hiiyii, ko sabu men enen ɗun windiraa. Mo no remude yo remir tama'u, e on mo no yaaɓude yo yaaɓir tama'u heɓugol geɓal.
46009011	Si tawii men aawii ko iwri e Alla hakkunde mon, taw si haanaa ka men soɲita e mon piiji aduna?
46009012	Si tawii ɗun no haanani woɓɓe goo e hoore mon, haray menen ittii e sikke. Kono men huutoraali kon ko haanani men. Kono meɗen ronditii fow, fii wota men fallu Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on.
46009013	E on andaa wonde ɓen waɗooɓe golle juulirde mawnde nden ko e ɗun ɲaamata, e wonde gollooɓe ka layyorde ɓen kadi no mari geɓal ka layyorde?
46009014	Ko wano non kadi Joomi on no yamiri wonde feɲɲinooɓe Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ko e makko wuurata.
46009015	Min non mi huutoraali hay huunde e ɗin haananɗi lan, awa mi windiraali ɗun kadi fii yo mi newnane. Ko fii mayde nden no ɓuranimmi edii goɗɗo ittude lan e ndee huunde nde mi mawninorta.
46009016	Ko fii hewtaa ka mi mantora yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ɓay ɗun ko ko waɗɗii mi. Si mi feɲɲinaali Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, bone wonanay lan.
46009017	Si tawii ko e hoore anniyee mi woni waɗirde, haray miɗo mari njoddi. Si tawii non mi fawa waɗugol ɗun, haray mi waɗay woni golle ɗe mi halfinaa.
46009018	Awa ko honɗun non jooni woni njoddi an ndin? Ko waajagol fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e ɓaawo ƴantugol njoddi e tortagol ko haanani waajotooɗo kon.
46009019	Ko fii, fii kala miɗo rinɗi e hoore wonɗo woo, mi waɗitii maccuɗo fow fii no adadu ɓurdo mawnude on heɓora.
46009020	E telen-ma Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, mi wa'a wa Yahuudiyankeejo, fii no mi heɓira Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen. E telen-ma wonɓe e ley Sariya on kadi, mi wa'a wa wonɗo e ley Sariya on, fii no mi heɓira wonɓe e ley Sariya on ɓen, fii kala min tigi hinaa mi wonɗo e ley Sariya on.
46009021	E telen-ma ɓe alaa e ley Sariya on ɓen kadi, mi wa'a wa mo alaa e ley Sariya on, fii no mi heɓira ɓe alaa e ley Sariya on ɓen, e hin-le min tigi wonaa wonde mi alaa e ley Sariya Alla on, kono miɗo e ley Sariya Almasiihu on.
46009022	Mi lo'ida e lo'uɓe ɓen fii no mi heɓira lo'uɓe ɓen. Mi wonii fow e telen-ma yimɓe ɓen fow, fii no gasirta woo mi wona sabu dandugol woɓɓe.
46009023	Mi waɗiri fow sabu Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, fii no mi heɓiroya geɓal.
46009024	E on andaa? Wonɓe foolotirde e dogudu ɓen fow no dogude, kono ko gooto foolata heɓa njoddi. Awa dogiree wano non, fii no heɓiron njoddi.
46009025	Kala foolotirteeɗo waɗay kala noone eltal ɓandu, fii no o heɓira meetelol ngol luttataa, kono enen ko meetelol luttoowol.
46009026	Min non miɗo dogude, kono hinaa dogudu meereeru. Miɗo uttaade, kono hinaa fii uttagol hendu ndun.
46009027	Liddu ɗun on non, miɗo yangude ɓandu an ndun, miɗo waawi ndu, fii nde mi gaynoyi waajaade ɓeya, min tigi wota mi pottine.
46010001	Musiɓɓe an, mi faalaaka yo on yejjitu wonde baabiraaɓe men ɓen fow wonno e ley duulere, ɓe fow ɓe taƴitiri ka baharu.
46010002	Ɓe fow ɓe lootaa maande gomɗinal ka duulere e ka baharu e nder humondiral e Muusaa.
46010003	Ɓe fow ɓe ɲaami ɲaametee gooto iwruɗo e Alla.
46010004	Ɓe fow ɓe yari njaram gootan iwruɗan e Alla, ko fii ko e fetere iwrunde e Alla jokkunoonde ɓe nden ɓe yaraynoo. Ko Almasiihu on wonnoo nden fetere.
46010005	Kono ɓurɓe ɓen e maɓɓe weltinaano Alla, ko ɗun waɗi si ɓe maayi ka wulaa.
46010006	Awa ɗun fow ko waɗiri ko fii hollugol en mise, fii wota en heɓu faaleeji bonɗi wano ɓe heɓirnoo non.
46010007	Wota on wonu rewooɓe sanamu, wano woɓɓe wonirnoo e hakkunde maɓɓe, wano windori non: «Jamaa on jooɗii fii ɲaamugol e fii yarugol, ɓawto ɗun ɓe immii fii fijirgol jiiɓaare.»
46010008	Awa wota en jokku jinaa, wano woɓɓe e maɓɓe waɗirnoo non, haa guluuje noogay e tato maayi ɲande wootere.
46010009	Wota en ndarndo Almasiihu on, wano woɓɓe e maɓɓe ndarndornoo non, ɓen ɓe bolle mulunoo.
46010010	Wota on ŋermu, wano ɓeya ŋermirnoo non, ɓen ɓe malaa'ikaajo muloowo on warunoo.
46010011	Ɗun, ko heɓiri ɓe ko fii yo wonan en misal, windiraa kadi fii hajagol en, enen ɓee tawaaɓe ka lannoode aduna.
46010012	Ko ɗun waɗi, on mo no sikki no darii, yo o reeno wota o yanu.
46010013	Ndarndannde woo heɓaali on nde goɗɗo goo heɓaali. Alla ko Sella-Findeejo, o newnataa ndarndeɗon toonin doole mon ɗen, kono e nder ndarndannde nden o adday feere no sortoron e mun, e no waawiron nde dartorde.
46010014	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo yiɓɓe an, dogee rewugol sanamu.
46010015	Ko wa yimɓe faamuɓe mi woni on yewtirde, onon tigi ɲaawee ko mi wi'i kon.
46010016	Jardukun du'aa kun wonɗen du'orde kun ko yuɓɓondirkun e ƴiiƴan Almasiihu on. Bireedi mo wonɗen taƴitude on, ko yuɓɓondirɗo e ɓandu Almasiihu on.
46010017	Ɓay ko bireediwal gootal woodi, enen e ɗuuɗude men ko en ɓandu wooturu. Ko fii en fow hiɗen hawti bireediwal gootal.
46010018	Ndaaree ɓee Isra'iilayankeeɓe wonɓe ɲaamude daabeeji sakkaaɗi ɗin. Hinaa yuɓɓondirɓe e layyorde nden?
46010019	Awa ko honɗun mi woni wi'ude? Wonde tebbeeli sakkaaɗi fii sanamuuji ɗin ko goɗɗun? Kaa sanamuuru ko goɗɗun? Oo'o!
46010020	Kono kon ko rewooɓe sanamuuji ɓen woni sakkaade, ko jinnaaji ɗin ɓe woni sakkanaade, hinaa Alla. E hin-le mi faalaaka yo on humondir e jinnaaji ɗin.
46010021	On waawataa yarirde jardukun Joomi on, yariron kadi jardukun jinnaaji ɗin. On waawataa heɓude ka ɲaametee Joomi on, heɓon kadi ka ɲaametee jinnaaji ɗin.
46010022	En faalaa memminde nawliigu Joomiraaɗo on? Kaa en ɓuru mo dolnude?
46010023	Fow no newnaa, kono hinaa fow wondi e nafa. Fow no newnaa, kono hinaa fow tiiɗinta.
46010024	Wota gooto ɗaɓɓu nafa mun on, kono yo ɗaɓɓu fii heddiiɓe ɓen.
46010025	Ɲaamee kala teewu ko yeeyetee ka luumo, hara on sikkitaaki ka ɓernde mon.
46010026	Ko fii: «Leydi ndin e kala ko ndi wondi ko Joomiraaɗo on wonani.»
46010027	Si tawii mo gomɗinaa saatinii on, e hin-le hiɗon faalaa yahude, ɲaamee kala ko weeɓitanoyaɗon, hara on sikkitaaki ka ɓernde mon.
46010028	Kono si goɗɗo wi'ii on: «Ɗunɗoo ko ko ittaa sadaka», haray wota on ɲaamu sabu on andinɗo on e sabu ɓernde nden.
46010029	Hinaa fii ɓernde mon nden mi woni yewtude ɗoo, kono ko fii ɓernde oya nden. Awa ko fii honɗun ndimankaaku an ngun ɲaawirtee ɓernde oya nden?
46010030	Si mi jarnii Alla e nder ko mi ɲaamata kon, haray ko honɗun mi felirtee fii on ɲaamete mo mi jarni Alla fii mun?
46010031	Woni on ɲaamay, woni on yaray, woni kala ko waɗoton, waɗiree piiji ɗin fow fii mangu Alla ngun.
46010032	Wota on wonan hay gooto peggal, woni Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen, woni Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, woni moftal Alla ngal.
46010033	Wano mi woniri weloowo wonɗo woo e ɗi fow non, mi alaa ɗaɓɓude nafa an on, kono ko nafa ɓurɓe ɗuuɗude ɓen fii no ɓe dandiree.
46011001	Awa ɲembee lan, wano min kadi mi woni ɲembirde Almasiihu on non.
46011002	Mi mantii on fii ko on yejjitaali fii an kon e ɗi fow, e ko maanditiɗon janndeeji ɗin kon, wano mi hewtiniri on ɗi non.
46011003	Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo faalaa yo on andu wonde Almasiihu on ko hooreejo kala neɗɗanke, gorko kadi ko hooreejo e fee ɓeyngu mun, Alla kadi ko hooreejo e fee Almasiihu on.
46011004	Kala gorko hippiiɗo kufune, nde no toroo Alla, maa no haala ko Alla longini ɗun, haray o yawike hoore makko.
46011005	Ko wano non kadi, kala debbo wonɗo toraade Alla maa haalude ko Alla longini ɗun, hara o taaraa, haray o yawike hoore makko. Haray no wa'i wa si tawii kanko debbo on himo fembii.
46011006	Ko fii, si debbo taaraa, haray yo o taƴu sukundu makko ndun. Ko fii, si no hersinanii debbo ka sukundu makko ndun taƴee, maa o femboo, haray yo o tiggo.
46011007	Kono duhiiɗo haanaa ka hippoo, ko fii ko o mbaadi e darja Alla, debbo non ko darja gorko.
46011008	Ko ɗun waɗi, gorko hinaa e debbo suutaa, kono ko debbo suutaa e gorko.
46011009	Awa kadi gorko hinaa sabu debbo tagiraa, kono debbo ko sabu gorko tagiraa.
46011010	Ko ɗun waɗi, sabu malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, debbo no haani heɓude ka hoore mun maande laamu ngu o woni e ley mun ngun.
46011011	Kono e telen-ma humondiral men e Joomiraaɗo on, debbo gasataa e ɓaawo gorko, gorko kadi gasataa e ɓaawo debbo.
46011012	Ko fii, ko wano debbo suutiraa e gorko non, ko wano non kadi tawi ko debbo daɲata gorko, ɗun fow non ko immorde e Alla.
46011013	Ɲaawee ɗun onon tigi. E hara no hawri ka debbo toroo Alla, hara o taaraa?
46011014	E hara aduna on tigi faaminaali on wonde no hersinanii gorko ka o accita saayannde?
46011015	Kono heɓugol sukundu ko darja debbo, ko fii sukundu ndu o yeɗaa ndun ko ko o buumora.
46011016	Si tawii goɗɗo no faalaa warrude noone goo, enen en alaa on naamu, mofte Alla ɗen kadi alaa on naamu.
46011017	E nder waɗugol non ɗee yamirooje yeeso ɗoo, alaa ko mi mantira on e nder ko mottondirton kon, hara hinaa fii ko ɓuri moƴƴude, kono ko fii ko ɓuri bonude.
46011018	Ko adii kon non, mi nanii nde mottondirɗon woo sendondiral waɗay hakkunde mon. E baŋŋe goo, ɗun no henanimmi.
46011019	Bee yeddondire wona hakkunde mon, fii no holniiɓe ɓen feeɲira e hakkunde mon.
46011020	Jaka nde mottondirɗon woo, hinaa fii ɲaamugol nafakkaari Joomi on.
46011021	Ɓay nde hiɗon ɲaama, mo kala kutoto nafakka mun on, ɲaama, hara goɗɗo goo no weelaa, oya kaɲun no mandili.
46011022	E hara on alaa cuuɗi ka ɲaamon e ka yaron? Kaa on hayfinay woni moftal Alla ngal, hersinon ɓe alaa huunde ɓen? Ko honɗun mi wi'ata on? Mi mantay on? Mi mantataa on e ɗun!
46011023	Ko fii, ko ko mi heɓiri Joomi on kon mi hewtini on. E nder jemma mo Iisaa Joomi on janfaa e mun on, o ƴettuno bireedi,
46011024	o jarni Alla, o taƴiti, o wi'i: «Ɗunɗoo ko ɓandu an, wonandu on ndun nii, waɗee ɗunɗoo maande ko anditiron fii an.»
46011025	Ko wano non kadi, ɓay ɓe gaynii ɲaamude, o ƴetti jardukun waɗorkun njaram, o wi'i: «Kun jardukun ko maande fii ahadi heyri tippundi e ƴiiƴan an ɗan, waɗee ɗunɗoo maande ko anditiron fii an, saa'i nde yaroton e mun woo.»
46011026	Ko fii nde ɲaamoton oo bireedi woo, yaron e kun jardukun, on wowlay fii mayde Joomi on haa ɲande o artoyi.
46011027	Ko ɗun waɗi, kala on ɲaamuɗo on bireedi, yari e kun jardukun Joomi on, hara ko no haaniraa, o wonay felniiɗo e telen-ma ɓandu e ƴiiƴan Joomi on.
46011028	Awa, yo mo kala miijitano hoore mun si o ɲaama on bireedi, maa o yarira kun jardukun.
46011029	Ko fii kala on ɲaamuɗo yari e ɓaawo anditugol ɓandu Joomi on, haray ontigi ɲaamii yarii ɲaawoore ɲaawaynde ɗun kaɲun tigi.
46011030	Ko ɗun waɗi si no e hakkunde mon nawnuɓe buy e kitasolooɓe buy, e on mayraama woɓɓe.
46011031	Si enen tigi en ɲaawitike, en ɲaawoytaake.
46011032	Kono Joomiraaɗo on no ɲaawude en donkina, fii wota en ɲaawidoye e aduna on.
46011033	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an, nde mottondirɗon fii nafakkaari ndin woo, habbondiree.
46011034	On mo tawi no weelaa, yo ɲaamu ka mun, fii wota on mottondir fawon ɲaawoore e hoore mon. Mi jaaboyto ɗeya lande, nde mi hewtoyi.
46012001	E telen-ma dokke iwruɗe e Ruuhu Alla ɗen, yo musiɓɓe an, mi faalaaka yo on ronku andude ɗun.
46012002	Hiɗon andi fewndo ko on gomɗinaa, hiɗon selnaa, nawraa e sanamuuji mbobooji.
46012003	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'ay on: kala mo Ruuhu Allaahu on ardii e nder ko o wowlata kon, wi'ataa: «Iisaa ko huɗaaɗo.» Hay gooto kadi waawataa wi'ude: «Iisaa ko Joomi», si hinaa Ruuhu Seniiɗo on ardii mo.
46012004	Dokke ɗen no serti, kono Ruuhu Allaahu on ko gooto.
46012005	Balle ɗen kadi no serti, kono Joomiraaɗo on ko gooto.
46012006	Golleeji ɗin kadi no serti, kono ko Alla gooto on woni waɗude ɗi fow e yimɓe ɓen fow.
46012007	E hin-le, mo kala ko Ruuhu Allaahu on feɲɲini e mun kon ko dokkal fii nafa fow.
46012008	Ko ɗun waɗi, Ruuhu on yeɗay goɗɗo on kongol faamu, on Ruuhu gooto yeɗa oya on kongol gandal,
46012009	on Ruuhu gooto yeɗa goɗɗo goo gomɗinal, on Ruuhu tigi yeɗa goɗɗo goo ɲawndugol,
46012010	goɗɗo goo dokkal fii waɗugol kaawakeeji moƴƴi, goɗɗo goo haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun, goɗɗo goo gandal fii sendindirgol noone ruuhuuji, goɗɗo goo noone haalaaji janani, goɗɗo goo nantingol ɗin haalaaji.
46012011	Ko on Ruuhu gooto bajjo waɗata ɗii piiji fow, senditana mo kala e ko mun, wano o yiɗiri non.
46012012	Ko ɗun waɗi, wano tawiri non ɓandu ndun ko wooturu, hindu mari tere buy. Tere ɓandu ndun non kadi e ɗuuɗude, ko ɓandu wooturu ɗe mari. Ko wano non wonirani Almasiihu on.
46012013	Ko fii ko Ruuhu gooto lootiraɗen fii wonugol ɓandu wooturu. En fow yarnaɗen Ruuhu Alla gooto on, woni non Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, woni Gereekiyankeeɓe ɓen, woni jiyaaɓe ɓen, woni rimɓe ɓen.
46012014	Ko fii ɓandu ndun wonaali teral gootal, kono tere buy.
46012015	Si koyngal ngal wi'ii wonde: «Ɓay hinaa mi jungo, mi tawdaaka e ɓandu ndun», ɗun ittataa ko ngal teral e ɓandu ndun.
46012016	Si nowru ndun kadi wi'ii wonde: «Ɓay hinaa mi yiitere, mi tawdaaka e ɓandu ndun», ɗun ittataa ko ndu teral e ɓandu ndun.
46012017	Si tawno ɓandu ndun fow wonno yiitere, ko honno ndu naniraynoo? Maa si ɓandu ndun fow waɗano nowru, ko honno ndu faamiraynoo barngol?
46012018	Kono Alla waɗi teral kala e ɓandu ndun no o faaliraa non.
46012019	Si fow wonno teral gootal, ko honto ɓandu ndun wonaynoo?
46012020	Jooni non, tere buy no woodi, kono ɓandu ndun ko wooturu.
46012021	Yiitere nden waawataa wi'ude jungo ngon: «Mi hatonjinaa e maa.» Hoore nden kadi waawataa wi'ude koyɗe ɗen: «Mi hatonjinaa e mon.»
46012022	Ɗun-le toode, tere ɓandu wa'uɗe wa si no ɓuri lo'ude ɗen, ko ɗen woni hittuɗe,
46012023	e ɗe tanƴiniɗen no ɓuri hayfude ɗen e ɓandu ndun, hiɗen hundiri ɗe teddungal ɓurngal tiiɗude. E hin-le tere men ɓurɗe hersinaade ɗen, ko ɗen ɓurɗen surrude,
46012024	ɗe hersinaaki ɗen kan hatonjinaa e ɗun. Alla waɗiri ɓandu ndun e noone mo ɓureten teddinirde ŋakkiraaɗe ɗen,
46012025	fii wota liddondiral waɗu e nder ɓandu ndun, kono yo ɗe nafindir.
46012026	Si teral tampii, ɗeya tere fow tampiday e maggal. Si teral gootal teddinaama, ɗeya tere fow weltoday e maggal.
46012027	Ko on ɓandu Almasiihu on, mo kala e mon ko teral e mayru.
46012028	Awa, ko Alla adii waɗude e nder moftal ngal, ko sahaabaaɓe, ɗimmun ɗun ko haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun, tammun ɗun ko jannooɓe, ɓawto ɗun dokkal fii kaawakeeji moƴƴi, e dokke fii ɲawndugol, e wallugol, e ardagol, e wowlugol e noone haalaaji janani.
46012029	Hara fow ko sahaabaaɓe? Kaa hara fow ko haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun? Kaa hara fow ko jannooɓe? Kaa hara fow waɗay kaawakeeji moƴƴi?
46012030	Kaa hara fow yeɗa dokke ɲawndugol? Kaa ko fow yeɗaa wowlugol e haalaaji janani? Kaa hara fow ko nantinooɓe ɗin haalaaji?
46012031	Kono himmanee dokke ɓurɗe moƴƴude ɗen. Awa mi hollay on kadi laawol ɓurngol moƴƴude ngol.
46013001	Hay si mi wowlii e haalaaji yimɓe ɓen e ɗi malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, si tawii mi alaa giggol, haray ko mi talenhun sila senƴoohun, maa foolifen wonɗo e iidude.
46013002	Hay si mi yeɗaama dokkal haalugol ko Alla longinimmi kon e faamu fii gundooji ɗin fow e gande ɗen fow, e hay si mi heɓii gomɗinal haa ka tawata mi dillinay pelle ɗen, si tawii mi alaa giggol, haray hinaa mi fus.
46013003	Hay si mi okkitirii keyeeji an ɗin fow fii ɲammingol miskinɓe ɓen, e hay si mi okkitirii ɓandu an ndun fii yo ndu sunne, si mi alaa giggol, ɗun nafataa lan huunde.
46013004	Giggol ko muɲal, giggol ko moƴƴuki, giggol nawlataa, giggol mantotaako, hinaa heewungol mawnintinaare.
46013005	Ngol waasaa needi, ngol ɗaɓɓataa nafa maggol, ngol yaawataa seytinde, ngol marataa bone.
46013006	Ngol weltortaa angal peewal, kono ko goonga ngol weltorta.
46013007	Giggol heɲɲay ko woni woo, hingol hoolii ko woni woo, hingol tanƴinii e ko woni woo, hingol wakkilii ko woni woo.
46013008	Giggol ngol lannataa haa poomaa. Haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun feƴƴay, haalaaji janani kadi feƴƴay, gandal kadi feƴƴay.
46013009	Ko fii gandal men ngal hinaa timmungal, ko haaleten kon e nder ko Alla longini en kon kadi hinaa ko timmi.
46013010	Ko fii, nde ko laatii kon aroyi woo, ko timmaa kon feƴƴay.
46013011	Wa fewndo ko mi wonnoo paykun, mi wowlirayno wa paykun, mi miijorayno wa paykun, mi ɲaawirayno kadi wa paykun. Ɓay mi wonii mokobaa, mi feƴƴani paykunyaagal.
46013012	Hande hiɗen tintora ndaarorgal e noone no niɓɓitiri, kono en yi'oyay kene e kene. Ko mi andi kon hande timmaa, kono mi andiroyay wano Alla andirimmi non.
46013013	Jooni non ko ɗii piiji ɗoo tati luttata: ko gomɗinal e tama'u e giggol. Kono ko ɓuri mawnude kon, ko giggol.
46014001	Awa ɗaɓɓee giggol ngol, himmanon dokke iwruɗe e Ruuhu Alla ɗen, tentinii haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun.
46014002	Ɗun, on wowluɗo e haala janana, haray hinaa yimɓe ɓen o wowlani, ko Alla. Ko fii hay gooto alaa mo faamude, awa kadi ko ruuhu o woni wowlirde ɗin gundooji.
46014003	Kono haaloowo ko Alla longini ɗun kon ko yimɓe ɓen o woni yewtude, o tiiɗina ɓe, o wakkilina ɓe, o yarlina ɓe.
46014004	On wowloowo e haala janana non ko hoore mun tun o woni tiiɗinde, kono wonɗo haalude ko Alla longini ɗun kon kaɲun ko moftal ngal o woni tiiɗinde.
46014005	Miɗo yiɗi on fow yo on wowlu e haala janana, kono ko mi ɓuri faaleede kon ko yo on wonu haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun. Ko fii on haaloowo ko Alla longini ɗun no ɓuri wowloowo e haalaaji janani on mawnude, si hinaa hara on neɗɗo nantin ɗun fii no moftal ngal tiiɗiniree.
46014006	Jooni non, yo musiɓɓe an, si mi arii ka mon e yewtugol on e haalaaji janani, haray ko honɗun mi nafi on, si wonaa hara ko kongol gandal maa jannde maa haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun maa feɲɲinannde mi woni wowlude?
46014007	Si tawii aalaaji ɗi wuuraa no waɗude hito, wano serdu maa hoddu, si hito majji on laaɓaali, haray ko honno andirton galli majji on?
46014008	E si tawii hito liital ngal laaɓaali, ko hombo eɓɓindantoo hare nden?
46014009	Onon kadi wano non, si tawii on alaa yewtude haala faamotooka e nder ko wowloton e haalaaji janani kon, ko honno ɓe andirta ko wonɗon wi'ude kon? Ko fii haray ko hendu ndun wonɗon wowlande.
46014010	Noone haalaaji buy no woodi e oo aduna, kono alaa e majji ngol alaa firo.
46014011	Si tawii non mi faamataa haala ka goɗɗo woni yewtude lan kan, mi wonanay mo janano, kanko kadi o wonanammi janano.
46014012	Onon kadi non, ɓay hiɗon himmande dokke iwruɗe e Ruuhu Alla ɗen, yo taw ko fii tiiɗingol moftal ngal wonɗon himmirande ɗen dokke haa feƴƴita.
46014013	Ko ɗun waɗi, on wonɗo yewtude e haala janana longinaaka, yo toro fii no waawira nantinirde.
46014014	Ko fii si miɗo toraade Alla e haala janana longinaaka, haray ruuhu an on no toraade, kono haray mi alaa faamude.
46014015	Awa ko honɗun mi waɗata? Haray yo mi toror ruuhu, kono yo mi toror kadi faamu, mi beytira ruuhu, kono mi beytira kadi faamu.
46014016	Si hinaa ɗun, si a mantirii Alla ruuhu on, ko honno jooɗiiɗo tun e hakkunde heɗotooɓe ɓen jaɓirta «aamiina» e nder ko wonɗaa jarnude kon, ɓay o andaa ko honɗun wonɗaa wi'ude?
46014017	Ko goonga, hiɗa jarnirde no moƴƴiri, kono a tiiɗinaali oya.
46014018	Mi jarnii Alla ko tawi kon miɗo wowlude e haalaaji janani ɓuri on on fow.
46014019	Kono ka nder moftal, ko haalirgol hakkille an ɗen konguɗi jowi jannayɗi ɓeya ɓuranimmi haalugol konguɗi guluuji sappo e haala janana.
46014020	Musiɓɓe an, wota on miijor wa paykoy. E telen-ma ka bone, wonee paykoy tosokoy, kono miijoron wa mokobaaɓe.
46014021	Ko fii no windii ka Sariya, Joomiraaɗo on no daali: «Ko yimɓe ɓe haalaaji janani e ɓe kundule janane mi wowliranoyta oo jamaa. Hay ɗun ɓe heɗoytaako lan.»
46014022	Awa, haalaaji janani ɗin ko maande fii ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hinaa fii gomɗinɓe ɓen. Kono haalugol ko longinaa kon ko maande fii gomɗinɓe ɓen, hinaa fii ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen.
46014023	Si tawii moftal ngal fow mottondirii, mo kala no wowlude e haalaaji janani, heɗotooɓe nii tun arii, maa ɓe gomɗinaa, e hara ɓe wi'ataa ko on feetuɓe?
46014024	Kono si tawii fow no haalude ko Alla longini ɗun, mo gomɗinaa maa heɗotooɗo nii tun aru e taweede, ɗun fow faaminay mo fii junuubaaji makko, ɲaawa mo kadi,
46014025	gundooji ɓernde makko nden kadi feɲɲinte, onsay o sujjay ka leydi, o rewa Alla, o qirritoo wonde ko goonga Alla no hakkunde mon.
46014026	Musiɓɓe an, ko honno non warreten jooni? Nde mottondirɗon woo, mo kala e mon no mari beytol, maa jannde, maa ko feɲɲinanaa, maa haala janana, maa noone nantingol. Yo fow waɗire fii tiiɗingol.
46014027	Si no wowleede e haala janana, wota ɓuru ɗiɗo maa tato, e yo ɓe lontondir, tawa kadi no woodi nantinoowo.
46014028	Si nantinoowo alaa, haray yo wowloowo on deƴƴu ka mottondiral, o yewtitoo ka ɓernde makko, o yewta Alla kadi.
46014029	Fii haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun ɓen kaɲun, yo ɗiɗo maa tato yewtu, ɓeya taskoo ko yewtaa kon.
46014030	Si goɗɗo goo feɲɲinanaama goɗɗun, yo oya on fanku.
46014031	Ko fii on fow hiɗon waawi lontondirde haalon ko Alla longini on kon, fii no fow jangira wakkiloo.
46014032	Ruuhuuji haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun ɓen no yankinanii ɓen haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun.
46014033	Ko fii Alla hinaa Alla jiiɓoldu, kono ko mo o ɓuttu.
46014034	Ko yo rewɓe ɓen deƴƴu ka hakkunde mbatu, wano woniri non e nder mofte gomɗinɓe ɓen fow, ɓay newnanaaka ɓe ka ɓe wowla, kono ko yo ɓe wonu yankiniiɓe wano Sariya on kadi wi'iri non.
46014035	Si tawii kamɓe rewɓe ɓen hiɓe faalaa andude e toɓɓe goo, yo ɓe lando moodiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen tigi ka cuuɗi. Ko fii no hersinanii debbo yewtugol ka hakkunde mbatu.
46014036	Kaa ko e mon daaluyee Alla on iwri? Kaa ko haa e mon onon tun o ari?
46014037	On mo sikki ko haaloowo ko Alla longini ɗun, maa yeɗaaɗo dokkal iwrungal e Ruuhu Alla on, yo o jaɓu wonde ko mi windani on kon ko yamiroore Joomiraaɗo on.
46014038	On mo itti yiila e ɗun, wattantaake yiila e makko.
46014039	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an, himmanee haalugol ko Alla longini on kon, e wota on haɗu wowlee e haalaaji janani.
46014040	Kono yo fow warru no haaniri non, hara ko no yaadiri.
46015001	Mi andinii on, yo musiɓɓe, fii oo Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo mi feɲɲinani on, mo jaɓuɗon, on mo catiɗon e mun, tabituɗon,
46015002	ɗun ko on mo dandiraɗon kadi, si tawii hiɗon jogori mo no mi feɲɲinirani on mo non, si tawii non hinaa non, haray on gomɗinii mo meere.
46015003	Ko adii kon, ko ko mi hendii kon mi feɲɲinani on: Almasiihu on ko fii junuubaaji men ɗin maayiri, wano windori non ka defte annabaaɓe ɓen,
46015004	o surraa, o immintinaa ka ɲalaande tammere, wano windori non ka defte annabaaɓe ɓen.
46015005	Oo wi'eteeɗo Petruusu yi'ii mo. E hoore ɗun kadi sappoo e ɗiɗooɓe ɓen yi'ii mo.
46015006	Ɓawto ɗun, ɓuri musiɓɓe teemeɗɗe njowo yiidi mo nde wootere, ɓe tawata ɓurɓe ɓen e hakkunde maɓɓe no wuuri fewndo ɗoo, woɓɓe ɓen maayiino.
46015007	Ɓawto ɗun kadi Yaaquuba yi'i mo. E hoore ɗun, sahaabaaɓe ɓen fow yi'i mo.
46015008	Ɓawto ɓenɗon fow, o hollitii e an min kadi oo wa'uɗo wa jibinaaɗo hewtaali.
46015009	Ko fii hari min mi hewtaa sahaabaaɓe ɓen, mi handaa kadi e noddeede sahaabaajo, ko fii miɗo cukkotonoo moftal Alla ngal.
46015010	Ko sabu moƴƴere Alla nden waɗi si mi woni ko mi woni kon. Awa kadi moƴƴere makko nden e telen-ma an wonaali meere. Ka liddu ɗun, mi gollii ɓuri ɓe ɓe fow. Kono fow e mun hinaa min, kono ko moƴƴere Alla wonde e an nden.
46015011	Ko ɗun waɗi, woni ko min, woni ko kamɓe, ko ɗunɗoo men waajii, ko ɗun kadi gomɗinɗon.
46015012	E hin-le, si men waajike wonde Almasiihu on immitike e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, haray ko honno woɓɓe e mon wi'irta wonde ummutal mayɓe alaa?
46015013	Si tawno ummutal mayɓe alaa, harayno Almasiihu on tigi immitaaki.
46015014	Awa si tawii Almasiihu on immitaaki, haray waaju amen ngun ko meere, gomɗinal mon ngal kadi ko meere.
46015015	Haray kadi ko men seeditotooɓe fenaande e fee Alla, ko fii men seeditanike Alla wonde o immintinii Almasiihu on, hara-le o immintinaali mo si tawno mayɓe ɓen immitotaako.
46015016	Ko fii si tawno mayɓe ɓen immitotaako, harayno Almasiihu on kadi immitaaki.
46015017	E si tawii Almasiihu on immitaaki, haray gomɗinal mon ngal ko meere, haray haa jooni hiɗon e nder junuubaaji mon ɗin.
46015018	Harayno mayduɓe e gomɗinal Almasiihu on ɓen ko hayruɓe.
46015019	Si tawii ko e nder oo aduna tun tanƴinorɗen Almasiihu on, haray e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen fow ko enen ɓuri yurmude.
46015020	Kono jooni non pellet Almasiihu on immintinaama e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, ko kanko woni arano e ɗun e nder mayɓe ɓen.
46015021	Ɓay mayde nden ko sabu neɗɗo gooto ardi, ummutal mayɓe ɓen kadi ko sabu neɗɗo gooto ardi.
46015022	Wano fow maayiri sabu Aadama non, ko wano non kadi fow wuuritirta sabu Almasiihu on.
46015023	Kono mo kala e saffewol mun. Ko Almasiihu on woni arano on, si hikka ɗon jeyaaɓe Almasiihu on ɓen, ɲande ardu makko ndun.
46015024	Ontuma, darngal daroo, ka o jonnitata ɗon laamu ngun Alla Baabaajo on, ɓawto bonnugol kala laamu e kala bawgal e kala doole.
46015025	Ko fii bee Almasiihu on laamoo haa tuma o watti ayɓe makko ɓen fow ka ley koyɗe makko.
46015026	Gaɲo sakkiteteeɗo muleede on, ko mayde nden.
46015027	Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla waɗii fow ka ley koyɗe makko. Kono si wi'aama fow yankinanaama mo, ka haqiiqa, haray on Yankinanɗo mo kala huunde tawaaka.
46015028	E nde piiji ɗin fow yankinanoyaa mo, onsay Ɓiɗɗo on tigi yankinanto on Yankinanɗo mo kala huunde, fii no Alla wonira fow e ɗi fow.
46015029	Awa ko honɗun wonɓe lootanaade mayɓe ɓen maande kisiyee waɗata? Si tawii mayɓe ɓen immitotaako few, haray ko fii honɗun ɓe lootantoo maande kisiyee fii maɓɓe?
46015030	Enen non fii honɗun saa'i kala hiɗen e masiibo?
46015031	Ɲande woo miɗo weeɓitanii mayde nden. Miɗo seedintini ɗun, yo musiɓɓe an, wano mi mantori on non e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
46015032	Si tawii ko e faale neɗɗanke mi haɓiri kulle ɗen ka saare Efeesi, haray ko nafa honɗun mi heɓoyta? Si tawii mayɓe ɓen immitoytaako: «Haray ɲaamen, yaren, ɓay jango en maayay.»
46015033	Awa wota on ɗaynito, ko fii wondiɓɓe bonɓe bonnay jikkuuji moƴƴi.
46015034	Awa artee e ko feewi kon, wota on waɗu junuubu. Ko fii woɓɓe ɓen maraa gandal fii andugol Alla, ko fii hersingol on mi wowliri ɗun.
46015035	Kono goɗɗo no gasa wi'ude: «Ko honno mayɓe ɓen immitoroyta e ko ɓandu hondu ɓe ardoyta?»
46015036	Ko an yo njofoojo, ko sankataa kon fuɗataa si maayaali.
46015037	Ko sankataa kon hinaa ɓandu aroyooru ndun, kono ko abbere nii tun, no gasa ngawri maa awdi goo.
46015038	E hoore ɗun, Alla yeɗa nden abbere ɓandu no o faaliraa, awdi kala o yeɗa ɗun ɓandu ko hawrani ɗun.
46015039	Ɓandu fow wonaa gootun: wonndu ko ndu neɗɗanke, wonndu goo ko ndu kulle, wonndu goo kadi ko ndu colli, wonndu goo kadi ko ndu liƴƴi.
46015040	No woodi kadi tagooje kammuyankeeje e tagooje adunayankeeje, kono ŋari tagooje kammuyankeeje ɗen no serti e ŋari tagooje adunayankeeje ɗen.
46015041	Naange ngen no mari ŋari mun feere, lewru ndun no mari ŋari mun feere, koode ɗen kadi no mari noone ŋariiji mun sertuɗi.
46015042	Awa ko nii kadi wonirani ummutal mayɓe ɓen: si ɓandu ɲolayndu sankaama, ko ndu ɲolataa immitoytoo.
46015043	Si ɓandu ɲiddundu sankaama, ndu immitodoyto e darja. Si ɓandu lo'undu sankaama, ndu immitodoyto e doole.
46015044	Si ɓandu adunayankeeru sankaama, ndu immitoyto ruuhuyankeeru. Si ɓandu adunayankeeru no woodi, haray ɓandu ruuhuyankeeru no woodi.
46015045	Ko ɗun waɗi si no windii: «Aaden arano on, ɗun ko Aadama, heɓi ngurndan, o wuuri.» Kono Aadama sakkitoro on ko ruuhuyankeejo yeɗoowo ngurndan.
46015046	Hinaa arano on woni ruuhuyankeejo on, kono ko ɓanduyankeejo, ko ko hikkii ɗon kon woni ruuhuyankejun ɗun.
46015047	Neɗɗo arano on ko e leydi ndin suutaa, ko mo ka leydi, neɗɗo ɗimmo on kaɲun ko ka kammu iwri.
46015048	Ɓen ɓe ka leydi no wa'i wa mo ka leydi on, ɓen ɓe ka kammu kadi no wa'i wa on mo ka kammu.
46015049	Ko wano nanditirɗen e mo ka leydi on non, ko wano non kadi nanditiroyten e oo mo ka kammu.
46015050	E hino ko mi woni wi'ude kon yo musiɓɓe an. Ka ɓandu ndun e ƴiiƴan ɗan waawaali heɓude geɓal ka laamu Alla ɗon, ko ɗon kadi woni ko ɲolata heɓataa geɓal e ko ɲolataa kon.
46015051	Awa e hino, miɗo wowlande on gundoo: en fow en maayataa, kono en fow en waylete,
46015052	e nder saa'ihun nii, yeru maƴaango yiitere, ka wuttaandu liital sakkitoral. Ko fii ngal wuttete, mayɓe ɓen immitoo ko bontataa, onsay enen non en waylete.
46015053	Onsay bee nduu ɓandu ɲolayndu lontiniree ndu ɲolataa, awa kadi ɓandu maayayndu ndun lontiniree ndu maayataa.
46015054	Nde ndun ɓandu ɲolayndu lontiniraa ndu ɲolataa, e nde ɓandu maayayndu ndun lontiniraa ndu maayataa, onsay daalol windiingol ngol laatoto, wonde: «Mayde nden moɗaama e nder polgal.»
46015055	«Ee mayde, ko honto polgal maa ngal woni? Ee mayde, ko honto ndagawal maa ngal woni?»
46015056	Kono ndagawal mayde ko junuubu, awa kadi doole junuubu ko Sariya.
46015057	Yo mantoore wonan Alla, on Yeɗuɗo en polgal immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
46015058	Awa yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe, wonee tabituɓe ɓe dillintaako, ɓurtee ɓeydaade e golle Joomiraaɗo on, e hoore andugol wonde, golle mon ɗen e telen-ma Joomiraaɗo on hinaa meere.
46016001	E telen-ma mottindirgol fii wallitagol yimɓe Alla ɓen, waɗiree onon kadi wano mi yamiriri mofte wonɗe Galaasi ɗen non.
46016002	Yo mo kala e mon heɓu ko anniyii, wallini feere beru maral makko ngal ka ɲallal aranal e nder yontere nden, ɗun ko alattiire nden, fii wota on habbo haa tuma mi ari fii mottindirgol ɗun.
46016003	Ɗun, nde mi aroyi, mi wattiday e ɓe suɓiɗon ɓen dokke mon ɗen, wondude e ɓataake, ɓe naɓa Yerusalaam.
46016004	Si tawoyii non bee mi yaha min tigi, mi yaadoyay e maɓɓe.
46016005	Mi yahoyay ka mon nde mi taƴitoyi Masedonii, ko fii mi rewoyay Masedonii.
46016006	No gasa mi ɲallidoyay e mon, maa toode mi ruumida e mon, fii no ardoron mi ka mi yahata ton.
46016007	E ngol laawol ɗoo mi faalaaka rewude ka mon e hoore hawjere, kono miɗo tanƴinii wondugol e mon seeɗa, si Joomiraaɗo on newnii.
46016008	Kono fow e mun, mi wonay Efeesi haa ka Juldeere Pentakosta.
46016009	Ko fii dambugal njanal udditanike golle an nden, awa kadi ayɓe ɓen no ɗuuɗi.
46016010	Awa si Timotee hewtii, waɗiree noone no o hulirtaa hakkunde mon, ko fii himo gollira wa an min e nder golle Joomiraaɗo on.
46016011	Awa wota gooto aybin mo. Neltee mo e jam fii no o hewtira ka an. Ko fii miɗo habbodi mo e musiɓɓe ɓen.
46016012	Telen-ma oo musiɗɗo an Apoloosi, mi wakkilinii mo fota fii yaadugol e musiɓɓe ɓen ka mon, hinaa non ɗun woni faale makko on fewndo ɗoo. Kono o yahoyay nde o heɓi fajuhun.
46016013	Wattanee yiila tabiton e nder gomɗinal ngal, wakkiloɗon, tiiɗon.
46016014	Ko waɗoton woo waɗiree giggol.
46016015	Mi yamirii on kadi yamiroore goo, yo musiɓɓe an. Hiɗon andi ko ɓeynguure Astefaana nden adii gomɗinde e nder Akaaya, ɓe woni kadi e kurkanagol yimɓe Alla ɓen.
46016016	Awa onon kadi yankinanee ɓen yimɓe e kala gollidooɓe e maɓɓe.
46016017	Awa miɗo weltori arugol Astefaana ngol, e Fortunaatusa e Akayuuka, ɓay ɓe waɗanii lan ko on waawataano waɗande lan.
46016018	Ko fii ɓe wallintinii wonkii an kin wano ɓe wallintiniri wonkiiji mon ɗin non. Awa manee sifa ɓen yimɓe.
46016019	Moftal ngal Aazii salminii on. Akiila kadi e Piriskiila, wondude e moftal wongal ka suudu maɓɓe ngal, salminii on fota e innde Joomiraaɗo on.
46016020	Musiɓɓe ɓen fow salminii on. Salmondiree, hirbondiron hirbondiral laaɓungal.
46016021	Min Puulusa, mi salminirii on jungo an ngon tigi.
46016022	On mo yiɗaa Joomi on, yo o laato huɗaaɗo. Yo Joomi on aru!
46016023	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Joomi on wonu e mon.
46016024	Miɗo yiɗi on on fow sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on. Aamiina!
47001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla hoddiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, wondude e oo musiɗɗo wi'eteeɗo Timotee, haa e ngal moftal Alla wongal Korenti, e gomɗinɓe wonɓe Akaaya ɓen fow.
47001002	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
47001003	Mantoore wonanii Alla, Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on Baabaajo yurmeteeɗo e on Alla Jom wakkilaare fow,
47001004	on wakkilinoowo en e nder kala tampereeji men, fii no enen kadi waawiren wakkilinirde ɓen wonɓe e nder kala noone tampereeji wakkilaare nde heɓirɗen Alla nden enen tigi.
47001005	Ko fii, ko wano tampereeji Almasiihu on layirta e hoore men non, ko wano non wakkilaare men nden layirta immorde e Almasiihu on.
47001006	Si tawii men tampii, ko fii wakkilaare mon nden e fii kisiyee mon on. Si tawii men wakkilinaama, ko fii no wakkilinireɗon, no wawnireɗon ŋaɲɲaade tampereeji gooti e ɗi men woni naɓude ɗin.
47001007	Tama'u amen on e telen-ma mon ko selluɗo, ko fii meɗen andi, wano tawdiraɗon non e tampereeji amen ɗin, ko wano non tawdiraɗon e wakkilaare amen nden.
47001008	Men faalaaka yo on ronku andude, yo musiɓɓe amen, tampereeji heɓuɗi men ɗin Aazii ɗi men sonjiraa, haa ka tawata alaa hattoode toonin doole amen ɗen, haa men taƴii hay wuurugol.
47001009	Kono menen e hoore amen tigi, meɗen felliti men fawaama mayde, fii wota men fawu hoolaare amen nden e hoore amen menen tigi, kono e Alla on Immintinoowo mayɓe ɓen.
47001010	Ko on jattini men, jattinoyta men kadi e sifa nden mayde. Hiiyii, meɗen tanƴinii, o jattinoyay men
47001011	e nder ko faaborton men torndeeji kon. Ko non Alla jaabinirta torndeeji ɗi ɗuuɗuɓe torantoo men ɗin. Ko ɗun waɗi si yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe jarnay Alla fii amen.
47001012	Ko men woni mantorde kon, ko ko ɓernde amen nden ɓanginani men kon, wonde men wuuririi e oo aduna, tentinii telen-ma mon, nunɗal e haqiiqa ko iwri ka Alla, hara hinaa ko iwri e faamu neɗɗanke, kono ko e sulfu Alla on.
47001013	Ko fii ko men woni on windande kon fow, ko ko waawoton jangude faamon. E miɗo tanƴinii on faamay ɗun fota,
47001014	wano fuɗɗorɗon faamude non wonde ko men ɓe mantorton. Onon kadi ko on ɓe men mantorta ɲande ardu Iisaa Joomi men on.
47001015	E nder nden hoolaare, hari miɗo faalanoo yahude ka mon, fii no heɓiron faabo Alla goo kadi.
47001016	Si mi iwriino ka mon, mi feƴƴa Masedonii. Nde miɗo iwta Masedonii, mi artira ka mon kadi fii no walliron mi no mi hewtira ka diiwal Yahuuda.
47001017	E nder anniyagol an ɗun, taw si hara mi miijitaaki? Kaa hara on sikku ɗen eɓɓooje an ko eɓɓooje neɗɗanke, haa ka tawata no e an «hiiyii» e «oo'o»?
47001018	No Alla woniri sella-findeejo non, ko non tawiri kongol ngol men hewtini on ngol wonaa ngol «hiiyii» e «oo'o».
47001019	Ko fii Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, mo min e Silaasi e Timotee men waajii on fii mun on, hinaa mo «hiiyii» e «oo'o», kono ko «hiiyii» woni e makko.
47001020	Fodooje Alla ɗen fow ko «hiiyii» e makko, awa kadi ko kanko wi'irten Alla «aamiina» fii mangu makko ngun.
47001021	Ko Alla woni fellintinanoowo en fow wonde hiɗen humondiri e Almasiihu on. Ko kanko kadi suɓii en,
47001022	o maandiniri en maande makko nden, ɗun ko tolmugol Ruuhu makko on ka ɓerɗe men.
