47001023	Alla ko seedee an: ko fii wota mi aanin on haɗi mi yiltitoo Korenti.
47001024	Hinaa fii meɗen laamii on e hoore gomɗinal mon ngal, kono ko men gollidooɓe e mon fii weltaare mon nden, ɓay hiɗon tabiti e nder gomɗinal ngal.
47002001	Min tigi mi aadii wota mi yiltitodu ka mon e sokola.
47002002	Ko fii min, si mi sokolinii on, haray ko hombo waawi lan weltinde, si hinaa onon heɓirɓe lan sokola ɓen?
47002003	Mi windiranii on nii fii wota mi heɓir haanuɓe weltinde lan ɓen sokola nde mi aroyi. Miɗo joganii on fow ndee hoolaare wonde, weltaare an nden ko nde mon on fow.
47002004	Ko e nder annde tiiɗunde e mettu ɓernde e gonɗi tiiɗuɗi mi windani on, hinaa non fii sokolingol on, kono ko fii no andiron giggol tiiɗungol ngol mi joganii on ngol.
47002005	Si tawii goɗɗo e mon wonii sabu annde, haray hinaa min o aanini, kono ko on fow, maa woɓɓe e mon, (fii wota mi wowlu haa feƴƴita).
47002006	Feloore nde ɓurɓe ɓen e hakkunde mon fawi mo nden, yonay on neɗɗo.
47002007	Haray jooni hiɗon haani mo yaafaade wakkilina, fii wota o sonjor sokola feƴƴituɗo.
47002008	Awa mi torike on hollugol mo giggol.
47002009	Ko fii, ko mi windirannoo on, ko fii ndarndagol on annda si hiɗon ɗoftii ko woni woo.
47002010	Ko fii kala mo yaafaniɗon, mi yaafanto mo min kadi. Telen-ma an min, si no woodi ko mi yaafoo, ko fii mon mi yaafori, e yeeso Almasiihu on,
47002011	fii wota en accu Ibuliisa foola en, ko fii wonaa wa si en andaa eɓɓooje makko ɗen.
47002012	Fewndo ko mi hewti Turuwaasi fii feɲɲingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on, mi tawi Joomiraaɗo on no udditanimmi dambugal.
47002013	Kono tawi ɓernde an nden waalanooki, ɓay mi tawaali ɗon oo musiɗɗo an wi'eteeɗo Tiituusa. Onsay mi waynitii ɓe, mi fokkitani Masedonii.
47002014	Yo mantoore wonan Alla, on Wonɗo en okkude polgal soono woo e nder humondiral men e Almasiihu on, on Wonɗo en huutorde fii feɲɲingol nokku kala urngol andugol Almasiihu on.
47002015	Awa e hakkunde wonaaɓe dandeede ɓen, e hakkunde wonɓe mulude ɓen, hiɗen wa'ani Alla wa angiri uurundi ndi Almasiihu on weeɓitani mo:
47002016	hiɗen wonani woɓɓe ɓen barngol mayde nawrayngol e mayde, hiɗen wonani ɓeya ɓen urngol ngurndan nawrayngol e ngurndan. Ko neɗɗo hombo gaynata sifa ɗen golle?
47002017	Ko fii men wa'aa wa woɓɓe, baanorɓe daaluyee Alla on, kono ko e nder haqiiqa men yewtirta e innde Alla, e yeeso Alla e nder humondiral amen e Almasiihu on.
47003001	E hara men fuɗɗitoto fahin kuljude hoore amen? Kaa men hatonjinay e ɓataake kuljuɗe fii amen wano woɓɓe goo? Kaa ko onon haani waɗangol men ɗun?
47003002	Ko onon tigi woni ɓatakuru amen, windiindu ka ɓerɗe amen, ndu yimɓe ɓen fow jangi, faami.
47003003	No laaɓi, ko on ɓatakuru Almasiihu on, ndu menen tigi men yottini, ndu tawata hinaa ndaha windiraa, kono ko windiraandu Ruuhu Alla Wuuruɗo on, ndu tawata hinaa e hoore alluuje kaaƴe windaa, kono ko ka ɓerɗe mon.
47003004	Ko ɗun woni hoolaare nde men jogii immorde e Almasiihu on yeeso Alla.
47003005	Hinaa wonde meɗen mari feere waɗugol goɗɗun menen tigi, wa ko iwrata e mbawdi amen menen tigi. Kono mbawdi amen ndin ko e Alla iwri.
47003006	O wawnii men kadi wonugol yangantooɓe ahadi heyri ndin, hara hinaa tippude e bindol sariya on, kono ko tippude e Ruuhu Allaahu on. Ko fii bindol ngol waray, kono Ruuhu on wurnay.
47003007	Sariya Muusaa windiranooɗo kalfe e hoore alluuje kaaƴe on arduno e ngun mangu haa ka tawata Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen waawataa ndaarude yeeso Muusaa ngon sabu on annoora feƴƴoowo wonnooɗo ka yeeso makko. Si tawii golle on Sariya nawroowo e mayde ardii e sifa ngun mangu,
47003008	haray ko haa honto non golle Ruuhu Allaahu on ɓuri mawnude!
47003009	Si tawii ko nawrata en e ɲaawoore kon mawninaama, haray ittii e sikke ko haa honto ko waɗata en feewuɓe yeeso Alla kon ɓuri mawnude!
47003010	Hiɗen waawi hay wi'ude wonde ngun mangu feƴƴungu fuutoraama mangu mun ngun fow, si ngu eɓɓindiraama e ɓurngu mawnude ngu hande ngun.
47003011	Si tawii ko feƴƴata kon heɓii mangu, haray ko haa honto ko luttata kon mawnata!
47003012	Awa oo tama'u ɗoo no okki en hoolaare tiiɗunde.
47003013	En waɗirtaa wano Muusaa non, on waɗaynooɗo tiggaare ka yeeso mun, fii wota Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen yi'u rawnoode annoora makko feƴƴoowo on.
47003014	Kono, e nder miijooji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen yoorii. Ko fii, haa weetaango hande ngoo, si ahadi hinndi ndin janga, taway haa hande nden tiggaare no woodaa. Nde ittaaka, ko fii ko e Almasiihu on tun nde muti.
47003015	Haa weetaango hande ngoo, si Sariya Muusaa on janga, taway tiggaare no wirni ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen.
47003016	Kono si fewta e Joomiraaɗo on, taway tiggaare nden ittaama ka ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
47003017	E hin-le Joomiraaɗo on ko Ruuhu, awa kadi ko ka Ruuhu Joomiraaɗo on woni ɗon, ko ɗon ndimu ngun woni.
47003018	Enen, ɓe geece mun buumaaki ɓen fow, jalbirɓe mangu Joomiraaɗo on wa ndaarorgal, hiɗen e nder wattegol mbaadi makko, mangu e hoore mangu, immorde e Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun ko on Ruuhu.
47004001	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay Alla yeɗii men ɗen golle e nder yurmeende makko nden, maayu ɓernde heɓataa men.
47004002	Men sali kala ko suuɗii hersinii, men wuurirtaa kadi ƴoyre, men ɓoylataa kadi daaluyee Alla on, kono ko e nder ko men feɲɲinta goonga on kon, ɗun holnay kala ɓernde neɗɗanke fii amen yeeso Alla.
47004003	Si tawii haa jooni Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo men waajotoo on no niɓɓitii, haray ko wonɓe mulude ɓen o niɓɓitani,
47004004	ɗun ko ɓen ɓe gomɗinaa, ɓe tawata alla nguu jamaanu wuminii miijooji mun, fii wota ɓe yi'u jalbeendi Kibaaru Moƴƴo ɓanginɗo mangu Almasiihu on, on wonɗo mbaadi Alla.
47004005	Hinaa fii amen tigi men woni waajaade, kono ko fii Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on men woni waajaade, menen non ko men kurkaaɗi mon sabu Iisaa.
47004006	Ko fii ko on Alla daaluɗo: «Yo ndaygu ngun jalbu ka nder niwre», ko kanko kadi jalbini ɓerɗe amen ɗen, fii ndaygingol e amen andal mangu Alla wongu e yeeso Almasiihu on ngon.
47004007	Enen jogiiɓe ngun ngalu, hiɗen wa'i wa looɗe leydi, fii no andiree wonde ngal bawgal mawngal ko e Alla iwi, hinaa e amen.
47004008	Men ɓittiraama nooneeji ɗin fow, kono men muncaaki. Men jiɓii, kono men taƴaaki.
47004009	Men cukkaa, kono men hawkaaka. Men liɓaa, kono men hayraali.
47004010	Meɗen wondi e mayde Iisaa nden saa'i kala ka ɓalli amen, fii no ngurndan Iisaa ɗan feeɲira ka ɓalli amen.
47004011	Ko fii enen wurɓe ɓen soono woo, hiɗen weeɓitanaa mayde nden sabu Iisaa, fii no ngurndan Iisaa ɗan kadi feeɲira e ɓalli men maayooji ɗin.
47004012	Ko non men weeɓitorani mayde nden fii no heɓiron ngurndan.
47004013	Wano windori non: «Mi gomɗinii, ko ɗun waɗi si mi wowli.» Menen kadi ɓay ko noone gomɗinal gootal men mari, meɗen gomɗini, ko ɗun waɗi si meɗen wowlude,
47004014	e nder andugol wonde, on Immintinɗo Iisaa Joomi on, o immintiniday en kadi e Iisaa, o weeɓitida men e mon yeeso makko.
47004015	Ko fii, ɗun fow ko woni ardude ko fii mon, fii yo sulfu on ɓurtu hewtude yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe, fii no yettooje ɗen ka mangu Alla laatora ɗuuɗuɗe.
47004016	Ko ɗun waɗi si maayu ɓernde heɓataa men. Hay si ɓandu amen ndun ɲolii, kono haray nder amen on no heyɗitude ɲande woo ɲande.
47004017	Ko fii oo saa'i satteende e fanɗude mun, o rimanay en darja tedduɗo poomayankeejo ɓurɗo oo saa'i satteende.
47004018	Ko fii menen, wonaa ko yi'otoo kon men waɗi hakkilaaji amen ɗin e mun, kono ko ko yi'otaako kon men waɗi hakkillaaji amen e mun. Ko fii ko yi'otoo kon, ko ko feƴƴata, ko yi'otaako kon, ko ko luttata haa poomaa.
47005001	Hiɗen andi wonde, si tawii ɗii togooji ɗi hoɗuɗen e mun ka leydi ɗoo, (e maanaa ɓalli men ɗin), aru e bonneede, haray hiɗen mari suudu ndu Alla eɓɓani en, ɗun ko wonunde poomayankeere, nde tawata hinaa juuɗe neɗɗanke moƴƴiniraa.
47005002	Awa kadi e nder ɗin togooji, hiɗen woytaade fii faale ɓornagol wonunde kammuyankeere nden,
47005003	tawa ko en ɓorniiɓe, hara tawetaake ko en darorɓe nii.
47005004	Ko ɗun waɗi, enen wonɓe e nder ɗin togooji, hiɗen woytaade, hiɗen sonjii, ɓay en faalaaka laataade ɓortiiɓe, kono hara ko ɓorniiɓe, fii no ngurndan ɗan moɗira mayde nden.
47005005	Awa on Hebulinɗo en fii nden eɓɓoore ko Alla, on Tolmuɗo Ruuhu mun on e men.
47005006	Awa hiɗen heewi soono woo wakkilaare. Hiɗen andi kadi fodde hiɗen wondi e nduu ɓandu, haray hiɗen woɗɗondiri e Joomiraaɗo on.
47005007	Ko fii, ko gomɗinal ngal woni en ardaade, hinaa giiɗe ɗen.
47005008	Hiɗen heewi wakkilaare, ko ɓurɗen faaleede ko seedugol e nduu ɓandu hoɗa moggo Joomiraaɗo on.
47005009	Ko ɗun waɗi, wonduɗen e nduu ɓandu maa seeduɗen e mayru, himme men ɗen ko welegol Joomiraaɗo on.
47005010	Ko fii en fow en darnete ka yeeso ɲaawirde Almasiihu on, fii no o jonnitira mo kala njoddi kuuɗe mun ɗe o waɗunoo ka aduna, woni ko ko moƴƴi, woni ko ko boni.
47005011	Awa, ɓay men andii ko woni hulugol Joomiraaɗo on, meɗen ɗaɓɓude no men fellintinira yimɓe ɓen. Alla no andi ko men homɓe, awa miɗo tanƴinii onon kadi ka nder ɓerɗe mon hiɗon andi men.
47005012	Men alaa kuljude hoore amen kadi, kono ko dalil men woni on jonnude fii no mantoron men, fii no waawiron jaaborde ɓen wonɓe mantorde ko woni e kene kon edii ɓe mantorde ko woni e ɓernde kon.
47005013	Si tawii ko men wiliiɓe, haray andee wonde ko fii Alla men wilanii. Si tawii kadi non meɗen selli, haray andee wonde ko fii mon men sellani.
47005014	Ko fii giggol Almasiihu on no laamii men, menen ɓee fellituɓe ɗunɗoo: aaden gooto maayanii fow, awa fow maayii.
47005015	O maayanii fow, fii wota wurɓe ɓen wuuran hoore mun hande kadi, kono yo wuuran Mayɗo immintinaa fii maɓɓe on.
47005016	Ɗun haray gila jooni men jogoraa hay gooto e noone no yimɓe oo aduna jogorta goɗɗo non. Hay si tawiino hari men jogoriino Almasiihu on wano non, jooni men jogoraa mo non hande kadi.
47005017	Si tawii goɗɗo no humondiri e Almasiihu on, haray ko o tagudi heyri, haray piiji kiɗɗi ɗin feƴƴirii mo, haray piiji ɗin fow wontii kesi.
47005018	Ɗun fow ko immorde e Alla woni, on Moƴƴintinɗo hakkunde men e makko rewrude e Almasiihu on. O yeɗi men menen kadi golle moƴƴintingol hakkunde yimɓe ɓen e makko kanko Alla.
47005019	Ko fii Alla moƴƴintinii hakkunde makko e aduna on rewrude e Almasiihu on, e ɓaawo joganagol yimɓe ɓen bonnereeji maɓɓe ɗin, o halfinii men menen kadi kongol moƴƴintingol hakkunde yimɓe ɓen e makko.
47005020	Awa ko men ɓe Almasiihu on immini wa si tawii Alla no rewrude e amen fii waajagol. Awa men jeejii on e innde Almasiihu on: wonee weldituɓe e Alla.
47005021	On mo junuubu alaa e mun, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, Alla waɗii mo junuubu fii men, fii, sabu humondiral men e Almasiihu on, no woniren feewuɓe Alla.
47006001	Ɓay ko men gollidooɓe, men wakkilinii on wota on jaɓir sulfu Alla on meere.
47006002	Ko fii himo daali: «Mi jaabinanii ma ka saa'i sulfu, ka ɲalaande kisiyee mi faabike ma.» Awa mi andinii on ko fewndo ɗoo woni saa'i sulfu on, awa kadi ko ɲalaande kisiyee nden nii.
47006003	Awa men wonataa sabu peggal woo e hoore hay gooto, fii wota golle amen ɗen wonu huunde felniinde.
47006004	E kala huunde men ɓanginay ko men kurkantooɓe Alla, e nder ŋaɲɲanɗe buy, e nder tampereeji ɗin e ŋakkireede, e nder anndeeji,
47006005	e nder pigge e kaseede e murtaneede, e golleeji sattuɗi e angal ɗoyngol e heege.
47006006	Meɗen feɲɲinira ɗun laaɓal e gandal e muɲal e moƴƴuki e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on e giggol ngol alaa faasiqankaaku,
47006007	wondude e daaluyee goongaajo on e bawɗe Alla ɗen, peewal ngal wona aala amen haɓirɗo e hiwitorɗo.
47006008	E hoore meɗen teddinee e meɗen hoynee, meɗen wowlee ko boni e meɗen wowlee ko moƴƴi. Meɗen jogoree wa fenooɓe, hara-le ko men wowlooɓe goonga.
47006009	Men jogoree wa ɓe andaaka fii kala meɗen andaa, wa wonɓe maayude e hin-le meɗen wuuri, maa wa wonaaɓe letteede fii kala men waraaka,
47006010	wa sokolnaaɓe e hin-le saa'i kala meɗen weltii, wa ɓilliiɓe hara-le meɗen alɗinde ɗuuɗuɓe, wa ɓe alaa huunde e hin-le meɗen mari fow.
47006011	Ko onon yo ɓe Korenti, men haalanii on ko woni e amen kon, meɗen yaɲɲani on ɓerɗe amen ɗen.
47006012	Men faaɗinanaali on ɓerɗe amen ɗen, kono ko onon tigi faaɗinani men ɓerɗe mon ɗen.
47006013	Awa miɗo yewtira on wa fayɓe an: onon kadi waɗiranee men wano men waɗirani on non, udditanon men ɓerɗe mon ɗen!
47006014	Wota on humondir e ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen. Ko fii ko humondiral hongal woni hakkunde peewal ngal e angal peewal ngal? Maa ko kawtital hongal woni hakkunde ndaygu e niwre?
47006015	E ko nanondiral hongal woni hakkunde Almasiihu on e Ibuliisa? E ko geɓal hongal gomɗinɓe ɓen e ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen hawti?
47006016	E ko ahadi hondi wondi suudu Alla ndun e sanamuuji ɗin? Ko fii, ko enen woni suudu Alla Wuuruɗo on, wano Alla daaliri non: «Mi hoɗay, mi jinda hakkunde maɓɓe, mi wona Alla maɓɓe, ɓe wona jamaa an.»
47006017	Ko ɗun waɗi si Joomiraaɗo on daali: «Iwee e hakkunde maɓɓe, seedon, wota on meemu ko laaɓaa, min mi jaɓɓoyto on.
47006018	«Mi wonanay on Baaba, onon wonanon mi ɓiɓɓe worɓe e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ko Joomiraaɗo Jom Bawgal on daali ɗun.»
47007001	Ɓay non hiɗen mari wano ɗii fodaariiji, yo yiɓɓe, laɓɓinoɗen e kala ko tuuninta ɓandu ndun e ruuhu on, e hoore timmingol laaɓal ngal e nder kulol Alla.
47007002	Wernee men ka ɓerɗe mon, ko fii men fawɲaaki hay e gooto, men bonnaali kadi hay gooto, awa kadi men huutoraali hay gooto.
47007003	Hinaa fii felugol on mi wi'iri ɗun, ko fii hari mi wi'uno wonde hiɗon ka ɓerɗe amen, woni ngurndan, woni mayde.
47007004	Miɗo mari hoolaare tiiɗunde e telen-ma mon, miɗo mari ko mi mantora fii mon fota, miɗo wakkilinaa fota, miɗo heewi weltaare e nder ɗii satteendeeji amen fow.
47007005	Ko fii gila men hewti Masedonii, men heɓaali feere no men fowtora hay seeɗa, men tampiniraama noone fow, gere ka kene, kulol ka nder.
47007006	Kono Alla, Wakkilinoowo miskinɓe ɓen, o wakkilinirii men ardu Tiituusa ndun.
47007007	Wonaa non ardu makko ndun tun o wakkiliniri men, kono kadi, ko wakkilaare nde wakkilinɗon mo nden. O sifanike men faale mon tiiɗuɗo on e gonɗi mon ɗin e cataare mon nden fii an. Ɗun waɗi haa weltaare an nden ɓurti tiiɗude.
47007008	Hay si tawii mi sokolinirii on ɓatakuru an ndun, mi ninsaa ɗun jooni, hay si tawii miɗo ninsunoo. Ko fii miɗo sutii wonde ndun ɓatakuru ko sokolini on ko haa seeɗa.
47007009	Fewndo ɗoo miɗo weltii, hinaa non fii ko sokolɗon kon, kono ko fii ko sokola mon on addi on e tuubuubuyee kon, ko fii on sokoliniraama no Alla yiɗiri, ɓay on heɓiraali men bone woo.
47007010	Ko ɗun waɗi, sokola mo Alla yiɗi on adday tuubuubuyee nawroowo e kisiyee mo en ninsataa, e hin-le sokola oo aduna ko addata ko mayde.
47007011	Awa on yi'ii ko oo sokola mo Alla yiɗi waɗi e mon kon: ɗun ko wakkilaare, e faale danditagol tooɲe, e ko tikkuɗon kon, e ko ŋalɗuɗon fii bone waɗaaɗo on, e faale mon moƴƴo fii yi'itugol lan, e cataare mon nden, e hebulaare mon nden fii donkingol bonnuɗo on. On holliri noone fow wonde on tawaaka e nduu muraadu.
47007012	Awa si mi windanii on, hinaa sabu fawɲiiɗo on, maa fawɲaaɗo e mun on, kono ko fii no jogitorɗon men non feeɲirana on onon tigi yeeso Alla.
47007013	Ko ɗun waɗi si men wakkilinaa. Kono e hoore nden wakkilaare amen, men ɓurti weltorde weltaare nde Tiituusa weltinaa nden, on mo on fow weltinɗon ɓernde mun.
47007014	Si tawii mi mantorii fii mon yeeso makko seeɗa, haray mi hersiraa ɗun, kono ko wano ko men yewtata on saa'i woo kon woniri goonga non, ko non ko men mantori moggo Tiituusa kon woniri kadi goonga.
47007015	Awa kadi giggol ngol o joganii on ngol ko tiiɗungol, tuma kala o anditi ko ɗoftiɗon mo kon on fow e noone no tolnirɗon mo non kulol e teddungal.
47007016	Miɗo weltori waawugol hoolorgol on e kala huunde.
47008001	Men andinay on, yo musiɓɓe, fii ndee moƴƴere Alla yeɗaande mofte makko ɗen Masedonii,
47008002	e maanaa, noone satteendeeji ɗi ɓe ndarndaa woo, weltaare maɓɓe heewunde nden e ɓillaare maɓɓe tiiɗunde nden no okkude ɓe feere okkirgol no yaajiri.
47008003	Yeru mbawdi maɓɓe ndin, miɗo seeditii, ɓe waɗii hay toonin mbawdi maɓɓe ndin e hoore anniyee moƴƴo.
47008004	Ɓe landike men, e nder tentingol no tiiɗiri, yo ɓe tawde e faabagol yimɓe Alla ɓen.
47008005	Ɗun feƴƴiti ko men tanƴininoo kon. Kamɓe tigi ɓe weeɓitanii Joomi on taho, si ɓe weeɓitanii men no yaadiri e faale Alla on.
47008006	Ko ɗun waɗi si men wakkilini Tiituusa yahugol ka mon fii wallugol on laatinde ndee moƴƴere, wano o fuɗɗornoo non.
47008007	Wano tawiri non hiɗon moƴƴi e ɗi fow, ka gomɗinal, ka kongol, ka gandal, ka cataare timmunde, e ka giggol mon e telen-ma amen, moƴƴiniree non kadi ndee moƴƴere.
47008008	Mi wowliraali ɗun fii waɗugol yamiroore, kono mi wowlan on fii hollugol baɲaare ɓeya nden, mi anda si giggol mon ngol ko haqiiqawol.
47008009	Ko fii hiɗon andi moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, fii kala ko alɗunooɗo, o waɗitii baaso fii mon, fii yo baasal makko ngal alɗin on.
47008010	E hino ko mi miijii no hawrani on kon: Ɓay ko onon adinoo anniyaade dokkal gila rowani, ko onon adii waɗugol ɗun kadi.
47008011	Awa jooni, jokkee ɗun haa timma, naɓon haa joofoya, beru wakkilaare mon nden, wondude e anniyee mo aadiɗon on.
47008012	Si en okkirii anniyee moƴƴo, haray ɗun ko ko jaɓetee tippude e ko marɗen kon, hara hinaa e ko en maraa kon.
47008013	Hinaa non fii ɓittingol on, weltina ɓeya, kono ko fii yo fotondiral waɗu.
47008014	Fewndo ɗoo ko ko ɓurtani on kon wonɗon faaborde baasal ɓeya ngal, fii no kamɓe kadi ɓe faabora baasal mon ngal ko ɓurtani ɓe kon. Si wonirii non, fow fotay,
47008015	wano windori non: «Marnooɗo buy on wontanii ɗun ko hawri, on marnooɗo kadi seeɗa, huunde ŋakkiraa ɗun.»
47008016	Yettoore wonanii Alla fii ko o waɗi e ɓernde Tiituusa kon sifa cataare nde mi joganii on nden.
47008017	Fii kala non o jaɓii eɓɓoore an nden fii yo o yahu ka mon, kono hari o aadike, wondude e tinnaare tiiɗunde, wonde o yahay kanko tigi ka mon.
47008018	Men immindinii mo e oo musiɗɗo mo mofte ɗen fow manti fii golle ɗe o waɗani Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ɗen.
47008019	E hoore ɗun, ko mofte ɗen toɗɗii mo fii ko wona yaadiɗɗo amen, e nder ndee moƴƴere nde tawata meɗen fawtii fii mangu Joomiraaɗo on tigi, e fii seedintingol anniyeeji amen moƴƴi ɗin.
47008020	Meɗen faalaa reenaade fii wota men fele fii ngal dokkal mawngal ngal men halfinaa.
47008021	Ko fii ko ko moƴƴi kon men woni ɗaɓɓude, hinaa non yeeso Joomiraaɗo on tun, kono kadi e yeeso yimɓe ɓen.
47008022	Men immindinii ɓe e oo musiɗɗo amen, on mo men ndarndori noone woo cataare makko nden e laabiiji buy, on wonɗo ɓanginirde ko tiiɗi e ngal ɗoo, hoolaare mawnde nde o joganii on nden.
47008023	Tiituusa non, ko o wondiɗɗo an e gollidoowo e an fii mon, musiɓɓe ɓe o wondi ɓen non, ko ɓe mofte ɗen immini, ko ɓe darja Almasiihu on.
47008024	Awa hollee mofte ɗen fow dalil giggol mon ngol e ko men woni mantorde fii mon kon yeeso maɓɓe.
47009001	Nafa alaa miɗo windana on fii ballal fokkintinanaangal yimɓe Alla ɓen.
47009002	Awa miɗo andi anniyee mon moƴƴo on fii wallugol, ko fii ɗun mi woni mantorde on e yeeso ɓe Masedonii ɓen, mi wi'a wonde, gila rowani ɓee ka diiwal Akaaya no hebulii wallugol. Awa kadi cataare mon nden wakkilinii yimɓe buy okkugol.
47009003	Mi imminii ɓee musiɓɓe fii wota mantoore nde men mani on nden wonu meere, e yo on wonu hebuliiɓe fii wallugol wano mi wi'iri non.
47009004	Si tawii men tawoyii on hebulaaki nde min e ɓe Masedonii ɓen men yaadoyi ka mon, haray hoolaare nde men hoolii on nden wontanay men hersa, haray onon hersa mon kan wowlotaako.
47009005	Awa mi taw no hawri ka mi wakkilina musiɓɓe ɓen ka ɓe adoyoo mi ka mon, ɓe wona e fii ballal ngal foduɗon ngal, fii no ngal hebilora ngal wona okkiraangal anniyee moƴƴo, hara hinaa wa si tawii ko kuugal karahaangal.
47009006	Andee wonde : mo sankii seeɗa ko seeɗa o wa'ata, mo sankii buy ko buy o wa'ata.
47009007	Yo mo kala okkir wano o anniyori non ka ɓernde makko, e ɓaawo ninsugol maa karhegol, ko fii Alla no yiɗi on okkiroowo weltaare.
47009008	Awa Alla no mari bawgal hebbingol e mon kala noone moƴƴere, fii no heɓiron saa'i kala ko hatonjinɗon e mun kon fow, e no waɗiron kadi kala kuugal moƴƴal haa feƴƴita,
47009009	wano windori non wonde: «O saakitii dokke, o yeɗii miskinɓe ɓen, peewal makko ngal ko luttoowal haa poomaa.»
47009010	On Jonnoowo remoowo on awdi, jonnay mo kadi ɲaametee ko on ɲaama, o yeɗoyay on onon kadi, o sowindirana on awdi ndin, o ɓeyda battane peewal mon ngal.
47009011	Ko non alɗiniroyteɗon e kala noone fii no waawiron okkirde no yaajiri. Immorde e ngal ballal ngal men hendorta on men hewtina ɓe, ɗun adday yettooje Alla.
47009012	Ko fii ngal ballal ngal waɗuɗon faaboto yimɓe Alla ɓen, kono kadi ɓeyday yettooje Alla ɗuuɗuɗe.
47009013	Ɓay ɗee golle mon taskaama, tawaama ko haqiiqaaje, Alla mawninte sabu yankinaare mon nden e telen-ma qirritagol Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on, e sabu ballal mon yaajungal ngal wallirɗon ɓe ngal, kamɓe e yimɓe ɓen fow.
47009014	Ɗun, ɓe toranto on wondude e giggol, sabu moƴƴere feƴƴitunde nde Alla waɗani on nden.
47009015	Yo yettoore wonan Alla fii dokkal makko ngal sifotaako ngal!
47010001	Min Puulusa, mi tororii on newaare e moƴƴuki Almasiihu on, min oo newiiɗo e yeeso mon, e heewuɗo cuucal fii mon ka woɗɗitii on.
47010002	Awa mi jeejii on, wota on karhan yo mi ɓangin cuucal nde mi hewtoyi ka mon, ko fii miɗo anniyii seedintinirde hoolaare an nden cuucal e fee ɓen sikkuɓe wonde meɗen wuuriri wa yimɓe aduna.
47010003	Hay si tawii wonii ko men yimɓe aduna, men haɓirtaa wano ɓe aduna ɓen gerdata non,
47010004	ko fii aalaaji ɗi men haɓirta ɗin hinaa ɗi oo aduna, kono ko wonduɗi e bawgal iwrungal e Alla fii liɓugol kala ko dartotoo mo. Men liɓay miijooji fenaandeeji ɗin
47010005	e kala mawnintinaare hawtotoonde dartoo gandal fii Alla ngal, e men ɗahay kala miijo haa ngo ɗoftoo Almasiihu on.
47010006	Si ɗoftaare mon nden timmii, meɗen hebulanii kadi donkingol kala ko ɗoftaaki.
47010007	Awa ndaaree no piiji ɗin woniri non. Si goɗɗo fellitanii hoore mun tigi wonde himo humondiri e Almasiihu on, yo o fellitan hoore makko ɗunɗoo: si himo humondiri e Almasiihu on, menen kadi men.
47010008	E hay si mi mantorii ko ɓurti seeɗa mbawdi ndi Joomiraaɗo on yeɗi men ndin fii tabintingol on, hara hinaa fii liɓugol on, haray mi hersoytaa.
47010009	Mi faalaaka wa'ude wa hulɓiniroowo on ɓataake an ɗen.
47010010	Ko fii hiɓe wi'a: «Ɗee ɓataake no tiiɗi no ɲaaɗi, kono si tawii kanko himo ɗoo, haray himo ɗaati, haalaaji makko ɗin no mehiɗi.»
47010011	Kala non jogiiɗo ngoo miijo, yo andu fota wonde: kala ko men windani on e ɓaawo mon, ko ɗun men waɗata e tawnde mon.
47010012	Men fotondirtaa maa men eɓɓindirtaa hoore amen e wonɓe hollitaade ɓen, kono e nder etitagol maɓɓe ngol e eɓɓitagol maɓɓe ngol kamɓe tigi, ɗun hollii ko ɓe ŋakkiraaɓe faamu.
47010013	Menen non, men yiɗaa mawnintinorde ko feƴƴiti etirde, kono men feƴƴataa keerol ngol Alla yeɗi men ngol, ko ɗun kadi hewtini men haa ka mon.
47010014	Men feƴƴitataa keerol amen ngol, wa si tawii hari men araali haa e mon, ko fii ko goonga, ko haa e mon men ardi e Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on.
47010015	Awa men feƴƴitirtaa keerol mantorgol golleeji woɓɓe goo, kono meɗen mari tama'u wonde si gomɗinal mon ngal ɓeydike, men waaway kadi laatinde golle ɓurɗe mawnuɗe e hakkunde mon,
47010016	e nder waajagol e ca'e wonɗe toonin mon ɗen, ɗoo yo men mantor ko waɗaa kon ka nokkeeli ɓeya.
47010017	«On mo no mantoo, yo mantor Joomiraaɗo on.»
47010018	Ko fii wonaa kuljuɗo hoore mun on jaɓaa, kono ko mo Joomiraaɗo on kulji on.
47011001	Jooni non, miɗo tanƴinii on waawayno muɲɲanaade lan, mi yewta on haalaaji komoyaagal seeɗa. Miɗo felliti on muɲɲanto lan!
47011002	Ko fii miɗo nawlani on nawliigu iwrungu ka Alla, ɓay mi tananike on gorko gooto, fii weeɓitugol on ka Almasiihu on, wa jiwo laaɓuɗo mo andaali gorko.
47011003	Kono miɗo huli fota wota on accu miijooji mon ɗin selnee e humondiral mon laaɓungal e haqiiqawal ngal e telen-ma Almasiihu on, wano Hawaa acciri mboddi ndin ɗayniri mo ƴoyre mun non.
47011004	Ko fii si goɗɗo aru on feɲɲinande fii Iisaajo goo, seeduɗo e mo men feɲɲinani on on, maa si on hendike ruuhu goo seeduɗo e mo hendinoɗon on, maa Linjiila goo seeduɗo e mo jaɓunoɗon on, haray on tewtike mo fota.
47011005	E hin-le miɗo felliti, ɓen «sahaabaaɓe townitiiɓe» ɓuraa lan hay huunde.
47011006	Fii kala miɗo hesiɗani waajagol, kono mi hesiɗanaa gandal ngal, men hollirii on ɗun noone fow e ɗi fow.
47011007	Kaa hara mi waɗii junuubu fewndo mi ɗuytitii fii ɓantugol on, wa fewndo ko mi feɲɲinani on Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e ɓaawo ƴantugol on hay huunde?
47011008	Mi ittinii mofte goo fii heɓirgol ɓe njoddi fii wallitagol on.
47011009	E hin-le fewndo mi ŋakkiraa ka mon, mi wonaano dongal hay gooto, ko fii musiɓɓe iwruɓe Masedonii ɓen faaboranno ko mi ŋakkiraa kon fow. Mi reenino wonugol dongal mon, e mi ɓurtay-le reenaade e ɗun.
47011010	Fodde goonga Almasiihu on no e an, miɗo wi'i: hay gooto fannataa lan mantorgol ɗun e nder diiwal Akaaya ngal fow.
47011011	Fii honɗun non? Hara ko fii mi yiɗaa on? Alla no andi miɗo yiɗi on.
47011012	Ko mi woni waɗude kon, mi jokkay waɗugol ɗun kadi, fii haɗugol ɓen faalaaɓe mantorde fotugol e amen.
47011013	Ɓen ko waɗitiiɓe sahaabaaɓe, gollooɓe ɗaynooɓe, waɗinkiniiɓe sahaabaaɓe Almasiihu on.
47011014	Kono ɗun ŋalɗinaa, ko fii Ibuliisa tigi ko waɗinkinotooɗo malaa'ikaajo ndaygu.
47011015	Haray juhaa kadi ka gollooɓe makko ɓen waɗinkinoo gollooɓe peewal. Kono rawnoode maɓɓe nden wa'ay wa kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen.
47011016	Awa miɗo fillitaade kadi: wota gooto ndaariran wa komoojo. Si hinaa ɗun, jogoree lan wa komoojo, fii min kadi no mi mantora seeɗa.
47011017	Ko mi woni wowlude koo e nder hoolaare heɓugol ko mi mantora, hinaa ko iwri e Joomiraaɗo on, kono ko wa komoojo.
47011018	Ɓay ɗuuɗuɓe no mantorde piiji aduna, min kadi mi mantoray ɗun.
47011019	Awa, onon marɓe faamu ɓen, on muɲɲanto no newori komooɓe ɓen!
47011020	Hiɗon muɲɲaade kadi ko kurketeɗon kon e ko huutorteɗon kon e ko jatteteɗon kon e ko jogorteɗon mawnintinaare kon e hay banteede.
47011021	Meɗen hersi wi'ugol wonde meɗen lo'i e telen-ma ɗii piiji! Kala ko goɗɗo suusi mantorde, haray min kadi miɗo suusi, (ko wa komoojo mi woni wowlirde).
47011022	Si ko ɓe Aabirayankeeɓe? Awa min kadi men. Si ko ɓe Isra'iilayankeeɓe? Awa min kadi men. Si ko ɓe jurriya Ibraahiima? Awa min kadi men.
47011023	Kaa ko ɓe kurkaaɗi Almasiihu on? Awa miɗo yewtirde komoyaagal, min kadi ko mi ɓuri ɗun! Telen-ma ka golleeji miɗo ɓuri ɓe, ka kaseede miɗo ɓuri ɓe, ka piyeede, ɗon kadi miɗo ɓuri ɓe, soono woo miɗo weeɓitanii mayde.
47011024	Laabi jowi miɗo heɓirde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen paatawol cappanɗe nay ŋakkuɗun ngol gooto!
47011025	Laabi tati miɗo luuboreede bedi, mi fiɗaa kaaƴe nde wootere, laabi tati mi tawaa e nder laaɗe wonɗe lancaade, mi wonii kadi ka ndiyan ɲallal gootal e jemma gooto, miɗo awƴa.
47011026	Soono woo e nder jinduruuji an ɗin haray miɗo weeɓitanii masiibooji ɗin ka maaje, e masiibooji hippotooɓe ɓen, e masiibooji yimɓe leɲol an ngol, e masiibooji ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, e masiibooji ɗin ka ca'e, e masiibooji ɗin ka wulaaji, e masiibooji ɗin ka baharu, e masiibooji wi'itiiɓe ɓen ko men musiɓɓe,
47011027	e ka golle e ka satteende, e jemmaaji ɗi ɗaanaaka, e heege e ɗonka e ŋakkireede ɲaametee, e jaangol e kolngal!
47011028	E hoore mi wowlaali fii ko heddii e dongal ngal mi rondii ɲande woo fii aanangol mofte ɗen fow.
47011029	Si goɗɗo lo'ii, hewtay lan. Si goɗɗo yanii e junuubu, ko min muusata.
47011030	Si tawii bee mi mantoo, haray ko fii lo'ere an nden mi mantotoo.
47011031	Alla, on wonɗo Ben Iisaa Joomi on, on mo mantoore wonani haa poomaa, no andi wonde mi fenataa.
47011032	Oo lanɗo Damaasi wi'eteeɗo Aretaasa ittayno ko ayna saare Damaasiyankooɓe ɓen fii nangugol lan.
47011033	Kono mi tumbaa e debeere, mi tippiniraa e yolnde, jokkinaa maadi ndin, ko nii mi fuutori ɓe.
47012001	Bee mi mantoo, fii kala ɗun nafataa. Kono fow e mun yo mi yewtu fii wirnitanɗe e feɲɲinanɗe iwruɗe ka Joomiraaɗo on.
47012002	Wonii nii duuɓi sappoo e nay miɗo andi goɗɗo gomɗinɗo Almasiihu on, naɓanooɗo ka kammu tataɓu, (mi andaa non si ko kanko tigi maa si ko ruuhu makko on, kono Alla kaɲun no andi).
47012003	-
47012004	Ko mi andi tun, on naɓaama ka aljanna, o nanii konguɗi ɗi sifotaako, ɗi newnanaaka neɗɗo fillagol, (mi andaa non si tawii ko kanko tigi maa si tawii ko ruuhu makko on, kono Alla kaɲun no andi).
47012005	Ko sifa on neɗɗo mi mantorta, kono mi mantortaa hoore an tigi, si hinaa fii lo'ereeji an ɗin.
47012006	Si tawii miɗo faalaa mantaade, mi wonataa komoojo, ko fii mi wowloyay goonga, kono mi mantotaako, fii wota goɗɗo tuuman toonin ko o woni yi'irde lan kon, maa ko o woni lan nanirde kon.
47012007	Sabu ɗee feɲɲinanɗe mawɗe ɗe mi feɲɲinanaa, mi heɓuno ko tampinirimmi wa bullal ka ɓandu an fii wota mi manto, ɗun ko mo Ibuliisa imminnoo fii tampingol lan.
47012008	Laabiiji tati miɗo jeejude Joomiraaɗo on yo o woɗɗintinan ɗun,
47012009	o jaabii lan: «Moƴƴere an nden yonii ma, ko fii bawgal an ngal ko e nder lo'ere nden ɓangata.» Awa mi ɓeyday mantaade fii lo'ereeji an ɗin, fii no bawgal Almasiihu on wonira e hoore an.
47012010	Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo weltii fii lo'ereeji ɗin e hoyreeji ɗin e sattendeeji ɗin e cukkanɗe ɗen e anndeeji ɗin fii Almasiihu on. Ko fii, nde mi laatii lo'uɗo, ko onsay mi woni dolnuɗo.
47012011	Mi wa'uno wa komoojo, kono ko onon karhunoo mi, ɓay ko onon haanuno kuljude lan! Ko fii hay huunde mi seedaa e ɓen «sahaabaaɓe townitiiɓe», fii kala hinaa mi huunde.
47012012	Maandeeji holluɗi fii sahaabaaɓe ɓen waɗiraama yeeso mon ŋaɲɲannde tiiɗunde, ɗun ko maandeeji e kuuɗe e kaawakeeji moƴƴi.
47012013	Ko honɗun ɗeya mofte heɓi ko on heɓaali, si wonaa mi wonanaali on dongal? Awa yaafanee lan on ella ɗon!
47012014	Awa e hino, miɗo faalaa yahude ka mon tammun, e hoore mi wonoytaa dongal mon, ko fii mi alaa ɗaɓɓude ko mon kon, kono ko onon tigi, ɓay hinaa paykoy koy haani marande mawɓe mun ɓen, kono ko mawɓe ɓen haani marande fayɓe mun ɓen.
47012015	Min mi wonay anniyiiɗo fii fawtagol, e mi fawtoto hoore an fii wonkiiji mon ɗin. Si mi ɓurtii on yiɗude, e hara giggol mon ngol e telen-ma an ɗuytoto?
47012016	Awa, mi wonanaali on dongal. E hara mi laatike neɗɗo ƴoyɗo? Kaa mi hendorii on janfa?
47012017	Kaa mi rewii e goɗɗo e ɓe mi imminani on ɓen fii huutorgol on?
47012018	Awa, mi wakkilinii Tiituusa fii yahugol ka mon, mi immindinii mo e musiɗɗo goo. Enee, taw si hara Tiituusa huutorii on onon fii heɓugol goɗɗun? E taw si hara kadi men jokkaali anniyee gooto e eɓɓooje goote?
47012019	No gasa hiɗon sikka gila neeɓii wonde men danditoto woni e telen-ma mon. Awa, ko yeeso Alla e innde Almasiihu on men woni yewtirde. Ɗun fow non, yo yiɓɓe, ko fii tiiɗingol on.
47012020	Ko fii miɗo huli, nde mi hewtoyi, no gasa mi tawroya on hara hinaa no mi faaliraa non, e min kadi no gasa hara hinaa no faaliraɗon non. Miɗo huli wota taw no gasa hara ko yeddondiral e nawliigu e monee e haasidi e ɲoore e baddi e mawnintinaare e jiiɓoldu woni hakkunde mon.
47012021	Miɗo huli, nde mi hewtoyi ka mon, wota Alla an on hersinoyan kadi e yeeso mon, mi wona e yoomugol fii waɗunooɓe junuubu ɗuuɗuɓe, ɓe ronki tuubude ngal angal laaɓal e jinaa e jiiɓaare nde ɓe waɗi nden.
47013001	Miɗo yahude ka mon tammun. Kala kongol ɲaawiroyte konguɗi seedeeɓe ɗiɗo maa tato.
47013002	Wa fewndo ko mi wonnoo ka mon ɗimmun, hari mi wowliino ɗun. Awa hande kadi, ka tawata mi alaa ton, mi wowlanii ɗun kadi waɗunooɓe junuubu ɓen ado mi yahude: si mi yiltoyike ka mon mi woopoytaa hay gooto,
47013003	ko fii hiɗon ɗaɓɓude seedee wonde ko Almasiihu on woni longinde lan ko mi woni wowlude kon, on mo lo'aa e telen-ma mon, kono marɗo bawgal e hakkunde mon.
47013004	Ko fii fewndo Almasiihu on fempanoo, hari ko o lo'uɗo, kono jooni himo wuuriri bawgal Alla ngal. Menen kadi e nder humondiral amen e makko, ko men lo'uɓe, kono menen e makko men wuuriray bawgal Alla ngal fii mon.
47013005	Awa taskee hoore mon onon tigi fii andugol si hiɗon wuuriri gomɗinal, ndarnditoɗon onon tigi. E on andaa Iisaa Almasiihu on no e mon? Si hinaa taw on woopu ndarnditagol mon ngol.
47013006	Kono miɗo tanƴinii on taway wonde en woopaali ndarnditagol men ngol.
47013007	Ko e nder ɗun men torotoo Alla fii wota on waɗu huunde ko boni. Hinaa non fii hollugol wonde men felnaaki, kono ko fii yo on waɗu ko moƴƴi, hay si tawii menen meɗen wa'i wa woopuɓe.
47013008	Ko fii men waawanaa goonga on hay huunde. Kono ko wonangol goonga on men waawi.
47013009	Menen men weltoto nde men lo'i, e hin-le onon hiɗon dolni, e ko men yelotoo e nder torndeeji amen ɗin, ko fii no laatoron timmuɓe.
47013010	Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo windande on ɗun si mi alaa ton, fii nde mi aroyi, wota mi sattiniran on huutorgol mbawdi fii laamagol on ndi Joomiraaɗo on yeɗimmi ndin fii tiiɗingol on, hara hinaa fii liɓugol on.
47013011	Fii rawnagol, yo musiɓɓe, wonee e nder weltaare, eɓɓanee wonugol timmuɓe, wakkilindiron, heɓon miijo wooto, wondiron ɓuttu. Ɗun, Alla Jom giggol e ɓuttu on wonday e mon.
47013012	Salmondiree, hirbondiron hirbondiral laaɓungal. Awa kadi gomɗinɓe ɓen fow salminii on.
47013013	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, e giggol Alla, wonu e mon on fow, wondude e humondiral e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
48001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, oo sahaabaajo, mo tawata hinaa yimɓe ɓen toɗɗii ɗun, hinaa kadi e hay gooto ɗun rewi si hinaa e Iisaa Almasiihu on e Alla Baabaajo on, on Immintinɗo mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen,
48001002	wondude e musiɓɓe ɓe mi wondi ɓen fow, haa e mon onon ngal moftal Iisaa wongal Galaasi.
48001003	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on,
48001004	on ittuɗo hoore mun sadaka fii junuubaaji men ɗin fii dandugol en e nguu jamaanu bonngu fewndiingu hande, wano Alla Baaba men hoddiri non,
48001005	on mo mangural wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
48001006	Miɗo ŋalɗi fii koo ko yaawuɗon yiltaade e ɓaawo oo Noddirɗo on moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu on, haa ka yahanon kibaaru goo.
48001007	Hara-le kibaaru goo alaa, kono yimɓe goo no woodi wonɓe on jiiɓude, faalaaɓe ɓoylude Linjiila Almasiihu on.
48001008	Kono hay si ko menen maa malaa'ikaajo iwruɗo ka kammu feɲɲinani on kibaaru goo sertuɗo e oya kibaaru mo men feɲɲinannoo on, yo o malkise.
48001009	Hari men yeetinoke on ɗun ado hande, miɗo fillitaade kadi: si goɗɗo feɲɲinanii on kibaaru sertuɗo e oo mo hendinoɗon, yo o malkise.
48001010	E jooni non, hara ko teddungal yimɓe ɓen mi woni ɗaɓɓude, kaa ko iwrungal ka Alla ngal? Kaa hara miɗo ɗaɓɓude no yimɓe ɓen yiɗirammi? Si mi faalano haa jooni yo yimɓe ɓen yiɗan, mi laatotanooko kurkaadu Almasiihu on.
48001011	Mi andinii on, yo musiɓɓe an, oo Kibaaru mo mi feɲɲinani on hinaa iwruɗo e neɗɗanke.
48001012	Ko fii min mi heɓiraali mo neɗɗanke, awa kadi wonaa neɗɗo jannimmi mo, kono ko Iisaa Almasiihu on tigi feɲɲinanimmi mo.
48001013	On naniino fii ɗee kuuɗe an e saa'iiji goo wa fewndo ko mi woni ka diina Yahuudiyanke, ɗun ko fewndo ko mi cukkii moftal Alla ngal haa feƴƴiti, miɗo lanca.
48001014	E nder kan diina Yahuudiyanke, hari miɗo ɓuri goreeɓe an buy e hakkunde leɲol an ngol, ko fii hari miɗo ɓuri ɓe himme tiiɗuɗo fii aadaaji baabiraaɓe amen ɓen.
48001015	Kono, nde Allaahu on, on Suɓinooɗo lan gila ka teege yumma an, ɗun ko on Noddirɗo lan moƴƴere mun nden,
48001016	o tawno no moƴƴi ka o feɲɲinanammi Ɓiɗɗo makko on fii no mi weeɓitirana mo ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, laatii mi landaaki hay gooto.
48001017	Kono e hoore ɗun mi yaaraali kisan Yerusalaam fii yiidoygol e adiiɓe lan toɗɗeede ɓen, kono mi yaari ka leydi Aarabu. Ɓawto ɗun mi yiltitii Damaasi.
48001018	Ko duuɓi tati ɓawto ɗun si mi yahi Yerusalaam fii yiidoygol e Petruusu. Mi woni ka makko ɗon e nder balɗe sappoo e jowi.
48001019	Kono hari ɗun fow, mi yiidaali e sahaabaajo goo, si hinaa Yaaquuba, ɗun ko miɲɲiraawo Joomi on.
48001020	E nder koo ko mi woni on windande ɗun, e hino Alla no reeni, mi fenaa.
48001021	Ɓawto ɗun mi yahi e nder ɗee leyɗe Sirii e Silisii.
48001022	Kono hari mofte Almasiihu wonɗe e diiwal Yahuuda ɗen yi'aali lan.
48001023	Ɓe naniino tun no wi'ee wonde: Oo cukkinooɗo ɓe oya tuma, no waajaade e ngal gomɗinal ngal o faalanoo lancude.
48001024	Jooni hiɓe mantude Alla fii an.
48002001	Duuɓi sappoo e nay ɓawto ɗun, mi yiltitii Yerusalaam, mi yiltodi e Barnabaasi e Tiituusa.
48002002	Ko sabu feɲɲinaneede mi yiltitori ton. Mi holli ɓe daaluyee Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo mi feɲɲinani ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen on. Mi feɲɲinani ɗun ɓurɓe teddude ɓen e nder gundoo, fii wota taw ko mi gollunoo kon e ko mi woni gollude kon ko meere.
48002003	Kono fii kala oo mo mi wondunoo ko mo leɲol goo, ɗun ko Tiituusa, oo Gereekiyankeejo, ɓe wi'aano bee o sunninee.
48002004	Kono waɗitiiɓe musiɓɓe men no suuɗinoo lombii hakkunde amen fii tefugol anda fii hettaare wonannde en e Iisaa Almasiihu on e faale maccinɗingol en.
48002005	Kono men jaɓanaano ɓe ɗun hay nde wootere, men yankinanaaki ɓe kadi, fii no goonga wonɗo e nder Kibaaru Moƴƴo on tabitira e mon.
48002006	Kono laatii, ɓee wa'uɓe wa si ko ɓurɓe teddude, ko ɓe wonnoo woo ko seeɗa hitti e an, ɓay Allaahu on hinaa dambe ndaarata, ɓen ɓeydaano huunde e ko mi woni waajaade kon.
48002007	Kono ɓe ndaari ɓe tawi ko mi halfiniraa daaluyee Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ko fii ɓe sunninaaka ɓen, ɗun ko ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, wano Petruusu halfiniraa non Kibaaru Moƴƴo on fii sunninaaɓe ɓen, ɗun ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
48002008	Ko fii ko on Alla huutorɗo Petruusu, waɗi mo sahaabaajo fii Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, ko kanko kadi huutorimmi, waɗimmi sahaabaajo fii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
48002009	Nde tawnoo Yaaquuba e Petruusu e Yuuhanna, jogoraaɓe wa tugaale dental ngal, fellitii fii moƴƴere nde mi yeɗaa nden, ɓe tamindiri juuɗe amen ɲaame ɗen, min e Barnabaasi, fii naɓidal amen, fii yo menen men yaaru ka ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, kamɓe ɓe yaara ka Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
48002010	Ɓe yamiri men kadi anditugol miskinɓe ɓen, ɗun ko ko mi hebulanii waɗugol.
48002011	Kono nde Petruusu arnoo Antiyoosi-Sirii mi feli mo e kene, sabu tawde ko o felniiɗo.
48002012	Ko fii, ado yimɓe ɓe Yaaquuba immini goo arude, hari o ɲaamiday e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, kono ɓay ɓen arii, o takkitii, o wonti feere, sabu kulol ɓen Yahuudiyankeeɓe gomɗinɓe, catii e sunninegol ɓen,
48002013	haa ɗun woni sabu ɓeya Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɲembi mo kanko Petruusu e ngal faasiqiyaagal, haa ɗun pooɗori hay Barnabaasi, o tawti ɓe e ɗun.
48002014	Kono nde mi ndaarunoo, mi tawi ɓe alaa yaarude no feewiri e no yaadiri e goonga Kibaaru Moƴƴo on. Onsay mi holli Petruusu e tawnde fow ɗunɗoo, mi wi'i mo: «Si tawii an Yahuudiyankeejo on, a wa'ii wa mo wonaa Yahuudiyanke, a iwtii noone Yahuudiyanke, haray ko honno waawirtaa doolirde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke'en jokkugol aadaaji Yahuudiyanke'en?»
48002015	Menen non, ko men jibinannde Yahuudiyanke, wonaa men ɓe ɗiya leƴƴi junuubankeeji,
48002016	kono men faamii wonde goɗɗo jogortaake feewuɗo sabu ɗoftagol Sariya on, kono ko sabu gomɗingol Iisaa Almasiihu on. Ko ɗun waɗi si menen kadi men gomɗinii Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii yo men jogore feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal ngal gomɗinɗen Iisaa Almasiihu on ngal, hara hinaa sabu ɗoftagol Sariya on. Ko fii hay gooto jogortaake feewuɗo sabu ɗoftagol Sariya on.
48002017	Si tawii, e nder ko ɗaɓɓeten jogoreede feewuɓe kon sabu humondiral e Almasiihu on, haray ɓangii wonde enen kadi ko en junuubankeeɓe, taw si ɗun no firi wonde Almasiihu on no wonani junuubu? Oo'o!
48002018	Si mi wonii e mahitugol ko mi liɓunoo kon, haray min tigi mi hollii ko mi bonɗo.
48002019	E telen-ma Sariya on, ko mi mayɗo ka baŋŋe Sariya fii no mi wuurirana Allaahu on.
48002020	Jooni mi fempidaama e Almasiihu on. Hinaa min tigi wuuri jooni, kono ko Almasiihu on wuuri e an. Ɗan ngurndan ɗan mi wuuri jooni ka ɓandu, miɗo wuuriri gomɗingol Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, on Yiɗuɗo lan, itti hoore mun sadaka fii an.
48002021	Min mi bugitotaako moƴƴere Alla nden, ko fii si tawiino peewal ko Sariya heɓorta, harayno Almasiihu on ko meere maayani.
48003001	Ko onon yo ɓe Galaasi njofooɓe, ko hombo mbilɗori on nii, onon ɓee ɓanginanaaɓe ko laaɓi poy fempegol Iisaa Almasiihu on?
48003002	Jooni ko ɗunɗoo tun mi faalaa andude e mon: hara ko sabu waɗugol ko Sariya on yamiri kon heɓirɗon Ruuhu Allaahu on, kaa ko gomɗingol ko heɗiɗon kon?
48003003	E jaa ko nii njofiɗirɗon? E on fuɗɗor Ruuhu Allaahu on, gaynitoron jooni wakkilaare ɓandu?
48003004	E hara kon ko tampunoɗon fow wonay meere? Miɗo tanƴinii wonataa meere!
48003005	E hara oo Wonɗo waɗude ɗii kaawakeeji moƴƴi e hakkunde mon, ɗun ko on Yeɗuɗo on Ruuhu mun on, ko woni ɗi waɗirde ko fii hiɗon waɗude ko Sariya on yamiri on kon, kaa ko fii hiɗon heɗorde gomɗinal?
48003006	Ko fii no windii wonde: «Ibraahiima gomɗini Alla, ngal gomɗinal makko jogoranaa mo peewal.»
48003007	Awa faamee wonde, gomɗinɓe ɓen ko ɓiɓɓe Ibraahiima.
48003008	Awa kadi bindi ɗin no wi'i wonde Alla jogitoroyay ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal ngal, ɗun ko ka Allaahu on adii feɲɲinde Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e Ibraahiima ɗon, o daali: «Leƴƴi ɗin fow barkinte sabu maa.»
48003009	Ko ɗun waɗi ɓen gomɗinɓe barkindinte e Ibraahiima, on gomɗinnooɗo.
48003010	Kala ɓen hoolorɓe Sariya on, haray ko e nder kuddi ɓe woni, ko fii no windii: «Kuddi no e hoore kala on mo tabitaali e huutorgol ko windii kon fow ka nder deftere Sariya.»
48003011	E hoore ɗun, no laaɓi poy wonde hay gooto jogortaake feewuɗo sabu Sariya on yeeso Alla, ko fii no windii: «Feewuɗo on wuuriray gomɗinal ngal.»
48003012	Awa Sariya on hottaaki gomɗinal. Ko fii no windii wonde: «Kala ɗoftiiɗo ɗee yamirooje, o wuuriray ɗe.»
48003013	Ko e nder ko kuddi ndin wontani Almasiihu on fii men kon, o sotti en e ley kuddi Sariya on, ko fii no windii: «Kuddi wonanii kala on wengaaɗo e leggal»,
48003014	ɗun ko fii no barki Ibraahiima hewtira leƴƴi ɗin fow sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, e hara kadi en hendorto fodaari Ruuhu Allaahu on gomɗinal ngal.
48003015	Musiɓɓe, miɗo ƴettude misal e hoore men. Si goɗɗo aru e wasiyaade, kala ko o wasiyii, hay gooto waawataa firtude ɗun maa ɓeydita goɗɗun e hoore ɗun.
48003016	Kono fodaariiji ɗin ko e hoore Ibraahiima e jurriya mun on woni. Kanko Alla o wi'aali «jurriyaaji ɗin», wa si tawii ko ɗi buy, kono ko gooto o wi'i «jurriya maa on», ɗun-le ko Almasiihu on.
48003017	E hino ko mi woni wi'ude kon: Sariya arɗo duuɓi teemeɗɗe nay e cappanɗe tati gaanin ahadi ndi Allaahu on waɗunoo ndin waawataa firtude maa mehinɗina ndin fodaari.
48003018	Ko fii si tawno ndondi ndin ko ka Sariya iwri, haray ndi fawaaki e fodaari. Kono ko sabu fodaari ndin Allaahu on yeɗiri Ibraahiima ndin ndondi.
48003019	Jooni ko sabu honɗun addi Sariya on? Ko sabu geddi addi Sariya on, haa nde on jurriya fodaaɗo ari. Ko malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen feɲɲini Sariya on, kono ɓe rewi e hakkundeejo.
48003020	Hakkundeejo non wonaa sengo wooto wonirta, Alla-le ko gooto.
48003021	Ɗun haray Sariya on ko liddiiɗo fodaariiji Alla ɗin? Kono hinaa non! Si tawii sariya on ko gasoowo wurnude addanoo, harayno peewal ngal ko e makko iwaynoo.
48003022	Ko ɗun waɗi si bindi ɗin wi'i fow no sokaa e ley junuubi, fii no fodaari ndin yeɗiree gomɗinɓe ɓen sabu ko ɓe gomɗini Iisaa Almasiihu on kon.
48003023	Ado gomɗinal ngal arude, hari hiɗen sokii e ley joge Sariya on, haa ngal gomɗinal araynoongal feeɲa.
48003024	Hari Sariya on ko ngaynaako men fii ko ardoo en e Almasiihu on, fii no jogoreɗen feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal ngal.
48003025	Ɓay ngal gomɗinal arii, en alaa e ley kongol on ngaynaako han kadi.
48003026	Ko fii on fow ko on ɓiɓɓe Alla sabu gomɗinal ngal gomɗinɗon Iisaa Almasiihu on ngal.
48003027	Onon lootaaɓe maande kisiyee e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on ɓen fow, on ɓornike Almasiihu on.
48003028	Yahuudiyankeejo maa Gereekiyankeejo, maa maccuɗo maa dimo, maa debbo maa gorko, alaa hande kadi. Ko fii on fow ko on gooto e nder humondiral mon e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
48003029	Awa-le si tawii hiɗon humondiri e Almasiihu on, haray ko on jurriya Ibraahiima, ronooɓe fodaari ndin.
48004001	Ko mi woni wi'ude: fannin ronoowo on ko paykun, haray alaa fus ko o serti e maccuɗo. Fii kala ko kanko jeyi fow,
48004002	haray hikun e ley kongol ne'ooɓe kun ɓen e fewjanooɓe kun ɓen, haa e saa'i mo ben makkun happi on timma.
48004003	Enen kadi wano non, wa fewndo ko wonɗen fayɓe, hari ko en maccuɓe ɗii mbawdiiji adunayankeeji.
48004004	Kono ɓay saa'i on hewtii, Allaahu on adduno Ɓiɗɗo makko on, on mo debbo jibini, jibinaaɗo e ley Sariya on,
48004005	fii sottugol ɓen wonɓe e ley Sariya on fii no jogoreɗen wa ɓiɓɓe.
48004006	Ɓay ko en ɓiɓɓe, Alla addii ka ɓerɗe men Ruuhu Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko on Ruuhu wonɗo ewnaade «Abba» e maana Baaba.
48004007	Ɗun haray hinaa a maccuɗo hande kadi, kono ko a ɓiɗɗo. Si tawii-le ko a ɓiɗɗo, haray ko a ronoowo immorde e Alla.
48004008	Wa fewndo ko on andaa Alla, hari ko on maccuɓe sanamuuji ɗi tawata wonaa goɗɗun tigi e oo aduna.
48004009	Jooni non on andii Alla, e tentinii non jooni ko on ɓe Alla andi, ko honno non yiltitorɗon e ɗii mbawdiiji mehi lo'uɗi? E hara on faalaa ɗe maccinɗinanaade kadi?
48004010	Hiɗon hittina fii ɲalaaɗe ɗen e lebbi ɗin e saa'iiji ɗin e duuɓi ɗin.
48004011	Miɗo huli fii mon, wota taw koo ko mi yanganii on ko meere.
48004012	Musiɓɓe an, wa'ee wa an min, ko fii min miɗo wa'i wa mon, yandi mi jeejii on! Ko fii on bonaaki e an.
48004013	Hiɗon maanditii ka aranun ko sabu nawnaare an mi heɓiri feere feɲɲinangol on Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
48004014	Hiɗon waawunoo non ronkude teddingol lan maa bugitoo lan sabu ɲawu an ngun, kono on waɗaali ɗun! Ka liddu ɗun, on tolnirno lan wa malaa'ikaajo Alla maa wa Iisaa Almasiihu on tigi.
48004015	Ko honto weltaare mon nden woni jooni? Ko fii miɗo seeditanaade on ɗunɗoo: si no gasaynoo, on ɓorayno gite mon ɗen, wattanon mi.
48004016	Haray e nder ko mi yeetotoo on goonga kon, mi wonii gaɲo mon?
48004017	Awa himme mo ɓe joganii on on hinaa moƴƴo, ko ɓe faalaaɓe sortude on e amen, fii no tawtiron ɓe.
48004018	No moƴƴi ka goɗɗo heɓa himme moƴƴo saa'i woo, hara hinaa si miɗo hakkunde mon tun.
48004019	Fayɓe an, miɗo joganii on kadi muuseendi ŋata haa wa'on wa Almasiihu on.
48004020	Miɗo faalaa wondude e mon jooni, mi yewtira on noone goo, ko fii miɗo aanani on.
48004021	Andinee lan, onon ɓee faalaaɓe wonude e ley Sariya on, si on faamaali ko Sariya on wi'i kon.
48004022	Ko fii no windii, Ibraahiima no mari ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo: goɗɗo on ko mo korɗo jibinani mo on, oya on ko mo dimo on jibinani mo on.
48004023	Mo korɗo on, ko jibiniraaɗo faale ɓandu, kono mo debbo dimo on, ko jibiniraaɗo fodaari ndin.
48004024	Ɗun ko misal nii: rewɓe ɓen ɗiɗo, ko ahadiiji ɗin ɗiɗi, ahadi goo ko ndi Fello Sinaayi ndin, ɓiɓɓe mayri ɓen ko maccuɓe, ɗun ko Haajirata.
48004025	Ko ngon Fello Sinaayi wongo ka leydi Aarabu woni Haajirata, hingo wa'i wa saare Yerusalaam handeere nden, ɓay hinde e nder maccangaaku, kayre e ɓiɓɓe mayre on.
48004026	Kono saare Yerusalaam dow-dowre nden ko dimo on, ko on woni yumma men Saarata.
48004027	Ko fii no windii: «Welto yo an mo jibintaa, an mo jiidotaako! Sowtu weltaare, ewnoɗaa, ɗun ko an mo andaali muuseendi ŋata! Ko fii ko ɓiɓɓe on wulɗaaɗo ɓurata ɗuuɗude edii on debbo wonduɗo e moodi on.»
48004028	Ko fii, yo musiɓɓe, onon kadi ko on ɓiɓɓe fodaari ndin, wano Issaaqa non.
48004029	Awa kadi, ko wano ko feƴƴunoo kon, on heɓiranooɗo faale ɓandu, ɓittinayno on heɓiraaɗo Ruuhu, ko ɗun fewndii kadi jooni.
48004030	Ko honɗun bindi ɗin wi'i? Ko: «Raɗo korɗo on e ɓiɗɗo mun on, ko fii ɓiɗɗo korɗo on ronidataa e mo debbo dimo on jibini on.»
48004031	Ko wano non yo musiɓɓe, hinaa en ɓiɓɓe korɗo on, kono ko en ɓe debbo dimo on.
48005001	Ko fii no woniren rinɗinaaɓe waɗi si Almasiihu on rinɗini en. Awa wonee tabituɓe, wota on yiltitu hoore mon kadi e ley ɓoggol maccangaaku.
48005002	Ko ɗun waɗi, min Puulusa, mi wi'ay on wonde si on etike fii yo on sunnine, haray Almasiihu on nafataa on huunde.
48005003	Awa mi fellintinanay kala neɗɗo kadi wonde si etike haa sunninaama, haray himo haani jokkude Sariya on fow.
48005004	Onon ɓee wonɓe ɗaɓɓude no jogitoree feewuɓe ka Sariya, on seedii e Almasiihu on, awa kadi on woɗɗondirii e moƴƴere Alla nden.
48005005	Kono enen, tama'u men on ko jogoreede feewuɓe yeeso Alla sabu gomɗinal men ngal. Ko tippude e Ruuhu on sabbiɗen on tama'u.
48005006	Ko fii, ko hitti e wonɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓen kon hinaa sunninegol maa angal sunninegol, kono ko gomɗinal feɲɲiniroowal hoore mun giggol.
48005007	Ko fii hari hiɗon dogude moƴƴa. Ko hombo non darni on haa haɗi on ɗoftagol goonga on?
48005008	Awa nden fewjoore ɗon hinaa e Nodduɗo on on iwri.
48005009	Ko fii lewen seeɗa tun ƴurinay farin jiiɓaaɗo.
48005010	Min non miɗo joganii on ndee hoolaare ɗoo e fee Joomiraaɗo on wonde, on miijotaako goɗɗun goo. Kono on wonɗo jiiɓude on, ɗun non ko wonɗo woo, o rondoyto ɲaawoore nden.
48005011	E min non yo musiɓɓe, si miɗo waajaade fii nafa sunninegol, haray ko fii honɗun kadi mi cukkantee? Si tawno haa jooni waaju an ngun no humii e sunninegol, haray fempeede Iisaa Almasiihu on ka hoore leggal altindiraangal accii wonangol yimɓe ɓen peggal.
48005012	Yo ɓen wonɓe sonjude on ɓujito haa ɗaata!
48005013	Musiɓɓe, jooni on noddaama ka ndimankaaku. Wota on ɓaaror ngun ndimankaaku mon fii waɗugol mbeleeɗe ɓandu, kono kurkondiranee e nder giggol.
48005014	Ko fii Sariya on fow no timmi e nder aaya gooto, e hino mo: «Yo a yiɗir ɲokondo maa on wano yiɗirɗaa hoore maa non.»
48005015	Kono si on ŋatindirii, on seekindirii wa kulle ɗen, awa reenee wota on mulindir.
48005016	Ko ɗun si mi wi'ay on: wuuriree Ruuhu Allaahu on, ɗun on jokkataa himmeeji ɓandu.
48005017	Ko fii himmeeji ɓandu no liddondiri e Ruuhu Allaahu on, on Ruuhu Seniiɗo kadi no liddondiri e himmeeji ɓandu, ko ɗi lurruɗi kanji ɗiɗi, fii wota on waɗu ko faalaɗon woo.
48005018	Kono si Ruuhu Seniiɗo on ardike on, haray hinaa e ley Sariya on wonɗon.
48005019	Ko fii mbeleeɗe ɓandu ɗen no waalii e kene, ɗen-le ko jinaa e angal laaɓal e jiiɓaare
48005020	e rewugol sanamu e mbileyaagal e ngayngu e yeddondiral e nawliigu e monee e haasidi e sendondiral e fedde-fedde
48005021	e ngaɲaneendi e mandilugol e fasaadu e ko nandi e mun. Miɗo haɗude on, wano mi haɗirnoo on non wonde, ɓen wuurirɓe nii heɓoytaa geɓal ka laamu Alla.
48005022	Kono ko Ruuhu Allaahu on funtinta kon, ko giggol e weltaare e ɓuttu e muɲal e yurmeende e moƴƴuki e sella-findeyaagal
48005023	e newaare e waawugol hoore mun. Sariya haɗaali sifa ɗin piiji.
48005024	Wonɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓen fempii ɓandu mun ndun wondude e himmeeji mun e faaleeji mun.
48005025	Si tawii ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wuurirɗen, haray yaaden kadi e Ruuhu on.
48005026	Wota en wonu mawnintiniiɓe, maa bagondiren, maa nawlindiren.
48006001	Musiɓɓe, si goɗɗo e mon aru e waɗugol bonnere, haray onon, ɓe Ruuhu on ardii ɓen, wurtiree mo hakkil newiiki. Onon tigi reenoɗon, fii wota onon kadi on jarribe.
48006002	Rondondiranee anndeeji mon ɗin. Ko non timminirton Sariya Almasiihu on.
48006003	On mo no sikki ko o goɗɗun, hara-le hinaa o huunde, haray o ɗaynitike kanko tigi.
48006004	Mo kala yo tasko kuuɗe mun ɗen tigi, o yi'anay hoore makko hara hinaa e ɓeya, ɗun o anday no o mantora,
48006005	ko fii mo kala no haani rondaade dongal mun ngal.
48006006	Yo on wonaaɗo janneede daaluyee on sendodu kala piiji moƴƴi e wonɗo mo jannude on.
48006007	Wota on ɗaynito, ko fii Alla yawitetaake, ko fii kala ko goɗɗo sanki ko ɗun o wa'ata.
48006008	Mo sankii mbeleeɗe ɓandu wa'ay e mayru halakuyee, kono on sankuɗo faale Ruuhu on, o wa'ay e makko ngurndan poomayankejan.
48006009	Wota en haaɓu waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ko fii en wa'oyay e saa'i haanuɗo si maayu ɓernde heɓaali en.
48006010	Ko ɗun waɗi, fewndo ka weeɓani en ɗon, waɗanen yimɓe ɓen fow ko moƴƴi, tentinii musiɓɓe men ɓen ka gomɗinal.
48006011	On yi'ii ittiri bindi njani ɗi mi windirani on jungo an ngon ɗin.
48006012	Kala ɓen faalaaɓe waɗude ko welata yimɓe ɓen kon, ɓe karhay on fii sunninegol, hara ko fii tun wota ɓe tampine sabu leggal altindiraangal Almasiihu on.
48006013	Ko fii hay kamɓe sunninaaɓe ɓen tigi ɓe jokkataa Sariya on, kono ko ɓe faalirtee yo on sunnine, ko fii no ɓe mantora e hoore mon.
48006014	Min non hinaa non! Ko fii mi mantortaa huunde si hinaa leggal altindiraangal Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on. Sabu maggal aduna on maayii telen-ma an, min kadi mi maayii telen-ma aduna on.
48006015	Awa hinaa sunninegol maa angal sunninegol hitti, kono ko ko Alla heyɗintini en kon hitti.
48006016	Yo ɓuttu e yurmeende wonan kala jokkuɗo ndee yamiroore, hay e Isra'iila mo Alla.
48006017	Ka heddii ɗoo, wota hay gooto tampinan, ko fii ɓattaate Iisaa ɗen no ka ɓandu an.
48006018	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on wonu e ɓerɗe mon, yo musiɓɓe. Aamiina!
49001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla hoddiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, haa e ɓee yimɓe Alla, sella-findeeɓe e nder humondiral maɓɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on, wonɓe Efeesi.
49001002	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
49001003	Mantoore wonanii Alla, Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on Hebbinɗo en kala barki iwruki e Alla ka kammuuli sabu Almasiihu on.
49001004	Ko sabu makko Allaahu on suɓori en ko adii fuɗɗoode aduna on, fii no woniren laaɓuɓe, ɓe aldaa e ella yeeso makko. E nder giggol makko ngol
49001005	o muuyanno en wonugol ɓe makko sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, wano o faaliraa non e nder eɓɓoore makko moƴƴere nden,
49001006	fii no mantiren mangu sulfu makko mo o yeɗiri en yiɗaaɗo makko on.
49001007	Ko e nder humondiral e makko sottiraɗen ƴiiƴan makko ɗan, ko ɗan heɓirɗen yaafuyee junuubaaji no yaadiri e ngalu sulfu makko,
49001008	mo Alla waɗiri e hoore men faamu yaajungu e hakkil timmuki, haa yoni.
49001009	O andinii en gundoo kodduruyee makko on, no yaadiri e faale makko moƴƴo, mo o eɓɓirnoo Iisaa Almasiihu on on,
49001010	fii huuwugol mo, nde saa'i on timmoyi, mottindira kala ko woni ka kammuuli e ka hoore leydi, waɗa ɗi ley yeesoojo gooto, ɗun ko Almasiihu on.
49001011	Enen humondirɓe e Almasiihu on ɓen, en suɓaama fii wonugol ɓe makko e nder muuyiraneede eɓɓoore on Timminiroowo kala huunde no yaadiri e anniyee faale makko on,
49001012	fii no menen ɓee attiiɓe tanƴinorde Almasiihu on men mantira mangu makko ngun.
49001013	Onon kadi hiɗon e makko, ɓay on nanii daaluyee goongaajo on, ɗun ko kibaaru hisinɗo on on. Onon kadi on gomɗinii, awa kadi Alla waɗii Ruuhu Seniiɗo on maande e mon, ɗun ko on mo fodanoɗon.
49001014	Ko on Ruuhu woni seeke ndondi men ndin, haa ɲande cottudi ɓen ɓe Alla suɓii tabiti, fii mantugol mangu makko ngun.
49001015	Ko ɗun waɗi si min kadi, ɓay mi nanii fii ko gomɗinɗon Iisaa Joomi on kon, e giggol ngol yiɗuɗon yimɓe Alla ɓen fow ngol,
49001016	mi alaa fowtaade e jarnugol Alla fii mon, mi maandinii kadi fii mon e nder torndeeji an ɗin,
49001017	fii no Jom Mangural ngal, ɗun ko Alla Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, okkira on ruuhu wonduɗo e faamu e feɲɲinaneede, fii no andiron mo,
49001018	e yo o hentin giiɗe ɓerɗe mon ɗen, fii no andiron on tama'u mo o noddi on fii mun, e no andiron ngalu darja ndondi makko ndin e hakkunde yimɓe Alla ɓen,
49001019	e no andiron mangu bawgal makko feƴƴitungu wongu gollude e men ngun, enen ɓee gomɗinɓe. Ko ngal bawgal o huutori doole makko ɗen
49001020	fewndo o immintini Iisaa Almasiihu on e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, o joɗɗiniri mo ka sengo makko ɲaamo ka kammuuli.
49001021	O waɗi mo e dow kala laamu, e kala ko jogii mbawdi, e kala ko jogii doole, e kala ko ardotoo, e hoore kala innde waaweteende janteede, hinaa non e oo aduna fewndiiɗo hande on tun, kono hay e aduna aroyoowo on.
49001022	O waɗi fow e ley koyɗe makko, o toɗɗii mo kadi Hooreejo Toowuɗo fii moftal ngal.
49001023	Ko ngal moftal woni ɓandu makko ndun, ngal hebbiniraama on Hebbinoowo fow e noone fow.
49002001	Onon non hari on maayii sabu bonnereeji mon ɗin e junuubaaji mon ɗin,
49002002	ɗi wuurunoɗon e mun, fewndo jokkunoɗon laawol oo aduna, wondude e bawgal oo lanɗo jinnaaji ɗin. Ko ruuhu on lanɗo woni gollude e ɓen yedduɓe jooni.
49002003	En fow kadi hiɗen tawdanoo e maɓɓe, hari hiɗen jokkunoo himmeeji ɓandu, hiɗen jokkunoo faaleeji ɓandu men ndun e miijooji men ɗin, hari ko en mbaadi fayɓe handunooɓe e tikkere wa ɓeya.
49002004	Kono Alla ko Heewuɗo yurmeende. Ko sabu giggol makko mawngol, ngol o yiɗi en ngol,
49002005	o wurnintinidii en e Almasiihu on, enen ɓe tawata maayiino sabu bonnereeji men ɗin: ko sulfu makko on dandiraɗon.
49002006	O immintinidii en e Iisaa Almasiihu on, o joɗɗindinii en e makko ka kammuuli,
49002007	fii no o feɲɲinira ka jamaanuuji aroyayɗi ngalu sulfu makko feƴƴitungu ngun e nder moƴƴuki makko ki yeɗiraɗen Iisaa Almasiihu on.
49002008	Ko sulfu on dandiraɗon sabu gomɗinal ngal, ɗun non hinaa e mon iwri, kono ko dokkal Alla.
49002009	Hinaa sabu kuuɗe ɗen few fii wota gooto mawnintino.
49002010	Ko fii ko en tagudi makko. Ko e humondiral men e Iisaa Almasiihu on tagaɗen fii no waɗiren kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɗe kanko Alla o eɓɓunoo gila law.
49002011	Awa, onon ɓee ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke e leɲol, ɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe wi'uɓe no sunninaa jogitori wa ɓe sunninaaka, hara kamɓe non, ko ɓe sunninaa ka ɓandu kon, ko ko waɗiraa juuɗe neɗɗanke, anditee wonde:
49002012	hari on alaa Almasiihu, on jeyaaka e leydi Isra'iila ndin, hari ko on jananɓe e telen-ma ahadiiji fodaari ndin, ɓe aldaa e tama'u, ɓe alaa Alla e oo aduna.
49002013	Kono jooni non, sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, onon woɗɗitinooɓe ɓen on wontii ɓadiiɓe rewrude e ƴiiƴan Almasiihu on.
49002014	Ko fii ko kanko woni ɓuttu men on, on waɗuɗo ɗiɗooɓe ɓen gooto, on liɓirɗo maadi ngayngu heedunoondi ɓe ndin okkitirgol ɓandu makko ndun.
49002015	O mehinɗinii Sariya on e yamirooje mun ɗen e farillaaji mun ɗin fii yo o sincir ɓen ɗiɗo aaden gooto keso humondirɗo e makko. Ko nii o woni tabintinirde ɓuttu,
49002016	o moƴƴintina hakkunde maɓɓe e Alla, kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe wona ɓandu wooturu rewrude e leggal altindiraangal ngal o wariri ngayngu ngal.
49002017	O ari, o waajii on onon woɗɗitinooɓe ɓen ɓuttu, o waajii ɓattiiɓe kadi ɓen ɓuttu,
49002018	ko fii rewrude e makko en fow hiɗen mari naatirgal takko Baabaajo on e nder Ruuhu gooto.
49002019	Ko ɗun waɗi, hinaa on jananɓe hande kadi, maa tuŋarankeeɓe, kono ko on jeyduɓe e yimɓe Alla ɓen, tawdaaɓe e suudu Alla ndun,
49002020	darnaaɓe e hoore didol sahaabaaɓe ɓen e annabaaɓe ɓen, tawi ko Iisaa Almasiihu on tigi woni hayre nden ka soɓɓundu.
49002021	Ko e makko kala mahoodi yuɓɓindiraandi no moƴƴiri ɓantorta, wona nokkuure hormorde fii Joomiraaɗo on.
49002022	Onon kadi, hiɗon mahideede e makko fii no woniron wonunde nde kanko Alla o hoɗiri Ruuhu makko on.
49003001	Sabu ɗun, min Puulusa, oo kasoojo Iisaa Almasiihu on fii mon, onon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen,
49003002	miɗo tanƴinii, on nanii fii ɗee golle moƴƴere Alla, ɗe mi halfinaa fii mon.
49003003	Ko feɲɲinaneede mi andiri gundoo on, wano mi windiri non e nder konguɗi seeɗaaji.
49003004	E nder jangugol ɗi, on waaway faamude hakkil ki mi heɓi e telen-ma gundoo Almasiihu on.
49003005	On gundoo feɲɲinananooka ɓii neɗɗanke'en e ɗiya jamaanuuji, wano Ruuhu Alla on feɲɲinirani non jooni sahaabaaɓe makko laaɓuɓe ɓen e annabaaɓe ɓen
49003006	wonde: ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen no kafidi e Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen ndondi wootiri, ɓe ɓandu mun woni wooturu, tawdaaɓe e fodaari wootiri ndin e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on sabu Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
49003007	Ko on Kibaaru Moƴƴo mi wontani kurkaadu sabu dokkal sulfu Alla mo mi yeɗiraa bawgal doole makko ɗen.
49003008	Ko min, oo ɓurɗo hayfude e hakkunde yimɓe Alla ɓen fow yeɗaa ndee moƴƴere: ɗun ko yottingol e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen Kibaaru Moƴƴo fii ngalu Almasiihu ngu alaa kattudi ngun,
49003009	e feɲɲingol fensita no Alla, on Taguɗo kala huunde, laatinirta eɓɓoore gundoore mun suuɗinoonde gila law nden.
49003010	Ɗun, gila jooni, yo laamuuji ɗin e bawɗe ɗen ka kammuuli andu cenɗe faamu Alla mawngu ngun, tippude e moftal Alla ngal,
49003011	hara ko no yaadiri e eɓɓoore makko poomayankeere nde o laatiniri Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on,
49003012	on mo heɓirɗen hettaare fii no ɓadoren Alla e nder hoolaare sabu gomɗinal men ngal.
49003013	Awa kadi miɗo torii on wota maayu ɓernde heɓu on sabu ko mi woni tampude fii mon kon, ko ɗun woni darja mon.
49003014	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi jiccii yeeso Baabaajo on,
49003015	on mo ɓeynguureeji wonɗi ka kammu e ka leydi ɗin fow inniraa,
49003016	fii yo o yeɗu on, immorde e mangural makko tiiɗungal ngal, no tiiɗinireɗon ka ɓerɗe mon bawgal Ruuhu makko on.
49003017	Yo Almasiihu on hoɗir ka ɓerɗe mon gomɗinal mon ngal, yo on tute kadi ɲiiɓineɗon e nder giggol,
49003018	fii no onon e yimɓe Alla ɓen fow waawiron faamirde ko honɗun woni yanji giggol Almasiihu on e junndi maggol on e luggeendi maggol on e tooweendi maggol on,
49003019	e no andiron ngol giggol Almasiihu feƴƴitungol kala faamu, fii no heewiron ko woni e Alla kon fow.
49003020	Ko kanko Alla, mo bawgal mun woni gollude e men on, waawi waɗude ɓuri ko toriɗen mo kon maa ko miijiɗen kon haa feƴƴita,
49003021	ko kanko mangural wonani ka moftal immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu on haa e jamaanuuji ɗin fow haa poomaa. Aamiina!
49004001	Awa, mi wakkilinii on, min oo kasoojo sabu humondiral an e Joomi on, wuurugol ngurndan yaaduɗan e noddaandu ndu noddaɗon ndun,
49004002	e nder yankinaare e no newori e yondinaare fow. Muɲɲondiranee e nder giggol.
49004003	Etee no tabintiniron pottal, ngal Ruuhu on yeɗata, e nder ɓuttu yuɓɓindirɗo on on.
49004004	On fow on heɓii Ruuhu gooto, on laatike ɓandu wooturu, wano tawiri non kadi hiɗon mari tama'u gooto mo noddiraɗon fewndo noddaɗon on.
49004005	Ko Joomi gooto kadi woodi, e gomɗinal gootal, e lootannde maande kisiyee wootere,
49004006	e Alla gooto woodi, ɗun ko on Baabaajo fow, on Wonɗo dow fow e hakkunde fow e ɗi fow.
49004007	Kono mo kala e men yeɗaama moƴƴere nden, embere dokkal ngal Almasiihu on yeɗi en ngal.
49004008	Ko ɗun waɗi si no wi'aa: «O ƴawii ka asama, o naɓori maccuɓe, o waɗanii yimɓe ɓen dokke.»
49004009	(E hin-le ko honɗun «o ƴawii» firi si wonaa wonde o tippike haa ka nokkeeli ɓurɗi luggude ka leydi?
49004010	On non Tippiiɗo, ko on ƴawi e dow kammuuli ɗin fow, fii hebbingol kala huunde.)
49004011	Ko kanko yeɗi woɓɓe wonugol sahaabaaɓe, woɓɓe ɓen wonugol annabaaɓe, woɓɓe ɓen feɲɲinooɓe Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, woɓɓe ɓen aynooɓe e jannooɓe,
49004012	fii hebulingol yimɓe Alla ɓen fii golleeji kurkagol ngol e fii tiiɗingol ɓandu Almasiihu on
49004013	haa en fow yuɓɓondiren e nder gomɗinal ngal e andugol Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, mawnen, wonen mokobaaɓe, haa hewten mawnannde tooweendi ko woni e Almasiihu on kon fow.
49004014	Ɗun, hande kadi en wontataa fayɓe yiilindirteeɓe, ruynirteeɓe kala noone janndeeji ɗi yimɓe eɓɓiri ƴoyre e kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗaynooje.
49004015	Kono, wowlugol goonga e nder giggol, en mawnay e kala huunde e telen-ma on wonɗo hoore, ɗun ko Almasiihu on.
49004016	Ko sabu makko tere moftal wongal ɓandu makko ndun fottiri tiiɗi, humondiri moƴƴa ka jokke, ɗe ndu woni e mun. Ko ɗun waɗi, nde teral kala waɗiri no haanirani ɗun non, ɓandu ndun fow mawnay, hettoo e nder giggol.
49004017	Awa e hino ko mi wi'ata on, mi andina on e innde Joomiraaɗo on: On haanaa wuurirde han kadi wa ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, ɓen jokkuɓe miijooji mun mehi.
49004018	Miijooji maɓɓe ɗin ko niɓɓituɗi, ko ɓe jananɓe e ngurndan Alla ɗan, sabu majjere maɓɓe nden e yoorere maɓɓe ɓernde nden.
49004019	Ɓe alaa leeɓol liimanaaku few, ɓe jokkii jiiɓaare, fii waɗugol kala ko laaɓaa ko yuɓɓondiri e himme.
49004020	Kono onon, hinaa non andirɗon Almasiihu on.
49004021	Ɓay pellet on nanii fii makko no wowlee, on jannaama fii makko ko yaadi e goonga wonɗo e makko on,
49004022	haray hiɗon haani ɓortaade jikku mon feƴƴuɗo on e tagudi mon hindi ndin, ɗun ko on tuuniniroowo on himmeeji faljinooji,
49004023	accon ruuhuuji mon ɗin e hakkilaaji mon ɗin heyɗintinee,
49004024	ɓornoɗon tagudi mon heyri ndi Alla tagiri mbaadi mun e nder peewal e laaɓal ko rimata goonga.
49004025	Ko ɗun waɗi ko yo on seedu e fenaande, mo kala e mon yo wowlan ɗimmo mun on goonga, ko fii ko en tere ɗe ɓandu wooturu.
49004026	Si on aru seytinde, wota on waɗu junuubu, haray wota naange ngen mutu hiɗon tikki.
49004027	Wota on jonnu Ibuliisa yolnde.
49004028	Wujjaynooɗo woo wota wujju han kadi, kono yo o gollir juuɗe makko ɗen e nder nunɗal, o waɗa goɗɗun ko nafi, o okkora hatonjinɗo.
49004029	Wota on accu kongol barminoowol woo yalta ka hunduko mon, kono wowlee konguɗi moƴƴinayɗi tun, addayɗi nafa, wallayɗi ɓeya mawnugol ka nder gomɗinal, ɗun ɗi waɗay ko moƴƴi e heɗotooɓe on ɓen.
49004030	Wota on aanin Ruuhu Alla Seniiɗo on, on mo maandiniraɗon fii ndee ɲalaande cottudi wonkii.
49004031	Yo kala metteeɗe e tikkere e monee e sonko e hoyre e kala bonki iwu hakkunde mon.
49004032	Moƴƴondiree, yurmondiron, yaafondiron, wano Alla yaafori on non sabu Almasiihu on.
49005001	Awa wonee ɲembooɓe Alla wa fayɓe yiɗaaɓe,
49005002	wuuron e nder giggol wano Almasiihu on yiɗiri en non. O wattitii kanko tigi e sookeeje Alla fii wonangol en sadaka sakkaaɗo wa angiri uurundi.
49005003	Wota jinaa e kala noone angal laaɓal maa himme maandine toode e hakkunde mon, ɓay ɗii piiji haananaa yimɓe Alla ɓen.
49005004	Wota haalaaji bonɗi maa ɗi aldaa e faamu wowle, hay non si ko awmagol, ɗun hinaa ko haani, kono yo Alla yette.
49005005	Ko fii, andee fota, kala jinoowo maa mo laaɓaa maa himmuɗo, e maanaa rewoowo sanamu, alaa geɓal ka laamateeri Alla e Almasiihu on.
49005006	Awa wota hay gooto ɗaynir on haalaaji mehi, ɓay ko fii ɗun tikkere Alla nden ardata e hoore murtuɓe ɓen.
49005007	Awa wota on kafidu e maɓɓe geɓal woo.
49005008	Hari ko on niɓe, kono jooni ko on ndaygu sabu humondiral mon e Joomiraaɗo on. Awa wuuriree wa fayɓe ndaygu ngun,
49005009	ko fii ndaygu ngun no funtina kala noone moƴƴere e peewal e goonga.
49005010	Awa hakkilanee e ko welata Joomiraaɗo on kon.
49005011	Wota on humondir e kuuɗe meereeje woo ɗe niɓe, kono feɲɲinee fii majje.
49005012	Ko fii ko ɓen yimɓe waɗata kon e gundoo no hersinii toode hay wowlugol.
49005013	Kono kala ko feeɲi ka ndaygu, yaltitay,
49005014	ko fii ndaygu ngun hentinay fow. Ko ɗun waɗi si no wi'aa: «Finu, yo an ɗaaniiɗo, immo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, Almasiihu on ndaygay e hoore maa.»
49005015	Awa wattanee yiila e ngurndan mon ɗan, hara on wuuriraali wa komooɓe ɓen, kono ko wa jooma-faamu'en.
49005016	Awa wota on accu fajuhun woo feƴƴira on, ko fii ɲalaaɗe ɗen ko bonɗe.
49005017	Ko ɗun waɗi, wota on wonu faaɗa-hakkilɓe, kono faamee ko honɗun woni faale Joomiraaɗo on.
49005018	Wota on yaru haa mandilon, ɗun ko ɓoylaare, kono hebbinoree Ruuhu Allaahu on.
49005019	Yewtiree beyti Zabuura e jaarooje e beyti hormorɗi. Beytanon, jaaranon Joomiraaɗo on ka ɓerɗe mon,
49005020	saa'i kala yetton Alla, on Baabaajo, e kala huunde e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
49005021	Ɗoftondiree e dow teddingol Almasiihu on.
49005022	Onon kadi, yo sonnaaɓe, mo kala yo yankinano moodi mun wano yankinorani non Joomiraaɗo on.
49005023	Ko fii ko gorko woni hoore debbo, wano Almasiihu on woniri non hoore moftal ngal, ngal-le ko ɓandu makko, ko kanko woni dandoowo ngal.
49005024	Wano moftal ngal yankinorani non Almasiihu on, yo mo kala e sonnaaɓe ɓen kadi yankinoran non moodi mun e ɗi fow.
49005025	Onon kadi, yo duhiiɓe, mo kala e mon yo yiɗu sonnaajo mun on wano Almasiihu on yiɗiri moftal ngal non, haa o okkitiri hoore makko fii maggal.
49005026	O waɗiri ɗun fii no ngal wonira ngal Alla e hoore laɓɓinirgol ngal lootirgol ndiyan e daaluyee on,
49005027	fii feɲɲinoygol ngal moftal darjungal e makko, hara ngal aldaa e waadere woo e ɲuɗagol e huunde ko nandi e ɗun, kono hara ko laaɓungal, ngal aldaa e ella.
49005028	Wano non kadi, duhiiɓe ɓen haani yiɗirde sonnaaɓe mun ɓen wa ɓalli maɓɓe ɗin tigi. Kala on yiɗuɗo sonnaajo mun on, haray no yiɗitii kaɲun tigi.
49005029	Ko fii hay gooto aɲataa ɓandu mun ndun, kono o ɲamminay ndu, o dankoo wano Almasiihu on waɗirani moftal ngal non.
49005030	Ko fii ko en tere ɓandu makko.
49005031	«Ko ɗun waɗi si gorko selay ben mun e yumma mun, humoo e ɓeyngu mun, onsay kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe wona gooto.»
49005032	On gundoo no mawni, kono ko hakkunde Almasiihu on e moftal mun ngal mi woni eɓɓindirde ɗun.
49005033	Ko heddii kon, yo mo kala e mon yiɗir sonnaajo mun on wa hoore mun, awa kadi yo sonnaajo on teddin moodi mun.
49006001	Onon kadi fayɓe, ɗoftee mawɓe mon ɓen sabu Joomiraaɗo on, ko fii ɗun ko ko feewi.
49006002	Ko fii «Teddin yumma maa e ben maa», ko yamiroore aranere nden non wondude e fodaari,
49006003	fii no ontigi malira, o heɓa duuɓi buy ka hoore leydi.
49006004	Onon kadi non, yo baabiraaɓe, wota on mettin ɓerɗe fayɓe mon ɓen, kono ne'iree ɓe waajagol ɓe, eltira laawol Joomiraaɗo on.
49006005	Onon kadi, yo jiyaaɓe, ɗoftee jeyɓe on jeyal adunayankewal ɓen e nder kulol e teddungal, e hoore ɓernde laaɓunde, wano ɗoftorɗon Almasiihu on non.
49006006	Ɗun non, hara hinaa e gite maɓɓe tun, maa wano welirta yimɓe ɓen non, kono wa kurkaaɗi Almasiihu on, waɗirooɓe faale Alla on ɓerɗe mun ɗen fow.
49006007	Golliranon ɓe anniyee moƴƴo wa si tawii ko Joomiraaɗo on wonɗon gollande, hara hinaa yimɓe ɓen,
49006008	e hoore andugol, kala jiyaaɗo maa dimo, Joomiraaɗo on yoɓoyay mo embere moƴƴi ɗi o waɗi ɗin.
49006009	Onon non kadi, yo rimɓe, waɗiree wano non e telen-ma jiyaaɓe mon ɓen, reenoɗon e kambugol, e nder andugol wonde Jeyɗo ɓe on e Jeyɗo on on no ka kammu, awa kadi yeeso makko giɗaale alaa.
49006010	Ka rawnoode, awa dolnoree Joomiraaɗo on e bawgal makko tiiɗungal ngal.
49006011	Ɓornoɗon aalaaji Alla ɗin fow, fii no waawiron catorde dartoo pehe Ibuliisa ɗen.
49006012	Tippiro men ngon wonaa hakkunde men e ɓandu e ƴiiƴan woni, kono ko hakkunde men e laamuuji ɗin e mbawdiiji ɗin e laamuuji oo aduna wonɗo e nder niɓe e mbawdiiji ruuhuuyankeeji bonɗi ɗin ka kammuuli.
49006013	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'ay on: ƴettee aalaaji Alla ɗin fow, fii no waawiron dartorde tuma ɲalaande bone nden aroyi woo, e fii no waawiron darorde tabita ɓawto waɗugol fow.
49006014	Awa daree catoɗon. Yo goonga on wonu dattol keeci mon ɗin, peewal ngal wona dolokke mon hiwitorɗo on.
49006015	Yo paɗe mon ɗen wonu hebulaare iwrunde e Kibaaru Moƴƴo yeɗoowo ɓuttu on.
49006016	E nder kala huunde, jogoree gomɗinal ngal wa hiwitorgo, ngo waawoton ɗanninirde ndagaaje yiite Ibuliisa ɗen fow.
49006017	Hippoɗon kadi kunnawal kisiyee ngal, jogoɗon kaafa Ruuhu on, kan-le ko daaluyee Alla on.
49006018	Saa'i kala toroɗon wano Ruuhu Allaahu on woni ardorde on non e kala noone torndeeji, landoɗon ballal Alla, findinon hakkillaaji mon ɗin fii ɗun, duumoɗon e ɗun fota, toranoɗon yimɓe Alla ɓen fow.
49006019	Toranoɗon mi min kadi, fii, nde mi udditi hunduko an kon woo, yo mi yeɗe konguɗi fii yottingol gundoo Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e nder cuucal.
49006020	Ko fii on Kibaaru Moƴƴo mi wonani nulaaɗo e nder jolokooje. Toranoɗon mi kadi no mi yewtira pellital, wano haaniranimmi non.
49006021	Tikiiki, oo musiɗɗo men yiɗaaɗo, kurkaadu holniindu e nder golle Joomiraaɗo on, o humpitoyay on no mi fewndori e ko mi woni waɗude kon.
49006022	Ko waɗi si mi immini mo haa e mon, ko fii no andiron no men fewndori, e fii yo o ɓuttin ɓerɗe mon ɗen.
49006023	Yo ɓuttu e giggol yeɗe musiɓɓe ɓen, wondude e gomɗinal, immorde e Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
49006024	Yo moƴƴere wonan kala yiɗirɗo Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, giggol ngol bontataa.
50001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa e Timotee, menen ɗii kurkaaɗi Iisaa Almasiihu on, haa e yimɓe Alla humondirɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on fow ka saare Filipii, e ardotooɓe moftal ngal e wallitotooɓe ngal ɓen.
50001002	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
50001003	Miɗo jarnude Alla an on saa'i kala nde mi anditi fii mon.
50001004	Saa'i kala nde mi torantoo on on fow, ko e nder weltaare mi tororta,
50001005	sabu ko kafiduɗon e amen fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo Iisaa Almasiihu on kon, gila ɲande mi hewti ka mon haa hande.
50001006	Miɗo felliti, Alla, on Fuɗɗiiɗo kuugal moƴƴal e mon, jokkay timmingol ɗun haa ɲande ardu Iisaa Almasiihu on.
50001007	No haani ka mi miijorana on nii, ko fii miɗo waɗi on ka ɓernde an. Ko fii on fow ko on kafiduɓe e an sulfu Alla on, woni e nder ko mi sokaa kon, woni ko mi darantoo Kibaaru Moƴƴo on kon, mi haqinqina mo.
50001008	Ko fii Alla no seeditanoo mi wonde miɗo yiɗi on on fow wano Iisaa Almasiihu on yiɗiri on non.
50001009	Ko mi torantoo on, ko yo giggol mon ngol ɓurtu ɓeydaade, e nder gandal e faamangol ko woni woo.
50001010	Ɗun, on waaway taskaade, anda ko ɓuri moƴƴude kon, fii no laatoron ɓe ɓernde laaɓunde e ɓe felnaaki ɲande ardu Almasiihu on,
50001011	heewuɓe kuuɗe feewuɗe iwruɗe e Iisaa Almasiihu on fii mangu e mantoore Alla.
50001012	Mi faalaa yo on andu, yo musiɓɓe an, ko heɓunoo mi kon wallii fii no Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ɓantora.
50001013	Ko ɗun waɗi, gila e ɓee suufaaɓe lanɗo on, haa naɓani hen fow, ɓangii wonde ko fii Almasiihu on mi sokiraa.
50001014	E nder ko mi sokaa kon, ɓurɓe ɓen e musiɓɓe ɓen ɓurtii hoolaade Joomiraaɗo on, ɓe ɓeydi suusude fii feɲɲingol daaluyee Alla on e ɓaawo kulol.
50001015	Ko goonga, woɓɓe ɓen no waajorde fii Almasiihu on nawliigu e monee, kono woɓɓe ɓen ko e hoore anniyee moƴƴo woni waɗirde ɗun.
50001016	Ɓen non no waɗirde ɗun giggol, e hoore andugol wonde mi waɗaama haqinqinoowo Kibaaru Moƴƴo on.
50001017	E hin-le, ɓen wonɓe ɓanginirde fii Almasiihu on haasidi, anniyeeji maɓɓe ɗin hinaa laaɓuɗi, hiɓe miijii ɓeyditude satteende e hoore ko mi sokaa kon.
50001018	No wa'i woo ko seeɗa hitti. Woni ko e anniyeeji moƴƴi maa si ko e anniyeeji bonɗi, min mi weltike, mi weltoto kadi, ɓay fii Almasiihu on waajaama.
50001019	Ko fii miɗo andi, ɗun wontanay lan kisiyee sabu torndeeji mon Alla ɗin e ballal Ruuhu Iisaa Almasiihu on.
50001020	Faale an tiiɗuɗo on e tama'u an on ko ko tawi kon mi hersirtaa hay huunde, kono gila ɗoo haa poomaa, mi geray no Iisaa Almasiihu on mawniniree e an min e nder hoolaare tiiɗunde, woni non ko e nder ngurndan an ɗan, woni ko e nder mayde an nden.
50001021	Ko fii min, ko Almasiihu on woni ngurndan an ɗan, mayde nden ko tono e an.
50001022	Kono si miɗo wuuri e oo aduna, ɗun mi waaway gollude golle nafooje. Ko honɗun mi haani suɓaade? Mi andaa!
50001023	Ko fii miɗo pooɗeede e cenɗe ɗen ɗiɗii non. Miɗo mari faale yahugol tawtoya Almasiihu on, ko ɗun ɓuri moƴƴude.
50001024	Kono ko si miɗo wuuri ɓuri wondande on e nafa.
50001025	Ko fii miɗo andi, miɗo felliti mi luttay, mi wona moggo mon on fow, fii ɓantal mon ngal, e fii weltaare mon nden ka nder gomɗinal.
50001026	Ɗun, haray mantoore mon nden e fee Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓeydoto sabu an nde mi yiltitoyii ka mon.
50001027	Ko woni tun, woniree e noone no haanirani Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on. Woni mi aru yi'ugol on, woni mi araali, yo mi nanu tun no wowlee fii mon wonde hiɗon tabiti e miijo wooto, tippiranon gomɗinal Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e nder anniyee gooto,
50001028	hara on jaɓaali hulɓinireede huunde immorde e ayɓe ɓen. Ɗun wonanay ɓe maande halkagol maɓɓe ngol, kono onon ɗun wonana on maande kisiyee mon on, ɗun ko immorde e Alla.
50001029	Ko onon yeɗaa moƴƴere sabu Almasiihu on, hinaa non gomɗingol mo tun, kono ko tampangol mo kadi.
50001030	Jooni on wakkilike tippiro ngo mi woni e mun ngon, ngon tippiro ngo yi'unoɗon miɗo tippiree, e ngon ngo wonɗon nanude miɗo tippiree haa jooni.
50002001	Nde tawnoo on heɓii wakkilineede sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, e dankeede e nder giggol, e mbeldigal, e yurmeende, e jokkere enɗan e nder Ruuhu Allaahu on,
50002002	timminiree weltaare an nden heɓugol miijo wooto, e nder giggol gootol e fondo wooto e anniyee gooto.
50002003	Wota on warru huunde haasidi maa manti mehi, kono e nder yankinaare jogoron heddiiɓe ɓen wa ɓurɓe on.
50002004	Ɗoo e yo mo kala e mon wattan yiila e fii ko nafata ɗun kon, wattanee yiila e ko nafata ɓeya kon kadi.
50002005	Waɗon e mon miijo wonnoongo e Iisaa Almasiihu on ngon:
50002006	Ɗun ko on mo mbaadi mun woni ndi Alla, kono o haɓɓitaaki fotugol e Alla,
50002007	kono o tippini hoore makko, o ƴetti mbaadi maccuɗo e hoore nandintinagol e neɗɗanke. Ɓawto tawdegol e noone neɗɗanke,
50002008	o jippini hoore makko, o ɗoftii haa e mayde, hay maayugol e leggal altindiraangal.
50002009	Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla towni mo ka ɓuri toowude ton, o yeɗi mo innde ɓurnde mawnude inɗe ɗen fow,
50002010	fii kala ko tagaa ko woni ka kammuuli e ka hoore leydi e ka nder leydi yo jicco e innde Iisaa,
50002011	e yo kala ɗenngal qirrito wonde Iisaa Almasiihu on ko Joomiraaɗo ka mangu Alla Baabaajo on.
50002012	Jooni non, yo yiɓɓe an, nde tawnoo hiɗon duumi e ɗoftaare, golliree kisiyee mon on e nder kulol e teddungal, hara hinaa e yeeso an tun, kono yo ɓurtu e ɓaawo an.
50002013	Ko fii ko Alla woni waɗude e mon faale on e huuwingol on ko yaadi e eɓɓoore makko moƴƴere nden.
50002014	Waɗiree fow e ɓaawo dukugol e yeddondiro,
50002015	fii no laatoron laaɓuɓe ɓe felnaaki, e no woniron fayɓe Alla ɓe felnaaki e hakkunde nguu jamaanu bonngu ɓoyliingu, ngu jalbirɗon e hakkunde mun wa kooɗe e oo aduna,
50002016	jogiiɓe daaluyee ngurndan ɗan. Ɗun, on wonanoyay lan ɓe mi mantorta ɲande ardu Almasiihu on, ɗun haray wonanii lan seedee ko mi jindi kon e ko mi tampi kon wonaali meere.
50002017	Hay si tawii mi wonay sadaka hibbanteeɗo Joomiraaɗo on fii timmingol sadaka mon on e kurkagol mon ngol immorde e gomɗinal mon ngal, haray miɗo weltii, miɗo weltodi kadi e mon on fow.
50002018	Onon kadi weltoree wano non, weltodon e an!
50002019	Miɗo tanƴinori Iisaa Joomi on nelugol Timotee haa e mon ko neeɓaa, fii no mi wakkilora min tigi sabu ɗin kibaaruuji ɗi mi heɓirta on.
50002020	Ko fii hay gooto aaniranaa on wa an si hinaa kanko Timotee.
50002021	Ko fii fow ko nafa mun on woni ɗaɓɓude, hinaa nafa wonɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
50002022	Kono hiɗon andi ko honno Timotee ɓanginiri fii mun, e no men gollidiri fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, wa paykun wonkun moggo ben mun.
50002023	Awa, miɗo tanƴinii nelugol mo haa e mon, nde mi humpitii ko laaɓi fii ko heɓoytammi kon woo.
50002024	Awa kadi miɗo hoolori Joomiraaɗo on, wonde min tigi mi yahay ko neeɓaa.
50002025	Miɗo tanƴinii no moƴƴi ka mi nelta e mon oo musiɗɗo an, wondiɗɗo an e golle e tippiro, wi'eteeɗo Epafruuditu, mo nelunoɗon e an, jonnorɗon piiji ɗi mi handi.
50002026	Himo wulɗaa on fota, on fow, awa kadi himo aani fota fii ko humpitiɗon fii nawnaare makko nden kon.
50002027	Ko goonga, o nawnuno haa moggo mayde, kono Alla yurmaa mo, hinaa kanko tun non o yurmaa, kono min men, fii wota mi heɓu sokola e hoore sokola.
50002028	Awa mi neltanii on mo e hoore hawjere tiiɗunde fii yo on weltor yi'ugol mo, e no min kadi sokola an on ɗuytora.
50002029	Jaɓɓee mo e innde Joomiraaɗo on, wondude e weltaare timmunde, teddinon kadi sifa ɓen yimɓe.
50002030	Ko fii, ko sabu golle Almasiihu on o eppirnoo mayde, fewndo o weeɓitunoo ngurndan makko ɗan, fii gollangol lan golle ɗe onon tigi on waawaano.
50003001	Ka rawnoode, yo musiɓɓe an, weltoree Joomiraaɗo on. Ko fii tampintaa lan ka mi fillitoo windangol on, ko fii ɗun ko ko dandata on.
50003002	Awa reenee e dawaaɗi ɗin, reenoɗon e gollooɓe bonɓe ɓen, reenoɗon e barajeliiɓe ɓen.
50003003	Ko fii, sunninaaɓe tigi-tigiiɓe ɓen ko enen, enen ɓee rewirooɓe Alla Ruuhu makko on, enen ɓee mantorɓe Iisaa Almasiihu on, enen ɓee ɓe hooloraa ɓandu mun.
50003004	E hin-le min kadi, miɗo waawunoo fawude hoolaare an nden e ɓandu an ndun. Si tawii goɗɗo no sikka no waawi fawude hoolaare mun nden e ɓandu mun, min kadi miɗo waawi ko ɓuri ɗun.
50003005	Ko fii mi sunninano ka ɲalaande jeetataɓere. Ko mi jibinannde Isra'iila ka bolondaa Buniyamiinu, ƴiiƴan Aabirayanke tigi. Fii telen-ma ka teddingol Sariya Muusaa on, miɗo tawdanoo e Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen.
50003006	Hakkee ko mi himmunoo, mi cukkotono gomɗinɓe Iisaa ɓen, e ley yamiroore Sariya on, tawi mi felnaaki.
50003007	Kono ko wonannoo mi tono kon, mi jogori ɗun wa meere sabu Almasiihu on.
50003008	Awa kadi mi jogorii fow wa meere e nder eɓɓindirgol ɗun e gandal mawngal fii Iisaa Almasiihu on, on Joomi an. Ko sabu makko mi tertori piiji ɗin fow, mi jogori ɗi fow wa tuuɗe, fii no mi heɓira Almasiihu on,
50003009	e no mi humondirira e makko. Hinaa sabu kuuɗe an ɗen maa sabu ɗoftagol Sariya Muusaa on waɗi si ko mi feewuɗo, kono ko sabu gomɗingol Almasiihu on waɗi si ko mi feewuɗo, ɗun ko ngal peewal iwrungal ka Alla, sabu gomɗinal.
50003010	Faandaare an nden ko andugol mo kanko Almasiihu on, anda bawgal immintineede makko nden, mi hawtida e makko tampereeji makko ɗin, mi wa'a wa makko ka mayde makko,
50003011	e dow tama'u immintineede e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.
50003012	Hinaa fii mi heɓii ko mi faandanii kon, maa mi hewtii ka timmoode, kono miɗo jokki yaarugol yeeso fii no mi hendoroya kon ko Iisaa Almasiihu noddirimmi fii mun.
50003013	Min tigi non, yo musiɓɓe an, mi tanƴinaaki wonde mi hendike ɗun taho. Kono miɗo waɗi huunde wootere: yejjitugol fii ko feƴƴi kon, pooɗanoo ko woni yeeso kon.
50003014	Miɗo dogande timmoode nden, fii no mi heɓira njoddi ndi Alla noddiri en fii mun ka kammu ndin rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
50003015	Enen mokobaaɓe e gomɗinal ɓen fow, heɓen sifa ngoo miijo. Si tawii non e toɓɓe goo hiɗon mari miijooji luutondirɗi e ɗunɗoo, haray Alla ɓanginanay on fii nden toɓɓere ɗon.
