50003016	Ko woni tun, ɓay en ardii haa ɗoo, yaaden yaadu wooturu.
50003017	Wonee ɲembooɓe lan, yo musiɓɓe. Ƴetton misal e ɓen wuurirɓe wano men wuuriri non.
50003018	No woodi ɗuuɗuɓe wonirɓe ngayngu leggal altindiraangal Almasiihu on ngal. Mi wowlanii on ɗun soono woo. Jooni kadi, miɗo wowlude ɗun e hoore miɗo wulla.
50003019	Sakkitoode maɓɓe nden ko halkagol, ko deedi maɓɓe ɗin woni alla maɓɓe on, hiɓe waɗi darja maɓɓe on ka hersinta ɓe, awa kadi ko fii piiji oo aduna tun ɓe miijotoo.
50003020	Enen, ko en jeyaaɓe ka aljanna ka Dandoowo mo habborɗen hawjere on iwata ton, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on,
50003021	on wayliroyoowo ɓalli men lo'uɗi ɗin bawgal makko waawayngal yankingol kala huunde e ley makko ngal, o nandintina ɗi e ɓandu makko darjundu ndun.
50004001	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe, ɓe mi wulɗaa fota, onon ɓe tawata ko weltaare an e meetelol an, tabitiree nii, ɲiiɓon e Joomiraaɗo on, yo yiɓɓe an.
50004002	Mi torike Afuudiyata e Sinitiiki, mi jeeji, yo ɓe waɗu sabu Joomiraaɗo on ɓe nantondira.
50004003	An men, yo mo mi gollidata, sella-findeejo, mi torike ma wallitagol ɓee rewɓe walluɓe lan tippirde fii yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, wondude e Akilimandu e ɓeya ɓe mi gollidata fow, ɓe tawata inɗe mun no windii ka deftere ngurndan.
50004004	Weltee saa'i woo e nder humondiral mon e Joomiraaɗo on, miɗo fillitaade kadi, weltee!
50004005	Yo yimɓe ɓen fow andu newaare mon nden, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on ko Ɓadiiɗo.
50004006	Wota on aanu huunde, kono e kala huunde weeɓitiranee Alla faaleeji mon ɗin toragol mo, landoo mo ballal, weltanoo mo.
50004007	Ɗun, ɓuttu ngu Alla yeɗata, feƴƴitungu kala faamu ngun, hiway ɓerɗe mon ɗen e miijooji mon ɗin e nder humondiral mon e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
50004008	Ko heddii kon, yo musiɓɓe an, kala ko tawata ko goonga, kala ko wondi e teddungal, kala ko feewi, kala ko laaɓi, kala ko labaa, kala ko handi e kuljeede, kala ko ɓuri moƴƴude, e kala ko handi e mantoore, yo ɗun wonan miijo mon ngon keyee.
50004009	Awa, ko andirɗon mi kon, e ko heɓirɗon mi kon, e ko nanuɗon miɗo wowla kon, e ko yi'uɗon miɗo waɗa kon, waɗee ɗun. Ɗun, Alla Jom ɓuttu on wonday e mon.
50004010	Miɗo weltanii Joomiraaɗo on fota, sabu ko wurnituɗon nafa mon fii an kon. Hari hiɗon wondi e on nafa, kono hari feere nden no ŋakkiri on.
50004011	Wonaa fii miɗo ŋakkiraa waɗi si mi wowli ɗun, ko fii mi ekkitike yondinorgol no mi fewndori non.
50004012	Miɗo waawi wuurude e nder ɓillaare, wano tawiri non kadi miɗo waawi wuurude e nder maral. E ɗi fow e hen fow mi ekkitike gundoo weltagol, woni e nder haarannde maa e heege, woni e nder maral maa e ŋakkireede.
50004013	Mi waawii fow sabu on Tiiɗinɗo lan.
50004014	Kono on waɗii ko moƴƴi tawdegol mon e tampereeji an ɗin.
50004015	Onon ɓe Filipii ɓen tigi hiɗon andi, ka fuɗɗoode waajagol an fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ka mon, ɓay mi iwii Masedonii, hay moftal gootal wallindiraali e an ka baŋŋe jonnugol e hendagol si wonaa ngal mon ngal.
50004016	Ko fii, fewndo mi wonnoo ka saare Tesalonii, on neldanno ɓuri nde wootere ko mi handi e mun.
50004017	Hinaa fii ko dokkal mi wonnoo ɗaɓɓude, kono ko mi woni ɗaɓɓude ko yo tono golle mon ɗen ɓeydo.
50004018	Mi hendike ko nelduɗon mi kon e juuɗe Epafruuditu. Jooni mi heɓii ko mi handi e mun kon haa feƴƴitii. Dokkal mon ngal no wa'i wa angiri ndi urngol moƴƴol, wa sadaka mo Alla jaɓi, hara ko waalaniiɗo mo.
50004019	Immorde e ngalu e darja Alla an on sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, o okkay on kala ko handuɗon.
50004020	Yo mangural wonan Alla, Baaba men, haa poomaa. Aamiina!
50004021	Salminanee lan kala aaden Alla humondirɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on. Musiɓɓe ɓe mi wondi ɓen salminii on.
50004022	Yimɓe Alla ɓen fow salminii on, tentinii ɓee jeyaaɓe e nduu suudu oo lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on.
50004023	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on wonu e ɓerɗe mon.
51001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla hoddiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, wondude e oo musiɗɗo men wi'eteeɗo Timotee,
51001002	haa e mon onon, ɓee musiɓɓe amen humondirɓe e Almasiihu on, gomɗinɓe wonɓe Koloosi, sella-findeeɓe. Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men.
51001003	Meɗen duumi e jarnugol Alla, on Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, e nder ko men torantoo on kon.
51001004	Ko fii men nanii fii ko gomɗinɗon Iisaa Almasiihu on kon no wowlee, e giggol ngol yiɗuɗon yimɓe Alla ɓen fow ngol,
51001005	sabu tama'u mo maranaɗon on ka kammu, on mo daaluyee goongaajo on andinnoo on fii mun, ɗun ko Kibaaru Moƴƴo
51001006	hewtuɗo ka mon on. Ko wano o woni waɗirde batte, o laya e aduna on fow non, ko wano non o woni waɗirde batte e hakkunde mon gila ɲande nanuɗon anduɗon moƴƴere Alla nden e nder goonga on,
51001007	ɓawto Epafaraasi, oo giɗo amen e gollidoowo e amen, hewtinde on ɗii janndeeji. Himo wonani on golloowo sella-findeejo e telen-ma Almasiihu on,
51001008	awa kadi o ɓanginanii men fii giggol ngol Ruuhu Allaahu on waɗi e mon ngol.
51001009	Ko ɗun waɗi, menen kadi, gila ɲande men humpitii ɗun, meɗen duumii e toranagol on Alla, e toragol yo on hebbine gandal fii faale makko on, wondude e kala faamu e hakkil iwruɗun e Ruuhu Allaahu on,
51001010	fii no wuuriron noone no hawrirani Joomiraaɗo on, e no welira mo e kala noone, ngurnɗan mon ɗan rima kala noone kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɓeydoɗon e andugol Alla,
51001011	bawgal mangu makko ngun tiiɗina on e kala huunde, fii no woniron ŋaɲɲiiɓe e muɲɲiiɓe,
51001012	e hoore hiɗon jarnira Baabaajo on weltaare, on Wawnuɗo on heɓugol geɓal ka ndondi ndi o marani gomɗinɓe ɓen ka laamateeri ndaygu,
51001013	on Jattinɗo en mbawdi niɓe ɗen, o addii en ka laamateeri Ɓiɗɗo makko yiɗaaɗo on,
51001014	on mo heɓirɗen cottudi wonkii e yaafuyee junuubaaji.
51001015	Ko on Ɓiɗɗo woni mbaadi Alla mo yi'otaako on, ko kanko woni afo e hoore kala ko tagaa.
51001016	Ko fii ko e makko kala huunde tagiraa ka kammu e ka hoore leydi, ko yi'otoo e ko yi'otaako, ɗun ko julle laamu e laamuuji e hooreyaagal e bawɗe, fow ko e makko tagiraa, e fii makko kadi tagiraa.
51001017	Ko kanko adii kala huunde, e kala huunde ko e makko woniri.
51001018	Ko kanko woni hoore ɓandu ndun, ɗun ko moftal ngal. Ko kanko woni Fuɗɗoode nden, e adaaɗo immintineede e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, fii no o wonira Arano e ɗi fow.
51001019	Ko fii welii Alla ka ko woni e Alla kon fow wona e Almasiihu on,
51001020	e moƴƴintinirgol fow e makko kanko tigi, ko woni ka hoore leydi kon e ko woni ka kammu kon, e nder waɗugol ɓuttu rewrude e ƴiiƴan makko hibbaaɗan ɗan ka hoore leggal makko altindiraangal.
51001021	Onon kadi, ɓee woɗɗitinooɓe Alla e ayɓe makko sabu miijooji mon ɗin e kuuɗe mon bonɗe ɗen,
51001022	jooni non ko mayde ɓandu makko ndun o moƴƴintiniri hakkunde mon e makko, fii no laatoron yeeso makko kanko Alla laaɓuɓe, ɓe aldaa e ella e ɓe felnaaki,
51001023	kono non, ko si tawii hiɗon duumii e gomɗinal ngal, hiɗon tabintinaa, ɲiiɓinaa e maggal, hara on woɗɗitaaki tama'u mo heɓirɗon Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo nanuɗon on. On Kibaaru feɲɲinanaaɗo kala tagaaɗo ka ley kammu, ko on min Puulusa mi wonti kurkaadu mun.
51001024	Jooni miɗo weltii e nder tampereeji an ɗin fii mon. Ko fii, e an min, mi timminirii ɓandu an ndun ko ŋakkunoo e tampereeji Almasiihu on, fii ɓandu makko ndun, ndun-le ko moftal ngal.
51001025	Ko ngal moftal mi wonani kurkaadu, wano Alla nelirimmi non fii feɲɲinangol on daaluyee makko on e ko woni e mun kon fow,
51001026	ɗun ko on gundoo neeɓunooɗo suuɗaade e nder jamaanuuji ɗin fow, kono jooni o feɲɲinanaama laaɓuɓe makko ɓen,
51001027	ɓen ɓe Alla faalaa andinde ko honɗun woni ngalu mangu on gundoo e hakkunde leƴƴi ɗin fow. Ko woni on gundoo: Almasiihu on no e mon, ko ɗun woni tama'u mangu ngun.
51001028	Ko on men woni feɲɲinde fii mun e nder hajagol, janna kala neɗɗo e dow faamu timmungu, fii no kala neɗɗo laatora mokobaa e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on.
51001029	Ko ɗun mi woni gollande, e nder tippirgol e doole makko wonɗe gollude e an no tiiɗiri ɗen.
51002001	Awa, mi faalaa yo on andu ko tippiro hongo mi rondii fii mon, onon e ɓee ɓe Laa'udiisa e ɓe yi'aali lan haa hande ɓen.
51002002	Ɗun ko fii no ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen wakkilora, e no ɓe tamondirira e nder giggol, ɓe heɓa kala ko woni e pellital heewungal iwrungal e faamu, fii andugol gundoo Alla on, ɗun ko Almasiihu on tigi,
51002003	on mo ngaluuji faamu ngun e gandal ngal fow suuɗii e mun.
51002004	Ko mi wi'iri ɗun, ko fii wota hay gooto faljinir on yewtereeji welɗi.
51002005	Ko fii, si tawii mi tawdaaka e mon e ɓandu, kono haray miɗo wondi e mon ka ɓernde, miɗo weltori yi'ugol nanondiral yaadungal wongal hakkunde mon ngal, e tiiɗeendi gomɗinal mon ngal e telen-ma Almasiihu on.
51002006	Nde tawnoo on jaɓii Iisaa Almasiihu on wona Joomi mon, awa duumee e humagol e makko.
51002007	Iree ɗaɗi mon ɗin e didoodi mon ndin e makko, tabiton e nder gomɗinal ngal wano janniraɗon non, wonon heewuɓe jarnugol.
51002008	Reenee, wota hay gooto e mon hiile, nangiree faamu neɗɗanke e ɗayni meereeji immorde e aadaaji neɗɗanke e mbawdiiji adunayankeeji, ɗi tawata wonaa e Almasiihu on iwri.
51002009	Ko fii allankaaku Alla ngun fow no e neɗɗankaaku Almasiihu on,
51002010	awa kadi on wonii timmuɓe e kala huunde e nder yuɓɓondiral mon e makko, ɗun ko on Wonɗo yeesoojo kala laamu e kala bawgal.
51002011	Ko e nder humondiral mon e makko kadi sunniniraɗon sunninannde nde waɗiraaka juuɗe neɗɗanke, kono hara ko sunninannde nde Almasiihu on waɗi nden, ɗun ko ɓoorugol ɓandu junuubankeeru ndun.
51002012	On surridaama e makko, e nder looteede maande kisiyee, on immintinidaama e makko sabu ko gomɗinɗon bawgal Alla ngal kon, on Immintinɗo mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.
51002013	Onon, ɓe tawata maayiino sabu bonnereeji mon e sabu angal sunninegol mon, kanko Alla o wurnitidii on e Almasiihu on. O yaafanike en bonnereeji men ɗin fow.
51002014	O montii derol ɲamaale windanoongol e hoore men ngol, ngol ngol tawata yamirooje mun no ŋannani en, o ittiri ngol fempugol ngol ka leggal altindiraangal.
51002015	O ɓoorii laamuuji ɗin e bawɗe ɗen, o weeɓitii ɗe e kene e yeeso fow e nder foolirgol ɗe leggal altindiraangal ngal.
51002016	Awa ko ɗun waɗi, wota gooto ɲaawu on fii ko ɲaamoton kon e ko yaroton kon, maa fii juldeere, maa lewru heyru, maa ɲalaaɗe fowteteeɗe e mun ɗen.
51002017	Ɗun fow ko ɗowdi piiji aroyayɗi ɗin, kono haqiiqa on ko ɗi Almasiihu on ɗin.
51002018	Wota on jaɓu ɓen yimɓe yiɗuɓe yankinorde tampingol ɓandu ndun e rewugol malaa'ika hippoo on mbuuɲaari mon ndin. Sifa ɓen yimɓe ko hoolorɓe koyɗi mun. Hiɓe hebbinora mawnintinaare nde alaa nafa, immorde e miijooji neɗɗanke,
51002019	edii ɓe humaade e Hooreejo on, on mo ɓandu ndun fow jogondiriri sabu mun, fottiri jokke ɗen e ɗaɗi ɗin, mawni no Alla yiɗiri non.
51002020	Nde tawnoo on maayidiino e Almasiihu on, on sertii e ɗii mbawdiiji adunayankeeji, ko honɗun jaɓanton ɓe fawa on ɗii aadaaji, wa si tawii hiɗon wuurani aduna,
51002021	ɗun ko «wota a meemu ɗunɗoo!», «wota a mettu ɗunɗaa!», «wota a foppo ɗuntoo!»
51002022	Ɗii aadaaji fow si huutoraama ko ɗi bontayɗi, ɓay ko ɗi yamirooje e janndeeji neɗɗanke.
51002023	Pellet, ko goonga, ɗin aadaaji no nandi e faamu, ɓay hiɗi catii e dewal anniyaangal immorde e neɗɗanke, e yankinaare e yangugol ɓandu, kono ɗi alanaa neɗɗanke no o wawtora hoore makko.
51003001	Ɓay non on wurnitidaama e Almasiihu on, haray ɗaɓɓee piiji wonɗi ka dow ɗin, ka Almasiihu on jooɗori ka sengo ɲaamo Alla ton.
51003002	Miijee fii ko woni ka dow kon, hara hinaa fii ko woni ka hoore leydi kon.
51003003	Ko fii on maayii, ngurndan mon ɗan no suuɗii e Almasiihu on ka Alla.
51003004	Awa, nde Almasiihu on, ɗun ko ngurndan mon ɗan, feeɲiti, haray on feeɲiday e makko ka mangural.
51003005	Awa waree piiji adunayankeeji wonɗi e mon ɗin, ɗun ko wano: jinaa e angal laaɓal e himmeeji e faaleeji bonɗi e miile, (ko fii miile ko rewugol sanamu).
51003006	Ko ɗun addata tikkere Alla nden e hoore murtuɓe ɓen.
51003007	Ko nii wuurirnoɗon oya tuma, wa fewndo junuubu ardinoo ngurndan mon ɗan.
51003008	Kono jooni non, onon kadi bugitee ɗun fow: ɗun ko tikkere nden e monee on e hunƴeendi ndin e hoyre nden e haalaaji bonɗi yaltaynooɗi e kundule mon ɗin.
51003009	Wota on fenindiran, onon ɓee ɓortiiɓe tagu hinngu ngun e kuuɗe mun,
51003010	ɓornii tagu hesu heyɗintinaangu e noone mbaadi on Taguɗo ngu, fii no waawiron mo andude haa timma.
51003011	Ɗon alaa Gereekiyankeejo maa Yahuudiyankeejo, maa sunninaaɗo maa mo sunninaaka, maa leɲol ngol finaa maa leɲol kaana-jikkuwol, maa maccuɗo maa dimo, kono ko Almasiihu on woni fow, woni e fow.
51003012	Ɓay ko on suɓaaɓe Alla, laaɓuɓe, e yiɗaaɓe makko, ɓornee yurmeende tiiɗunde e moƴƴuki e yankinaare e newaare e yondinaare.
51003013	Muɲɲondiranee, yaafondiron si tawii goɗɗo no mari ko wullitoo e hoore oya. Wano Almasiihu on yaaforani on non, onon kadi waɗiree wano non.
51003014	Kono, e hoore ɗunɗoo fow, ɓornee giggol, sabu ko ngol yuɓɓindirta haa timma.
51003015	Yo ɓuttu Almasiihu ngu noddiraɗon fii wonugol ɓandu wooturu ngun ardo ɓerɗe mon ɗen. Wonee anditanooɓe.
51003016	Yo kongol Almasiihu on hebbin ɓerɗe mon ɗen. Jannindiree, hajondiron e dow faamu fow e nder ko beytiranton Alla beyti Zabuura e jaarooje e beyti hormorɗi, yettiron Alla beytirangol mo ɓerɗe mon ɗen fow.
51003017	Kala ko waɗoton, e kongol maa e kuugal, waɗee fow e innde Iisaa Joomi on, e jarnirgol mo Alla Baabaajo on.
51003018	Rewɓe, mo kala e mon, yo yankinano moodi mun, wano hawrirani Joomiraaɗo on non.
51003019	Onon kadi worɓe, mo kala e mon yo yiɗu ɓeyngu mun, hara on hunƴanaali ɓe.
51003020	Onon kadi fayɓe, ɗoftee mawɓe mon ɓen e ɗi fow, ko fii ɗun no wela Joomiraaɗo on.
51003021	Onon kadi baabiraaɓe, wota on mettin ɓerɗe fayɓe mon ɓen, fii wota ɓerɗe maɓɓe maayu.
51003022	Onon kadi yo jiyaaɓe, ɗoftee jeyɓe on jeyal adunayankewal ɓen e ɗi fow, hara hinaa non e gite maɓɓe tun, wa si tawii on ɗaɓɓay woni no yimɓe ɓen yiɗira on, kono hara ko ɓernde laaɓunde e nder kulol Joomiraaɗo on.
51003023	Kala ko waɗoton, waɗiree ɗun ittiri wonkii mon kin fow, wa si tawii ko Joomiraaɗo on wonɗon waɗande, hara hinaa yimɓe ɓen,
51003024	e hoore andugol mon on heɓiray Joomiraaɗo on ndondi wa ngeenaari. Ko Almasiihu Joomi on wonɗon kurkanaade.
51003025	Ko fii kala on waɗuɗo ko boni, o hettay njoddi bonnere makko nden, awa kadi giɗaale alaa ton.
51004001	Onon kadi yo jeyɓe, jogoree jiyaaɓe mon ɓen no feewiri e no nunɗiri, e hoore andugol wonde onon kadi hiɗon mari Jeyɗo on ka kammu.
51004002	Duumee e toragol Alla, hakkilanon e ɗun e dow yettugol mo.
51004003	Toranoɗon men kadi, fii yo Alla udditan konguɗi amen ɗin dambugal fii no men waawira feɲɲinirde goonga lugguɗo Almasiihu on, on goonga mo mi jolkaa fii mun,
51004004	e no mi yewtira fii on goonga no laaɓiri, wano haaniranimmi non.
51004005	E telen-ma ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, wondiree faamu, hara on accaali fajuhun woo feƴƴira on.
51004006	Yo taw soono woo konguɗi mon ɗin ko welɗi, hara hiɗi weliri wa lanɗan, fii no andiron ko honno jaaborton mo kala.
51004007	Tikiiki, oo musiɗɗo an yiɗaaɗo, golloowo holniiɗo mo mi kurkodata fii golle Joomiraaɗo on, o andinoyay on fow fii no mi fewndori.
51004008	Ko waɗi si mi immini mo haa e mon, ko fii no andiron no men fewndori, e fii yo o wakkilin ɓerɗe mon ɗen.
51004009	Mi immindinanii on mo e oo musiɗɗo yiɗaaɗo sella-findeejo wi'eteeɗo Onesiima, on ko mo mon. Ɓe andinoyay on ko woni feƴƴude gaa kon fow.
51004010	Oo wondiɗɗo an e joge wi'eteeɗo Aristarke salminii on, wondude e Markuusa, oo denɗiraawo Barnabaasi, on mo tindinanaɗon fii mun. Si o hewtoyii ka mon, wernee mo moƴƴa.
51004011	Iisaa jammaaɗo Yustuusa kadi salminii on. E nder leɲol Yahuuda ngol, ko ɓee ɗoo tun woni gollidude e an fii laamateeri Alla ndin, ɓe woni wakkilinɓe lan.
51004012	Oo kurkaadu Iisaa Almasiihu on wi'eteeɗo Epafaraasi salminii on, on ko mo mon. Himo duumii e tippiro fii mon e nder torndeeji makko ɗin, fii no tabitiron wa mokobaaɓe, heewuɓe hoolaare e telen-ma faale Alla on fow.
51004013	Miɗo seeditanii mo ɗun, wonde o yanganike on fota, e fii ɓee ɓe Laa'udiisa e fii ɓee ɓe Hiirapoliisa.
51004014	Awa kadi, oo ɲawndoowo yiɗaaɗo wi'eteeɗo Luuka, wondude e Demaasi, salminii on.
51004015	Salminanee lan musiɓɓe wonɓe Laa'udiisa ɓen, kaɲun e oo debbo wi'eteeɗo Nimfaasi, e moftal wongal ka suudu makko ngal.
51004016	Si nduu ɓatakuru jangaama ka mon, etee kadi no ndu jangiree ka moftal wongal Laa'udiisa. Jangon kadi iwranayndu on ndun Laa'udiisa.
51004017	Wi'on kadi oo wi'eteeɗo Arkiipe yo o eto no o timminira ɗee golle ɗe o heɓiri Joomiraaɗo on.
51004018	Min Puulusa, mi salminirii on jungo an ngon tigi. Awa anditee fii jolokooje an ɗen. Yo moƴƴere wonan on.
52001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, wondude e Silaasi e Timotee, haa e ngal moftal wongal Tesalonii, humondirɓe e Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on. Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on.
52001002	Meɗen duumii e jarnugol Alla fii mon on fow, e meɗen anditude fii mon on fow e nder torndeeji amen ɗin.
52001003	Meɗen anditude soono woo yeeso Alla, on Ben men, kuuɗe gomɗinal mon ngal e golle giggol mon ngol e tama'u mo catorɗon e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
52001004	Meɗen andi, yo musiɓɓe ɓe Alla yiɗi, ko on suɓaaɓe,
52001005	ko fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo men woni feɲɲinde on, men addiranaali on mo kongol tun, kono ko wondude e bawgal e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on e hoolaare mawnde. E hiɗon andi-le no men wondirnoo e mon fii nafa mon.
52001006	Onon kadi on ɲembii men, on ɲembii Joomi on. Hay e nder tampereeji mon ɗuuɗuɗi ɗin, on jaɓirii daaluyee on weltaare iwrunde e Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
52001007	Ko ɗun waɗi, on wonii ɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen Masedonii e Akaaya fow ɲembinta.
52001008	Ko fii daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on lollirii immorde ka mon, hinaa non e hoore Masedonii e Akaaya tun, kono gomɗinal mon ngal e Alla andike nokkeeli ɗin fow, haa ka tawata hewtaa ka men wowla fii mun.
52001009	No sifeede fii jaɓɓo ngo men jaɓɓaa ka mon ngon, e ko honno tuubiranɗon Alla, yiltiɗon e ɓaawo sanamuuji fii rewugol Alla Wuuruɗo Goongaajo on,
52001010	e fii habbagol ka kammuuli on Ɓiɗɗo makko, mo o immintini e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, ɗun ko Iisaa, on Jattinɗo en tikkere aroyaynde nden.
52002001	Hiɗon andi onon tigi, yo musiɓɓe, ardu amen ndun ka mon wonaali meerenteeru.
52002002	Kono ɓawto men tampude, men tampinee e ndee saare wi'eteende Filipii, wano andirɗon non, men ƴetti hoolaare e Alla men on fii feɲɲinangol on Kibaaru Moƴƴo Alla on e nder tippiro mawngo.
52002003	E hoore ɗun, waajuuji amen ɗin hinaa e palji iwri, maa e anniyeeji bonɗi, maa e ƴoyre,
52002004	kono ɓay Alla tawii meɗen foddi e halfineede Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ko ɗun waɗi si men yewtirtaa no welirta yimɓe ɓen, kono ko no welirta Alla, on ndarndotooɗo ɓerɗe amen ɗen.
52002005	E hoore ɗun, hiɗon andi men ɗayniraali on mantirgol konguɗi, miile kadi ardaaki men, Alla ko seedee e ɗun.
52002006	E men ɗaɓɓaali kadi yo yimɓe ɓen teddin men, woni onon, woni heddiiɓe ɓen.
52002007	Hay si men waawayno hollude on mbawdi sabu ko men sahaabaaɓe Almasiihu on, men waɗaali ɗun. Kono fewndo men wondi e mon, men holli on newaare, wano neene dankorta ɓiɓɓe mun.
52002008	E nder giggol ngol men joganii on ngol, meɗen yiɗunoo yeɗugol on Kibaaru Moƴƴo Alla on, kono kadi ngurndan amen ɗan tigi, hakkee ko men yiɗi on.
52002009	Onon on anditii, yo musiɓɓe, golle amen ɗen e yangi amen kin fewndo men feɲɲinannoo on Kibaaru Moƴƴo Alla on, men gollirno jemma e ɲalorma, fii wota men wonan hay gooto e mon dongal.
52002010	Ko on seedee, Alla kadi ko seedee, men wonirno e noone laaɓuɗo e no feewiri e no felnoraa telen-ma mon, onon gomɗinɓe ɓen.
52002011	Hiɗon andi kadi men woniranno kala e mon wano baaba woniranta fayɓe mun.
52002012	Men waajino on, men wakkilini on, men jeeji on yo on wuurir noone no welirta Alla, on Nodduɗo on ka laamateeri mun e ka mangu mun.
52002013	E hino ko men duumori e jarnugol Alla kon: e nder jaɓugol mon daaluyee mo men feɲɲinannoo on on, on jaɓiraano mo wa iwruɗo e neɗɗanke, kono on jaɓirno mo wa daaluyee Alla, no o woniri haqiiqa non, ko on daaluyee woni gollude e mon onon gomɗinɓe ɓen.
52002014	On ɓanginno ɗun, yo musiɓɓe, e nder ɲembugol mon mofte Alla wonɗe ka diiwal Yahuuda ɗen, ɗe tawata ko Iisaa Almasiihu on jeyi, ko fii onon kadi on tampuno e juuɗe ɲokondooɓe mon ɓen sifa tampereeji ɗi Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen tampinnoo ɗen mofte ɗin.
52002015	Ko ɓen wari Iisaa Joomi on, wari annabaaɓe ɓen, cukkii men, ɗun ko ɓen ɓe welataa Alla, wonɓe ayɓe yimɓe ɓen fow.
52002016	Hiɓe fanni men yewtugol ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen fii wota ɓen dande, ko nii ɓe jokkiri hebbingol junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin. Kono tikkere Alla nden sakkitori nangugol ɓe.
52002017	Menen, telen-ma amen yo musiɓɓe, e nder ko men seedunoo e mon kon e nder saa'ihun e ɓandu, kono hinaa e ɓernde, hakkee ko men marnoo faale tiiɗuɗo fii yi'itugol on, men etino fii ɗun fota.
52002018	Ko ɗun waɗi si men faalano yahude ka mon, tentinii min Puulusa, mi etino ɗun ɓuri nde wootere. Kono Ibuliisa hanni men.
52002019	E hara hinaa onon woni tama'u amen on e weltaare amen nden e meetelol darja amen on yeeso Iisaa Joomi men on ɲande ardu makko ndun?
52002020	Hiiyii, ko onon woni darja amen on e weltaare amen nden!
52003001	Ko ɗun waɗi si men wawtaano hande kadi habbagol ko ɓuri nii, men tawi no ɓurani men ka men wona menen tun ka saare Atiina,
52003002	men imminana on oo musiɗɗo amen inneteeɗo Timotee, on wondiɗɗo amen e nder golle Alla ɗen e hoore feɲɲingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on. Men fawi mo tiiɗingol on e wakkilingol on ka gomɗinal mon,
52003003	fii wota hay gooto dilline e nder tampereeji fewndiiɗi ɗin. Ko fii onon tigi hiɗon andi ko ɗun muuyanaɗen.
52003004	Fewndo ko men wonnoo takko mon, men wowlanayno on wonde en heɓay satteendeeji, ko ɗun woni ko hewti, hiɗon andi.
52003005	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay mi waawataano habbaade hande kadi, mi imminii Timotee fii humpitagol gomɗinal mon ngal, miɗo hulunoo wota taw no gasa hara jarribotooɗo on faljinii on, tawa golle amen ɗen wonii meere.
52003006	Awa Timotee ko e hewtitude woni ka amen iwrude ka mon, o addoranii men kibaaru moƴƴo fii gomɗinal mon ngal e giggol mon ngol. O innii men, tigi-tigi on, hiɗon joganii men maande moƴƴere, awa kadi hiɗon himmani yi'ugol men, wano men himmirani yi'ugol on non.
52003007	E hoore ɗun, e nder satteende amen nden fow e tampere amen nden, yo musiɓɓe, men wakkilinaama sabu gomɗinal mon ngal.
52003008	Jooni non hiɗen wuuri, ko fii hiɗon tabiti few e Joomiraaɗo on.
52003009	E hara ko honno men waawata jarnirde Alla fii mon, fii ndee weltaare nde weltinɗon men yeeso makko fow?
52003010	Ko ɗun waɗi, jemma e ɲalorma meɗen toraade mo e nder tentingol fii yo o newnan men yi'itugol on, timmintina ko ŋakki e gomɗinal mon ngal kon.
52003011	Yo Alla Ben men on tigi, e Iisaa Joomi men on, udditan men laawol haa ka mon.
52003012	Awa kadi yo Joomiraaɗo on hebbin giggol hakkundeeji mon haa feƴƴita, e telen-ma yimɓe ɓen fow, hara kadi ko sifa giggol ngol men joganii on ngol.
52003013	Yo o tabintinir nii ɓerɗe mon ɗen fii no woniron laaɓuɓe e ɓe felnaaki yeeso Alla Baabaajo men on, ka ɲalaande nde Iisaa Joomi men on aroyta e mun wondude e laaɓuɓe mun ɓen fow.
52004001	Ka rawnoode, yo musiɓɓe, on andirii men ko honno gasirton wonirde fii no weliron Alla, e hin-le ko non wonirɗon. Jooni men torike on, men jeejii, sabu humondiral men e Iisaa Joomi on, ɓeydee yaarude yeeso soono woo e ɗen baŋŋe.
52004002	Ko fii hiɗon andi janndeeji ɗi men janni on ɗin immorde e Iisaa Joomi on.
52004003	Ko Alla faalaa ko yo on laato laaɓuɓe, e fii yo on woɗɗito jinaa,
52004004	e yo mo kala e mon waawu jogitaade ɓandu mun ndun e nder laaɓal e teddungal,
52004005	e ɓaawo accugol faaleeji wonkii foola ɗun, wano ɓe gomɗinaa andaa Alla ɓen gerdata non.
52004006	E telen-ma ɗun, wota hay gooto bonnu musiɗɗo mun maa huutora mo ƴoyre, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on yoɓay sifa ɗin noone ellaaji fow. Hari men wowlaniino on ɗun, men hajike on e ɗun.
52004007	Ko fii Alla noddiraali en wuurirgol angal laaɓal, kono ko wuurirgol laaɓal.
52004008	Ko ɗun waɗi, on bugitiiɗo ngal gandal, haray hinaa neɗɗo o bugitii, kono ko Alla, on Yeɗuɗo on Ruuhu mun Seniiɗo on.
52004009	E telen-ma giggol siɗɗankaaku musiɓɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen, on hatonjinaa e windaneede fii ɗun, ko fii Alla tigi wawnii on yiɗindirgol.
52004010	Ko ɗun kadi wonɗon waɗude e fee musiɓɓe men ɓen fow e nder Masedonii no didori, kono men wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe, ɓeydugol kadi.
52004011	Himmanon wuurirgol ɓuttu, jokkon haajuuji mon ɗin tigi, golliron juuɗe mon ɗen, wano men yamiriri on non.
52004012	Ɗun ko fii no woniron feewuɓe e telen-ma ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hara on wonataa dongal hay gooto.
52004013	Men faalaaka, yo musiɓɓe, yo on ronku andude fii mayɓe ɓen, fii wota on heɓu sokola, wano ɓeya ɓe alaa tama'u ɓen.
52004014	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay hiɗen gomɗini Iisaa maayii, awa kadi o immintinaama, hiɗen gomɗini kadi Alla artiray maayuɓe no gomɗini Iisaa ɓen wondude e makko.
52004015	Awa e hino ko men wi'ata on, ɗun non ko e kongol Joomi on iwri: enen wurɓe ɓen, luttituɓe haa ɲande ardu Joomi on, en adotaako mayɓe ɓen artireede.
52004016	Ko fii, Joomi on tigi iwray ka kammu, tippoda e yamiroore ewnaande e hawa malaa'ikaajo mawɗo e hito liital Alla ngal. Onsay ko maayuɓe no gomɗini Almasiihu on ɓen adetee immintineede.
52004017	Ɓawto ɗun, enen wurɓe luttitayɓe ɓen, en ƴettidete e maɓɓe ka nder duule, fii fottoygol e Joomi on ka weeyo. Onsay en wonday e Joomi on haa poomaa.
52004018	Awa wakkilindiree rewrude e ɗii konguɗi.
52005001	Fii ɲalaaɗe ɗen e saa'iiji ɗin, on hatonjinaa e windaneede fii ɗun, yo musiɓɓe.
52005002	Ko fii onon tigi hiɗon andi few ɲalaande Joomi on arday wa nde ngujjo no ara jemma.
52005003	Nde yimɓe wi'i: «Ɓuttu ngun tabitii, tawa kadi masiibo alaa!», ko onsay halakuyee on arata heɲa, yana e maɓɓe wa nde ŋata fiɗi debbo reeduujo, hara ɓe daɗataa-le few.
52005004	Kono onon, yo musiɓɓe, on alaa e nder niwre nden haa ka nden ɲalaande juhira on wa ngujjo.
52005005	On fow ko on ɓiɓɓe ndaygu ngun e ɓiɓɓe ɲalorma on. Hinaa en ɓe jemma on maa niwre nden.
52005006	Awa, wota en ɗaanor wa ɓeya, kono wattanen yiila, wonen hakkilanɓe.
52005007	Ɗaanotooɓe ɓen ɗaanoto jemma, mandilooɓe ɓen ko jemma mandilirta.
52005008	Kono enen yimɓe ɲalorma ɓen, wonen hakkilanɓe, ɓornoɗen hiwitorgo gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol, hippoɗen kunnawal tama'u kisiyee on.
52005009	Ko fii Alla muuyanaali en tikkere makko nden, kono ko fii no heɓiren kisiyee rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on,
52005010	on mayɗo fii men, fii, woni hiɗen ɗaanii, woni en ɗaanaaki, no wuuridiren e makko.
52005011	Awa, wakkilindiree, tiiɗindiron, wano wonɗon warrude non fewndo ɗoo.
52005012	Men torike on, yo musiɓɓe, anditanee wonɓe gollude hakkunde mon ɓen, ɓen ɓe Joomiraaɗo on suɓii ko ardoo on, hajoo on.
52005013	Joganoɗon ɓe teddungal tiiɗungal e giggol, sabu kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen. Yo ɓuttu wonu hakkunde mon.
52005014	Men yamirii on, yo musiɓɓe, hajee puyɓe ɓen, wakkilinon aamituɓe ɓen, wallitoɗon lo'uɓe ɓen, wonon muɲɲiiɓe e fee wonɗo woo.
52005015	Wattanon yiila fii wota hay gooto yoɓir bone bone, kono waɗee soono woo ko moƴƴi, woni non ko e hakkunde mon, woni e telen-ma wonɗo woo.
52005016	Wonee saa'i kala weltiiɓe,
52005017	duumoɗon e toragol,
52005018	jarnee Alla e fee kala ko woni, ko fii ko ɗun woni faale Alla on fii mon, onon ɓee humondirɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
52005019	Wota on faaɗinan Ruuhu Allaahu on.
52005020	Wota on hayfin konguɗi ɗi Alla longini gomɗinɓe ɓen,
52005021	kono taskee kala huunde, jogitoɗon ko moƴƴi kon.
52005022	Reenoɗon e bone, noone woo no o wa'i.
52005023	Yo Alla Jom Ɓuttu on waɗu on yimɓe makko ko timmi, e yo o reenu on e baŋŋeeji ɗin fow, ɗun ko ruuhu mon on e wonkii mon kin e ɓandu mon ndun, fii wota on wonu felniiɓe ɲande ardu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
52005024	Ko fii on Nodduɗo on ko Sella-Findeejo, awa kadi ko on woni Timminoyoowo ɗun fow.
52005025	Musiɓɓe, awa toranee men menen kadi.
52005026	Salminiree musiɓɓe ɓen fow hirbondiral laaɓungal.
52005027	Mi torike on e innde Joomi on: yo musiɓɓe ɓen fow jangu nduu ɓatakuru.
52005028	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on wonu e mon.
53001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, wondude e Silaasi e Timotee, haa e ngal moftal wongal Tesalonii humondirngal e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on:
53001002	yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
53001003	Meɗen haani, yo musiɓɓe, duumaade e jarnugol Alla fii mon, ɗun-le ko ko feewi, ko fii gomɗinal mon ngal no ɓeydaade, awa kadi giggol ngol yiɗindirɗon ngol ko e ɓeydaade tun woni.
53001004	E hoore ɗun, meɗen mantorde on e nder mofte Alla ɗen, sabu ŋaɲɲaare mon nden e gomɗinal mon ngal e nder cukkanɗe ɗe cukkaɗon ɗen fow e satteendeeji ɗi wakkiliɗon ɗin.
53001005	Awa, ko ɗunɗoo woni seedee ɲaawoore Alla feewunde nden, fii no woniron rinɗanɓe laamu Alla ngu wonɗon tampande ngun.
53001006	Ko fii no feewi yeeso Alla ka o yottorana on ɓee wonɓe on tampinde tampere,
53001007	e ka o yeɗa on ɓuttu, onon tampinaaɓe ɓen, wondude e amen, nde Iisaa Joomi on feeɲoyi ka kammu, wondude e malaa'ikaaɓe dolnuɓe ɓen
53001008	e hakkunde joyngol yiite, fii yaggingol ɓe andaa Alla ɓen e ɓe ɗoftanooki Kibaaru Moƴƴo Iisaa Joomi men on.
53001009	Ɓe lettiree halakuyee poomayankeejo, ɓe woɗɗitoo Joomi on e mangu bawgal makko ngal
53001010	nde o aroyi e nden ɲalaande, fii yo o darjine immorde e laaɓuɓe makko ɓen, o mugina gomɗinɓe ɓen fow. Onon kadi, on gomɗinii ko men seeditanii on kon.
53001011	Ko ɗun waɗi, meɗen duumaade e toranagol on, fii no Alla men on waɗira on rinɗanɓe ngurndan ɗan o noddiri on ɗan, e no o laatinira e mon kala eɓɓooje moƴƴe e kuuɗe gomɗinal mon ngal tippude e bawgal makko ngal,
53001012	fii no innde Iisaa Joomi men on mawniniree e mon, e no onon kadi mawninireɗon e makko, sabu sulfu Alla men on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
53002001	Fii ardu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, e mottondiral men ngal e makko, men torike on, yo musiɓɓe,
53002002	wota on jaɓu ɓerɗe mon yaawee jiiɓeede, maa aaninireɗon wi'ugol ɲalaande Joomi on hewtii. Hay si goɗɗo wi'ii on ko Alla longini men maa ko nelal maa ko ɓatakuru ko iwri e amen, wota on hulu.
53002003	Wota hay gooto faljinir on noone woo, ko fii nden ɲalaande arataa ado murtaldu ndun waɗude, e feeɲugol aaden bonɗo on, on muuyanaaɗo hayrugol,
53002004	ɗun ko on dartotooɗo immoo daroo e hoore kala ko neɗɗanke inni ko alla e hoore kala ko rewetee, o yaha haa o jooɗoyoo ka juulirde Alla mawnde, o wi'itoo kanko tigi Alla.
53002005	On anditaali miɗo wowlanaynoo on ɗun, wa fewndo ko mi wondi e mon?
53002006	Jooni non hiɗon andi tigi ko tongi mo, fii yo o feeɲu e saa'i makko on,
53002007	ko fii fewndo ɗoo, doole bonɗe suuɗiiɗe ɗen no gollude, ko woni tun fewndo ɗoo goɗɗo no haɗi ɗe taho haa o dira.
53002008	Ko onsay non aaden bonɗo on feeɲata. Iisaa Joomi on muliray mo wuttugol, o muncira mo jalbeendi ardu makko ndun kanko Iisaa.
53002009	On aaden bonɗo ardoyay e kuuɗe Ibuliisa, o waɗa noone kaawakeeji e maandeeji e kuuɗe fenaandeeje,
53002010	o huutoray kala noone bone fii faayingol wonɓe mulude ɓen, ɓay ɓe jaɓaali yiɗude goonga on fii no ɓe dandiree.
53002011	Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla kadi accidi ɓe e doole ɗaynooje fii no ɓe gomɗinira fenaande nden,
53002012	fii no yiɗuɓe angal peewal ngal, gomɗinaali goonga on ɓen ɲaawiree.
53002013	Telen-ma amen menen, yo musiɓɓe ɓe Joomiraaɗo on yiɗi, meɗen haani duumaade e jarnugol Alla fii mon, ko fii Allaahu on suɓino on gila ka fuɗɗoode fii kisiyee on, e hoore laɓɓinirgol on Ruuhu Allaahu on e gomɗingol goonga on.
53002014	Ko ɗun o noddiri on Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo men feɲɲinani on on, fii no heɓiron geɓal ka mangu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
53002015	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe, wonee tabituɓe, jogitoɗon janndeeji ɗi men janni on ɗin, woni non ko e konguɗi, woni e ɓataake.
53002016	Yo Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on tigi, e Alla Baaba men, on Yiɗuɗo en, yeɗi en wakkilaare poomayankeere e tama'u moƴƴo immorde e sulfu makko on,
53002017	wakkilin ɓerɗe mon ɗen, tabintina on e kala kuugal e kala kongol moƴƴol.
53003001	Ka rawnoode, yo musiɓɓe, toranee men fii no daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on lollira e no mawniniree, wano o lolliri e mawniri ka mon non,
53003002	fii no men dandiree ɓoyliiɓe ɓen e bonɓe ɓen, ko fii hinaa fow mari gomɗinal.
53003003	Kono Joomiraaɗo on ko Sella-Findeejo, o tabintinay on, o hisina on bonɗo on.
53003004	Joomiraaɗo on no okki men hoolaare e telen-ma mon wonde hiɗon waɗude, on waɗoyay kadi ko men yamiri on kon.
53003005	Yo Joomiraaɗo on ardo ɓerɗe mon ɗen e fee giggol iwrungol e Alla e ŋaɲɲaare iwrunde e Almasiihu on.
53003006	Men yamirii on e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, yo musiɓɓe, yo on woɗɗito kala musiɗɗo wuuruɗo e nder puyndan, ko yaadaa e jannde nde hendorɗon men nden.
53003007	Ko fii hiɗon andi onon tigi ko honno ɲembirton men, ko fii men wuuriraali puyndan hakkunde mon.
53003008	Men jaɓaali goɗɗo fawtoo men ɲaametee nii tun, kono ko e nder golle sattuɗe e yangi men golliri jemma e ɲalorma, fii wota men wonan hay gooto e mon dongal.
53003009	Wonaa fii hari ɗun no haanani men men waɗiri ɗun, kono men faalano on accirde menen tigi noone mo ɲembon.
53003010	E hoore ɗun, fewndo ko men wonnoo ka mon, men waɗanno on ndee yamiroore ɗoo: kala on saliiɗo gollude, wota ɲaamu kadi!
53003011	E hin-le men nanii woɓɓe e hakkunde mon no jokki puyndan, hiɓe jokki ko wonaa haaju maɓɓe edii ɓe gollude.
53003012	Men torike ɓen yimɓe, men jeejirii ɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, yo ɓe gollu e nder ɓuttu, ɓe ɲaama ko ɓe to'ani hoore maɓɓe kon.
53003013	Onon non, yo musiɓɓe, wota ɓerɗe mon maayan waɗugol ko moƴƴi.
53003014	On mo ɗoftaaki ko men wi'i kon e nduu ɓatakuru, haray maandinee fii makko. Wota on huuwondir e makko huuwondiral woo, fii yo o hersu.
53003015	Wota on jogor mo non wa gaɲo, kono hajoree mo wa musiɗɗo mon.
53003016	Yo Joomiraaɗo, Jom Ɓuttu on, yeɗu on ɓuttu kanko tigi saa'i kala e noone kala. Yo Joomiraaɗo on wondu e mon on fow.
53003017	Min Puulusa, mi salminirii on jungo an ngon tigi. Ko maande an nden woni e nder ɓataake an ɗen fow, e hino bindi an ɗin.
53003018	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on wonu e mon on fow.
54001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla, on Danduɗo en, e Iisaa Almasiihu, on wonɗo tama'u men, yamiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on.
54001002	Mi salminii ma yo Timotee, an oo ɓiɗɗo an e nder gomɗinal. Yo Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on yeɗe moƴƴere e yurmeende e ɓuttu.
54001003	Wano mi wakkilinirno-maa non wonugol Efeesi ɗon, fewndo ko mi fokkiti Masedonii, fii yo a yamir woɓɓe goo wota ɓe jannu janndeeji goo,
54001004	e wota ɓe cato e tindi mehi e lasilankaaku ngu lannataa, ko memminta yeddondire, hara hinaa waɗugol golle Alla ɗen e nder gomɗinal.
54001005	Ko woni faandaare ndee yamiroore, ko yiɗirgol ɓernde laaɓunde e fondo moƴƴo e gomɗinal ngal aldaa e faasiqankaaku.
54001006	Woɓɓe ɓen sortii e ɗen pehe, ukkii e haalaaji mehi,
54001007	hara hiɓe faalaa wonude jannooɓe fii Sariya on, e hin-le ɓe faamanaa hay ko ɓe woni wi'ude kon, e ko ɓe woni tentinde fii mun kon.
54001008	Hiɗen andi tigi wonde Sariya on no moƴƴi, kono ko e hoore jogitorgol mo no haaniri.
54001009	Awa kadi anden Sariya on waɗiraaka fii feewuɓe ɓen, kono ko fii bonɓe ɓen e dartiiɓe ɓen e heeferɓe ɓen e junuubankeeɓe ɓen e ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen e hayfinooɓe fii Alla ɓen e warooɓe ben mun e yumma mun ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen
54001010	e jeenooɓe ɓen e worɓe jinooɓe worɓe e yeeyooɓe yimɓe e fenooɓe e woondooɓe fenaande ɓen e kala waɗooɓe kuuɗe woopondirɗe e jannde haqiiqaare nden.
54001011	Ndee jannde no yaadi e Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo o halfinimmi on, on ɓanginɗo mangural Alla moƴƴo on.
54001012	Mi jarnii on yeɗɗinɗo lan, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, jogitorɗo lan wa holniiɗo, toɗɗii mi e ɗee golle makko,
54001013	min oo hoynaynooɗo, cukkotonooɗo, yennaynooɗo. Kono mi yurminaa, ko fii ko mi wonnoo warrude ɗun, ko angal gandal e angal gomɗinal.
54001014	Joomiraaɗo on yeɗii lan moƴƴere no yaajiri, wondude e gomɗinal e giggol ko woni e Iisaa Almasiihu on kon.
54001015	Ngol kongol ɗoo ko haqiiqawol, hingol handi e jaɓeede few, ngol-le e hino ngol: Iisaa Almasiihu on ko ardi ka aduna ko dandugol junuubanke'en. Min non ko mi ɓurɗo bonde e ɓen.
54001016	Kono mi yurminaa, fii no Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓanginira e an, min oo ɓurɗo bonde, yondinaare makko nden fow, fii no mi wonira misal e gomɗinoyooɓe e makko ɓen, ɓe heɓa ngurndan poomayankejan.
54001017	Teddungal e mangu wonanii Lanɗo poomayankeejo, mo maayataa, mo yi'otaako, Alla bajjo, haa poomaa. Aamiina!
54001018	Ndee yamiroore nde mi yamir-maa, yo Timotee ɓiɗɗo an, wano hiitoraa fii maa non, ko yo a tippir tippiro moƴƴo ngon
54001019	e nder gomɗinal wondude e ɓernde laaɓunde. Nden ɓernde laaɓunde non woɓɓe ɓen tertike nde, haa ka tawata gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal yoolike.
54001020	No tawaa e ɓen Himenee e Aleksander, ɓen ɓe mi accidi e Ibuliisa fii jannugol ɓe wota ɓe hoynu Alla.
54002001	Ko adii kon taho, miɗo torii yo en landano yimɓe ɓen fow ballal Alla, waɗanen ɓe torndeeji e du'aaji e yettooje Alla,
54002002	waɗanen ɗun kadi lamɓe e kala yeesooɓe, fii no wuuriren ngurndan newiiɗan e ɓuttuɗan wano Alla faaliraa non e hoore teddungal.
54002003	Ko ɗun woni ko moƴƴi, ko welata Alla, Danduɗo en on,
54002004	on Yiɗuɗo yo yimɓe ɓen fow dande, ɓe ara e andugol goonga on.
54002005	Ko fii ko Alla gooto woodi, no woodi kadi moƴƴintinoowo gooto hakkunde makko e yimɓe ɓen, ɗun ko oo neɗɗo wi'eteeɗo Iisaa Almasiihu,
54002006	on sakkiiɗo hoore mun fii sottugol fow, ɗun ko seedee waɗaaɗo e saa'i toɗɗaaɗo on.
54002007	Ko fii feɲɲingol on seedee waɗi si mi waɗiraa waajotooɗo e yottinoowo, (mi wowlay goonga, mi fenataa), fii ko janna ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen ko woni gomɗinal goongawal ngal kon.
54002008	Miɗo yiɗi kadi yo worɓe ɓen toro Alla ka woni woo, e hoore townugol juuɗe laaɓuɗe e ɓaawo tikkere e yeddondiral.
54002009	Rewɓe ɓen kadi wano non, ɓe ɓornora no haaniri, hara hinaa no maniree e no hawnori, hara ɓe ukkaaki e morɗi hawniiɗi e cuɗorgol kaŋŋe e koɗe hittuɗe, maa conci satta-cogguuji,
54002010	kono ko waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe, hara ko yaaduɗe e kuuɗe rewɓe qirritiiɓe rewugol Alla.
54002011	Awa kadi yo debbo jangu e nder deeƴere e yankinaare timmunde.
54002012	Mi yamiraali non debbo jannugol, maa laamagol gorko, kono ko yo o deeƴu.
54002013	Ko fii ko Aadama adaa tageede, si Hawaa hikki ɗon.
54002014	Awa kadi wonaa Aadama ɗaynanoo, kono ko debbo on ɗaynanoo, o bonni yamiroore Alla nden.
54002015	Kono fow e mun, debbo dandirte jiidi mun ndin si o duumike e nder gomɗinal ngal e giggol e laaɓal no haaniri.
54003001	No wi'aa: on mo no yelii wonugol yeesoojo ka moftal Alla, haray ontigi ko huunde moƴƴere woni ko faalaa. Ngol kongol ko haqiiqawol.
54003002	Kono fow e mun yo taw ardotooɗo on ko neɗɗo mo felnaaki, hara ko yondinorɗo debbo gooto, waawuɗo hoore mun, hara wonaa uɓɓitoowo, hara ko o teddintooɗo, wernoowo hoɓɓe, waawuɗo jannude,
54003003	hara hinaa yaroowo mandila, hinaa ɲaaɗuɗo, kono hara ko o newiiɗo, hara hinaa yeddondirteeɗo, hara ko mo haajaaka e ngaluuji aduna,
54003004	hara ko ardotooɗo moƴƴa ɓeynguure mun nden tigi, e ne'uɗo fayɓe mun ɓen, hara hiɓe yankinanii mo e nder teddungal timmungal.
54003005	Ko fii si goɗɗo waawataa ardaade ɓeynguure mun nden tigi, haray ko honno ontigi waawata dankorde moftal Alla ngal?
54003006	Yo taw wonaa gomɗinɗo kesun, fii wota o heewu townitaare, haa o yana e ɲaawoore nde Ibuliisa ɲaawaa nden.
54003007	Bee o heɓira ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen kadi seeditoore moƴƴere, fii wota o heɓu feloore, o yana e pircol Ibuliisa.
54003008	Wallitotooɓe moftal ngal ɓen kadi wano non, hiɓe haani wonude tedduɓe, woɗɗitiiɓe faasiqiyaagal e njaram feƴƴituɗan e ɗaɓɓirgol miile.
54003009	Hiɓe haani humaade e goonga lugguɗo gomɗinal ngal e nder ɓernde laaɓunde.
54003010	Kamɓe kadi non hiɓe haanaa ndarndeede taho, onsay non si tawii hay huunde alaa ko ɓe feliree, ɓe waɗa non ɗen golle.
54003011	Rewɓe ɓen kadi wano non, yo ɓe wonu tedduɓe, hara ɓe wonaali ɲo'ooɓe, ɓe wona waawuɓe hoore maɓɓe e sella-findeeɓe e kala huunde.
54003012	Wallitotooɗo on no haani tawde ko yondinorɗo debbo gooto, e ne'irɗo ɓiɓɓe mun ɓen e ɓeynguure mun nden no moƴƴiri.
54003013	Ko fii kala wallitotooɗo, golluɗo ɗen golle no moƴƴiri, heɓoyay teddungal tiiɗungal e hoolaare mawnde ka gomɗingol makko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
54003014	Mi windanii ma ɗunɗoo e hoore tanƴinagol mi yahay ka maa ko neeɓaa.
54003015	Kono si mi aru e tongaade, ɗun a anday ko honno haanuɗaa wuurirde ka suudu Alla, ndun-le ko moftal Alla Wuuruɗo on, doosal e ɓalal goonga on.
54003016	Awa kadi no fellitaa wonde gundoo ngal dewal no mawni: «Ɗun ko on feeɲirɗo ɓandu, holliraaɗo Ruuhu Alla ko o feewuɗo, feeɲanɗo malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, on jantaaɗo fii mun e hakkunde leƴƴi ɗin, o gomɗinaa e nder aduna on, o ƴentinaa ka kammu e nder mangural.»
54004001	Kono Ruuhu Allaahu on no holli no laaɓiri wonde, ka saa'iiji sakkitori woɓɓe ɓen tertoyto gomɗinal ngal fii jokkugol ruuhuuji ɗaynayɗi e janndeeji jinna,
54004002	ɓe ɗayniree faasiqankaaku e waajuuji fenaandeeji, tawa ɓernde maɓɓe nden no jukkiniraa wa ko sunniraa njanɗe wojjiniraaɗe yiite.
54004003	Ɓen yimɓe wi'oyay wota dese waɗu, ɓe harmina ɲaameteeji ɗi Alla waɗi fii yo gomɗinɓe ɓen e anduɓe goonga on ɓen ɲaamu e nder jarnugol mo ɗin.
54004004	Hara-le ko Alla tagi kon fow no moƴƴi, huunde wonaa ko bugitetee. Ko jarnugol tun Alla nde hiɗen huutora.
54004005	Ko fii ko Alla tagi kon fow no laɓɓiniraa daaluyee on e toraare.
54004006	Si a weeɓitanii ɗun musiɓɓe ɓen, a wonanay Iisaa Almasiihu on kurkaadu moƴƴuru, eltiraaɗo daaluyeeji gomɗinal ngal wondude e janndeeji moƴƴi ɗi jokkuɗaa ɗin tigi.
54004007	Kono an, bugito taali neɗɗanke mehi ɗi yummiraaɓe yewtata. Eltiraa hoore maa wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non.
54004008	Ko fii eltugol ɓandu ndun ko seeɗa nafi, kono wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non kan no wondi e nafa e nooneeji ɗin fow, no wondi kadi e fodaari ngurndan fewndiiɗan ɗan e aroyayɗan ɗan.
54004009	Ngol ko kongol haqiiqawol, handungol e jaɓeede few wano ngol woniri non.
54004010	Ko wonɗen gollirde tippira, ko fii en waɗii tama'u men on e Alla Wuuruɗo on, on Dandoowo yimɓe ɓen fow, tentinii gomɗinɓe ɓen.
54004011	E hino ko haanuɗaa yamirde, janna kon.
54004012	Wota hay gooto yawo ma fii ko a suka, kono wonan gomɗinɓe ɓen misal e kongol e jikku e giggol e gomɗinal e laaɓal.
54004013	Ɗoo e mi arude, cato e jangangol yimɓe ɓen daaluyee on, waajoɗaa ɓe, jannaa ɓe.
54004014	Wota a weddito e dokkal maa ngal, ngal yeɗiranoɗaa hiitaango ngal, fewndo ko ardotooɓe moftal ngal fawi juuɗe e hoore maa.
54004015	Huutor, wonaa e ɗun tun, fii no golle maa ɗen ɓangirana fow.
54004016	Wattaa yiila e hoore maa e ko jannataa kon e nder cataare. Ko fii si a waɗirii non, a danday hoore maa, dandaa heɗotooɓe ma ɓen.
54005001	Awa kadi wota a felir nayeejo no sattiri, kono waajor mo wa si ko o ben maa, sukaaɓe worɓe ɓen kadi wa miɲɲiraaɓe maa,
54005002	rewɓe nayeeɓe ɓen kadi wa neeniraaɓe maa, jiwɓe ɓen kadi wa bandiraaɓe maa e nder laaɓal timmungal.
54005003	Teddinaa kadi keynguuɓe ɓen, hara ko keynguuɓe ɓe alaa ballo ɓen.
54005004	Si keynguujo no mari ɓiɓɓe maa taaniraaɓe, yo ɓen ekkito taho wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non e telen-ma ɗankagol ɓeynguure maɓɓe nden tigi, ko nii ɓe yoɓitirta mawɓe maɓɓe ɓen, ko fii ɗun no wela Alla.
54005005	Keynguujo tigi-tigiijo mo alaa ballo on no waɗi tama'u mun on e Alla, duumii e toragol mo jemma e ɲalorma.
54005006	Kono keynguujo jokkuɗo mbeleeɗe ko mayɗo, fii kala himo wuuri.
54005007	Ko ɗunɗoo haanuɗaa waajaade fii wota ɓen keynguuɓe wonu felniiɓe.
54005008	On mo dankaaki siɓɓe mun ɓen, tentinii ɓeynguure mun nden, haray o bugitike gomɗinal ngal, awa kadi haray hay mo gomɗinaa no ɓuri mo.
54005009	Fii yo keynguujo windodu e keynguuɓe haanaaɓe walliteede ɓen, yo taw ko fanɗi woo himo mari duuɓi cappanɗe jeegoo, hara kadi ko yondinornooɗo gorko gooto,
54005010	hara kadi ko andiraaɗo kuuɗe moƴƴe, wano ne'ugol fayɓe, wernugol kadi hoɓɓe, sembugol koyɗe yimɓe Alla ɓen, wallitagol tampuɓe ɓen, waɗugol kala kuugal moƴƴal.
54005011	Kono wota a jaɓu winditude keynguuɓe hecciɗuɓe ɓen, ko fii nde himmeeji maɓɓe ɗin woɗɗintini ɓe Almasiihu on woo, ɓe faalete ƴetteede,
54005012	ɓe adda ɲaawoore Alla e hoore maɓɓe, sabu ko ɓe firti ahadi maɓɓe araniri ndin kon.
54005013	E hoore ɗun, ɓe wona puyɓe, ɓe wowtinoo naata e nduu, yalta e nduu, ɓe ɓeyda e ɗun ɲooreeji, ɓe wona humpaaɓe, ɓe wona e wowlugol piiji ɗi haanaaka wowleede.
54005014	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'i yo keynguuɓe hecciɗuɓe ɓen ƴette, ɓe heɓa ɓiɓɓe, ɓe ardoo ɓeynguure maɓɓe nden, fii wota en jonnu liddotooɓe en ɓen jolkun woo no ɓe aybinira en.
54005015	Ko fii wuren woɓɓe e maɓɓe murtii, jokkii Ibuliisa.
54005016	Si debbo gomɗinɗo no mari keynguuɓe ka mun, yo o wallito ɓe, hara hinaa moftal ngal fawtii ɓe, fii no moftal ngal waawira wallitorde keynguuɓe ɓe alaa ballo ɓen.
54005017	Ardotooɓe moftal ngal moƴƴa no handi e teddungal sowondirngal, tentinii ɓen wakkiliiɓe yangi waajagol e jannugol.
54005018	Ko fii bindi ɗin no wi'i: «Wota mo buuma hunduko ngaari ndin nde hindi yaaɓana ɗun maaro», awa kadi: «Golloowo no handi e njoddi mun.»
54005019	Wota a jaɓu tooɲe e hoore ardotooɗo woo, si hinaa a heɓu seeditiiɓe ɗiɗo maa tato.
54005020	Duumiiɓe e waɗugol junuubu ɓen, wurtu ɓe e yeeso fow, fii no heddiiɓe ɓen kadi hulira.
54005021	E yeeso Alla e Iisaa Almasiihu on e malaa'ikaaɓe suɓaaɓe ɓen, mi yamirii ma jokkugol ɗee yamirooje e ɓaawo ɓurdindingol maa giɗaale.
54005022	Wota a hawju fawugol juuɗe e hoore hay gooto toɗɗoo mo fii golle Alla ɗen. Wota a tawde e junuubaaji woɓɓe. Reeno, wonaa laaɓuɗo.
54005023	Accu yarugol ndiyan tun, huutoraa kadi njaram wiiɲu seeɗa, sabu nawnahoy reedu maa jokkondirkoy koy.
54005024	Junuubaaji yimɓe goo no feeɲi ado ɓe ɲaaweede, woɓɓe ɓen non ɗi feeɲirii woo yeeso.
54005025	Ko wano non kadi kuuɗe moƴƴe ɗen no feeɲi, hay ɗe feeɲaa ɗen kadi waawataa suuɗaade.
54006001	Yo jiyaaɓe ɓen fow jogor jeyɓe ɗun ɓen wa handuɓe e teddungal timmungal, fii wota innde Alla nden e jannde nden hoyne.
54006002	Ɓen jiyaaɓe, ɓe tawata jeyɓe ɗun ɓen ko gomɗinɓe, ɓe haanaa ka ɓe ronka ɓe teddinde, ɓay ɓen ko musiɓɓe maɓɓe. Kono hiɓe haani ɓurtude kurkanaade ɓe, ko fii ɓen wonɓe nafitorde golle maɓɓe ɗen, ko yiɓɓe maɓɓe gomɗinɓe. Ko ɗun haanuɗaa jannude waajoo.
54006003	Si goɗɗo no jannirde noone goo, hara o alaa jokkude konguɗi selluɗi Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, e janndeeji yaaduɗi e laawol Alla ngol,
54006004	haray on ko townitiiɗo, mo andaa huunde, wonduɗo e nawnaare yeddondiral e pooɗotiro haala. Ko ɗun wonata neene nawliigu e pooɗotiro e hoyre e sikkitaareeji bonɗi,
54006005	e yeddondire ɗe lannataa hakkunde yimɓe ɓe hakkille bonɗe, ɓe andaa goonga, jogorɓe dewal ngal wa ɓundu keɓal.
54006006	Ko goonga, dewal ngal ko tono moolanaaɗo, si tawii en yondinorii ko jogiɗen kon.
54006007	Ko fii en addoraano hay huunde e oo aduna, awa kadi en nattortaa hay huunde.
54006008	Si tawii non hiɗen mari neema e conci, yo ɗun yonu en.
54006009	Kono ɓen faalaaɓe alɗude yanay e nder jarrabuyee, e nder pircol, e faaleeji ɗuuɗuɗi njofooji, bonnayɗi, ko yollata yimɓe ɓen e nder yeebaare e halkaare.
54006010	Ko fii giggol kaalisi ko ɗaɗol kala bone. E nder ko woɓɓe ɓen himmani ɗun kon, ɓe woɗɗitii gomɗinal ngal, ɓe waɗitii kamɓe tigi tampereeji.
54006011	An non, oo aaden Alla, dogu ɗin piiji, ɗaɓɓitaa peewal ngal e wuurirgol no Alla faaliraa non e gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol e wakkilaare nden e newaare nden.
54006012	Tippiraa tippiro moƴƴo fii gomɗinal ngal, catoɗaa e ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan, ɗan noddiraɗaa fii mun ɗan, ɗan qirritorɗaa qirritannde moƴƴere fii mun yeeso seedeeɓe ɗuuɗuɓe.
54006013	Mi yamirii ma e yeeso Alla, on Yeɗoowo ngurndan kala huunde, e yeeso Iisaa Almasiihu on, on seeditorɗo qirritannde mun moƴƴere nden yeeso Pilaatu Pontii lanɗo on,
54006014	ɗofto yamiroore nden e hoore laaɓal e no felnoraa, haa nde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on feeɲi.
54006015	Feeɲugol makko laatoo e saa'i mo Alla happi on, ɗun ko on Yeesoojo bajjo moƴƴo, Lanɗo lamɓe, Koohoojo koohooɓe ɓen,
54006016	on mo tawata ko kaɲun tun woni maayataa, Hoɗuɗo e jalbeendi ndi ɓadotaako, mo goɗɗo woo yi'aali, waawataa yi'ude kadi, on mo teddungal e bawgal wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
54006017	Yamir alɗuɓe ɓen e oo aduna fewndiiɗo, wota ɓe wonu mawnintiniiɓe, wota ɓe faw tama'u maɓɓe on e ngaluuji ɗi luttataa ɗin, kono yo ɓe waɗu tama'u maɓɓe e Alla, on Yeɗoowo en fow haa feƴƴita fii no weltoroyoɗen.
54006018	Yo ɓe waɗu ko moƴƴi, ɓe alɗira kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɓe wona okkooɓe e kafidotooɓe.
54006019	Waɗugol maɓɓe ɗun, ko wa sincugol didol moƴƴol fii ko aroyta kon, e fii no ɓe tamira ngurndan haqiiqajan ɗan.
54006020	Ko an yo Timotee, jogito koo ko halfinaɗaa, e nder reenagol e haalaaji mehi, ɗi yaadaa e faale Alla on, e yeddondire fii gandal fenaandewal,
54006021	e nder ko woɓɓe ɓen humii e ngal gandal kon, ɓe seli gomɗinal ngal. Yo moƴƴere Joomiraaɗo on wonu e mon!
55001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla hoddiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, e telen-ma fodaari ngurndan wonɗan e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɗan.
55001002	Mi salminii maa yo Timotee, an oo boobo an mo mi yiɗi fota. Yo Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on yeɗe moƴƴere e yurmeende e ɓuttu.
55001003	Mi yettii Alla, on mo mi woni rewude, wano baabiraaɓe an ɓen non, e dow ɓernde laaɓunde, e hoore mi alaa yejjitude fii maa e nder torndeeji an ɗin jemma e ɲalorma.
55001004	Ko fii miɗo andita fii gonɗi maa ɗin, awa miɗo faalaa yi'itude ma fota fii no mi heewira weltaare.
55001005	Miɗo andita kadi gomɗinal wongal e maa ngal, ngal aldaa e faasiqankaaku, wonnoongal e pati maa Lowiisi e yumma maa Eniisi, wano mi fellitiri non hingal e maa.
55001006	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wakkilinii ma huɓɓitugol ngal dokkal Alla, ngal hendornoɗaa fawugol juuɗe an ɗen e hoore maa.
55001007	Ko fii ruuhu mo Alla yeɗi en on wonaa waɗoowo en huluɓe, kono ko ruuhu okkoowo en doole e giggol e waawugol hoore mun.
55001008	Awa wota a hersir seeditanagol Joomi men on, e min sokiraaɗo sabu makko on, kono tampidu e an fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e dow bawgal Alla,
55001009	on Danduɗo en, noddi en fii no naɓiren ngurndan men ɗan no laaɓiri, hara hinaa sabu kuuɗe men ɗen, kono ko sabu haajaande makko nden tigi e moƴƴere nde yeɗiraɗen sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on nden, ado saa'iiji poomayankeeji ɗin.
55001010	Nden moƴƴere ɓanginiraama jooni feeɲugol Iisaa Almasiihu, Danduɗo en on, on muncuɗo doole mayde nden. Ko Kibaaru Moƴƴo on o feɲɲinirani en ngurndan ɗan lannataa ɗan.
55001011	Ko fii oo Kibaaru Moƴƴo mi waɗiraa waajotooɗo e sahaabaajo e jannoowo.
55001012	Ko sabu ɗun mi heɓiri ɗii satteendeeji. Kono mi hersaa, ko fii miɗo andi ko hombo mi gomɗini, awa miɗo felliti himo mari bawgal hiwugol ko mi halfinaa kon haa e ɲalaande ɲaawoore nden.
55001013	Awa jogito sifa ɗii konguɗi selluɗi ɗi hendorɗaa mi, e nder gomɗinal ngal e giggol wongol ngol e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
55001014	Jogitoɗaa kaliifu moƴƴo mo hendorɗaa Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, ɗun ko Wonɗo e men on.
55001015	Hiɗa andi wonɓe leydi Aazii ɓen fow tertike lan. Figeeli e Hermogaana no tawaa e ɓen.
55001016	Yo Joomiraaɗo on tippin yurmeende mun nden e hoore ɓeynguure Onesifoora nden, ko fii himo muɲɲinaynoo lan soono woo, awa kadi o hersiraano ko mi sokaa kon.
55001017	E hoore ɗun, ɓay o arii Roomu, o catino e ɗaɓɓitugol lan haa o yi'immi.
55001018	Yo Joomiraaɗo on yeɗoy mo yurmeende mun nden ɲande ɲaawoore nden. Hiɗa andi ɓuri wonɗo woo haa honto o wallimmi ko mi woni Efeesi.
55002001	An kadi non, yo boobo an, tiiɗinor e moƴƴere wonde e Iisaa Almasiihu on nden.
55002002	Ko nanirɗaa mi kon e tawnde seedeeɓe ɗuuɗuɓe, halfin ɗun yimɓe holniiɓe, waawayɓe kaɲun kadi jannude woɓɓe goo.
55002003	Tampidu e an wa suufaajo moƴƴo Iisaa Almasiihu on.
55002004	Ko fii si suufaajo golloowo golle mun no faalaa weltinde hooreejo mun on, o hilnotaako haajuuji goo.
55002005	Ko fii foolotirteeɗo e dogudu waɗantaake meetelol si o waɗiraali no haaniri non.
55002006	Ko remoowo wakkiliiɗo on haani adaade hendaade geɓal mun ngal ka baagol.
55002007	Hakkilan koo ko mi woni wi'ude, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on yeɗete faamu e ɗi fow.
55002008	Anditii fii Iisaa Almasiihu, on immitiiɗo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, iwruɗo e bolondaa Daawuuda on, wano Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo mi woni yottinde on wi'iri non,
55002009	on mo mi tampani haa mi haɓɓiraa wa waɗoowo bone. Kono daaluyee Alla on haɓɓaaka.
55002010	Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo wakkilii fow sabu suɓaaɓe ɓen, fii kamɓe kadi no ɓe heɓira kisiyee wonɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on, wondude e darja poomayankeejo on.
55002011	Ngol kongol ko haqiiqawol wonde: Si en maayidii e makko, en wuuritidoyay kadi e makko.
55002012	Si en ŋaɲɲike, en laamodoyay kadi e makko. Si en yeddii kadi fii makko, kanko kadi o yeddoyay fii men.
55002013	Si tawii en sellaa-finde, kanko ko o sella-findeejo, ko fii o waawataa yedditaade.
55002014	E hino ko haanuɗaa andintinde kon: jeejaa yimɓe ɓen yeeso Alla wonde, yo ɓe accu pooɗotiro haala ka aldaa e nafa. Si hinaa ɗun, ɗun nawray heɗotooɓe ɓen e majjere.
55002015	Eto no weeɓitoraa yeeso Alla wa neɗɗo haanaaɗo jaɓeede, ɗun ko golloowo mo hersaa, e tindinoowo daaluyee goongaajo on no feewiri.
55002016	Reenoɗaa e haalaaji mehi ɗi yaadaa e faale Alla on, ko fii jokkuɓe ɗi ɓen ɓurtay tun woɗɗitaade Alla.
55002017	Ko fii konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin no layira wa nawnaare «masara.» Himenee e Fileeti no tawaa e ɓen,
55002018	ɓen seluɓe goonga on, no bonnira gomɗinal woɓɓe ɓen wi'ugol wonde ummutal ngal waɗiino.
55002019	E hin-le hayre didol tiiɗunde nde Alla waɗi nden no ɲiiɓi haa jooni, hinde notiraa ɗii konguɗi ɗoo: «Joomiraaɗo on no andi ɓe makko ɓen!», awa kadi: «Kala jantiiɗo innde Joomiraaɗo on yo yilto e angal peewal.»
55002020	E nder suudu hittundu hinaa miranji tafiraaɗi kaŋŋe maa kaalisi tun woni ton, kono kunnaaje e payanɗe leydi kadi no ton. Miranji arani ɗin ko mariraaɗi fii haaju hittuɗo, kono ɗiya ko huutorteeɗi fii ko woni woo.
55002021	On laɓɓinɗo hoore mun e ɗii piiji bonɗi, o wonay miran hittuɗo, huutorteeɗo, laaɓuɗo, mo jom mun huutorta, hebulaniiɗo kala kuugal moƴƴal.
55002022	Awa dogu himmeeji cukankaaku ɗin, ɗaɓɓaa peewal ngal e gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol e ɓuttu on, wondude e jantorayɓe Joomiraaɗo on ɓernde laaɓunde.
55002023	Bugitoɗaa yeddondire njofooje ɗe aldaa e nafa ɗen, ɗe anduɗaa adday hawreeji ɗen.
55002024	Ko fii haanaa ka kurkantooɗo Joomiraaɗo on haɓidee. Himo haani wonde newaniiɗo fow, muɲɲiiɗo, o waawa jannude.
55002025	Himo haani kadi wurtirde liddotooɓe mo ɓen no newori, e nder tanƴinagol wonde Alla okkay ɓe feere no ɓe tuubira, ɓe anda goonga on,
55002026	ɓe ruttoo e faamu maɓɓe moƴƴo on, e no ɓe sortora e pircol Ibuliisa nanguɗo ɓe fii waɗugol faale mun on.
55003001	Awa andu wonde ka sakkitoode aduna, sattoyay fota.
55003002	Ko fii yimɓe ɓen laatoyto ɓurtintiniiɓe, yiɗuɓe kaalisi, mantiiɓe, hownitiiɓe, hoynooɓe, dartotooɓe mawɓe mun, dulluɓe, hayfinooɓe fii laawol feewungol ngol,
55003003	ɓe yurmetaake, ɓe rippotaako, aybinooɓe, ɓe waawataa hoore mun, hunƴuɓe, ayɓe moƴƴere,
55003004	janfotooɓe, huuwirooɓe angal faamu, heewuɓe townitaare, yiɗuɓe faale mun on ɓuri Alla.
55003005	Hara hiɓe ɓangini e kene dewal ngal, kono hara hiɓe yeddi ko ngal wondi e bawgal kon. Awa pottito ɓen yimɓe ɗon.
55003006	No woodi e maɓɓe naatooɓe ka cuuɗi, pooɗa rewɓe lo'uɓe fawiiɓe junuubi, ɓe kala noone himmeeji ardii.
55003007	Ɓen rewɓe no janga ɲande woo, kono hara ɓe waawataa andude goonga on few.
55003008	Ko wano Janeesi e Jambereesi dartornoo Muusaa non, ko wano non ɓen yimɓe kadi dartorta goonga on. Ɓen ko yimɓe ɓe hakkille mun bonnaa, ɓe gomɗinal mun wonaa haqiiqawal.
55003009	Kono ɓe yaarataa yeeso, ko fii feetere maɓɓe nden ɓanganay fow, wano no ɓee yimɓe ɗiɗo wowlaaɓe fii mun non.
55003010	Kono an, a catike fota e janndeeji an ɗin e jikkuuji an ɗin e anniyeeji an ɗin e gomɗinal an ngal e muɲal an ngal e giggol an ngol e ŋaɲɲaare an nden.
55003011	Hiɗa andi kadi ko mi jokkaa kon e tampereeji an ɗi mi heɓi e ɗee ca'e Antiyoosi-Pisidii, Ikoniim e Listaara ɗin, e cukkanɗe ɗe mi heɓi ɗen e no Joomiraaɗo on yaltinirimmi e ɗun fow.
55003012	Ɗun-le wuren, kala faalaaɓe wuurude e hoore dewal e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓen fow cukkete.
55003013	Kono yimɓe bonɓe ɓen e ƴoƴuɓe ɓen soono woo ɓurtay tun yaarude e nder bone on, ɓe ɗayna hoore maɓɓe, ɓe ɗaynora heddiiɓe ɓen kadi.
55003014	Kono an, cato e ko janguɗaa kon, ɗun ko ko hendorɗaa hoolaare, hiɗa andi ko hombo heɓirɗaa ɗun.
55003015	Gila e paykunyaagal maa hiɗa andi bindi seniiɗi ɗin. Hiɗi waawu-maa okkude faamu fii kisiyee on sabu gomɗingol Iisaa Almasiihu on.
55003016	Kala daalol windiingol ko foofaango Alla, hingol wondi e nafa fii jannugol e hollugol ellaaji e wurtugol e ne'ugol e nder peewal,
55003017	fii no aaden Alla on eltiree, hebulanoo waɗugol kala kuugal moƴƴal.
55004001	Ko ɗun waɗi, e yeeso Alla e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on ɲaawayɗo wurɓe ɓen e mayɓe ɓen, e sabu ardu makko ndun e laamu makko ngun, mi yamirii ma, mi tentinii:
55004002	waajo fii daaluyee on, catoɗaa e ɗun, nde heɓuɗaa fajuhun weeɓukun woo, maa a heɓaa, hollaa ɓe ellaaji maɓɓe ɗin, felaa ɓe, wakkilinaa ɓe e hoore jannugol e nder muɲal timmungal.
55004003	Ko fii saa'i no aroya nde tawata yimɓe ɓen jaɓataa hande kadi jannde sellunde nden, kono tippude e faaleeji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓe ɓannay takko maɓɓe karamokooɓe ɗuuɗuɓe ko yewta ɓe ko ɓe faalaa nanude kon.
55004004	Ɓe udda noppi maɓɓe ɗin e goonga on, ɓe fewta tindi mehi ɗin.
55004005	Kono an non, wonu hakkilanɗo e ɗi fow, wakkiloɗaa tampereeji ɗin, waɗaa kuuɗe waajotooɗo fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, timminiraa golle maa ɗen no feewiri.
55004006	Ko fii min, miɗo itti wonkii an kin wa sadaka hibbaaɗo fii Alla, ko fii saa'i fokkitugol an ngol hewtii.
55004007	Mi tippirii tippiro moƴƴo ngon, mi timminii dogudu an ndun, mi woni sella-findeejo e telen-ma gomɗinal ngal.
55004008	Jooni non miɗo maranaa meetelol peewal ngol. Joomi on, on Ɲaawoowo Feewuɗo, jonnoyay lan ngol ka ɲalaande sakkitorde, ɗun non hinaa min tun, kono ko kala himmanɗo feeɲitugol makko ngol kadi.
55004009	Awa eto araa, tawaa mi ko ɓuri yaawude.
55004010	Ko fii Demaasi tertike lan, sabu yiɗugol mo oo aduna fewndiiɗo. O yahii Tesalonii. Kiriskiisu kadi yahii Galaasi, Tiituusa kadi yahii Dalamaasi.
55004011	Ko min tun e Luuka wondi. Ardu e Markuusa, ko fii himo hitti e an fota fii golle ɗen.
55004012	Mi imminii Tikiiki Efeesi.
55004013	Nde hiɗa ara, addoraa burmusu mo mi acciri Karpuusi on ka wi'etee ɗon Turuwaasi, e defte ɗen, tentinii guri windeteeɗi e mun ɗin.
55004014	Oo siyaakeejo wi'eteeɗo Aleksander waɗii lan boneeji buy, kono Joomiraaɗo on jonnitay mo ittiri kuuɗe makko ɗen.
55004015	An kadi reeno e makko, ko fii o dartike konguɗi men ɗin no tiiɗiri.
55004016	Ko mi adii dandude hoore an ka ɲaawirdu, hay gooto wallitanooki lan, kono fow tertino lan. Wota ɗun jogitane ɓe.
55004017	Ko Joomiraaɗo on wallitinoo lan, tiiɗinimmi, fii no mi timminira yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, e fii no leƴƴi ɗin fow nanira ɗun. Awa kadi mi jattinaa hunduko ngayuuri ndin.
55004018	Ko Joomiraaɗo on yaltintammi e kala kuugal bongal, o dandammi fii no o naadirammi ka nder laamateeri makko kammuyankeeri. Yo mangural wonan mo haa poomaa. Aamiina!
55004019	Mi salminii Piriskiila e Akiila, e ɓeynguure Onesifoora nden.
55004020	Awa Arastuusa kaɲun no Korenti. Mi accu kadi Torofiimi no nawni ka saare Miletii.
55004021	Eto araa ado ndungude. Ebuluusu e Pudeniisi e Linuusa e Kaludiiyata, wondude e musiɓɓe ɓen fow salminii ma.
55004022	Yo Joomiraaɗo on wondu e maa, awa kadi yo moƴƴere makko nden wonu e mon.
56001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, nduu kurkaadu Alla e sahaabaajo mo Iisaa Almasiihu on toɗɗii fii tiiɗingol gomɗinal ɓen ɓe Alla suɓii, adda ɓe e goonga nawrayɗo e wuurirgol no Alla faaliraa non,
56001002	fii yo ɓe heɓu tama'u ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan, ɗun ko ɗan ngurndan ɗan fodanoɗen ko adii saa'iiji ɗin fuɗɗaade, immorde e Alla, on mo faayataa.
56001003	E saa'i toɗɗaaɗo on, o ɓanginiri daaluyee makko on waajuuji ɗi mi halfinaa waajagol ɗin, wano kanko Alla Dandoowo en on o yamiriri non.
56001004	Mi salminii ma yo Tiituusa, an oo ɓiɗɗo an tigi e nder gomɗinal ngal hawtuɗen ngal. Yo Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu hisinoowo en on yeɗe yurmeende e ɓuttu.
56001005	Ko mi accir-maa Kereeti ton, ko fii yo a gaynito fewnitagol ko heddii feewaali kon, joɗɗinaa kadi e saare kala ardotooɓe moftal ngal, wano mi hollir-maa non.
56001006	Mo kala e maɓɓe non no haani wonude aaden mo felnaaki, hara ko yondinorɗo debbo gooto, hara kadi ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen ko gomɗinɓe, e maanaa hara ɓe waawetaake tooɲireede angal peewal maa angal ɗoftaare.
56001007	Awa no haani ka tawata ardotooɗo dental ngal felnaaki, ko fii himo halfinaa ardagol ɓeynguure Alla nden, ko ɗun waɗi si hara hinaa mawnintiniiɗo, hinaa seytinoowo, hinaa yaroowo, hinaa ɲaaɗuɗo, hinaa ɗaɓɓiroowo miile,
56001008	kono yo taw ko o wernoowo hoɓɓe, yiɗuɗo ko moƴƴi, nawruɗo ngurndan mun ɗan faamu, feewuɗo, laaɓuɗo, waawuɗo hoore mun,
56001009	hara kadi ko o catiiɗo e daaluyee haqiiqaajo on, hara ko no yaadiri e ko o jannaa kon, ɗun o waaway wakkilinirde heddiiɓe ɓen jannde sellunde nden, e hollugol liddotooɓe nden jannde ɓen ellaaji maɓɓe ɗin.
56001010	Ko fii buy ko murtuɓe, yewtooɓe yewtereeji mehi, ɗaynooɓe, tentinii ɓen wonɓe e hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe gomɗinɓe, catii e sunninegol ɓen.
56001011	Awa yo kundule maɓɓe ɗen ombe, ko fii hiɓe jiiɓa ɓeynguureeji goo fow jannirgol ɓe ko haanaaka janneede fii heɓirgol angal nunɗal.
56001012	Goɗɗo e maɓɓe, mo ɓe wi'i ko annabaajo, no wi'i wonde, ɓe Kereeti ɓen ko fenooɓe, ko ɓe kulle hunƴuɗe, reereɗuɓe, puyɓe.
56001013	Nden seeditoore-le ko goonga. Ko ɗun waɗi bee feliraa ɓe no sattiri fii no ɓe heɓira gomɗinal laaɓungal,
56001014	e no ɓe accira humagol e tindi Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, e yamirooje iwruɗe e yimɓe ɓe tawata ko seluɓe goonga on.
56001015	Laaɓuɓe ɓen kan, ko woni woo no laaɓani ɗun, kono yimɓe tuunuɓe ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hay huunde laaɓanaa ɗun, ko fii hakkillaaji maɓɓe ɗin e ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen no tuuninaa.
56001016	Hiɓe wi'i ko ɓe anduɓe Alla, kono kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen no yeddi ɗun, ko fii ko ɓe harmuɓe, murtuɓe, ɓe waawataa laatinde kala kuugal moƴƴal.
56002001	An non yewtu ko yaadi e jannde sellunde nden kon,
56002002	wi'aa mawɓe ɓen, yo ɓe wonu waawuɓe hoore maɓɓe, teddintooɓe, hara wonaa uɓɓitooɓe, kono hara ko tabituɓe e gomɗinal ngal e nder giggol e ŋaɲɲaare.
56002003	Yo woniran non kadi yummiraaɓe ɓen, hara jikku maɓɓe on ko moƴƴo, hara ɓe wonaali ɲo'ooɓe, maa yarooɓe, ɓe wona e jannugol ko moƴƴi,
56002004	hara ɓe waajoto sukaaɓe rewɓe ɓen yiɗugol moodiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen.
56002005	Hara ko e nder faamu ɓe nawri ngurndan maɓɓe ɗan no laaɓiri, e no ɓe wonira jom-suuduuɓe moƴƴuɓe, e no ɓe yankinorana moodiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen, ɗun haray daaluyee Alla on hoynetaake.
56002006	Yamiraa kadi sukaaɓe worɓe ɓen nawrugol ngurndan maɓɓe ɗan e nder faamu.
56002007	E kala huunde hiɗa haani wonande ɓe misal e waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe. E nder ko jannataa kon, janniraa nunɗal e teddungal,
56002008	e yo konguɗi maa ɗin wonu selluɗi, ɗi aybintaako, fii no liddotooɓe en ɓen hersira, tawa ɓe waawataa heɓude bone woo mo ɓe wowla en.
56002009	Yamiraa kadi jiyaaɓe ɓen yankinanagol jeyɓe ɓe ɓen e kala huunde, ɓe ɗaɓɓa no ɓe weltinira ɓe, ɓe reenoo e yeddondirgol e maɓɓe.
56002010	Ɓe reenoo kadi e nguyka, ɓe ɓangina sella-findeyaagal timmungal, ɗun ɓe teddinay gandal fii Alla Danduɗo en on.
56002011	Ko fii moƴƴere Alla nden, ɗun ko ɓundu kisiyee fii yimɓe ɓen fow, feeɲii.
56002012	Nden moƴƴere no ne'a en, hinde yilta en e kala ko Alla aɲi, hinde accintina en himmeeji aduna, ɗun en waaway nawrude ngurndan men ɗan fewndo ɗoo e nder faamu e peewal e wano Alla faaliraa non,
56002013	e nder ko tijjiɗen tama'u sollituɗo on kon, ɗun ko feeɲugol mangural Alla men on e Dandoowo en on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu.
56002014	O okkitirii hoore makko kanko tigi fii men, fii sottugol en e kala ko boni, fii laɓɓinangol hoore makko jamaa suɓaaɗo, himmanɗo waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe.
56002015	Ko ɗun haanuɗaa yewtude, wakkilinaa, felaa wa newnanaaɗo yamirgol. Wota hay gooto yawito ma e ɗun!
56003001	Andintin ɓe hiɓe haani yankinanaade laamuuji ɗin e laamiiɓe ɓen, ɓe ɗoftoo ɓe, ɓe hebilanoo kala kuugal moƴƴal.
56003002	Wota ɓe hoynu hay gooto, maa ɓe wona yeddondirteeɓe, kono ɓe wona moƴƴuɓe, newiiɓe e telen-ma yimɓe ɓen fow.
56003003	Ko fii hari enen kadi ko en faaɗa-hakkilɓe, ɓe ɗoftotaako, ɗaynaaɓe, maccuɓe kala himmeeji e mbeleeɗe neɗɗanke, wuuruɓe e nder hunƴeendi e nawliigu, aɲaaɓe, e aɲindirɓe.
56003004	Kono nde Alla, Danduɗo en on, feɲɲini moƴƴuki makko kin e giggol makko ngol o yiɗi yimɓe ɓen ngol,
56003005	o dandi en, hinaa non ɓay en waɗii kuuɗe feewuɗe, kono ko e iwrude e yurmeende makko nden. O dandiri en lootirgol en tagiteede, heyɗintiniree Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
56003006	Ko Iisaa Almasiihu, Danduɗo en on, Alla tippiniri on Ruuhu e hoore men haa heewi,
56003007	fii no jogoreɗen feewuɓe sabu moƴƴuki makko kin, e fii no waawiren ronirde ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan tanƴiniɗen ɗan.
56003008	Koo ko mi wi'i ɗoo ko haqiiqa. Miɗo faalaa yo a cato e ɗii piiji, fii no gomɗinɓe Alla ɓen fewtinira ɓerɗe mun ɗen e waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe ɗen. Ko ɗun woni ko moƴƴi kon e ko nafata yimɓe ɓen kon.
56003009	Kono ko yo a reeno e yeddotire njofooje ɗen e fii lasilankaaku e poodondiro e yeddondiro fii Sariya on, ko fii ɗun ko meere, aldaa e nafa.
56003010	Kala waɗoowo sendondiral, si a hajike mo nde wootere haa laabi ɗiɗi, o jaɓaali, pottin mo takko maa.
56003011	Hiɗa waawi fellitude sifa on neɗɗo ko ɓoyliiɗo, junuubankeejo, on ɲaawanii hoore mun.
56003012	Tuma mi imminoyi oo wi'eteeɗo Artemaasi maa Tikiiki haa e maa, haray eto araa tawaa mi Nikopooli, ko fii ko ɗon mi aadii waɗugol ndungu ngun.
56003013	Wattanaa yiila kadi fii wallitagol oo bambanoowo ka sariya wi'eteeɗo Zenaasi e Apoloosi, fii wota hay huunde ŋakkir ɓe e nder yaadu maɓɓe ndun.
56003014	Bee kadi ɓe men ɓen ekkitoo haa waawa waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe, fii wattangol yiila e kala sokola hittuɗo, ɗun haray ngurndan maɓɓe ɗan wonataa meerejan.
56003015	Ɓe mi wondi ɓen fow hiwrike ma. Mi salminii yiɗuɓe en e nder gomɗinal ɓen. Yo moƴƴere Alla nden wonu e hoore mon on fow.
57001001	Immorde e an min Puulusa, oo kasoojo sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, wondude e Timotee oo musiɗɗo men, haa e oo giɗo amen, wondiɗɗo amen e golle, ɗun ko an Filimuunu,
57001002	wondude e Apifiyyata oo bandiraawo amen e Arkiipe oo wondiɗɗo amen e tippiro e haa e moftal wongal ngal ka suudu maa an Filimuunu.
57001003	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on, immorde e Alla Baaba men, e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
57001004	Miɗo duumii e jarnugol Alla an on e nder ko mi maandini fii maa e nder torndeeji an ɗin,
57001005	ko fii miɗo nanude no wowlee fii ko gomɗinɗaa Iisaa Joomi on kon, e giggol ngol yiɗuɗaa yimɓe Alla ɓen fow ngol kadi.
57001006	Mi torike yo gomɗinal maa ngal hawtuɗen ngal waɗu batte, andaa moƴƴere wonannde en e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on.
57001007	E hoore ɗun mi heɓii weltaare e wakkilaare buy sabu giggol maa ngol, ko fii ko sabu maa yo musiɗɗo, ɓerɗe yimɓe Alla ɓen ɓuttiniraa.
57001008	Ko ɗun waɗi, fii kala miɗo mari hoolaare mawnde sabu Almasiihu on fii windangol ma ko haanuɗaa waɗude kon,
57001009	miɗo yiɗu-maa tororde giggol, wano min Puulusa mi woniri nii nayeejo e kasoojo kadi sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on.
57001010	Mi jeejii ma fii Onesiima, on wontuɗo ɓiɗɗo an ka gomɗinal fewndo mi jolkaa.
57001011	Hari o wonanii ma meere, kono jooni o nafete wano o nafirimmi non.
57001012	Awa mi neltii mo e maa, on mo tawata ko ɓernde an min tigi.
57001013	Mi faalano yo o wonu takko an, fii yo o wallan lonto-maa e nder ko mi jolkaa fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on kon.
57001014	Kono hay fus mi faalaaka waɗude e ɓaawo fewjoore maa nden, fii wota kuuɗe maa moƴƴe ɗen wonu karhaaɗe, kono ɗe wona anniyaaɗe.
57001015	No gasa a seeduno e Onesiima haa seeɗa, fii yo a hettitu mo haa poomaa.
57001016	Hara hinaa wa maccuɗo hande kadi, kono no ɓuriri maccuɗo, wa musiɗɗo yiɗaaɗo, tentinii telen-ma an min, ittii e sikke telen-ma maa, ɓay ko o maccuɗo, awa kadi ko o musiɗɗo gomɗinɗo Joomi on.
57001017	Si tawii hiɗa jogori lan wa gollideteeɗo, haray jaɓir mo wa an min.
57001018	Si himo bonnu-maa, maa si himo jogani-maa goɗɗun, fawu ɗun e hoore an.
57001019	Ko jungo an ngon tigi, min Puulusa mi windiri nduu ɓatakuru, mi yoɓitoyte ɗun, fii kala mi faalaaka wi'ude an tigi hiɗa joganii mi goɗɗun, ɗun ko ngurndan maa ɗan.
57001020	Awa yo musiɗɗo, waɗanan ɗun sabu Joomiraaɗo on, ɓuttinaa ɓernde an nden e telen-ma Almasiihu on.
57001021	Ko e nder hoolorgol ɗoftaare maa nden mi windiri, e hoore andugol a waɗay ɓuri ko mi wi'i kon.
57001022	E hoore ɗun, eɓɓanan werde, miɗo tanƴinii yahugol ka mon sabu torndeeji mon ɗin.
57001023	Epafaraasi oo mo mi sokidaa ka kaso sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on, salminii ma,
57001024	wondude e Markuusa e Aristarke e Demaasi e Luuka, ɗun ko ɓen wondiɓɓe an e golle.
57001025	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on wonu e ɓerɗe mon.
58001001	Nde wonnoo Alla yewtiriino maamiraaɓe men ɓen annabaaɓe ɓen laawi buy e nooneeji buy,
58001002	Alla yewtirii en ka ɲalaaɗe sakkitore ɗoo Ɓiɗɗo on. O waɗi mo ronoowo e kala huunde, awa ko on o tagiri aduna on.
58001003	Ko on Ɓiɗɗo woni jalbeendi annoora Alla on, ko kanko woni mbaadi Alla ndin tigi. Ko on Ɓiɗɗo woni tambitiiɗo kala huunde rewrude e daaluyee makko dolnuɗo on. Nde o laatinnoo laɓɓingol yimɓe ɓen junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin, o jooɗoyii ka sengo ɲaamo Alla Mawɗo on ka kammuuli,
58001004	o woni ɓurɗo malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, wano innde nde o roni nden ɓurdiri ɗe maɓɓe ɗen non.
58001005	Ko fii ko hombo e malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen Alla daalani: «Ko an woni Ɓiɗɗo an on, hande a wonii mo an», maa o daalani kadi: «Mi wonanay mo Baaba, o wonanammi Ɓiɗɗo.»?
58001006	Ɓay o addii Afo on ka nder aduna, o daali kadi: «Yo malaa'ikaaɓe Alla ɓen fow sujjan mo.»
58001007	Fii malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen o daali: «O waɗay malaa'ikaaɓe makko ɓen hendu e kurkaaɗi makko ɗin ɗenɗe yiite.»
58001008	Kono fii Ɓiɗɗo on o daali: «Jullere maa laamu nden, yaa an Alla, luttay haa poomaa, labbooru maa laamu ndun ko labbooru peewal.
58001009	A yiɗii peewal ngal, a aɲii angal peewal ngal. Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla Joomiraaɗo maa on toɗɗor maa nebban weltaare ɓuri wondiɓɓe maa ɓen.»
58001010	E hoore ɗun o daali kadi: «Yaa an Joomiraaɗo, ko an wallini ndelo leydi ndin ka fuɗɗoode, awa kadi kammuuli ɗin ko juuɗe maa ɗen tagiraa.
58001011	Ɗi lannay, kono an a luttay, ɗi fow ɗi nawyiray wa dolokke,
58001012	ɲobbiraa ɗi wa waanaare, e hoore ɗun ɗi waylirte wa dolokke. Kono an a wa'ay no wa'uɗaa, awa kadi, duuɓi maa ɗin lannataa.»
58001013	E ko hombo e malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen o daalani: «Jooɗor ka sengo an ɲaamo, haa mi waɗa ayɓe maa ɓen ka ley teppe maa.»?
58001014	Hara ɓee malaa'ikaaɓe fow, hinaa ɓe ruuhuuji kurkotooɗi, nulaaɗi fii gollangol ronooɓe kisiyee ɓen?
58002001	Ko ɗun waɗi, hiɗen haani cataade fota e ko nanuɗen kon, fii wota en selu.
58002002	Ko fii, si konguɗi ɗi malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen hewtini maamiraaɓe men ɓen ɗin haqinqinaama, awa kadi kala bonnere e noone geddi yoɓiraama ko handi kon,
58002003	haray ko honno daɗiroyten si en wedditike e sifa oo kisiyee mawɗo? Ko Joomi men on tigi adii feɲɲinde mo, onsay non nanunooɓe mo ɓen haqinqinani en.
58002004	Allaahu on seeditodi e maɓɓe, o ɓanginiri ɗun kuuɗe e maandeeji e noone kaawakeeji moƴƴi e sendirgol dokke Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wano o yiɗiri non.
58002005	Hinaa malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen Alla yankinani oo aduna aroyoowo mo wowleten fii mun on.
58002006	Kono goɗɗo no seeditii nokku goo, wi'i: «Ko honɗun woni neɗɗo fii no anditiraa fii makko, yaa an Alla, e ko woni ɓii neɗɗanke fii yo a danko mo?
58002007	A waɗii mo e ley malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen e nder seeɗa nii, a taaranii mo meetelol mangu e teddungal, a waɗii mo e hoore kuuɗe juuɗe maa ɗen,
58002008	a waɗii piiji ɗin fow e ley koyɗe makko.» E nder yankinangol mo piiji ɗin fow, alaa ko Alla acci yo ronku yankinanaade mo, kono haa jooni en yi'aali ka piiji ɗin fow yankinanii mo.
58002009	Kono non e hino ko tawɗen kon: ɓawto o waɗeede e ley malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen fii saa'ihun nii, kanko Iisaa o waɗanaama meetelol mangu e teddungal sabu mayde nde o tampiri nden, fii, tippude e moƴƴere Alla nden, yo o maayan yimɓe ɓen fow.
58002010	E dow ardagol fayɓe buy ka mangu, tawi no hawrani on Taguɗo piiji fow, e mo piiji ɗin fow wonani on, laatinirgol Iisaa timmuɗo e nder tampereeji, on Sincuɗo kisiyee maɓɓe on.
58002011	Ko fii, ko laɓɓinɗo on e laɓɓinaaɓe ɓen fow woni iwdi wootiri. Ko ɗun waɗi kanko Iisaa o hersiraa noddirgol ɓe musiɓɓe,
58002012	wano o wi'iri Alla non wonde: «Mi jantanto musiɓɓe an ɓen innde maa nden, mi mantoyte ka hakkunde tumbondiral.»
58002013	O wi'i kadi: «Mi waɗay hoolaare an nden e makko.» Awa kadi: «E hino lan, min e fayɓe ɓe Alla okkimmi ɓen.»
58002014	Awa nde tawnoo fayɓe ɓen no mari ƴiiƴan e ɓandu, kanko Iisaa kadi ko wano non o tawdiraa e maɓɓe, fii, rewrude e mayde makko nden, yo o muncu on joginooɗo bawgal mayde nden, ɗun ko Ibuliisa,
58002015	e fii yo o jattin kala wonnooɓe e nder maccangaaku e nder ngurndan mun sabu kulol mayde.
58002016	Ɓay, pellet wonaa malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen o ari faabagol, kono ko jurriya Ibraahiima on o ari faabagol.
58002017	Ko ɗun waɗi si himo haanunoo nandude e musiɓɓe makko ɓen few, fii no o wonira yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, yurmeteeɗo, holniiɗo e nder golle Alla ɗen, fii no jamaa on heɓira yaafuyee junuubaaji.
58002018	Ɓay kanko tigi o tampii fewndo o ndarndaa, himo waawi faabaade wonaaɓe e ndarndeede ɓen.
58003001	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an laaɓuɓe, ɓe mi hawti noddaandu Alla ndun, feŋee miijo mon ngon e hoore mo Alla toɗɗii neli on, on Yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, on mo qirritiɗen ka gomɗinal men, ɗun ko Iisaa.
58003002	O wonno sella-findeejo e telen-ma on Toɗɗiiɗo mo, wano Muusaa wonirnoo non e nder suudu Alla ndun fow.
58003003	E hoore ɗun, tawaama ko o Rinɗanɗo mangu ɓuri ngu Muusaa ngun, ko fii darnuɗo suudu on no mari teddungal ɓuri suudu ndun tigi.
58003004	Ko fii kala suudu ko goɗɗo darni ɗun, kono ko kanko Alla darni kala huunde.
58003005	Muusaa kaɲun wonno kurkaadu sella-findeejo e nder suudu Alla ndun fow, fii seeditagol ko Alla daaloyta kon.
58003006	Kono Almasiihu on kan ko Ɓiɗɗo sella-findeejo e hoore suudu Alla ndun. Ko enen woni suudu makko ndun, si en catike fota e wakkilaare e hoolaare nde jogiɗen fii ko tanƴiniɗen kon.
58003007	Ko ɗun waɗi, wano Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wi'iri non: «Si on nanii kongol makko ngol hande,
58003008	wota on sattin ɓerɗe mon ɗen, wa fewndo maamiraaɓe mon ɓen murtannoo mi, ɓe ndarndii mi ka wulaa,
58003009	ka ɓe liggitunoo mi ɗon, ɓe ndarndii mi, ɓe yi'uno kuuɗe an ɗen e nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay.
58003010	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi tikkani ngun jamaanu, mi wi'i: ‹Ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen ko seluɗe saa'i kala, ɓe andaali laawi an ɗin.›
58003011	Mi woonduno e nder tikkere an nden wonde: ‹Ɓe naatataa ka fowtaare an few!› »
58003012	Awa, reenee, yo musiɓɓe, fii wota hay gooto e mon heɓu ɓernde bonnde e ɓernde nde gomɗinal tabitaa e mun, haa ka yiltoɗon e ɓaawo Alla Wuuruɗo on.
58003013	Kono wakkilindiree hakkunde mon ɲande woo, yeru no wi'eede hande, fii wota hay gooto e mon sattinir ɓernde mun ɗaynireede junuubu.
58003014	Ko fii en wonii kafiduɓe e Almasiihu on, si tawii en jogitike fota pellital men aranal ngal haa ka sakkitorun,
58003015	wano bindi ɗin wi'iri non wonde: «Hande si on nanii hito makko ngon, wota on sattin ɓerɗe mon ɗen wa fewndo murtaldu ndun.»
58003016	Ko homɓe woni ɓen murtannooɓe Alla, ɓawto ɓe nanude kongol makko ngol? Hinaa ɓee ɓe Muusaa ardinoo, yaltini Misira?
58003017	E ko homɓe woni ɓen ɓe Alla tikkannoo e nder ɗii duuɓi cappanɗe nay? Hinaa ɓee waɗunooɓe junuubu, maayi ka wulaa?
58003018	E ko homɓe o woondannoo naatataa ka fowtaare makko, si hinaa yedduɓe ɓen?
58003019	Awa en yi'ii ɓe waawaali naatude ka fowtaare makko, sabu angal gomɗinal.
58004001	Ko ɗun waɗi, yeru fodaari fii naatugol ka fowtaare makko no lutti, haray hulen wota goɗɗo e mon aru e tawdeede e ronkooɓe naatude ɓen.
58004002	Ko fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on feɲɲinanaama en, wano ɓeya non, kono kongol ngol ɓe heɗii ngol nafaali ɓe huunde, ko fii ko ɓe nanunoo kon, ɓe jaɓiraano gomɗinal.
58004003	Kono enen gomɗinɓe ɓen, en naatay e nden fowtaare nde o innunoo wonde: «Mi woondii e nder tikkere an nden, ɓe naatataa ka fowtaare an few!» E hin-le, Alla gayniino golle mun ɗen gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna on.
58004004	Ko fii himo daali nokku goo ka bindi fii ɲalaande jeeɗiɗaɓere nden wonde: «Ka ɲalaande jeeɗiɗaɓere Alla fowtino e golleeji makko ɗin fow.»
58004005	Himo daali kadi fahin ɗoo: «Ɓe naatataa ka fowtaare an few!»
58004006	Nde tawnoo no heddanii woɓɓe goo fii naatoygol ton, e hin-le kadi attinooɓe hendaade Kibaaru Moƴƴo on kaɲun naataano sabu angal gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal,
58004007	e yeeso ɗun buy Allaahu on daaluno kadi iwrude e Daawuuda, o toɗɗii ɲalaande, o inni nden «hande», wano siforanoo non dow ɗoo: «Hande si on nanii hito makko ngon, wota on sattin ɓerɗe mon ɗen.»
58004008	Si tawiino Yaasuwa yeɗiino ɓe nden fowtaare, Alla wowlataano ɓawto ɗun fii ɲalaande goo.
58004009	Awa jaka no lutti ɲalaande fowteteende e mun fii jamaa Alla on.
58004010	Ko fii kala naatuɗo ka fowtaare Alla, o fowtoto kadi e golle makko ɗen, wano Alla fowtornoo ɗe mun ɗen non.
58004011	Awa etoɗen naatugol ka fowtaare makko ɗon, fii wota hay gooto falju, jokka ɓe ɗoftaaki ɓen.
58004012	Ko fii, daaluyee Alla on ko wuuruɗo duncoowo, himo weli ɓuri kaafa ka mbelɗe ɗiɗi, ko naatayɗo haa hakkunde ruuhu e wonkii, e hakkunde jokke e mbuso, o ɲaawa mbeleeɗe e miijooji ɓernde.
58004013	Alaa ko tagaa ko o yi'ataa, fow no wallinaa, waɗaa e kene yeeso on mo hunoytoɗen.
58004014	Ɓay hiɗen mari hooreejo mawɗo yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla, taƴituɗo kammuuli ɗin, ɗun ko Iisaa Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, catoɗen e qirritannde gomɗinal men ngal.
58004015	Ko fii en maraa yottinoowo mawɗo mo waawataa faamude lo'ere men nden, kono o ndarndoranooma wano men non e ɗi fow, e hoore o waɗaali junuubu.
58004016	Awa ɓadoren hoolaare ka jullere laamu, ka sulfu on heɓoytoo ton, fii no heɓiren yurmeende e moƴƴere ko wonana en ballal fewndo haanani en.
58005001	Awa, kala yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, suɓaaɗo e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen, ko joɗɗiniraa ko fii yimɓe ɓen, fii ko waɗa golleeji Alla ɗin, fii no ɓe weeɓitira dokke e sadakaaji fii junuubaaji ɗin.
58005002	Himo waawi yurmeede ɓe faamaa ɓen e seluɓe ɓen, ko fii kanko tigi lo'ereeji no hundi mo.
58005003	Awa ko sabu nden lo'ere waɗi si himo haani ittande hoore makko sadaka, o ittana jamaa on kadi sadakaaji fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin.
58005004	Kono hay gooto waawataa heɓande hoore mun ngal teddungal wonugol yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka. Ko Alla yeɗata ɗun, wano o toɗɗori Haaruuna non.
58005005	Ko wano non kadi, hinaa Almasiihu on tigi yeɗi hoore mun ngal teddungal wonugol yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, kono ko Wi'uɗo mo on wonde: «Ko an woni Ɓiɗɗo an on, hande a wonii mo an.»
58005006	Wano non himo wi'i kadi nokku goo: «Ko a yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla haa poomaa wano Maaliki-Siddiiqu non.»
58005007	E hoore ɗun, e nder ngurndan makko ɗan ka hoore leydi, kanko Iisaa o weeɓitanno on Gasoowo mo dandude mayde nden gonɗi e torndeeji e nder ewnagol ko tiiɗi. Alla jaabinani mo sabu ko o yankinaninoo mo kon.
58005008	Fii kala ko o Ɓiɗɗo Alla, o andi ko woni ɗoftaare e nder ko o tampi kon fow.
58005009	Ɓay wonii o waɗaama Timmuɗo, o wonani ɗoftiiɓe mo ɓen fow ɓundu kisiyee poomayankeejo.
58005010	Onsay Alla toɗɗii mo yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla wano Maaliki-Siddiiqu non.
58005011	Hiɗen mari piiji buy ko wowlen e fii ɗun, hara ko piiji buy mettuɗi sifaade, ko fii on wonii mettuɓe faaminde.
58005012	E hin-le, e oo saa'i ɗoo hiɗon haanunoo wonude jannooɓe, kono hiɗon handi kadi e janneede ƴi'al daaluyeeji Alla ɗin. Fewndo ɗoo ko ɓira handuɗon e mun, hinaa ɲaametee.
58005013	On jokkuɗo yarugol ɓira, haray alaa faamu woo e fii daaluyee faaminayɗo ngurndan feewuɗan ɗan, ko fii haray haa jooni ootigi ko boobo.
58005014	Mokobaaɓe ɓen kaɲun, ko ɲaametee tedduɗo ɓe ɲaamata, ko fii tippude e kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen hakkille maɓɓe ɗen no eltanii sendindirgol ko boni e ko moƴƴi.
58006001	Ko ɗun waɗi, sutanoɗen jannde ƴoƴunde nden, feƴƴen jannde baggere fii Almasiihu on nden, hara en fuɗɗitaaki jannugol fii tuubugol kuuɗe nawrayɗe e mayde ɗen, e fii gomɗingol Alla,
58006002	e lootagol maande kisiyee, e fawugol juuɗe, e immitagol mayɓe ɓen, e ɲaawoore poomayankeere nden.
58006003	Ko ɗun waɗeten si Allaahu on newnii.
58006004	Fii ndayginananooɓe, mettii dokkal kammuyankewal ngal, tawdaa e hendiiɓe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on,
58006005	mettii moƴƴuki daaluyee Alla on wondude e doole aduna aroyoowo on ɓen kan,
58006006	si ɓe aru e selude gomɗinal ngal, ɓe waawetaake yilteede ka tuubuubuyee han kadi, ko fii haray kamɓe tigi ɓe fempitike Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, e hoore ɗun ɓe aybinii mo e kene.
58006007	Nde leydi yari ndiyan saaƴoojan soono woo, ndi fuɗini puɗi wonduɗi e nafa fii mo ndi remanaa on, haray hindi wondi e barki Alla.
