58006008	Kono si tawii ko bulle e kebbe ndi funnata, haray hinaa ndi huunde, ko ndi ɓadondirndi e kuddi, sakkitora sunneede.
58006009	Hay si men yewtirii nii, yo yiɓɓe amen, haray meɗen hoolii hiɗon e laawol moƴƴol e telen-ma kisiyee on.
58006010	Ko fii Alla hinaa mo feewaa, sakko o yejjita kuuɗe mon ɗen, e giggol ngol holluɗon fii innde makko nden, e golle ɗe waɗuɗon ɗen e ɗe waɗanton ɗen kadi yimɓe Alla ɓen.
58006011	Kono meɗen faalaa yo mo kala e mon hollir nii wakkilaare wootere nden e telen-ma pellital timmungal fii ko tanƴiniɗen kon haa ka sakkitorun.
58006012	Ko ɗun waɗi, wota on wonu aamuɓe, kono ɲembee ɓen heɓirnooɓe ndondi fodaandi ndin gomɗinal e muɲal.
58006013	Ko ɗun waɗi, nde Alla waɗannoo Ibraahiima fodaari ndin, o tawno o waawataa woondirde ko ɓuri mo kanko Alla mawnude, o woondiri hoore makko kanko tigi,
58006014	o wi'i: «Pellet, mi waɗay barki e maa fota, mi yaɲɲay jurriya maa on yaɲɲudee.»
58006015	Ko e nder ɗun, ɓay wonii Ibraahiima habbike e nder muɲɲaare, o heɓi non ko o fodanoo kon.
58006016	E hin-le, yimɓe ɓen no woondira ko ɓuri ɓe mawnude, nden woondoore wonana ɓe seedee fii rawnoode kala yeddondiral.
58006017	Ko wano non, hakkee ko Alla faalanoo hollude ronooɓe fodaari makko ndin ɓen noone no anniyee makko on firtortaa, o waɗirno ɗun woondoore
58006018	fii, sabu ɗee kuuɗe ɗiɗi ɗe waylotaako, ɗe tawata gasataa ka Alla fena, no enen fattiiɓe ɓen heɓiren wakkilaare tiiɗunde fii tamagol e tama'u mo Alla weeɓitani en on.
58006019	On tama'u no wa'ani en wa saanirgal tiiɗungal holnii fii ngurndan men ɗan, rewoowo ka wirngallo fii naatugol ka nder nokkuure hormorde mawnde nden,
58006020	ɗun ko ka Almasiihu on naati ɗon fii men wa fertaniiɗo en laawol, o woni yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla haa poomaa, wano Maaliki-Siddiiqu non.
58007001	Ko Maaliki-Siddiiqu on wonnoo lanɗo Salaam, e yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla Jom Ɓural on. O yahi, o fottoyi e Ibraahiima fewndo ko on iwtata fooloygol lamɓe ɓen, kanko Maaliki-Siddiiqu o du'anii mo.
58007002	Ibraahiima jonni mo sappaɓun e ɗi fow. Ko adii kon taho, innde Maaliki-Siddiiqu nden no firi ‹lanɗo peewal›. E hoore ɗun kadi ko o lanɗo Salaam, e maanaa lanɗo ɓuttu.
58007003	Kono o alaa neene, o alaa baaba, o alaa iwdi, o alaa fuɗɗoode, o alaa kattudi ngurndan. O wa'i wa Ɓiɗɗo Alla, o woni yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla haa poomaa.
58007004	Ndaaree ko haa honto o mawni, on mo Ibraahiima mawɗo on tigi jonni sappaɓun mun e nder ko o heɓoyi kon!
58007005	Sariya on toɗɗii e ɓiɓɓe Lewi ɓen wonugol yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla e ƴantooɓe sappaɓun e hoore ko jamaa Isra'iila on heɓi kon fow, ɗun ko e ɓen ben-gootooɓe maɓɓe, fii kala ɓen ko ɓe jurriya Ibraahiima.
58007006	Kono Maaliki-Siddiiqu, mo tawdaaka e jurriya Lewi on, o hendike sappaɓun Ibraahiima on, e hoore ɗun, o du'anii on hendiiɗo fodaariiji ɗin.
58007007	E hin-le yeddotaako ko mawɗo on du'antoo tosooko on.
58007008	E hin-le, e telen-ma yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen ka bolondaa Lewi, ko maayayɓe woni hendaade sappaɓun ɗun, kono e telen-ma Maaliki-Siddiiqu kan, ko wuuruɗo woni ko hendii, wano seeditoraa non.
58007009	Ka raɓɓinɗinnde, Lewi, oo wonɗo hendaade sappaɓun ɗun, o yoɓiino ko makko kon rewrude e Ibraahiima.
58007010	Ko fii hari himo ka keeci ben makko wa fewndo ko Maaliki-Siddiiqu yahi fottugol e Ibraahiima.
58007011	Ko rewrude e yottinooɓe sadaka ka gorol Lewi ɓen jamaa Isra'iila on hendornoo Sariya on. E hin-le, si tawno golle ɓen yottinooɓe sadaka ko timmunooɗe, harayno ko fii honɗun haanannoo waɗugol yottinoowo goo wano Maaliki-Siddiiqu non, hara hinaa wano Haaruuna non?
58007012	Ko fii si aada wonugol yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen waylike, haray no haani kadi ka Sariya on waylee.
58007013	Ko fii on mo ɗii piiji wowli fii mun on, ko jeyaaɗo e bolondaa goo mo hay gooto toɗɗaaka e mun fii golle layyorde nden.
58007014	E hoore ɗun, wano andirɗen non tigi, Joomi men on ko feeɲuɗo e bolondaa Yahuuda on. E telen-ma wonugol yottinooɓe sadaka, Muusaa wowlaali few fii on bolondaa.
58007015	Ɗunɗoo kadi no ɓuri ɓanginde si yottinoowo sadaka goo feeɲirii wa Maaliki-Siddiiqu,
58007016	wontuɗo yottinoowo sadaka, hara hinaa tippude e Sariya yuɓɓondirɗo e gorol lannoowol, kono ko tippude e doole ngurndan ɗan lannataa ɗan.
58007017	Ɓay no seeditaa wonde: «Ko a yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla haa poomaa, wano Maaliki-Siddiiqu non.»
58007018	Awa, ko yamiraa ɓaawo ɗoo kon ittaama, sabu lo'ere mun nden e mehiɗugol mun ngol,
58007019	ko fii Sariya on waawaali timminde huunde. Kono en addanaama tama'u ɓurɗo moƴƴude mo ɓadoren Alla.
58007020	Ɗun non waɗaaka e ɓaawo woondoore. Ɓeya non kaɲun wontii yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla e ɓaawo woondoore,
58007021	kono kanko Iisaa o wontirno ɗun woondoore, ɓay Alla daalanno mo ɗunɗoo: «Mi woondii, mi firtataa, ko a yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla haa poomaa.»
58007022	Ko ɗun waɗi si Iisaa wonii holnuɗo ahadi ɓurndi hittude ndin.
58007023	E hoore ɗun, hari ɓen yottinooɓe sadaka no woodunoo buy, ko fii hari mayde nden no haɗi ɓe duumagol e golle maɓɓe ɗen.
58007024	Kono Iisaa kaɲun, ɓay tawii himo wuuri haa poomaa, golle makko yottingol sadaka ɗen lannataa.
58007025	Ko ɗun waɗi kadi, himo waawi dandude few ɓen wonɓe ɓadorde Alla sabu makko kanko Iisaa, ɓay himo wuuri haa poomaa fii fattanagol ɓe.
58007026	Ko wano on yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka tigi haanannoo en, hara ko seniiɗo, mo bonnaali, mo aldaa e junuubu, seeduɗo e junuubanke'en, e ɓurɗo kammuuli ɗin ɓanteede,
58007027	mo hatonjinaa e ittugol sadakaaji wano yottinooɓe mawɓe ɓen ittirta ɲande woo sadakaaji fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin, kamɓe tigi taho, e ɗi jamaa on ɗin kadi. Iisaa waɗii ɗun nde wootere ko yoni fii saa'iiji ɗin fow, e nder ko o itti hoore makko sadaka kon.
58007028	Sariya on kaɲun, ɓe toɗɗotoo ɓen fii wonugol yottinooɓe sadaka mawɓe ko yimɓe lo'uɓe, kono daalol woondoore nden ɓawto Sariya on toɗɗike Ɓiɗɗo on, on wonɗo Timminaaɗo haa poomaa.
58008001	Awa e hino nafa toɓɓere nde wonɗen yewtude fii mun nden: hiɗen mari wano oo yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, jooɗiiɗo ka sengo ɲaamo jullere laamu Alla Mawɗo on ka kammuuli.
58008002	Ko o golloowo ka nder nokkuure hormorde, ɗun ko ka rewirdu goongaaru, hara hinaa ndu yimɓe ɓen darni, kono ko Joomiraaɗo on.
58008003	Kala yottinoowo mawɗo ko toɗɗoraa ko fii weeɓitangol Alla dokke e sadakaaji, bee yottinoowo men mawɗo on kadi heɓa goɗɗun ko o weeɓita.
58008004	Si tawno himo ka hoore leydi, o wonataano yottinoowo sadaka, ɓay no woodi weeɓitooɓe dokke, hara ko no yaadiri e Sariya on.
58008005	Ɓen no waɗude dewal ngal tawata ko mbaadi e ɗowdi goongaaji kammuyankeeji ɗin, wano Muusaa ɓanginiranaa non fewndo ko o darnata rewirdu ndun, Alla daalani mo: «Ndaaru, a waɗiray fow noone no holliraɗaa non ka hoore fello.»
58008006	Kono jooni, Almasiihu on heɓii golle ɓurɗe mawnude ɗe ɓeya ɗen, no o woniri non holnuɗo ahadi ɓurndi moƴƴude ndin, sincaandi e fodaariiji ɓurɗi kelɗude ɗin.
58008007	Si tawno ahadi araniri ndin wonno ndi felnaaki, hewtataano ka wonndi ɗaɓɓee.
58008008	E hin-le ko e hoore feloore Alla daalani jamaa mun on: «Kanko Joomiraaɗo on o daali: ‹Ɲalaande no aroya nde mi ƴettodoyta e yimɓe Isra'iila ɓen e yimɓe Yahuuda ɓen ahadi heyri.
58008009	Ndin ahadi wa'oytaa wa ndi mi ahodunoo e baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen ndin, wa fewndo mi tambitornoo ɓe juuɗe an ɗen fii yaltingol ɓe Misira, ko fii ɓe hunnaali ahadi an ndin.› «Joomiraaɗo on daali: ‹Min kadi jooni mi huccii ɓe.
58008010	E hino non ahadi ndi mi ahodoyta e yimɓe Isra'iila ɓen ɓawto ɗee ɲalaaɗe ɗoo.› «Joomiraaɗo on daali: ‹Mi waɗoyay sariyaaji an ɗin ka miijo maɓɓe, mi winda ɗi ka ɓerɗe maɓɓe, min mi wona Alla maɓɓe, kamɓe kadi ɓe wona jamaa an.
58008011	Hara ɓe hatonjinaa e jannindirgol maa fillitanagol wondiɗɗo mun maa musiɗɗo mun, wi'a: Bee andaa Joomiraaɗo on! Ko fii fow andoyay lan, gila e ɓurɗo fanɗude on haa e ɓurɗo mawnude on.
58008012	Ko fii mi yaafoyto ellaaji maɓɓe ɗin, mi hakkilanoytaa e junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin.› »
58008013	Ka o inni ndin ahadi heyri ɗon, ko ɗon o watti araniri ndin hinndi. E hin-le hinndi ndin nawyii, no e moggo mulugol.
58009001	Ahadi araniri ndin kadi no marnoo aadaaji mun yaaduɗi e dewal, wondude e nokkuure mun hormorde ka aduna ɗoo.
58009002	E hoore ɗun, rewirdu waɗanooma. Nokkuure aranere nden e ndun rewirdu no wi'etenoo hormorde, ka joɗɗinirde pitilli nden wonnoo ɗon, e taabal ngal e bireediije weeɓitanaaɗe Joomiraaɗo on ɗen.
58009003	E hoore ɗun, ɓaawo wirngallo ɗimmo ngon, tawi no ɗon nokkuure wi'etenoonde hormorde mawnde nden.
58009004	Tawi hinde wondunoo e sunnirde urngallooji tafiraande kaŋŋe, e kankiranwal seeditoore hoobiraangal kaŋŋe haa hunditi. Tawi no e nder maggal loonde kaŋŋe waɗornde ‹manna›, wondude e tuggordu Haaruuna ndun, ndu tawata hari fiinii, e alluuje maande ahadi ɗen.
58009005	Tawi no ka hoore kankiranwal nandollaaji serubiina Mangural ngal, omborde maggal on, ɗun ko ka junuubaaji ɗin yaafetee ɗon, no ɗuwiraa gabitanji majji ɗin. Kono hinaa fewndo ɗoo haanuɗen wowlugol fensita fii kun kala e koy piihoy.
58009006	Nde tawnoo ɗun fow ko non joɗɗiniranoo, yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla ɓen naatayno soono woo ka nokkuure aranere e nder rewirdu ndun, fii waɗugol golle diina maɓɓe kan.
58009007	Kono ka nokkuure hormorde mawnde, ko yottinoowo mawɗo on tun naataynoo ton nde wootere e nder hitaande nden, e hoore addorgol ƴiiƴan ko sakkoo fii hoore mun e fii ellaaji ɗi jamaa on waɗiri angal andude.
58009008	Ruuhu Seniiɗo on no holliri en telen ɗoo wonde ɗatal nokkuure hormorde mawnde nden udditaaki, fannamaa rewirdu aranuru ndun no lutti.
58009009	Hiɗen mari ɗoo misal feɲɲingal goongaaji fewndiiɗi hande ɗin. Ɗun fow no ɓangini wonde dokke e sadakaaji, ko weeɓitirantenoo nii Alla, waawataa laɓɓinde ɓernde on rewiroowo non.
58009010	Ko ɗunɗoo woni yamirooje neɗɗanke tun yuɓɓondirɗe e ɲaameteeji e njaramji e noone salligiiji, yamiraaɗe haa ɲande Alla heyɗintini piiji ɗin fow.
58009011	Kono Almasiihu on ardii wa yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka fii moƴƴereeji fewndiiɗi ɗin. O taƴiti rewirdu ɓurndu mawnude ndun e ɓurndu timmude ndun, ndu tawata hinaa darniraandu juuɗe yimɓe, e maanaa ndun hinaa ndu oo aduna.
58009012	O naatii ka nokkuure hormorde mawnde nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa, rewrude e ƴiiƴan makko ɗan tigi, hara hinaa rewrude e ƴiiƴan ciikuliiji e ɲalbi. Ko nii o yeɗiri en cottudi poomayankeeri.
58009013	Si tawii ƴiiƴan ciikuliiji e ga'i na'i e ndoondi wiige, ko wiccitee junjee e hoore yimɓe ɓe laaɓaa, no laɓɓina ɓe ka ɓandu,
58009014	kono Almasiihu on kaɲun ko hoore mun tigi ittani Alla sadaka e ɓaawo ella, e hoore ardoreede Ruuhu Poomayankeejo on, ko haa honto non ƴiiƴan makko ɗan laɓɓinta ɓerɗe men, itta en e kuuɗe nawrayɗe en e mayde, fii no rewiren Alla Wuuruɗo on!
58009015	Ko ɗun waɗi si ko kanko woni holnuɗo ahadi heyri ndin, fii yo noddaaɓe ɓen hendo ndondi poomayankeeri ndi Alla fodi ɓe ndin. Ko fii mayde makko nden wonii sadaka fii sottugol ɓe e ɗin bonnereeji waɗaaɗi ka fewndo ahadi hinndi.
58009016	Ko fii, ka wasiyannde nden woni ɗon, haray no haani ka mayde wasiyiiɗo on andee.
58009017	Wasiyannde nden non laatike woo ɓawto mayde nden, ko fii nde alaa nafa fewndo wasiyiiɗo on wuuri.
58009018	Ko ɗun waɗi, ahadi araniri ndin tigi, ndi udditaaka e ɓaawo hibbugol ƴiiƴan.
58009019	Ɓay Muusaa gaynii weeɓitande jamaa on fow kala yamiroore, wano ɗe woniri non ka Sariya, o ƴetti ƴiiƴan ga'i na'i e ciikuliiji e ndiyan e gaara boɗe, o wicciri deftere nden e jamaa on baapal no wi'ee hisoopu,
58009020	e hoore himo wi'a: «Ɗunɗoo ko ƴiiƴan ahadi ndi Alla yamiri fii mon ndin nii.»
58009021	Ko wano non kadi, o wicciri rewirdu ndun e aalaaji gollirteeɗi fii diina ɗin ƴiiƴan.
58009022	E telen-ma Sariya on, fayda fow ko ƴiiƴan laɓɓiniraa, ko fii yaafuyee alaa e ɓaawo hibbugol ƴiiƴan.
58009023	Ɗin aalaaji lontiiɗi goongaaji kammuyankeeji, no haanunoo laɓɓinireede oo noone ɗoo, kono no haaniri non ka haqiiqaaji kammuyankeeji ɗin laɓɓiniree sadakaaji ɓurɗi moƴƴude.
58009024	Ko fii Almasiihu on naataali e nder nokkuure hormorde waɗiraande juuɗe neɗɗanke, ɲembinaande goongaare nden, kono ko ka kammu tigi fii no o weeɓitorana en jooni yeeso Alla.
58009025	O naatiraali fii ittugol hoore makko sadaka soono woo, wano yottinooɓe mawɓe ɓen naatirta hitaande woo ka nokkuure hormorde mawnde wondude e ƴiiƴan ɗan tawata wonaa ƴiiƴan makko.
58009026	Ko fii, si hinaano ɗun, Almasiihu on tampayno soono woo gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna on. Kono jooni, ka lannoode jamaanuuji, o feeɲii nde wootere ko yoni fii saa'iiji ɗin fow fii bonnitugol junuubaaji e nder ko o itti hoore makko sadaka kon.
58009027	Nde tawnoo no maranaa yimɓe ɓen maayugol nde wootere pet, ɓawto ɗun ɲaawoore nden waɗa,
58009028	ko wano non Almasiihu on ittiri hoore mun sadaka nde wootere pet fii ronditagol junuubaaji yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe. Awa, o artoyay kadi, hara hinaa fii ronditagol junuubaaji, kono ko fii dandugol ɓen habbornooɓe mo kisiyee.
58010001	E hoore ɗun, wonaa Sariya on tigi woni haqiiqaaji aroyaynooɗi ɗin, kono ko mbaadi mun tun. O waawataa few laatinde ɓen ɓadorayɓe non Alla timmuɓe, rewrude e on sadaka gooto jokkondirɗo hitaande woo hitaande.
58010002	Si o waawayno, harayno neeɓii ko ɓen waɗaynooɓe ɗin sadakaaji acci, harayno ɓe laɓɓinaama nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa, harayno kadi ɓernde maɓɓe felataa ɓe e telen-ma junuubu woo.
58010003	Kono, ɗin sadakaaji andintinay en hitaande kala fii junuubaaji ɗin.
58010004	Ko fii waawataa ka ƴiiƴan ga'i na'i e ciikuliiji monta junuubaaji.
58010005	Ko ɗun waɗi, e nder naatugol e nder aduna on, Almasiihu on no wi'i: «Wonaa sadakaaji maa dokke faalaɗaa, kono a waɗanii lan ɓandu.
58010006	A weltoraali sadaka sunneteeɗo, maa ko sakkaa fii junuubu.
58010007	Awa mi wi'i: ‹E hino lan, mi arii fii waɗugol faale maa on, yaa an Alla, wano fii an windori non e nder ndee deftere taggiinde.› »
58010008	Himo wi'i taho: «A yiɗaali e a weltoraali sadakaaji e dokke e sadakaaji sunneteeɗi e sadakaaji fii junuubaaji, waɗiranooɗi no yaadiri e Sariya on.»
58010009	E hoore ɗun o wi'i kadi: «E hino lan, mi arii fii waɗugol faale maa on.» O ittii aranun ɗun fii sincugol ɗimmun ɗun.
58010010	Awa, ko sabu faale Alla on laɓɓinaɗen fii wonugol yimɓe makko, rewrude e oo sadaka mo Iisaa Almasiihu on ittiri ɓandu mun ndun tigi nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa.
58010011	Kala yottinoowo sadaka ka Alla no ka gollata ɗon ɲande woo fii waɗugol golle mun diina ɗen, e ittugol sadakaaji gooti ɲande woo, ɗi tawata waawataa ittude junuubaaji few.
58010012	Almasiihu on non kaɲun, o waɗii sadaka gooto bajjo fii junuubaaji ɗin, yonuɗo haa poomaa, awa kadi himo jooɗii ka sengo ɲaamo Alla,
58010013	himo sabbii ɗon haa Alla waɗa ayɓe makko ɓen ka ley koyɗe makko.
58010014	Ko dokkal bajjal o timminiri haa poomaa wonaaɓe laɓɓineede fii wonugol yimɓe Alla ɓen.
58010015	Ko ɗun Ruuhu Seniiɗo on seeditanii en kadi. Ko fii himo wi'i taho:
58010016	«Joomiraaɗo on daali: ‹E hino ahadi ndi mi ƴettodoyta e maɓɓe ndin: Ɓawto ɗee ɲalaaɗe ɗoo, mi waɗoyay sariyaaji an ɗin ka ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi windoya ɗi ka hakkille maɓɓe.› »
58010017	O ɓeyditi e ɗun: «Mi anditoytaa hande kadi fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin e angal peewal maɓɓe ngal.»
58010018	Ko fii ka junuubaaji ɗin yaafaa ɗon, haray alaa ko sakkee fii junuubu.
58010019	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an, ɓay hiɗen mari hoolaare fii naatugol ka nokkuure hormorde mawnde sabu oo sadaka ƴiiƴan Iisaa
58010020	ɗan o udditirani en laawol kesol wurngol, rewrungol ka wirngallo, ngon-le ko ɓandu makko ndun,
58010021	e ɓay kadi hiɗen mari yottinoowo mawɗo wonɗo ka suudu Alla,
58010022	ɓadoren Alla ɓernde nunɗunde e gomɗinal heewungal pellital, e ɓernde laɓɓinaande kala miijooji bonɗi, e ɓandu lootiraandu ndiyan laaɓuɗan.
58010023	Wonen catiiɓe tabiti e tama'u mo qirritiɗen on, ko fii Waɗanɗo en ɗin fodaariiji on ko Sella-findeejo.
58010024	Miijondiranen ko honno waaweten wakkilindirde ka giggol e ka kuuɗe moƴƴe.
58010025	Wota en terto mottondiral men ngal, wano woɓɓe woowiri non. Kono wakkilindiren fodde hiɗen yi'ude ɲalaande nden no ɓadaade.
58010026	Ko fii si en duumike waɗugol junuubu e nder tewaare ɓawto en hendaade gandal goonga on, haray sadaka alaa hande kadi fii junuubaaji,
58010027	kono ko habbannde ɲaawoore hulɓiniinde e nguleendi yiite hebuliinge sunnugol murtuɓe ɓen.
58010028	Si goɗɗo bonniino Sariya Muusaa on, o wareteno, o yaafetaake, e hoore seeditoore ɗiɗo maa tato.
58010029	E miijo mon onon, si goɗɗo hayfinii Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, si o jogitorii ƴiiƴan ahadi ɗan wa ɗan aldaa e fiira, ɗan ɗan o laɓɓiniraa, e si o hoynii Ruuhu Allaahu on, on Jom Sulfu, e hara on miijaaki himo handi e lette ɓurɗe muusude kadi?
58010030	Ko fii hiɗen andi on Wi'uɗo: «Ko min yottagol woodani, ko min yoɓoyta», e hoore ɗun: «Joomiraaɗo on ɲaaway jamaa mun on.»
58010031	No hulɓinii yanugol e juuɗe Alla Wuuruɗo on!
58010032	Anditee liddu ɗun ka saa'iiji arani, ɓawto Alla ndayginande on, on ŋaɲɲino satteende tiiɗunde e nder tippiro muusungo.
58010033	Ko fii e saa'i goo on hoynano, cukkaɗon e kene, e saa'i goo jonnindirɗon juuɗe e ɓen waɗiranooɓe wano non.
58010034	E hoore ɗun, yurmaɗon sokaaɓe ɓen, jaɓuɗon kadi e nder weltaare yo on jatte keyeeji mon ɗin, sabu andugol mon hiɗon mari keyee ɓurɗo moƴƴude, luttoowo.
58010035	Awa wota on accitu hoolaare mon addaynde mbarjaari mawndi nden.
58010036	Ko fii hiɗon haani ŋaɲɲaade, fii, nde timminoyɗon faale Alla on, yo on hendoyo ko o fodi on kon.
58010037	Ko fii e nder saa'ihun nii: «Haanuɗo arude on aray, neeɓataa.
58010038	Feewuɗo an on non wuuriray gomɗinal. Kono si o yiltitike, wonkii an kin weltanoytaako mo.»
58010039	Enen-le hinaa en yiltorooɓe ɓaawo fii hayrugol, kono ko en gomɗinɓe fii dandegol.
58011001	E hin-le, gomɗinal ngal ko pellital fii piiji ɗi tanƴiniɗen, e hoolaare fii piiji ɗi en yi'aali taho.
58011002	Alla kulji mawɓe ɓaawo ɗoo ɓen sabu gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal.
58011003	Ko gomɗinal ngal wonɗen andirde aduna on ko daaluyee Alla on tagiraa. Ko ɗun waɗi ko yi'eten kon iwraa e ko yi'otoo.
58011004	Ko gomɗinal ngal Haabiila yeɗiri Alla sadaka ɓurɗo moƴƴude mo Qaayiina on. O kuljiraa feewuɗo sabu ngal gomɗinal. Alla tigi kulji ɗen dokke makko. Fii kala kanko Haabiila o maayii, kono ngal gomɗinal no ɓanginde fii makko.
58011005	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi Hanuuka ƴentiniraa fii wota o andu mayde nden. En yi'ataa mo hande kadi sabu Allaahu on ƴentinno mo. Ko fii, ado o ƴentineede, hari o heɓiino kuluujaa wonde himo weltini Alla.
58011006	Awa, e ɓaawo gomɗinal, gasataa ka ontigi weltina Alla, ko fii on ɓadotooɗo mo no haani gomɗinde wonde kanko Alla himo woodaa, gomɗina kadi ko kanko woni yoɓoowo ɗaɓɓooɓe mo ɓen.
58011007	Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin Nuuhu moƴƴinirnoo laana fii dandugol ɓeynguure mun nden. Ko nii o teddiniri ko Alla hiitaninoo mo fii ko aroyta yi'aaka taho kon. Ɓay o warrii non kanko Nuuhu, tawi o hollii wonde yimɓe aduna on ko felniiɓe. Alla jogori Nuuhu feewuɗo sabu gomɗinal makko ngal.
58011008	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi Ibraahiima ɗoftori noddaandu ndu Alla noddi mo ndun fii yahugol e leydi ndi o ronoyta ndin. O yahi e hoore o andaa ka o woni yahude.
58011009	Ko gomɗinal o hoɗiri e ndin leydi fodaandi wa leydi jananiri, o hoɗi e nder cuuɗi bagi. Issaaqa e Yaaquuba kadi hoɗiri non, ɓe ronidi e makko fodaari wootiri ndin.
58011010	Ko fii hari, kanko Ibraahiima himo habbii hoɗo ngo tawata didol cuuɗi mun no tiiɗi, ngo tawata ko Alla eɓɓi, darni.
58011011	Ko sabu gomɗinal ngal kadi, fii kala Saarata kaɲun ko mo jiidotaako, o heɓiri feere jurriyagol e nder nayeewu makko, ɓay himo hoolii wonde Alla ko hunnoowo ko o fodi kon.
58011012	Ko ɗun waɗi si neɗɗo gooto, mo tawata mayde mun nden heɓiino ɗun, heɓi jurriya ɓurɗo koode ɗen ka kammu ɗuuɗude e njaareendi ndin ka sera baharu, ko tawata en waawataa limude.
58011013	Ko e nder gomɗinal ngal ɓe fow ɓe maayi e ɓaawo hendagol piiji fodaaɗi ɗin, kono ɓe haynino ɗi ka woɗɗi, ɓe weltori, e nder qirritagol ko ɓe tuŋarankeeɓe e jananɓe ka leydi.
58011014	Yewtirayɓe nii ɓen hollii no laaɓiri wonde hiɓe ɗaɓɓande hoore maɓɓe leydi heyri.
58011015	Si tawno non ɓe wulɗano ka ɓe iwi ton, ɓe heɓayno feere no ɓe yiltora.
58011016	Kono ka haqiiqa hiɓe himmannoo nokkuure ɓurnde moƴƴude, ɗun ko ka kammu. Ko ɗun waɗi Alla hersiraa noddeede Alla maɓɓe, ko fii o moƴƴinanii ɓe hoɗo.
58011017	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi Ibraahiima weeɓitiri Issaaqa fii layyagol fewndo ko Allaahu on ndarndii mo. Hari himo e fii sakkagol Issaaqa, ɓiɗɗo makko bajjo on, kanko hendinooɗo fodaariiji ɗin,
58011018	ɗun ko on mo Allaahu on daalannoo wonde: «Ko e Issaaqa jurriya maa on nodditirtee.»
58011019	Himo joginoo wonde Alla ko Waawuɗo hay immintingol mayɗo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, ko ɗun waɗi si o hettitiri ɓiɗɗo makko on wa immitiiɗo e mayde.
58011020	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi Issaaqa du'orani Yaaquuba e Iisu fii ko aroyta kon.
58011021	Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin, fewndo Yaaquuba maayata, o du'orani mo kala e ɓiɓɓe Yuusufu ɓen, o ugginii e hoore tuggordu makko ndun, o sujjani Alla.
58011022	Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin, ɓay ɓadike ka Yuusufu maaya, o maandiniri fii eggudu Banii-Isra'iila'en ndun Misira, o waɗi kadi yamirooje fii ƴi'e makko ɗen.
58011023	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi, ɓay Muusaa jibinaama, mawɓe makko ɓen suuɗiri mo lebbi tati, ɓay ɓe tawii boobo on no labaa fota, awa kadi ɓe hulaano yamiroore lanɗo on.
58011024	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi, ɓay Muusaa mawnii, o salori wi'eede ko o geɗal jiwo Fir'awna on.
58011025	O tawi ko tampindineede e jamaa Alla on ɓurani mo, edii weltorgol junuubu e nder saa'ihun.
58011026	Tawi himo miijii wonde ko aybinireede wa Almasiihu on ɓuri jogaade ngalu tiiɗungu edii ngu Misira ngun, ko fii himo ndaaraynoo ka muutii telen ka njoddi.
58011027	Ko gomɗinal ngal o yaltiri Misira e ɓaawo ɗenƴagol tikkere lanɗo on, ɓay himo catornoo wa sutiiɗo on mo yi'otaako.
58011028	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi o waɗiri Juldeere Yawtaneede nden, e wujugol ƴiiƴan fii wota muloowo dikkuruuɓe on meemu ko dikkoranaa Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen kon.
58011029	Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin ɓe taƴitiri Baharu Boɗeejo on wa leydi yorndi, kono nde Misirayankooɓe ɓen eɓɓunoo waɗirgol non, ɓe yoolino.
58011030	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi tata on Yeerikoo yaniri, ɓay ɓe gaynii taaraade mo e nder balɗe jeeɗiɗi.
58011031	Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi waɗi si Raabi, oo debbo cagaajo, maydaano e heeferɓe ɓen, sabu ko o wernirnoo tefooɓe ɓen kon ɓuttu.
58011032	Ko honɗun mi wi'ata kadi? Saa'i on yonantaa lan si tawii mi wowlay mi fensita fii oo wi'eteeɗo Gadawna e Baaraka e Samsuuna e Yiftaaha e Daawuuda e Samu'iila e annabaaɓe ɓen.
58011033	Ko gomɗinal ngal ɓe fooliri laamateeriiji, ɓe tabintini peewal, ɓe heɓi fodaariiji, ɓe ombi sekko ngayuuje.
58011034	Ɓe ɗannini giiteeli bonnooji, ɓe daɗi mbelndi kaafa, ɓe heewi doole fii kala hiɓe lo'unoo, ɓe hollitii ka nder hareeji, ɓe raɗii koneeli jananɓe ɓen.
58011035	Rewɓe yi'i mayɓe mun no immitoo. Woɓɓe goo kadi lettaa, ɓe salii sotteede fii no ɓe heɓira ummutal ɓurngal moƴƴude.
58011036	Woɓɓe ɓen heɓi aybineede e focceede, e hoore jolkeede sokee.
58011037	Woɓɓe ɓen wariraa kaaƴe, woɓɓe ɓen tampinaa taƴaa ɗiɗi, maa wariraa kaafa. Woɓɓe nawri ngurndan mun ɗan yaarugol hen fow, hara no ɓornii guri baali maa be'i, ɓillorɓe ɗi fow, cukkee tampinee.
58011038	Hari aduna on handaa e ɓen, ɓe tawata wonundeeji mun ko ka wulaaji e ka pelle e ka pammeeje e ka gayɗe.
58011039	Ɓen kuljiranooɓe sabu gomɗinal mun ngal fow non, hendaaki ko ɓe fodanoo kon.
58011040	Ko fii Alla no eɓɓani en goɗɗun ko ɓuri moƴƴude, fii wota ɓe laato timmuɓe e ɓaawo men.
58012001	Ɓay wano ngal dental mawngal seedeeɓe no hundi en, bugitoɗen kala dongal e junuubu ko falli en no weeɓiri, dogiren wakkilaare dogudu ndu eɓɓanaɗen ndun.
58012002	Punnoɗen Iisaa, on wonɗo daƴƴere gomɗinal ngal, on timminoowo ngal. Ɓay himo sutinoo weltaare maraniinde mo nden, o jaɓuno leggal altindiraangal ngal, o yawitii hersa, o jooɗii ka sengo ɲaamo jullere laamu Alla.
58012003	Miijitee fii on ŋaɲɲiiɗo ndee liddannde nde junuubanke'en liddii mo, fii wota ronkere heɓu on haa ɓerɗe mon maaya.
58012004	E hin-le e nder gertagol mon junuubu ngol, on dartaaki haa ƴiiƴan mon ɗan hibbi.
58012005	Awa kadi on yejjitii kongol ngol Allaahu on wakkiliri on ngol wa ɓiɓɓe makko: «Ɓiɗɗo an, wota a jogitor wurtannde Joomiraaɗo on no hayfiri, awa kadi wota ɓernde maa maayu nde o wurtu-maa.
58012006	Ko fii ko mo Joomiraaɗo on yiɗi, o wurtata, o yaggina kala mo o jaɓi yo wonu ɓiɗɗo makko.»
58012007	Wakkilee tampereeji mon ɗin, ko ɗin woni on wurtude. Ko wa ɓiɓɓe Alla woni on jogitorde. Ko hombo woni ɓiɗɗo mo ben mun wurtataa?
58012008	Kono si on woorike wurtannde nde fow heɓata nden, haray ko on fattuuɓe, hinaa on ɓiɓɓe.
58012009	Ɓay en heɓii baabaaɓe ka aduna ɗoo wurtaynooɓe en, ɓe teddinnoɗen, ko haa honto non haanuɗen yankinanaade Ben ruuhuuji men ɗin fii no wuuriren!
58012010	Ko fii baabiraaɓe men ɓen no wurtaynoo en e nder saa'ihun nii, ɓay ɓe tawno ko ko moƴƴi, kono Alla ko woni en wurtirde ko fii nafa men on tigi, fii no tawreɗen e laaɓal makko ngal.
58012011	No fellitaa fewndo wurteede nandaa e huunde weltinnde, kono ko satteende. Kono ɓawto ɗun, battane ngurndan feewuɗan wonɗan e nder ɓuttu no maranii ɓen wurtaaɓe.
58012012	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'ay on, ɓantee juuɗe mon lo'uɗe ɗen, sattinon koppi mon lo'uɗi ɗin,
58012013	yo koyɗe mon ɗen jokku laawi feewuɗi ɗin, fii wota laƴooje ɗen worgito, kono ɗe sella.
58012014	Etee no wondiron e fow e nder ɓuttu, wuuron e nder laaɓal, ko fii ɓaawo maggal hay gooto yi'ataa Joomiraaɗo on.
58012015	Reenee fii wota hay gooto ŋakkire moƴƴere Alla nden, wota ɗaɗol haaɗungol woo kadi funtu, wona sabu jiiɓoldu haa raaɓa buy e mon.
58012016	Reenee fii wota hay gooto e mon jeenu, maa wona keefeero wa Iisu, on yeeyitunooɗo afoyaagal mun ngal fii nafakka gooto.
58012017	Hiɗon andi, ɓawto ɗun, wa fewndo ko o faalaa heɓude du'aa ben makko on, o bugitano, ko fii o heɓaano feere waylugol miijo ben makko ngon, fii kala hari himo ɗaɓɓirde ɗun gonɗi.
58012018	Ko fii onon, on ɓadaaki fello ngo waaweten meemude, e yiite huɓɓunge e ɗowdi duule e niɓe e nduluuru,
58012019	maa hito liital, maa hawa ka Isra'iilayankeeɓe ɓen nanunoo kan haa ɓe wi'i wota ɓe ɓeyditane hay kongol,
58012020	ko fii ɓe townataano sifa ndee yamiroore tiiɗunde ɗoo: «Hay si mummunte meemiino ngon fello, warirteno kaaƴe.»
58012021	Hakkee ko ɗun hulɓininoo, Muusaa wi'i: «Mi diwnii hakkee ko mi huli!»
58012022	Kono onon, on ɓadike Fello Siyuuna ngon e saare Alla Wuuruɗo on, ɗun ko Yerusalaam kammuyankeejo on, e guluuje malaa'ika mottondiri e nder weltaare.
58012023	On ɓadike dental dikkuruuɓe Alla ɓen, ɓen ɓe tawata no windii ka kammuuli. On ɓadike Alla, on Ɲaawoowo yimɓe ɓen fow, e ruuhuuji feewuɓe timminaaɓe ɓen.
58012024	On ɓadike Iisaa, on holnuɗo ahadi heyri ndin, e ƴiiƴan makko hibbaaɗan, ɗan seeɗitoore mun ɓuri moƴƴude ɗan Haabiila ɗan.
58012025	Awa reenee wota on salo heɗaade on Wonɗo on yewtude. Ɓen Isra'iilayankeeɓe, salinooɓe heɗaade on Wonnooɗo ɓe yamirde ka hoore leydi, ɓe daɗaano lette ɗen. E ko honno non woniranta en si en huccii on Wonɗo en yewtude ka kammuuli dow?
58012026	On mo hito mun dimbi leydi ndin, waɗii jooni ndii fodaari ɗoo: «Awa mi dimbitoyay nde wootere kadi, hinaa non leydi ndin tun, kono hay kammu ngun.»
58012027	Ngol daalol «nde wootere kadi» no laaɓi poy holli wonde kala ko tagaa dimboto, dilla, fii no goongaaji ɗi gasataa dimbaade ɗin luttira.
58012028	Ɓay laamu ngu hendotoɗen ngun hinaa dimbotoongu, weltanoɗen Alla, kurkanoɗen mo noone no welirta mo e nder teddungal e kulol.
58012029	Ko fii Alla men on ko yiite sunnoowe.
58013001	Yo giggol siɗɗankaaku ngol duumo.
58013002	Wota on yejjitu wernugol. Ko fii e nder warrugol non woɓɓe wernii malaa'ikaaɓe, hara ɓe andaa.
58013003	Anditee fii kasooɓe ɓen, wa si tawii hiɗon sokidaa e maɓɓe, e wonaaɓe e tampineede ɓen, wa si tawii ko onon wonaa tampineede.
58013004	Yo mo kala teddin dewgal ngal, awa kadi yo ƴettindirɓe ɓen yonindiran, ko fii telen-ma ɗon, Alla ɲaaway fijooɓe ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen.
58013005	Wota on ardinir ngurndan mon ɗan giggol kaalisi, yondinoree ko jogiɗon kon fewndo ɗoo. Ko fii Alla tigi no wi'i: «Mi accitataa ma e mi tertotaako ma few.»
58013006	Mo kala e men no waawi wi'ude e nder pellital: «Ko Joomiraaɗo on woni faabo an ngon, mi hulataa. Ko honɗun neɗɗo waawanimmi?»
58013007	Anditee fii ardotooɓe on ɓen, ɓen feɲɲinannooɓe on daaluyee Alla on, miijitoɗon fii battane no ɓe wuuriri non, ɲembon gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal.
58013008	Awa Iisaa Almasiihu on ko gooto, o waylotaako hanki e hande e haa poomaa.
58013009	Wota on jaɓu kala noone janndeeji janani selna on. Ko fii no moƴƴi ka ɓernde nden tiiɗiniree moƴƴere Alla nden, hara hinaa sariyaaji fii ɲaameteeji ɗi nafaali huunde ɓen jokkuɓe ɗi.
58013010	Ko fii hiɗen mari layyorde nde tawata haananaa gollooɓe ka rewirdu adunayankeeru ɲaamugol ko sakkaa ɗon kon.
58013011	Ko fii yottinooɓe mawɓe sadaka ɓen sakkorayno ƴiiƴan ka nokkuure hormorde, kono tebbeeli ɗin sunneteno ka ɓaawo hoɗo.
58013012	Ko ɗun waɗi si Iisaa kadi tampuno ka ɓaawo hoɗo fii laɓɓinirgol jamaa on ƴiiƴan makko ɗan tigi.
58013013	Awa enen kadi, yalten ka ɓaawo hoɗo fii yahugol e makko, e hoore rondagol hersa ka o rondinoo kan.
58013014	Ko fii en maraa ɗoo hoɗo tabitungo, kono hiɗen ɗaɓɓude aroyayngo ngon.
58013015	E innde makko kanko Iisaa, duumoɗen e waɗangol Alla sadaka mantoore, e maanaa sadaka yaltoowo e toni jantotooɗi innde makko nden.
58013016	Awa wota on weddito e waɗugol moƴƴere e wallindirgol, ko ɗii woni sadakaaji ɗi Alla jaɓata weltora.
58013017	Ɗoftee ardotooɓe on ɓen, yankinanoɗon ɓe. Ko fii hiɓe ayni fota wonkiiji mon ɗin, wa hunitoytooɓe ka Alla. Awa etee ɓe waɗa ɗun e hoore weltaare, hara hinaa no mettirta ɓe. Si hinaa ɗun, nafoytaa on.
58013018	Awa toranee men: meɗen felliti wonde meɗen mari ɓernde laaɓunde e nder faalegol nawrude ngurndan amen ɗan no feewiri e kala huunde.
58013019	Mi torike on fow tentinii toragol fii yo Allaahu on newnanan yiltitagol ka mon no yaawiri.
58013020	Yo Alla Jom Ɓuttu on, on Artirɗo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen Iisaa Joomi men, Ngaynaako Mawɗo baali ɗin, rewrude e ƴiiƴan ahadi poomayankeeri ndin,
58013021	yo o wawnu on e kala ko moƴƴi fii waɗugol faale makko on, o waɗa e men ko welata mo, tippude e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo mangural wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
58013022	Mi torike on, yo musiɓɓe an, jaɓugol ngol kongol wakkilinayngol, ko fii mi windanii on, mi raɓɓinɗinii.
58013023	Awa andee wonde, Timotee, oo musiɗɗo men, yaltinaama ka kaso. Si o hewtitii law, mi yaaday e makko, men yiida e mon.
58013024	Hiwranee lan ardotooɓe on ɓen fow e yimɓe Alla ɓen fow. Ɓee ɓe Italii salminii on.
58013025	Yo moƴƴere Joomiraaɗo on wonu e hoore mon on fow.
59001001	Salminaango an min Yaaquuba, oo jiyaaɗo Alla e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, haa e ɗii bolondaaji sappoo e ɗiɗi saakitiiɗi e nder aduna on.
59001002	Ko onon yo musiɓɓe, si on rewrii e kala noone ndarndanɗe, haray jogitoree ɗun weltaare fow,
59001003	ko fii hiɗon andi, ndarndagol gomɗinal mon ngal adday ŋaɲɲaare.
59001004	Kono bee ŋaɲɲaare nden waɗa golle timmuɗe, fii no woniron mokobaaɓe timmuɓe, e hara on ŋakkiraaka huunde.
59001005	Si goɗɗo e mon ŋakkira faamu, yo o toro ɗun Alla, on okkay mo ɗun. Ko fii kanko Alla ko Yeɗoowo fow no yaajiri e ɓaawo feloore.
59001006	Kono yo o toror mo gomɗinal ngal aldaa e sikkitaare. Ko fii on sikkitiiɗo no wa'i wa morlooɗe ndiyan ɗan ka baharu, ɗe hendu ndun duɲata ƴeƴa.
59001007	Wota sifa on neɗɗo sikku hendoto goɗɗun e juuɗe Joomiraaɗo on,
59001008	on ko neɗɗo sikkitiiɗo, mo tabitaa e laawi mun ɗin fow.
59001009	Yo musiɗɗo miskiino on weltor ko Alla towni mo kon,
59001010	alɗuɗo on kadi weltora ko Alla tippini mo kon, ɓay fii makko on feƴƴiray wa piindi ngesa.
59001011	Si naange ngen fuɗii, nge toowidii e nguleendi magge muusundi ndin, hinge yornude kuɗi ɗin, piindi majji on saama, ŋari majji on bonta, ko non alɗuɓe ɓen saamirta e nder golle maɓɓe ɗen.
59001012	Maloore wonanii on neɗɗo ŋaɲɲiiɗo ndarndanɗe ɗen, ko fii si o dartike ndarndanɗe ɗen, o hendoto meetelol ngurndan, ngol Joomiraaɗo on fodi yiɗuɓe mo ɓen.
59001013	Wota hay gooto wi'u e nder ko jarribetee kon: «Ko Alla jarribii mi.» Ko fii Alla jarribortaake ko boni, kanko kadi o jarribotaako hay gooto.
59001014	Nde jarribaɗen woo, ko himmeeji bonɗi ɗi wonduɗen ɗin woni en pooɗude murtina.
59001015	Ɓawto ɗun, himme bonɗo on fuɗa haa rima junuubu, si junuubu on kadi heewii, o rima mayde.
59001016	Wota on ɗaynito, yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe,
59001017	kala dokkal moƴƴal e kala dokkal timmungal ko ka dow iwrani en, e immorde e Baabaajo ndayguuji ɗin, on mo waylotaako, mo ɗowdi mun dillataa,
59001018	on Woodintinirɗo en Daaluyee makko goongaajo on no o yiɗiri non, fii no laatoren dikkuruuɓe e tagu makko ngun.
59001019	Andee ɗun, yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe, yo neɗɗo kala yaawu heɗaade, nenna si yewta, nenna si tikka.
59001020	Ko fii tikkannde neɗɗanke nden laatintaa peewal ngal Alla yiɗi ngal.
59001021	Awa sertee e kala ko tuuninta e kala bonki layuki, jaɓiron newaare daaluyee aawaaɗo e mon on, ɗun ko on waawuɗo dandude wonkiiji mon ɗin.
59001022	Wonee huutorooɓe daaluyee on, hara hinaa on heɗotooɓe mo tun, si hinaa ɗun, haray onon tigi on ɗaynitoto woni.
59001023	Ko fii si goɗɗo heɗike daaluyee on, o huutoraali mo, haray himo wa'i wa neɗɗo wonɗo tintaade, yi'a yeeso mun ngon.
59001024	Si o gaynii ndaaritaade, o yahii, o yejjita kisan ko honno o wa'i.
59001025	Kono on waɗuɗo giiɗe mun ɗen ka nder sariya timmuɗo, ɗun ko on sariya rinɗinoowo, o tabiti, hara hinaa fii heɗagol yejjita, kono hara ko huutorgol, onɗon wonay malaaɗo e nder kala ko o waɗata.
59001026	On mo sikki ko dewo, e ɓaawo waawugol ɗenngal mun ngal, haray on ɗaynii hoore mun, ngal dewal ko meerewal.
59001027	Dewal laaɓungal, ngal aldaa e koju ngal yeeso Alla Baabaajo on, ko dankagol aliyatiimaaɓe ɓen e dankagol keynguuɓe ɓen e nder satteendeeji maɓɓe ɗin, e rentagol e tuundiiji aduna ɗin.
59002001	Musiɓɓe an, ɓay ko on gomɗinɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men mo darja wonani on, reenee e ɓurdindingol yimɓe.
59002002	Si wattiiɗo hurundaare kaŋŋe, ɓornii conci dimi aru e naatude ka moftal mon, baaso kadi ɓorniiɗo conci yakkiiɗi ara e naatude,
59002003	si on hittinii fii ɓorniiɗo conci dimi on, on wi'ii mo: «Onon toolii mon ka ndaɗɗudi ɗoo!», wi'on baaso on: «An daro ɗaa!», maa: «Jooɗo ka ley koyɗe an ɗoo!»,
59002004	e hara on waɗaali sendondiral hakkunde mon onon tigi? E on ɲaawiraali miijooji bonɗi?
59002005	Heɗitee, yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe! E hara hinaa miskinɓe ɓen ka aduna ɗoo Alla suɓii fii no ɓe wonira alɗuɓe e nder gomɗinal ngal, e heɓooɓe geɓal e laamu ngu o fodi yiɗuɓe mo ɓen ngun?
59002006	Kono onon, on hersinii baaso on. E hara wonaa alɗuɓe ɓen woni on tampinde, naɓa on ka ɲaawirɗi?
59002007	E hinaa ɓen woni hoynooɓe innde teddunde nde inniraɗon nden?
59002008	Kono si on ɗoftike sariya mawɗo on, wano bindi ɗin wi'iri non wonde: «Yo a yiɗir ɲokondo maa on wano yiɗirɗaa hoore maa non», haray on waɗii ko moƴƴi.
59002009	Kono si on ɓurdindinii yimɓe ɓen, haray on waɗii junuubu, Sariya on no jogori on wa bonnuɗo Sariya.
59002010	Ko ɗun waɗi, on mo yeddi yamiroore wootere e nder Sariya on, hay si o ɗoftike ɗeya heddiiɗe fow, haray o wonii bonnuɗo Sariya on fow.
59002011	Ko fii on Wi'uɗo: «wota mo jeena», no wi'i kadi: «wota mo itta hoore.» E hin-le si on waɗaali jinaa, kono on ittii hoore, haray on wonii bonnuɗo Sariya on.
59002012	Awa yewtiree huuwiron wa yimɓe ɲaawiroyteeɓe Sariya rinɗinoowo on.
59002013	Ko fii ɲaawoore nden aldanaa mo yurmetaake e yurmeende, kono yurmeende nden foolay ɲaawoore nden.
59002014	Musiɓɓe an, ko nafa honɗun woodani neɗɗo wi'ugol himo mari gomɗinal, si o alaa ɓanginirde ɗun kuuɗe? Taw si sifa ngal gomɗinal no waawi dandude mo?
59002015	Si musiɗɗo men gorko maa bandiraawo men no holi, no ŋakkiri ɲaametee kadi ɲande woo,
59002016	goɗɗo e mon ara e wi'ude ɓen: «Yahee e jam, ɓornoɗon, ɲaamon haa haaron», e ɓaawo jonnugol ɓe ko ɓalli maɓɓe ɗin handi e mun kon, haray ko honɗun ɗun nafata?
59002017	Gomɗinal ngal kadi ko wano non: si ngal aldaa e kuuɗe, ko ngal mayngal kangal tigi.
59002018	Kono si goɗɗo wi'ii: «An hiɗa mari gomɗinal e min miɗo mari kuuɗe», haray min mi wi'ay mo: «Hollan gomɗinal maa ngal e ɓaawo kuuɗe, min non mi hollirte gomɗinal an ngal kuuɗe an ɗen.»
59002019	Hiɗa gomɗini ko Alla gooto woodi? No moƴƴi! Jinnaaji ɗin kadi no gomɗiniri non, haa hiɗi diwna.
59002020	Ko an yo njofoojo! Hiɗa faalaa faamude wonde gomɗinal ngal aldaa e kuuɗe ko meerewal?
59002021	Enee, wonaa ko Ibraahiima, on maamiraawo men, waɗunoo kon fewndo o weeɓiti Issaaqa ɓiɗɗo makko on fii layyagol ka layyorde kon waɗi si o jogitoraa feewuɗo?
59002022	A yi'ii, gomɗinal ngal yaadii e kuuɗe makko ɗen, awa kadi ko kuuɗe makko ɗen timmini gomɗinal makko ngal.
59002023	Ko non ko bindi ɗin wi'i kon laatori: «Ibraahiima gomɗini Alla, ngal gomɗinal makko jogoranaa mo peewal», haa o noddaa giɗo Alla.
59002024	On yi'ii, ko sabu kuuɗe ɗen neɗɗo on jogoraa feewuɗo, hinaa sabu gomɗinal ngal tun.
59002025	Enee, oo cagaajo wi'eteeɗo Raabi, kanko kadi, taw si hinaa sabu kuuɗe ɗen o jogoranoo feewuɗo fewndo ko o wernunoo nulanooɓe fii tefugol ɓen, o holli ɓe laawol goo ngol ɓe rewa?
59002026	Wano tawiri non ɓandu ndu aldaa e ruuhu ko mayndu, ko wano non kadi gomɗinal ngal aldaa e kuuɗe ko mayngal.
59003001	Musiɓɓe an, wota buy e mon himman jannugol, ko fii hiɗon andi enen jannooɓe ɓen en ɲaawete ɲaawoore ɓurnde sattude.
59003002	Ko fii en fow en waɗay ellaaji ɗi tawata ko nooneeji ɗuuɗuɗi. On mo waɗaali ella e nder konguɗi, haray on neɗɗo ko timmuɗo, waawuɗo huɓindaade ɓandu mun ndun fow.
59003003	Si en waɗii lagambe ɗen ka kundule pucci ɗin fii yo ɗi ɗofto en, haray en huutoray kadi ɓalli majji on fow.
59003004	Ndaaree kadi, ɗee laaɗe e njanɗude mun, ko hendu dolnundu naɓata ɗe, hiɗe ardoree aalahun ɓurkun fanɗude ka naɓoowo on faaliraa ɗon.
59003005	Wano non, ɗenngal kadi ko terun fanɗukun, kono hingal waawi mantorde piiji mawɗi. On yi'ii wano giitun tosokun waawi sunnirde buruure mawnde?
59003006	Ɗenngal ngal kadi ko yiite, hingal heewi boneeji, hingal tawdaa e tere ɓandu men ndun, ngal tuuninay ɓandu ndun fow, ko ka yiite jahannama ngal huɓɓinaa, ngal sunnay ngurndan men ɗan fow.
59003007	Kala noone kulle, wano colli ɗin e ko daasotoo kon e kulle ɗen ka nder ndiyan, no huɓindoo, ɗen-le neɗɗanke no huɓindii ɗe.
59003008	Kono ɗenngal, hay gooto waawataa ngal huɓindaade. Ko bone mo waawotaako huɓindaade, hingal heewi tooke warooje.
59003009	Ko kangal mantirten Ben men Joomiraaɗo on, ko kangal kadi huɗirten yimɓe tagaaɓe e mbaadi Alla ɓen.
59003010	Ko e kon hunduko wooto du'aa e kuddi yaltata. Kono yo musiɓɓe, wota ɗun wonir non.
59003011	Taw si ndiyan welɗan e ndiyan haaɗuɗan no tubba e ɓundu wooturu, hara ko e ngayka woota?
59003012	Enee musiɓɓe an, hara ƴibbehi no waawi rimude kaccu, maa piyahi rima ƴibbe? Ko wano non kadi, ɓundu ndiyan lanɗan waawataa tubbinde ndiyan welɗan.
59003013	Ko hombo e hakkunde mon mari faamu e hakkil? Yo o ɓanginir ɗun jikku makko moƴƴo on wondude e kuuɗe newiiɗe iwruɗe e faamu.
59003014	Kono si tawii hiɗon mari ka ɓerɗe mon nawliigu tiiɗungu e haasidi, haray wota on mawnintino, e wota on yeddu goonga on.
59003015	Sifa ngun faamu hinaa ka kammu iwri few, ko ngu aduna e ngu neɗɗanke e ngu Ibuliisa.
59003016	Ko fii, kala ka nawliigu e haasidi woni, ko ɗon kadi jiiɓoldu e kala noone kuuɗe bonɗe woni.
59003017	Kono faamu iwrungu ka Alla ngun, ko adii taho, ko ngu laaɓungu, awa kadi ko ngu ɓuttu, ko ngu newiingu, ko ngu deeƴinayngu, heewungu yurmeende e kuuɗe moƴƴe, ngu aldaa e ɓurnondiral e faasiqankaaku.
59003018	Ko tabintinooɓe ɓuttu ɓen aawata e nder ɓuttu kon, rimay peewal.
59004001	Ko honto ɗee poodotire e ɗee yeddondire hakkunde mon iwri? E hara hinaa faaleeji bonɗi woni waɗude hare ka ɓerɗe mon?
59004002	Hiɗon himmani, kono on alaa heɓude. Ko on warooɓe, ko on miilaaɓe e ɓaawo waawugol heɓude hay huunde. Hiɗon wondi e yeddondire e pooɗotiro. E hin-le on hendotaako, ɓay on alaa toraade,
59004003	maa hiɗon toraade, on alaa heɓude, ɓay hiɗon tororde anniyee bonɗo fii no huutoriron ɗun fii faaleeji mon.
59004004	Ko onon, yo jamaa jinooɓe! E on andaa yiɗugol aduna on ko aɲugol Alla? Awa si goɗɗo no faalaa yiɗude aduna on, haray o waɗitike gaɲo Alla.
59004005	On sikku bindi ɗin ko wi'i kon ko meere, wonde: «Alla no nawlani ruuhu mo o waɗi e men on.»?
59004006	Kono ko o ɓuri en yeɗude e ko mawni kon ko sulfu. Awa e hino ko bindi ɗin wi'i kon: «Alla liddoto mawnintiniiɓe ɓen, o yeɗa jippinɓe hoore mun ɓen sulfu.»
59004007	Awa yankinanee Alla, dartoɗon Ibuliisa, ɗun o dogay, o woɗɗoo on.
59004008	Ɓadee Alla, ɗun o ɓadoto on. Laɓɓinee juuɗe mon ɗen, yo onon junuubankeeɓe. Laɓɓinon ɓerɗe mon ɗen, yo onon sikkitiiɓe.
59004009	Woytee, yoomon, wullon. Yo jaleeɗe mon ɗen wontu yoomugol, weltaare mon nden wonta ɓiɗagol.
59004010	Jippinee hoore mon yeeso Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun o ɓantoyay on.
59004011	Wota on ɲakkin ɓee ɗoo maa ɓee ɗaa, yo musiɓɓe an. Mo ɲakkinii musiɗɗo mun, maa ɲaawii musiɗɗo mun, haray ko Sariya on o ɲakkini, o ɲaawi. Si a ɲaawii-le Sariya on, haray hinaa a huutorɗo mo, kono ko a ɲaawoowo mo.
59004012	Ko fii ko Gooto pet woni Waɗoowo Sariya ɲaawa, ɗun ko on Waawuɗo dandude e mulude. An non, ko a hombo, si hiɗa ɲaawa ɲokondo maa?
59004013	Ko onon, yo wi'uɓe jooni: «Hande maa jango men yahay e ndee saare ɗoo, men wona ton hitaande, men waɗoya ton goɗɗun, men heɓa tono.»
59004014	Onon on andaa toode no ngurndan mon ɗan wonirta jango. Ko on norngal feeɲungal fii saa'ihun nii, ɓawto ɗun muta.
59004015	Ko haanuɗon wi'ude: «Men wuuray, men waɗa ɗunɗoo maa ɗunɗaa, si Joomiraaɗo on jaɓii.»
59004016	Kono jooni, hiɗon mawnintinaade e nder townitaare mon. Sifa nden mawnintinaare fow ko bonnde.
59004017	Si goɗɗo no andi moƴƴere nde o haani waɗude, o waɗaali ɗun, haray o waɗii junuubu.
59005001	Jooni non, yo onon alɗuɓe, wullee sowru tiiɗundu, sabu tampereeji aroyayɗi e hoore mon ɗin!
59005002	Ngalu mon ngun bonii, conci mon ɗin mooƴii,
59005003	kaŋŋe mon ɗen e kaalisi mon on kornii. Kori mun on immoyto seeditoo e hoore mon, ɲaamira ɓalli mon ɗin wa yiite. On mooɓii ngaluuji e nder ɗee ɲalaaɗe sakkitore.
59005004	Njoddi ndi on yoɓaali wa'uɓe gese mon ɗen ndin no woytaade e hoore mon. E woyaaɗi soɲituɓe ɓen arii haa e noppi Joomiraaɗo Jom Bawɗe on.
59005005	On wuuririi ka aduna ɗoo e nder mbeleeɗe e ko foti. On fayinii hoore mon e ndee ɲalaande nde hirseteɗon e mun.
59005006	On ɲaawii, on warii feewuɓe ɓe dartaaki on.
59005007	Awa muɲɲee, yo musiɓɓe an, haa nde Joomi on ari. Ndaaree no remoowo habbori coɲal tiiɗungal, ngal o habbori muɲal haa ndiyan setto e ndiyan dabbunde toɓɓa.
59005008	Onon kadi muɲɲee, tabintinon ɓerɗe mon ɗen, ko fii ardu Joomi on ko ɓadiiɗun.
59005009	Wota on ŋermindir, yo musiɓɓe an, fii wota on ɲaawe, ɓay Ɲaawoowo on no darii ka yeeso dambugal.
59005010	Musiɓɓe an, ƴettee misal tampere e muɲal ɓen annabaaɓe yewtuɓe e innde Joomiraaɗo on.
59005011	Ndaaree, hiɗen wi'a maloore wonanii ɓen ŋaɲɲiiɓe. On nanii fii ŋaɲɲaare Ayyuuba nden no wowlee, awa kadi on yi'ii ko Joomiraaɗo on waɗani mo kon ka sakkitorun. Ko fii Joomiraaɗo on ko heewuɗo giggol e yurmeende.
59005012	Ko adii kon taho, yo musiɓɓe an, wota on woondir kammu ngun maa leydi ndin, maa kala ko woni e woondoore. Ko yo «hiiyii» mon on wonu «hiiyii», «oo'o» mon on wona «oo'o», fii wota on wonu e nder ɲaawoore nden.
59005013	E hara goɗɗo e mon no e nder tampere? Yo ontigi toro Alla. Kaa hara goɗɗo e mon no e nder weltaare? Yo ootigi beytu.
59005014	E hara kadi goɗɗo e mon no nawni? Yo ontigi noddu ardotooɓe moftal ngal, ɓentigi toranoo mo e hoore juurugol nebban e hoore makko e innde Joomiraaɗo on.
59005015	Toraare waɗiraande gomɗinal no sellina nawnuɗo. E hoore ɗun, Joomiraaɗo on imminay mo. Si tawii ontigi no waɗi junuubi, ɗi yaafante mo.
59005016	Awa, qirritee junuubaaji mon ɗin hakkunde mon, torondiranon kadi, fii no sellinireɗon. Torndeeji ɗi aaden feewuɗo torii ɗin ko dolnuɗi duncayɗi.
59005017	Ko fii Iiliiya kadi hari ko neɗɗo wa'unooɗo wa men nii, nde o duuminoo e toraare fii wota ndiyan aru, ɗan ronki arude ka hoore leydi e nder duuɓi tati e lebbi jeegoo.
59005018	Ɓawto ɗun kadi o torii, kammu ngun sammini ndiyan, onsay leydi ndin funtini ko rimata ɓiɓɓe.
59005019	Ko onon yo musiɓɓe an, si goɗɗo e hakkunde mon selii goonga on, goɗɗo artirii mo,
59005020	haray andee, on ittuɗo on junuubankeejo ka o selunoo ton, artiri mo ka laawol, haray o montii junuubaaji ɗuuɗuɗi, o dandii wonkii mayde.
60001001	Immorde e an min Petruusu, sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on, haa e ɓee suɓaaɓe Alla, tuŋarankeeɓe e oo aduna, e nder ɗee leyɗe Pontii e Galaasi e Kapadoosi e Aazii e Bitinii.
60001002	Ko onon yo suɓiranooɓe eɓɓoore Alla, on Ben men, e dow laɓɓinireede Ruuhu makko on, fii ɗoftagol Iisaa Almasiihu on, wiccee ƴiiƴan makko ɗan: yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu sowindirane on.
60001003	Mantoore wonanii Alla, Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on. Ko yurmeende makko mawnde nden o yeɗiri en jibintineede sabu immintineede Iisaa Almasiihu on e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen fii no heɓiren tama'u selluɗo,
60001004	e fii no heɓiren ndondi ndi bontataa, ndi tuunataa, ndi mbaadi mun waylotaako, maraniindi on ka kammu,
60001005	ɗun ko onon ɓee ɓe Alla hiwiri bawgal mun sabu gomɗinal ngal fii kisiyee hebuliiɗo feɲɲineede on ka saa'iiji sakkitori.
60001006	Ko ɗun wonani on ndee weltaare tiiɗunde, hay si tawii fewndo ɗoo maa satteendeeji seeɗa wona ko aanini on,
60001007	fii no gomɗinal mon ngal ndarndoree. Gomɗinal mon ngal-le no ɓuri kaŋŋe hittude, ɓay kaŋŋe ko ko mulata, ɗen-le ko yiite ndarndoraa. Ko nii gomɗinal mon ngal wonirta maniniingal, darjingal, e teddungal ɲande Iisaa Almasiihu on feeɲitoyi.
60001008	On yiɗii mo kanko Iisaa e hoore on yi'aali mo, on hoolike mo kadi e ɓaawo yi'ugol mo. E hoore ɗun, hiɗon hebbinori weltaare tiiɗunde, nde wonkii woo waawataa sifaade fii mun,
60001009	ɓay hiɗon hendaade faandaare gomɗinal mon ngal, ɗun ko kisiyee wonkiiji mon ɗin.
60001010	Oo kisiyee ko huunde nde annabaaɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓitunoo tefi fii mun, ɗun ko ɓee hiitinooɓe fii oo sulfu sutiiɗo on.
60001011	Hiɓe ɗaɓɓaynoo andugol ko e saa'i hombo maa ko honno ko Ruuhu Almasiihu on andini ɓe kon waɗiroyta, fewndo on Ruuhu wonɗo e maɓɓe hiitantonoo ɓe fii tampereeji heɓoyaynooɗi Almasiihu on ɗin e darjaaji hikkotooɗi e mun ɗin.
60001012	Ɓe ɓanginanaa kadi wonde, wonaa fii maɓɓe kamɓe tigi ɓe wonnoo kurkanaade, kono ko fii mon, fewndo ɓe wowli fii ɗii piiji ɗi ɓee waajiiɓe on fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on yottiniri e mon fewndo ɗoo Ruuhu Seniiɗo iwruɗo ka kammu on, ɗin piiji ɗi tawata hay malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen tigi no faalaa andude fii mun.
60001013	Ko ɗun si mi wi'ay on, hebulinee hakkillaaji mon ɗin, waawon hoore mon, waɗon tama'u mon on fow e oo sulfu mo yeɗoyteɗon ɲande Iisaa Almasiihu on feeɲitoyi.
60001014	Wa'ee wa paykoy ɗoftiikoy, hara on accaali hande kadi ɗiya himmeeji ardoo on, ɗun ko ɗin ɗi wondunoɗon e nder angal andugol mon.
60001015	Kono ɓay Nodduɗo on on ko Laaɓuɗo, onon kadi wonee laaɓuɓe e nder jikku mon on,
60001016	ko fii e hino ko Allaahu on daali kon ka deftere: «Wonee laaɓuɓe, ko fii ko mi Laaɓuɗo.»
60001017	Ɓay on noddirii oo Fonnuɗo fow «Baaba», ɗun ko on Ɲaawiroowo mo bee embere kuuɗe mun ɗen, haray yo on hulu mo fannin hiɗon koɗii aduna on.
60001018	Hiɗon andi wonaa huunde bonaynde wano kaalisi maa kaŋŋe sottiraɗon e nder ɗan ngurndan meerejan ɗan ronunoɗon baabiraaɓe mon ɓen,
60001019	kono ko ƴiiƴan Almasiihu hittuɗan ɗan, on wa'itayɗo wa baalun kun alaa ella, alaa waadere,
60001020	on adaaɗo toɗɗeede ado fuɗɗoode aduna on, kono o feɲɲinaa ka saa'iiji sakkitori fii mon.
60001021	Ko sabu on gomɗinirɗon Alla, on Immintinɗo mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, yeɗi mo kadi mangural, fii no gomɗinal mon ngal e tama'u mon on fawora e Alla.
60001022	Ɓay on laɓɓinirii hoore mon ɗoftagol goonga on, haa on heɓii giggol siɗɗankaaku sellungol, jooni yiɗindiree giggol tiiɗungol ka ɓerɗe mon,
60001023	ɗun ko onon ɓee jibinaaɓe kesun, ɓe tawata hinaa awdi muloori kono ko luttoori, immorde e daaluyee Alla wuuruɗo tabiti on.
60001024	E hin-le: «Kala neɗɗo no wa'i wa huɗo, darja makko on fow kadi no wa'i wa piindi kon huɗo. Huɗo kon no yooriri, piindi ndin no saamude,
60001025	kono daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on ko luttayɗo haa poomaa.» On daaluyee ko Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo feɲɲinanaɗon on.
60002001	Awa tertee kala bonki e kala kippugu e faasiqiyaagal e nawliigu e kala ɲoore,
60002002	yiɗiron daaluyee on wano boobo kecco yiɗiri ɓiraaɗan kencan laaɓuɗan, fii no mawniron e nder kisiyee on sabu makko,
60002003	ɓay on mettike, on andii Joomi on no moƴƴi.
60002004	Ɓadee mo kanko ndee hayre wuurunde, nde yimɓe ɓen bugitinoo, ɗun ko on mo Alla suɓii, hittuɗo yeeso makko.
60002005	Ɓay onon kadi hiɗon wa'i wa kaaƴe wuuruɗe mahindiraaɗe, woni suudu ndu Ruuhu Alla on hoɗi e mun, fii wonugol yottinooɓe sadaka laaɓuɓe fii no waɗiranon Alla sadakaaji ruuhuyankeeji, hara ko no hawrirani mo, rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
60002006	E hin-le no windii wondema: «Miɗo tippinde ka hoore Fello Siyuuna hayre wonaynde ka soɓɓundu, ɗun-le ko nden suɓaande hittunde. Kala gomɗinɗo e makko hersinoytaake.»
60002007	Nden hayre no hittani on, onon ɓee gomɗinɓe. Kono fii ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen: «Hayre nde mahooɓe ɓen hawkunoo nden wontii hittunde ka soɓɓundu,
60002008	hayre fegginaynde, e fetere liɓaynde.» Ɓe feggike e mayre sabu yeddugol maɓɓe daaluyee on, tawde ko ɗun ɓe muuyananoo.
60002009	Kono onon, ko on leɲol suɓaangol, yottinooɓe sadaka fii laamu Alla ngun, awa kadi ko on jamaa laaɓuɗo, yimɓe jeyaaɓe ka Alla fii ko feɲɲina kuuɗe moƴƴe mawɗe on Nodduɗo on fii yo on yaltu ka niwre, aron ka ndaygu makko hawniingu.
60002010	Ɗun ko onon ɓee ɓe tawata hari hinaa jamaa Alla, kono jooni ko on jamaa makko, ɗun ko onon ɓee ɓe heɓaano yurmeende makko nden, kono jooni on heɓii yurmeende makko nden.
60002011	Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, hoɓɓe jananɓe, mi wakkilinii on e reenagol ɗii himmeeji neɗɗanke, ɗi tawata ko haɓooji wonkii.
60002012	Wuuriree no moƴƴiri e hakkunde ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen fii nde hiɓe tooɲira on wa waɗooɓe ko boni, yo ɓe yi'u kuuɗe mon moƴƴe ɗen, ɗun ɓe mawninoyay Alla nde o aroyi.
60002013	Sabu Joomiraaɗo on, yankinanee kala laamu neɗɗanke, woni lanɗo mawɗo, marɗo mbawdi,
60002014	woni ɓen ɓe o lammini fii donkingol ɓen waɗooɓe ko boni, manta ɓen waɗooɓe ko moƴƴi.
60002015	Awa, ko Alla faalaa e nder ko waɗoton ko moƴƴi kon, ko yo ɗun ɗahu fankina majjuɓe ɓe alaa hakkil ɓen.
60002016	Wuuriree wa rindinaaɓe, e ɓaawo waɗugol ngun ndimu wirngallo buumayngo bonki, kono wa kurkantooɓe Alla.
60002017	Teddinee fow, yiɗon musiɓɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen, hulon Alla, teddinon lanɗo on.
60002018	Jiyaaɓe, yankinanee jeyɓe on ɓen e nder teddungal timmungal, hara hinaa non moƴƴuɓe ɓen tun e newiiɓe ɓen, kono e mettuɓe fii ɓen kadi,
60002019	ko fii, si e nder miijitagol fii Alla, ontigi ŋaɲɲike tampere nde ontigi foddaa, ɗun ko huunde moƴƴere.
60002020	Ko hongal e teddungal marɗon, si on muɲɲike tampere sabu waɗugol junuubu? Kono si on muɲɲike tampere sabu waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ɗun ko huunde moƴƴere yeeso Alla.
60002021	Awa, ko fii ɗun noddiraɗon, ko fii Almasiihu on kadi tampii fii mon, o accanii on misal, fii no jokkiron batteeji makko ɗin,
60002022	ɗun ko on «mo waɗaali junuubu, mo toni mun jantaaki fenaande»,
60002023	ɗun ko on hoynaaɗo mo yottaaki, tampinaaɗo mo kambaali, kono watti fow e juuɗe on Ɲaawoowo no feewiri non.
60002024	O ronditanike en junuubaaji men ɗin ka ɓandu makko, ɗun ko ka leggal altindiraangal, fii no maayiren e telen-ma junuubaaji ɗin, wuuren ngurndan feewuɗan, ko fii, ko sabu barmeeji makko ɗin selliniraɗon.
60002025	Ɓay hari hiɗon wa'i wa baali saakitaaɗi, kono jooni on artiraama ka Ngaynaako, Hiwoowo wonkiiji mon ɗin.
60003001	Onon kadi yo rewɓe wano non, mo kala e mon yo yankinano moodi mun. Ɗun si woɓɓe e maɓɓe ɗoftaaki daaluyee on, ɓe gomɗiniray sabu kuuɗe rewɓe maɓɓe ɓen e ɓaawo kongol,
60003002	e nder yi'ugol maɓɓe jikku mon laaɓuɗo wonduɗo e teddungal on.
60003003	Wota on fotin ko woni e kene kon, wano mooragol e cuɗorgol kaŋŋe e conci dimi.
60003004	Kono yo ŋari mon kin wonu ko marii ka ɓernde, hara ko ŋari halal ki bonataa, ki jikku newiiɗo deeƴuɗo. Ko ɗun ɓuri hittude yeeso Alla.
60003005	Ko nii rewɓe ɓaawo ɗoo laaɓuɓe, tanƴinornooɓe Alla ɓen, parornoo, ɓe yankinanii moodiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen,
60003006	wano Saarata non, on ɗoftinooɗo Ibraahiima, wi'aynooɗo mo koohoojo makko. Onon kadi on laatoto jiwɓe Saarata si on waɗii ko moƴƴi, e ɓaawo on jaɓude jiiɓireede kulol woo.
60003007	Onon moodiɓɓe ɓen kadi wano non, mo kala e mon yo wondir e sonnaajo mun on e hoore andugol wonde rewɓe ɓen ko ɓe neɗɗanke ɓurɓe lo'ude. Teddiniron ɓe wa ronidooɓe e mon ngurndan ɗan Alla yeɗi on ɗan, fii wota hay huunde haɗu torndeeji mon ɗin.
60003008	Ka rawnoode, on fow heɓee miijo wooto e giggol gootol, heewon giggol siɗɗankaaku e yurmeende e angal mawnintinaare.
60003009	Wota bone woo yottore bone, maa yennee yottoo, kono ka liddu ɗun, onon ko yo on du'ano, ko fii ko ɗun noddiraɗon fii no roniron barki kin.
60003010	Ko fii: «Si tawii goɗɗo no faalaa wuurude ngurndan welɗan, e yi'ugol ɲalaaɗe hettaare, haray yo ontigi reenu ɗenngal mun ngal e wowlugol ko boni, o reena toni makko ɗin e janfagol.
60003011	Yo ontigi woɗɗito ko boni, o waɗa ko moƴƴi, o ɗaɓɓita ɓuttu on, o jokka ɗun,
60003012	ko fii giiɗe Joomiraaɗo on no e hoore feewuɓe ɓen, awa kadi noppi makko ɗin no udditanii toraaje maɓɓe ɗen, kono yeeso Joomiraaɗo on no huccana ɓen waɗooɓe bone.»
60003013	Ko hombo tampinta on, si on himmanii waɗugol ko moƴƴi?
60003014	Ɗun-le wuren hay si on tampii fii peewal ngal, on maloyte. Awa wota on hulu yimɓe ɓen, wota on laato maapiiɓe.
60003015	Hormoree Almasiihu on ka ɓerɗe mon wa Joomi on. Wonee ɲande woo hebuliiɓe fii jaabagol landotooɓe on dalil tama'u mon on ɓen.
60003016	Waɗiron ɗun newaare e teddungal e nder ɓernde mon laaɓunde nden, fii yo wonɓe on wowlude ko boni e hoore jikku mon moƴƴo on e telen-ma Almasiihu on, heɓoy ko hersinta ɓe e fee konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin.
60003017	Awa kadi, ko ɓuri ko tampugol sabu waɗugol ko moƴƴi, si tawii ɗun ko faale Alla, edii tampugol sabu waɗugol ko boni.
60003018	E hin-le Almasiihu on kadi maayii fii junuubaaji ɗin nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa, on Feewuɗo fii ɓe feewaa ɓen, fii addugol on e Alla. O waraama ka ɓandu, o wurnitiraama Ruuhu Allaahu on.
60003019	Ko on Ruuhu o yaari, o waajoyii ruuhuuji wonɓe ka kaso ɓen,
60003020	ɗun ko ɓee murtunooɓe wa fewndo tawata muɲal Alla ngal no ɓeydii ka ɲalaaɗe ɗe Nuuhu moƴƴinaynoo laana kan e mun. Ko yimɓe seeɗaaɓe nii, e maanaa ɓe njeetato, ɓe dandiraa rewugol ka ndiyan.
60003021	Ɗun ko misal lootagol maande kisiyee wonaɗon dandireede fewndo ɗoo. Ɗun wonaa lootugol tuundi ɓandu ndun, kono ko aadanorgol Alla ɓernde laaɓunde. Ɗun hisiniri on immintineede Iisaa Almasiihu on,
60003022	on Ƴentuɗo ka kammu, wonirɗo ka sengo ɲaamo Alla, on mo malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen e bawɗe ɗen e doole ɗen yankinanaa.
60004001	Ɓay Almasiihu on tampii ka ɓandu mun, onon kadi dolnoree e ngon miijo wooto, (ko fii on tampuɗo e ɓandu seedii e faale waɗugol junuubu),
60004002	fii no wuuriron wano Alla faaliraa non, hara hinaa e himmeeji neɗɗanke, yeru saa'i heddaniiɗo on wuuridugol e ɓandu on.
60004003	Awa e saa'i feƴƴunooɗo on, on ɓooyii waɗude ko ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen yiɗi waɗude kon, fewndo jokkondirɗon e maɓɓe e nder jiiɓaare e himmeeji bonɗi e mandilugol e fasaadu e mottondirgol ka mandiletee e dewal sanamuuji harmungal.
60004004	Kono jooni ɓe tawi no ŋalɗini ɓe ko on alaa jokkondirde e maɓɓe hande kadi e telen-ma nden ɓoylaare tiiɗunde kon. Ko ɗun waɗi si hiɓe hoynude on.
60004005	Awa ɓe hunitoyto yeeso on Hebulaniiɗo ɲaawugol wurɓe e mayɓe.
60004006	Ko ɗun waɗi si hay mayɓe ɓen feɲɲinanaa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, fii nde ɓe ɲaawiroyaa wa neɗɗanke ka ɓandu, yo ɓe wuuroy ka ruuhu wano Alla wuuriri non.
60004007	Lannoode piiji ɗin fow hewtii. Awa wonee hakkilanɓe waawon hoore mon fii no waawiron tororde.
60004008	Ko adii kon, yiɗindiree giggol tabitungol, ko fii giggol ngol no monta adadu junuubaaji ujune ujune.
60004009	Tolnindiree e ɓaawo dukindirgol.
60004010	Awa yo mo kala e mon kurkoran heddiiɓe ɓen dokkal ngal o heɓi ngal, ɗun on wonay halfinaaɓe moƴƴere Alla yaajunde nden.
60004011	Yo taw non, mo yewtay e hakkunde mon, ko daaluyeeji Alla ɗin o woni yewtirde. Mo kurkoto kadi e hakkunde mon yo taw ko mbawdi ndi Allaahu on okki mo ndin woni ko o kurkori. Ɗun fow ko fii yo mantoore wonan Alla, e innde Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo mangural e bawgal wonani haa pooma. Aamiina!
60004012	Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, wota on ŋalɗir nguli heɓuki on kin fii ndarndegol, wa si tawii ko huunde heyre heɓi on.
60004013	Kono weltoree tawdeede e tampereeji Almasiihu on ɗin, fii no heɓiroyon kadi weltaare ɲande feeɲugol mangu makko ngun.
60004014	Si on hoynaama fii innde Almasiihu on, haray ko on malaaɓe, ko fii Ruuhu darjinɗo on, ɗun ko on Ruuhu Alla, no e hoore mon.
60004015	Si goɗɗo e mon tampinaama, wonaa yo taw ko fii himo itti hoore, maa himo wujji, maa himo waɗi ko boni, maa himo ukkii e ko wonaa haaju makko.
60004016	Kono si tawii o tampinaama sabu ko mo Almasiihu on, haray wota ontigi hersir ɗun, kono yo o mawnin Alla sabu nden innde.
60004017	Jooni non, saa'i fuɗɗoode ɲaawoore nden hewtii, nde fuɗɗora yimɓe Alla ɓen. Si tawii ko enen nde fuɗɗori, haray ko honno sakkitoode ɓen ɓe ɗoftanooki Kibaaru Moƴƴo Alla on wa'oyta?
60004018	Si tawii non feewuɗo on dandiraama karahan, haray ko honno woniranta mo rewataa Alla on e junuubankeejo on?
60004019	Ɗun haray, yo wonɓe tampude no yaadiri e kodduruyee Alla on duumo e waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ɓe watta wonkiiji maɓɓe ɗin e juuɗe Taguɗo on, ɗun ko on Sella-Findeejo.
60005001	Awa jooni miɗo yewtude ardotooɓe moftal wonɓe hakkunde mon ɓen. Min kadi ko mi ardotooɗo, e seedeejo tampereeji Almasiihu on, e heɓoowo geɓal e darja feɲɲinoyteeɗo on. Mi wakkilinii on
60005002	aynugol wuro ngo Alla halfini on ngon, hara hinaa e hoore karheede, kono hara ko no Alla yiɗiri non e hoore ɓernde laaɓunde, hara on waɗiraali ɗun miile, kono hara ko e anniyee moƴƴo.
60005003	Wota on hollu mbawdi e hoore ɓe halfinaɗon ɓen, kono wonanon wuro ngon misal.
60005004	Ɗun, nde Hooreejo Ngaynaakooɓe ɓen feeɲoyi, on hendoyto meetelol darja, ngol ŋari mun bontataa haa poomaa.
60005005	Onon kadi sukaaɓe wano non, yankinanee ardotooɓe moftal ngal, mo kala e mon jippina hoore mun yeeso oya, ko fii: «Alla liddoto mawnintiniiɓe ɓen, kono o yeɗa jippinɓe hoore mun ɓen sulfu.»
60005006	Awa, jippinee hoore mon e ley jungo Alla dolnungo ngon fii yo o ɓantoy on e saa'i mo o toɗɗii on.
60005007	Fawee anndeeji mon ɗin fow e hoore makko, ko fii o kippay fii mon.
60005008	Wonon hakkilanɓe e reeniiɓe, ko fii liddotooɗo on on, ɗun ko Ibuliisa, no waɗude yaha ara, riggora wa ngayuuri, hara no ɗaɓɓa ko seekita.
60005009	Dartoree mo kanko Ibuliisa no tiiɗiri e nder gomɗinal ngal, e hoore yo on andu ko tampereeji gooti fawaɗon onon e musiɓɓe mon wonɓe e nder aduna on fow.
60005010	Kono si on tampii e nder saa'ihun nii, Alla Jom sulfu on, on Nodduɗo on ka darja makko poomayankeejo on e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on, o heydintinoyay on kanko tigi, o tabintina on, o tiiɗinoya on, o waɗa on ɓe dillintaako.
60005011	Ko kanko bawgal wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
60005012	Ko e dow ballal Silaasi, oo musiɗɗo sella-findeejo, mi windirani on nduu ɓatakuru raɓɓiɗundu, fii wakkilingol on e fii seedintingol wonde ko ɗunɗoo woni moƴƴere Alla haqiiqaare nden, awa humee e mayre.
60005013	Suɓaaɓe wonɓe Baabiila ɓen e Markuusa ɓiɗɗo an on salminii on.
60005014	Awa hiwrondiree lunnondiral giggol siɗɗankaaku. Yo ɓuttu wonan on, onon humondirɓe e Almasiihu on ɓen fow.
61001001	Immorde e an min Sim'uunu Petruusu, sahaabaajo e kurkaadu Iisaa Almasiihu on, haa e ɓee hendiiɓe gomɗinal fotayngal hittude e ngal amen ngal, immorde e peewal Alla men e Dandoowo on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
61001002	Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu sowindirane on e hoore andugol Alla e Iisaa Joomi men on.
61001003	Ko bawgal makko ngal, Alla yeɗiri en kala ko handuɗen fii ngurndan e wuurirgol wano o faaliraa non, e nder andingol en on Noddirɗo en mangural mun ngal e moƴƴuki mun kin.
61001004	Ko nii o yeɗiri en fodaariiji ɓurɗi hittude e ɓurɗi mawnude ɗin, fii, tippude e ɗin fodaariiji, no tawdireɗon e jikku makko on, kanko Alla, ɗun ko onon fuutinooɓe ɓoylaare aduna iwrunde e himmeeji bonɗi.
61001005	Ko sabu ɗun waɗi, geree ɓeyditon e gomɗinal mon ngal jikku moƴƴo, e hoore jikku moƴƴo on kadi ɓeyditon ɗon gandal,
61001006	e hoore gandal ngal kadi ɓeyditon waawugol hoore mun, e hoore waawugol hoore mun ngol kadi ɓeyditon ŋaɲɲagol, e hoore ŋaɲɲagol ngol kadi ɓeyditon wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non,
61001007	e hoore wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non ɓeyditon giggol siɗɗankaaku, e hoore giggol siɗɗankaaku ngol ɓeyditon giggol.
61001008	Si ɗii jikkuuji ɗoo sowondirii e mon, ɗi haɗay on wonude meerenteeɓe ɓe alaa battane moƴƴe fii andugol Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
61001009	Kono mo aldaa e ɗin, haray ko bunɗo, mo felsataa, yejjituɗo ko junuubaaji mun ɗin laɓɓinanoo kon.
61001010	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe, ɓurtee wakkilaade fii haqinqingol noddaandu ndu noddaɗon ndun e ko suɓaɗon kon. Si on warrii non, on yanataa e nder bone few.
61001011	Ko nii newniranteɗon no yaajiri naatugol ka laamateeri poomayankeeri Joomi men on, on Dandoowo, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
61001012	Ko ɗun waɗi si soono woo mi andintinay on fii ɗii piiji, hay si tawii hiɗon andi ɗi e hiɗon tabiti e goonga mo hendiɗon on.
61001013	Miɗo sikki no haananimmi ka mi jokka andintingol on, fannin miɗo e nduu togooru, ɗun ko ɓandu an ndun,
61001014	ko fii miɗo andi mi sertay jooni e nduu ɓandu maayooru, wano Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, ɓanginiranimmi non.
61001015	Ko ɗun waɗi si mi etoto fota, fii hay si mi iwoyii, no anditiroyon ɗii piiji.
61001016	Awa, hinaa men ɓaarorɓe taariikaaji sinciraaɗi ƴoyre, fewndo ko men ɓanginani on ardu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on e bawgal makko ngal. Kono men yi'irii gite amen ɗen tigi mangu makko ngun.
61001017	Ko fii o hendike e juuɗe Alla Baabaajo on teddungal e darja fewndo ko o nanunoo hawa iwrude ka darja heewuɗo ɓural on, ko Allaahu on daalani mo: «Oo ɗoo ko Ɓiɗɗo an yiɗaaɗo, mo mi weltori on.»
61001018	Menen kadi, men nanii ngol kongol iwrungol ka kammu, fewndo men wondi e makko ka hoore fello hormorteengo.
61001019	Awa meɗen ɓuri fellitude fii konguɗi ɗi annabaaɓe ɓen longinaa ɗin, ɗin ɗi tawata si on wattanii yiila, haray on waɗii ko moƴƴi, ɓay ɗin konguɗi no wa'i wa lampu huɓɓuɗo e nokkuure niɓɓitunde, haa nde fajiri on feeri, jaawiire nden toowi ndaygini ɓerɗe mon ɗen.
61001020	Ko adii kon, andee wonde firo konguɗi ɗi annabaaɓe ɓen windi ɗin, ɗun ko daaluyeeji ɗi ɓe longinaa ɗin, hinaa e neɗɗanke iwri.
61001021	Ko fii kala kongol longinaangol hinaa e miijo neɗɗanke iwi, kono ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on yimɓe ɓen haaliri ko Alla longini ɓe kon.
61002001	Woodiino e hakkunde jamaa on waɗitiiɓe annabaaɓe. Jannooɓe fenaande woniroyay non e hakkunde mon onon kadi, hara hiɓe ɓisa janndeeji fenaandeeji e nder ko ɓe jannata kon, nawrayɗi e halkaare. Ɓe yedda on Soodituɗo ɓe, ɗun ko Joomi on. Ko nii ɓe pooɗirta e maɓɓe halakuyee yaawuɗo.
61002002	Buy jokkoyay jiiɓaare maɓɓe nden, laawol goonga on hoynoyee sabu maɓɓe.
61002003	Immorde e miile maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe hiiliroya on konguɗi sincaaɗi. Kono gila neeɓii ko ɓe happanaa kon no ɓadaade tun, awa hayrannde maɓɓe nden ŋoŋaa.
61002004	Ko fii Alla dandaali malaa'ikaaɓe waɗunooɓe junuubu ɓen, kono o nangi ɓe, o bugii ka yiite jahannama ka ɓe jolkaa ɗon e nder niwre, ɓe jogoraa ɗon fii ɲaaweede.
61002005	O dandaali kadi ɓeya yimɓe aranɓe, kono ko njeetato o acci e maɓɓe, goɗɗo on ko Nuuhu, on waajotonooɗo fii peewal ngal, fewndo ko Allaahu on acciti waamere nden e hoore jamaa ɓe rewataa mo ɓen.
61002006	O happani kadi ɗee ca'e Saduuma e Amuura mulugol ɗe, watta ɗe ndoondi, fii waɗangol ɓe rewataa mo ɓen kanko Alla misal.
61002007	Kono o dandi Luutu feewuɗo on, on mo ɓernde mun wondunoo e sokola tiiɗuɗo sabu jikku jiiɓiiɗo ɓee bonɓe,
61002008	ko fii on ko feewuɗo hoɗunooɗo hakkunde maɓɓe, mo wonkii mun tampintenoo ɲande woo ɲande sabu angal peewal ngal o yi'aynoo ngal e ngal o nanaynoo ngal.
61002009	Awa ɗunɗoo fow no holli ko Joomiraaɗo on andi ko honno o dandirta yimɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen ndarndeede, o donkina ɓe feewaa ɓen haa ɲande ɲaawoore nden,
61002010	tentinii ɓen jokkuɓe himmeeji tuunuɗi ɓalli mun, hoyna laamu Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun ko ɓee suusuɓe reedu, mawnintiniiɓe, ɓe hulataa aybinde ruuhuuji ɗin ka kammu.
61002011	E hin-le malaa'ikaaɓe, ɓurɓe ɓe doole e mbawdi ɓen, ɲaawiraali ɓen yimɓe hoyre yeeso Joomiraaɗo on.
61002012	Kono ɓen jannooɓe fenaandeeɓe ko wa'uɓe wa kulle buruure ɗe alaa miijoo-miccoo, tagiraaɗe fii nangeede mulee, ko fii hiɓe hoynude ko ɓe andaa. Ɓe muliray wa kulle buruure nii,
61002013	ko bone wonata njoddi boneeji maɓɓe ɗin. Ɓe tawi faale maɓɓe on ko jiɲangol mbeleeɗe aduna tumbere ɲalorma. Ko ɓe wa'uɓe wa ella e waadere, ɓay hiɓe weltora ɗaynugol on, hay nde hiɓe ɲaamida e mon.
61002014	Gite maɓɓe ɗen no heewi jinaa, awa kadi ɓe haaɓataa waɗugol junuubu. Hiɓe pooɗa wonkiiji ɗi tabitaa ɗin, nawra ɗi e ko boni. Ɓerɗe ɓen jannooɓe fenaandeeɓe no eltiraa miile, ɓen ko ɓe fayɓe huɗaaɓe,
61002015	ɓay ɓe accitii laawol feewungol ngol, ɓe majjirii sabu jokkugol laawol Bal'ama ngol, on ɓiɗɗo Be'uura, yiɗunooɗo njoddi heɓorndi bonki.
61002016	Kono o feliraa sabu geddi makko ɗin tigi, ɗin geddi woni sabu haa mbabun kun, ɗun ko mummuntehun kun, wowliri wa neɗɗo, ɗun haɗi on annabaajo waɗugol kuugal feetere.
61002017	Ɓen ko ɓe ɓulli ɗi alaa ndiyan, ko ɓe duule ɗe hendu raɗotoo, ɓen no maranaa niwre ɓurnde tekkude nden.
61002018	Immorde e yewtereeji maɓɓe manti e mehi, hiɓe huutora himmeeji jiiɓaare ɓandu fii pooɗugol ɓen fuutorɓe karahan e juuɗe wuuruɓe e majjere ɓen.
61002019	Hiɓe foda ɓe ndimu, e hin-le kamɓe tigi ko ɓe maccuɓe ko nawrata e halkaare, ko fii mo kala ko maccuɗo ko fooli ɗun kon.
61002020	Ko fii si tawii, ɓawto fuutagol tuundiiji oo aduna sabu andugol maɓɓe Joomi on e on Dandoowo, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, si ɓe nangike kadi e pircol ɗin tuundiiji haa ɗi foolii ɓe, haray sakkitorde maɓɓe nden ɓuray aranere nden bonude.
61002021	No ɓurani ɓe ka tawata ɓe andaano laawol peewal ngol, edii, andugol ngol, sela yamiroore hormorteende nde ɓe andinaa nden.
61002022	Ɗun haray ɓe tentinii ko ngol tindol goongawol wi'i kon wonde: «Saa'i kala bareeru ndun yiltitanto ko ndu tuutunoo kon», awa kadi: «Saa'i kala kosewii arngii e looteede ngin ruttitoto e rukagol ka loope.»
61003001	Awa e hino ɓatakuru ɗimmuru ndu mi windani on ndun, yo yiɓɓe. E nder majji ɗi ɗiɗii non, mi windiranii on ɗi fii andintingol on, walla on heɓon miijooji laaɓuɗi,
61003002	fii no anditiron konguɗi ɗi annabaaɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen hiitinoo ɗin, e yamiroore Joomi on e Dandoowo en on, nden nde sahaabaaɓe ɓen hewtini on.
61003003	Ko adii kon, andee wonde ka ɲalaaɗe sakkitore, yawitiiɓe aroyay heewuɓe jalnori, wuuriroyayɓe himmeeji maɓɓe ɗin,
61003004	hara hiɓe wi'oya: «Ko honto ardu makko fodanoondu ndun woni? Ko fii gila baabiraaɓe ɓen maayi, fow no wa'i wano wa'unoo non gila aduna on fuɗɗii.»
61003005	Kono ɓe tewi ɓe yejjiti wonde, ko daaluyee Alla on waɗi si kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin woodiranoo, leydi ndin suutaa e ndiyan, ndi moƴƴiniraa ndiyan.
61003006	Ko ndiyan kadi aduna feƴƴunooɗo on muliraa ndiyan waamere.
61003007	Kono ko on daaluyee Alla kadi waɗi si kammuuli fewndiiɗi ɗin e aduna fewndiiɗo on maranaa yiite ngen ɲande ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen ɲaawetee halkee.
61003008	Kono no woodi toɓɓere nde on haanaa yejjitude, yo yiɓɓe: ɲallal gootal ka Joomiraaɗo on ko wa duuɓi wuluure, awa kadi duuɓi wuluure ko wa ɲallal gootal.
61003009	Awa Joomiraaɗo on alaa nennude hunnugol fodaari makko ndin, wano woɓɓe miijori non. Kono ka liddu ɗun, o muɲɲani on tun, ko fii o yiɗaa hay gooto hayra. Kono ko o yiɗi, ko yo fow aru e tuubuubuyee.
61003010	Awa, ɲalaande Joomi on arday wa ngujjo. Nden ɲande non kammuuli ɗin muliray hito uuyungo, piiji oo aduna sunnee mula, leydi ndin kadi e kuuɗe ko ndi wondi kon feɲɲinee.
61003011	Ɓay ɗun fow non no e laawol mulirgol nii, haray pellet hiɗon haani wuurirde laaɓal e no Alla faaliraa non.
61003012	Awa e nder ko habbiɗon ardu ɲalaande Alla nden kon, etee fii no ɗun yaawira, ɗun ko ka kammuuli ɗin mulirta yiite ɗon, e ka piiji oo aduna taayirta nguleendi yiite ɗon.
61003013	Kono enen hiɗen habbii fodaari Alla ndin, ɗun ko kammu hesu e leydi heyri ka peewal ngal hoɗoyta ɗon.
61003014	Ko ɗun waɗi, yo yiɓɓe, e nder nden habbannde, etee fii, nde o aroyi, no o tawira on e nder ɓuttu, hara on aldaa e waadere, on aldaa e ella.
61003015	Jogoree muɲal Joomiraaɗo men on wa kisiyee, wano Puulusa, oo musiɗɗo men yiɗaaɗo, windirani on non kaɲun kadi, tippude e faamu ngu o yeɗaa ngun.
61003016	Ko ɗun o woni waɗude e ɓataake ɗen fow, ka o wowli fii ɗin piiji ɗon, e ka windanɗe mettuɗe faamude ɗen woni ɗon, ɗe tawata yimɓe ɓe faamaa ɓen e ɓe tabitaa ɓen ɓoylii noone on, wano ɓe waɗiri non e ko heddii e bindi ɗin kon, fii hayrannde maɓɓe kamɓe tigi.
61003017	Onon non, yo yiɓɓe, ɓay on hajaama, reenee fii wota on selu jokkon ɗayni ɓe ɗoftaaki yamirooje Alla ɗen, haa ka yoolon tabital mon ngal.
61003018	Awa ɓeydee yaarude yeeso e nder moƴƴere nden e andugol Joomi men on, on Dandoowo, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo mangural wonani jooni e haa poomaa. Aamiina!
62001001	Ko wonnoo kon gila ka fuɗɗoode, ko ɗun men nani, men yi'iri gite amen ɗen, men punnii, men meemiri juuɗe amen ɗen, ɗun ko daaluyee ngurndan ɗan.
62001002	Awa, ngurndan ɗan feeɲii, men yi'ii ɗan, meɗen seeditanaade ɗan. Meɗen feɲɲinande on ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan, ɗan wondunooɗan e Baabaajo on, ɗan feɲɲinanaama men.
62001003	Meɗen hollitude on onon kadi ko men yi'i kon e ko men nani kon fii no laatoron humondirɓe e amen e nder humondiral men e Baabaajo on e Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
62001004	Meɗen windude ɗunɗoo fii no weltaare men nden timmira.
62001005	E hino kibaaru mo men naniri mo on, meɗen ɓanginande on mo: Alla ko ndaygu, niwre woo alaa e makko.
62001006	Si en innii hiɗen humondiri e makko, kono hiɗen yahude e nder niwre nden, haray en fenii, en wuuriraali goonga on.
62001007	Kono si tawii hiɗen yahude e nder ndaygu ngun, wano o woniri non kanko tigi ka nder ndaygu, haray hiɗen humondiri, ɗun haray ƴiiƴan Iisaa Ɓiɗɗo makko on no laɓɓinde en e kala junuubu.
62001008	Si en innii en aldaa e junuubu, haray en ɗaynitike enen tigi, ɗun haray goonga on alaa e men.
62001009	Si en qirritike non junuubaaji men ɗin, Alla ko Sella-Findeejo, Feewuɗo, o yaafanto en junuubaaji men ɗin, o laɓɓina en e kala bonnere.
62001010	Si en innii en waɗaali junuubu, haray en waɗii mo fenoowo, ɗun haray daaluyee makko on alaa e men.
62002001	Fayɓe an, miɗo windande on ɗunɗoo fii wota on waɗu junuubu. Kono si goɗɗo aru e waɗude junuubu, haray hiɗen mari Fattantooɗo en moggo Baabaajo on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu, Feewuɗo on.
62002002	Ko fii kanko tigi ko o sadaka fii no heɓiren yaafuyee junuubaaji men ɗin, hinaa non fii ɗi men ɗin tun, kono ko fii ɗi ɓe aduna on fow.
62002003	Si en ɗoftike yamirooje makko ɗen, haray hiɗen felliti wonde hiɗen andi mo.
62002004	Kala on wi'uɗo no andi mo, hara o ɗoftaaki yamirooje makko ɗen, haray ko o fenoowo, goonga on alaa e makko.
62002005	Kono kala ɗoftiiɗo daaluyee makko on, haray giggol Alla ngol no timmi e makko, ko non andirten hiɗen humondiri e makko.
62002006	Kala on wi'uɗo no humondiri e makko, haray no haani wuurirde wano Almasiihu on wuurirnoo non.
62002007	Yiɓɓe, hinaa yamiroore heyre mi woni windande on, ko yamiroore hinnde, nde heɓunoɗon gila ka fuɗɗoode. Ndee yamiroore hinnde, ko ngol kongol ngol nanuɗon.
62002008	Kono fow e mun, ko yamiroore heyre mi woni windande on. Haqiiqa mayre on no ɓangi e makko, no ɓangi e mon, ko fii niwre nden no feƴƴude, awa kadi ndaygu haqiiqawu ngun ndaygii toode.
62002009	On wi'uɗo no ka ndaygu e hoore aɲugol musiɗɗo mun, haray haa jooni himo ka niwre.
62002010	On mo yiɗi musiɗɗo mun, haray himo ka ndaygu, peggal woo alanaa mo.
62002011	Kono on aɲuɗo musiɗɗo mun ko ka niwre woni, ko e nder niwre o woni yahude, o andaa ka o woni yaarude, ko fii niwre nden wuminii gite makko ɗen.
62002012	Miɗo windande on, yo fayɓe, ɓay junuubaaji mon ɗin yaaforaama sabu innde makko nden.
62002013	Miɗo windande on, yo baabiraaɓe, ɓay on andii on Woodanooɗo gila ka fuɗɗoode. Miɗo windande on, yo sukaaɓe, ɓay on foolii bonɗo on.
62002014	Mi windanii on kadi, yo fayɓe, ɓay on andii Baabaajo on. Mi windanii on kadi, yo baabiraaɓe, ɓay on andii Woodanooɗo on gila ka fuɗɗoode. Mi windanii on kadi, yo sukaaɓe, ɓay hiɗon tiiɗi, daaluyee Alla on no e mon, awa kadi on foolii bonɗo on.
62002015	Wota on yiɗu aduna on e ko woni e aduna on kon. On mo yiɗi aduna on, haray giggol Baabaajo on alaa e makko.
62002016	Ko fii kala ko woni e oo aduna, ɗun ko mbeleeɗe ɓandu e himmangol ko yi'i e mantorgol keyeeji aduna, hinaa e Baabaajo on iwri, kono ko e oo aduna.
62002017	Awa oo aduna e himmeeji mun ko ko woni feƴƴude, kono on waɗoowo faale Alla on luttay haa poomaa.
62002018	Awa, yo fayɓe, ko saa'i sakkitoro on nii. Wano nanirɗon non, liddotooɗo Almasiihu on aray, e hay fewndo ɗoo toode liddotooɓe Almasiihu on ɗuuɗuɓe arii. Ko nii andirten wonde ko saa'i sakkitoro on nii.
62002019	Ɓen non ko e men iwi, kono hinaa ɓe men, ko fii si ɓe wonno ɓe men, ɓe luttidayno e men. Kono ɗun ɓanginii wonde ɓe fow wonaa ɓe men.
62002020	Onon kan, Seniiɗo on yeɗii on Ruuhu mun on, ko ɗun waɗi si on fow hiɗon mari andal.
62002021	Mi windiranaali on wa si tawii on andaa goonga on, kono ko ɓay hiɗon andi, e hiɗon andi kadi wonde fenaande woo iwataa e goonga.
62002022	Ko hombo non woni on fenoowo, si hinaa on yedduɗo wonde Iisaa ko Almasiihu? On ko liddotooɗo Almasiihu on, yedduɗo Baabaajo on e Ɓiɗɗo on.
62002023	Awa kala yedduɗo Ɓiɗɗo on heɓaali Baabaajo on, kala qirritiiɗo Ɓiɗɗo on, haray heɓii Baabaajo on.
62002024	Onon non, ko nanuɗon kon gila ka fuɗɗoode no haani wonude ka ɓerɗe mon. Si tawii ko nanuɗon kon gila ka fuɗɗoode wonii ka ɓerɗe mon, haray onon kadi on humondirii e Ɓiɗɗo on e Baabaajo on.
62002025	Awa e hino fodaari ndi o waɗani en ndin: ko ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan.
62002026	Mi windiranii on ɗun e telen-ma wonɓe ɗaynude on ɓen.
62002027	Ko fii onon, Ruuhu mo heɓirɗon Almasiihu on no e mon, ko ɗun waɗi on hatonjinaa e janneede, kono, wano Ruuhu makko on woni jannirde on piiji ɗin fow non, (ko mo goonga, mo aldaa e fenaande), humondiree e Almasiihu on wano Ruuhu makko on janniri on non.
62002028	Jooni non, yo fayɓe, humondiree e makko, fii, nde o feeɲoyi, yo en heɓu hoolaare, e nde o ari, wota en hersu yeeso makko.
62002029	Si tawii hiɗon andi ko o Feewuɗo, haray andee kala waɗuɗo ko feewi ko jibinannde makko.
62003001	Ndaaree noone giggol ngol Baabaajo on yeɗi en ngol, haa noddaɗen fayɓe Alla. Awa kadi ko en ɗun. E hino ko waɗi kon si aduna on andaa en, ko fii o andaali mo.
62003002	Yiɓɓe, jooni non ko en fayɓe Alla. Ko wonoyten kon feɲɲinaaka taho. Kono hiɗen andi, nde o feeɲoyi, en nandoyay e makko, ko fii en yi'oyay mo wano o woniri non.
62003003	Kala jogiiɗo on tama'u e makko, haray no laɓɓintinii wano kanko Almasiihu on o laaɓiri non.
62003004	Kala non on waɗuɗo junuubu, haray ontigi bonnii Sariya on, ko fii junuubu ko bonnugol Sariya.
62003005	Kono hiɗon andi, kanko Almasiihu on ko o feeɲiri ko fii ittugol junuubaaji, e hin-le junuubu alaa e makko.
62003006	Kala on humondirɗo e makko duumotaako e waɗugol junuubu. Kala non waɗoowo junuubu, haray yi'aali mo, andaali mo.
62003007	Ko onon, yo fayɓe, wota hay gooto ɗaynu on, ko fii kala on waɗuɗo ko feewi, haray ko feewuɗo, wano kanko Almasiihu on o woniri feewuɗo non.
62003008	Kala non on waɗoowo junuubu, haray ko mo Ibuliisa, ko fii gila ka fuɗɗoode Ibuliisa no waɗude junuubu. Ɓiɗɗo Alla on-le ko feeɲiri ko fii mulugol kuuɗe Ibuliisa ɗen.
62003009	Kala on jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla duumotaako e waɗugol junuubu, ko fii haray awdi Alla ndin no e makko, haray o waawataa waɗude junuubu, ɓay ko e immorde e Alla woni ko o jibinaa.
62003010	Awa e hino ko ɓangini hakkunde fayɓe Alla ɓen e fayɓe Ibuliisa ɓen: kala on mo waɗataa ko feewi, haray hinaa mo Alla, ko wano non kadi on mo yiɗaa musiɗɗo mun.
62003011	E hino kibaaru mo nanuɗon on gila ka fuɗɗoode: yiɗindiren.
62003012	Wota en wa'u wa Qaayiina, on mo Ibuliisa, warunooɗo miɲɲiraawo mun on. E ko fii honɗun o warannoo mo? Ko tawde kuuɗe makko ɗen kanko Qaayiina ko bonɗe, ɗe miɲɲiraawo makko on ɗen kan ko feewuɗe.
62003013	Musiɓɓe an, si tawii aduna on no aɲi on, haray wota on ŋalɗu.
62003014	Ko fii hiɗen andi ko e mayde iwuɗen, aruɗen e ngurndan, ɓay hiɗen yiɗi musiɓɓe men ɓen. On mo alaa giggol, haray ko ka mayde woni.
62003015	Kala on aɲuɗo musiɗɗo mun, haray ko waroowo. Hiɗon andi-le kala waroowo, haray ngurndan poomayankejan alaa e makko.
62003016	E hino no andirten ko woni giggol: Almasiihu on okkitirii ngurndan mun ɗan fii men, haray enen kadi hiɗen haani okkitirde ngurndan men ɗan fii musiɓɓe men ɓen.
62003017	Si tawii goɗɗo no mari ngaluuji aduna, o yi'ii musiɗɗo makko sokolɗo, o ombanii mo gite, haray ko honno giggol Alla ngol wonirta e makko?
62003018	Ko onon, yo fayɓe, wota en yiɗir kongol maa ɗenngal tun, kono yiɗiren kuugal e goonga.
62003019	Ko nii andirten ko en ɓe goonga, ɓerɗe men ɗen heɓirta kadi hoolaare yeeso makko.
62003020	Hay si ɓerɗe men ɗen no felude en, Alla no ɓuri ɓerɗe men ɗen mawnude, e himo andi fow.
62003021	Awa, yo yiɓɓe, si tawii ɓerɗe men ɗen felaali en, haray hiɗen mari hoolaare yeeso Alla.
62003022	Kala ko toriɗen mo, en heɓiray mo, ɓay hiɗen ɗoftii yamirooje makko ɗen, hiɗen waɗude ko welata mo.
62003023	Awa e hino yamiroore makko nden: ko yo en gomɗin innde Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, yiɗindiren kadi wano o yamiri en non.
62003024	Kala on ɗoftiiɗo yamirooje makko ɗen, haray no humondiri e Alla, Alla kadi no humondiri e makko. Awa kadi e hino no andirten wonde himo humondiri e men: ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo mo o yeɗi en on andirɗen ɗun.
62004001	Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, wota on hoolo kala neɗɗo wi'uɗo Ruuhu Alla on no e makko, kono taskee ɓe fii andugol si ruuhu wonɗo e maɓɓe on ko e Alla iwri, ko fii waɗitiiɓe annaba ɗuuɗuɓe arii e oo aduna.
62004002	E hino no andirton si konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin ko e Ruuhu Alla on iwri: kala qirritiiɗo wonde Iisaa Almasiihu on wontuno neɗɗo, o ari ka aduna, haray ko mo Alla.
62004003	Kala non mo qirritaaki Iisaa, haray hinaa mo Ruuhu Alla on, haray on ko mo liddotooɗo Almasiihu on, on mo nanunoɗon no arude. On non jooni no e aduna on.
62004004	Ko onon, yo fayɓe, ko on ɓe Alla, awa kadi on foolii waɗitiiɓe annaba ɓen, ko fii Wonɗo e mon on no ɓuri mawnude wonɗo e aduna on.
62004005	Ɓen ko ɓe oo aduna, ko ɗun waɗi konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin ko ɗi oo aduna, awa kadi aduna on no heɗaade ɗi.
62004006	Enen-le, ko en ɓe Alla. Kala on anduɗo Alla heɗoto en, kono on mo tawata non wonaa mo Alla heɗotaako en. Ko non andirten Ruuhu Goongaajo on e ruuhu fenaandeejo on.
62004007	Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, yiɗindiren, ko fii giggol ko ka Alla iwri, awa kala yiɗuɗo ko jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla, haray himo andi Alla.
62004008	Kala mo aldaa e giggol, haray andaa Alla, ko fii Alla ko giggol.
62004009	E hino no giggol Alla ngol feeɲiri e men: Allaahu on addii Ɓiɗɗo makko bajjo on e nder oo aduna fii no wuuriren immorde e makko.
62004010	E hino ko woni ngol giggol kon: hinaa ko yiɗuɗen Alla kon, kono ko ko o yiɗi en kon, o addiri Ɓiɗɗo makko on sadaka fii no heɓiren yaafuyee junuubaaji men ɗin.
62004011	Ɓay Alla yiɗirii en nii, yo yiɓɓe, haray enen kadi hiɗen haani yiɗindirde.
62004012	Hay gooto yi'aali Alla haa hande, kono si en yiɗindirii, haray Alla no humondiri e men, giggol makko wonungol e men ngol timma.
62004013	E hino no andirten hiɗen humondiri e makko, kanko kadi himo humondiri e men: ko sabu Ruuhu makko mo o yeɗi en on.
62004014	Menen non men yi'ii, meɗen seeditaade wonde Baabaajo on nulii Ɓiɗɗo on fii dandugol aduna on.
62004015	Kala on qirritiiɗo wonde Iisaa ko Ɓiɗɗo Alla, haray Alla no humondiri e makko, kanko kadi himo humondiri e Alla.
62004016	Awa, enen en andii, en gomɗinii giggol ngol Alla yiɗi en ngol. Alla ko giggol. Kala on wonduɗo e giggol, haray himo humondiri e Alla, Alla kadi no humondiri e makko.
62004017	Ko nii giggol ngol timmiri e men, fii no heɓiren hoolaare ɲande ɲaawoore nden. Wano o woniri non kanko, enen kadi ko non wonirɗen e oo aduna.
62004018	Kulol alaa e nder giggol, kono giggol timmungol raɗoto kulol, ɓay kulol no tijjii donkineede. Awa kadi, kala on huluɗo, haray giggol ngol timmaa e makko.
62004019	Enen non hiɗen yiɗi, ɓay ko kanko adii en yiɗude.
62004020	On mo wi'i no yiɗi Alla, e hoore himo aɲi musiɗɗo makko, haray ko fenoowo. Ko fii on mo yiɗaali musiɗɗo mun mo o renti on, haray o waawataa yiɗude Alla mo o rentaa on.
62004021	Awa, ko ndee yamiroore ɗoo heɓirɗen mo: mo no yiɗi Alla, yo yiɗu kadi musiɗɗo mun on.
