62005001	Kala on gomɗinɗo wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on, haray ko jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla, e kala yiɗuɗo Baabaajo on yiɗay Ɓiɗɗo on kadi.
62005002	E hino no andirten hiɗen yiɗi fayɓe Alla ɓen: ko si en yiɗii Alla, en ɗoftike yamirooje makko ɗen.
62005003	Ko woni yiɗugol Alla: ko ɗoftagol yamirooje makko ɗen. Yamirooje makko ɗen-le hinaa sattuɗe,
62005004	ko fii on jibinaaɗo ka Alla foolay oo aduna. Awa e hino polgal foolungal aduna on: ko gomɗinal men ngal.
62005005	Ko hombo woni on fooluɗo aduna on, si hinaa on gomɗinɗo wonde Iisaa ko Ɓiɗɗo Alla?
62005006	Ko kanko Iisaa Almasiihu on ardi e ndiyan e ƴiiƴan, hinaa non ndiyan tun o ardi, kono ko ndiyan e ƴiiƴan. Awa ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni seeditaade, ɓay on Ruuhu ko o goonga.
62005007	Ko fii ko piiji tati woni seeditaade:
62005008	ko Ruuhu Allaahu on e ndiyan ɗan e ƴiiƴan ɗan, ɗin non tati hiɗi fotti.
62005009	Hiɗen jaɓude seeditooje yimɓe ɓen, kono ko seeditoore Alla nden ɓuri mawnude, ɗun ko seeditoore nde Alla seeditii fii Ɓiɗɗo makko on nden.
62005010	Kala on gomɗinɗo Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, haray nden seeditoore no e makko. Kono on mo gomɗinaa Alla non, haray o waɗii mo fenoowo, ko fii haray o gomɗinaa seeditoore nde Alla seeditii fii Ɓiɗɗo mun on nden.
62005011	Awa e hino nden seeditoore: Alla okkii en ngurndan poomayankejan, ɗan ngurndan non no e Ɓiɗɗo makko on.
62005012	Kala humondirɗo e Ɓiɗɗo on no mari ngurndan ɗan. Kala mo humondiraa e Ɓiɗɗo Alla on haray alaa ɗan ngurndan.
62005013	Mi windanii on ɗun fii no andiron wonde hiɗon mari ngurndan poomayankejan, onon ɓee gomɗinɓe e innde Ɓiɗɗo Alla on.
62005014	Awa e hino hoolaare nde ɓattorten Alla nden: si en torike mo goɗɗun ko yaadi e faale makko on, o heɗoto en.
62005015	Ɓay non hiɗen andi himo heɗii kala ko toriɗen mo, haray hiɗen andi en heɓii ko toriɗen mo kon.
62005016	On mo yi'i musiɗɗo mun no waɗa junuubu mo nawrataa e mayde, yo o torano mo, Alla yeɗay mo ngurndan, ɗun non ko ɓen waɗooɓe junuubu mo nawrataa e mayde. Kono no woodi junuubu nawroowo e mayde, hinaa fii on junuubu mi wi'i yo tore.
62005017	Kala ko aldaa e peewal ko junuubu, kono no woodi non junuubaaji ɗi nawrataa e mayde.
62005018	Hiɗen andi kala on jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla, o duumotaako e waɗugol junuubu, kono Ɓiɗɗo Alla on reenay mo, danda mo, hara Bonɗo on meemataa mo.
62005019	Hiɗen andi ko en ɓe Alla, awa kadi aduna on fow no e ley doole Bonɗo on.
62005020	Hiɗen andi kadi Ɓiɗɗo Alla on arii, o okkii en faamu fii andugol Goongaajo on. Hiɗen humondiri-le e Goongaajo on, ɓay hiɗen humondiri e Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu. Ko on woni Alla Goongaajo on e ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan.
62005021	Ko onon, yo fayɓe, reenee e sanamuuji ɗin!
63001001	Salminaango an min oo ardotooɗo, haa e oo suddiiɗo suɓaaɗo tedduɗo e fayɓe mun, mo mi yiɗi e nder goonga, mo tawata non hinaa min tun yiɗi ɗun, kono ko kala anduɗo goonga on,
63001002	sabu goonga wonɗo e men on, ɗun ko on goonga wonoowo e men haa poomaa.
63001003	Moƴƴere e yurmeende e ɓuttu wonay e men immorde e Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu on, ɗun ko Ɓiɗɗo Baabaajo on, e nder goonga e giggol.
63001004	Mi weltike fota ko mi tawi kon woɓɓe e fayɓe maa ɓen no jokki laawol goonga on, wano Baabaajo on yamiriri en non.
63001005	Jooni non, an oo suddiiɗo tedduɗo, koo ko mi wonu-maa windande hinaa yamiroore heyre, kono ko ndee nde heɓunoɗen gila ka fuɗɗoode mi tori-maa, ɗun ko yo en yiɗindir.
63001006	Awa e hino ko woni giggol kon: ko jokkugol yamirooje makko ɗen. E hino yamiroore nde anduɗon gila ka fuɗɗoode nden: ko yo on wuuru e nder giggol.
63001007	Ko fii ɗaynooɓe ɗuuɗuɓe naatii e nder aduna on, ɓe jaɓaali wonde Iisaa Almasiihu on wontuno neɗɗo o ari ka aduna. Ko ɓee woni ɗaynooɓe e liddotooɓe Almasiihu on ɓen.
63001008	Awa, reenee onon tigi, fii wota battane golle men ɗen bonu, kono fii yo on heɓu njoddi heewundi.
63001009	Kala feƴƴituɗo jannde Almasiihu on, ronki humaade e mayre, haray on wonaa humondirɗo e Alla. Kala non tabituɗo e nden jannde, haray no humondiri e Baaba on e Ɓiɗɗo on.
63001010	On mo ari e mon, addoraali nden jannde, wota on wernu mo ka suudu mon, awa kadi wota on hiwro mo.
63001011	Ko fii kala on hiwriiɗo mo, haray tawdaama e kuuɗe makko bonɗe ɗen.
63001012	Miɗo mari buy ko mi windana on, kono mi yiɗaali windirde ɗun ndaha e kaydi. Kono non miɗo tanƴinii yahugol ka mon, mi yewtira on hunduko, fii no weltaare men nden timmira.
63001013	Fayɓe jaaja maa suɓaaɗo on salminii ma.
64001001	Salminaango an min oo ardotooɗo, haa e maa an oo yiɗaaɗo an Gayuusi, mo mi yiɗi e nder goonga.
64001002	Giɗo an, e nooneeji ɗin fow miɗo yelani-maa moƴƴere e cellal ɓandu, wano wonkii maa kin selliri non.
64001003	Mi weltike fota, fewndo musiɓɓe goo ari, ɓe seeditii fii ko humiɗaa e goonga on kon e ko wuurirɗaa goonga on kon.
64001004	Mi alaa weltaare mawnde ɓuri nanugol no wi'ee wonde fayɓe an ɓen no jokki goonga on.
64001005	Giɗo an, hiɗa waɗirde no feewiri e nder ko wonɗaa waɗande musiɓɓe ɓen kon, hay ɓe a andaa ɓen.
64001006	Ɓe seeditike fii giggol maa ngol yeeso moftal ngal. Haray a waɗii ko moƴƴi si a faaborii ɓe ko haani e nder yaadu maɓɓe ndun, hara ko noone no welirta Alla,
64001007	ɓay ko fii innde Almasiihu on ɓe yahi, e ɓaawo hendagol hay huunde e juuɗe ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen.
64001008	Hiɗen haani jaɓɓaade sifa ɓen yimɓe, fii no gollidiren e maɓɓe fii goonga on.
64001009	Mi windanii moftal ngal konguɗi seeɗa, kono oo wi'eteeɗo Diyoteriifa, yiɗuɗo wonude arano e hakkunde maɓɓe on, jaɓanaa men.
64001010	Ko ɗun waɗi, nde mi aroyi, mi humpitoyay on fii kuuɗe makko ɗen, konguɗi bonɗi ɗi o woni ɲo'ude men ɗin. Nde tawnoo ɗun yonanaali mo, o salii wernude musiɓɓe ɓen, o fannani faalaaɓe waɗude ɗun ɓen kadi, o raɗii ɓe ka moftal.
64001011	Awa yo giɗo an, wota a ɲembu ko boni, kono ɲembu ko moƴƴi. Kala on waɗuɗo ko moƴƴi, haray ko mo Alla, kala non on waɗuɗo ko boni, haray andaali Alla.
64001012	Yimɓe ɓen fow no joganii Dimitiriyuusa kongol moƴƴol, hay goonga on tigi, menen kadi meɗen seeditanaade mo ɗun. Hiɗa andi-le seeditoore amen nden ko goonga.
64001013	Miɗo mari buy ko mi windane, kono mi faalaaka waɗirde ɗun ndaha e karambol.
64001014	Miɗo tanƴinii yi'itugol ma ko woɗɗaa, onsay en yewtiray hunduko.
64001015	Yo ɓuttu wonane. Yiɓɓe ɓen salminii ma, min kadi mi salminirii yiɓɓe ɓen gooto gooto.
65001001	Immorde e an min Yuudu, nduu kurkaadu Iisaa Almasiihu on, ɗun ko oo miɲɲiraawo Yaaquuba, haa e ɓee noddaaɓe, ɓe Alla Baabaajo on yiɗi, maraaɓe Iisaa Almasiihu on.
65001002	Yo yurmeende e ɓuttu e giggol sowindirane on.
65001003	Yiɓɓe, e nder ko mi marnoo faale tiiɗuɗo fii windangol on fii kisiyee mo hawtuɗen on, mi taw bee mi winda taho fii wakkilingol on no tippiranon gomɗinal hewtinaangal yimɓe Alla ɓen nde wootere haa poomaa.
65001004	Ko fii woɓɓe ɓe ɲaawoore mun windananoo gila neeɓii no ɓisii e hakkunde mon, ɗun ko ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen. Hiɓe waylude moƴƴere Alla men on jiiɓaare, ɓe yeddi Iisaa Almasiihu on, on Hooreejo men e Joomi men bajjo.
65001005	Miɗo faalaa andintinde on ko anduɗon moƴƴa, ɓay Joomiraaɗo on dandii jamaa Isra'iila on e nder leydi Misira ndin, ɓawto ɗun o muluno kadi ɓe gomɗinaa wonnooɓe hakkunde maɓɓe ɓen.
65001006	Awa kadi malaa'ikaaɓe hawkunooɓe nokkuure mun nden ɓe ronki jogaade bawgal ngal ɓe halfinaa ngal, o jolkii ɓe jolokooje ɗe ɓe seedataa, o marii ɓe ka nder niɓe haa ɲande ɲalaande mawnde ɲaawoore nden.
65001007	Ko wano non kadi, ɓee yimɓe ɗee ca'e Saduuma e Amuura wondude e ca'e ɗe ɗe kawtiri ɗen, waɗirnoo jinaa, hiɓe ɗaɓɓaynoo yiidugol e mbalndi no haaniraa, ɓen waɗaa misal fii wonoyayɓe e ley lette yiite poomayankeewe ngen.
65001008	Ko wano non kadi, ɓen yimɓe ko miijotooɓe miijooji mehi, ɓe tuunina ɓandu ndun, ɓe hoyna laamateeri Joomiraaɗo on e ruuhuuji ɗin ka kammu.
65001009	E hin-le, fewndo Miikaa'iilu oo malaa'ikaajo mawɗo yeddondiri e Ibuliisa, ɓe pooɗondiri fii furee Muusaa on, kanko Miikaa'iilu o suusaano mo ɲaawirde hoyre, o wi'uno tun: «Yo Joomiraaɗo on donkine!»
65001010	Kono ɓen yimɓe no hoyna ko ɓe andaa, ko ɓe andani hoore maɓɓe kon kadi no wa'i wa mummunte ɗi alaa miijoo-miccoo, ɗun-le ko halkayɗun ɓe.
65001011	Bone wonanii ɓe, ko fii ɓe jokkii laawol Qaayiina ngol, ɓe ukkori e ella fii heɓugol njoddi wano Bal'ama non, awa kadi ɓe muliri sabu murtaldu maɓɓe wano Qooraha non.
65001012	Ko ɓe baade ɓaleeje ka mottondire mon fii hiraande jokkere enɗan. Hiɓe waɗa mbeleeɗe e ɓaawo hersa, hiɓe hittini fii hoore maɓɓe tun. Ko ɓe duule ɗe aldaa e ndiyan, ɗe hendu sorotoo naɓa. Ko ɓe leɗɗe dabbunde ɗe aldaa e ɓiɓɓe, mayɗe laabi ɗiɗi, ɓoraa.
65001013	Ko wano morlooɗe ndiyan ɲaaɗuɗe bugitortoo ngufo ka sera baharu, tuunina mo non, ko wano non kamɓe kadi ɓe tuuninirta woɓɓe goo kuuɗe maɓɓe hersiniiɗe. Hiɓe wa'i wa koode yiilotooɗe, ɓe niwre niɓe maranaa haa poomaa.
65001014	Ko fii maɓɓe kadi, Hanuuka, on njeeɗiɗaɓo gila e Aadama, hiitinoo, o wi'i: «Awa, Joomiraaɗo on arii wondude e laaɓuɓe makko guluuje guluuje,
65001015	fii waɗugol ɲaawoore e hoore fow, e fii hollugol ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen fow kuuɗe maɓɓe bonɗe ɗen, e kala konguɗi sattuɗi ɗi junuubankeeɓe, ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen, wowli e hoore makko!»
65001016	Ɓen ko yimɓe ŋormotooɓe, woytotooɓe, jokkuɓe himmeeji mun, ɓe tawata kundule mun no wowla haalaaji manti, mantooɓe yimɓe fii nafa mun.
65001017	Kono onon, yo yiɓɓe, anditee fii waajuuji ɗi ɓee sahaabaaɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on hiitinoo,
65001018	hiɓe wi'aynoo on: «Ka saa'iiji sakkitori woodoyay yawitiiɓe, jokkoyayɓe himmeeji mun bonɗi ɗi yaadaa e faale Alla on.»
65001019	Awa e hino ɓen, ko ɓee waddooɓe, jokkuɓe miijooji aduna, ɓe Ruuhu Alla on alaa e mun.
65001020	Kono onon non yo yiɓɓe, tiiɗinee ngurndan mon ɗan e hoore gomɗinal mon hormorteengal ngal, tororon Alla bawgal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on,
65001021	catoɗon e giggol Alla ngol, habboɗon yurmeende Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, fii yeɗugol on ngurndan poomayankejan.
65001022	Yurminee sikkitiiɓe ɓen,
65001023	faaboron ɓeya kadi jattingol ɓe yiite, yurminiron ɓeya yurmeende wondude e kulol, e nder aɲugol tuundi haa aɲa tuundi conci tuuniniraaɗi kuuɗe ɓandu.
65001024	Awa, on Alla waawuɗo on dandude kala yanal, feɲɲina on yeeso mangu mun ngun e nder weltaare mon, tawa on felnaaki,
65001025	ko kanko Alla bajjo on, on Dandirɗo en Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, darja e mangu mawngu e doole e bawgal wonani, ado saa'iiji ɗin fow, e jooni, e haa poomaa. Aamiina!
66001001	Feɲɲinannde Iisaa Almasiihu on. Ndee feɲɲinannde ko Allaahu on halfini nde Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii yo o hollu jiyaaɓe makko ɓen kon ko saatii arude ko ɓooyaa. Kanko kadi o ɓanginiri ɗun nulugol malaa'ikaajo makko goo e oo jiyaaɗo makko Yuuhanna,
66001002	seeditiiɗo ko o yi'i kon fow, ɗun ko daaluyee Alla on, wondude e seeditoore Iisaa Almasiihu on.
66001003	Maloore wonanii on janguɗo e ɓen heɗiiɓe ɗii konguɗi ndee feɲɲinannde, maanditii koo ko windii, ko fii saa'i on ɓadike.
66001004	Immorde e min Yuuhanna haa e mon onon ɗee mofte Iisaa jeeɗiɗi wonɗe e ngal diiwal Aazii: Yo ɓuttu e moƴƴere wonan on immorde e on Woodaaɗo, on Woodanooɗo e on Aroyoowo, wondude e ɗii ruuhuuji jeeɗiɗi wonɗi ka yeeso jullere laamu makko,
66001005	wondude kadi e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on Seedeejo Sella-Findeejo, e Adaaɗo immintineede e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, ɗun ko oo Lanɗo lamɓe aduna. Yo on Yiɗuɗo en, fuutiniri en ƴiiƴan mun ɗan bawgal junuubaaji men,
66001006	waɗi en laamateeri e yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla, on Baabaajo makko, ko on mangu e laamu wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
66001007	E hino ka o arata, himo arda e duule, kala neɗɗo yi'ay mo, hay tufunooɓe mo ɓen. Awa kadi bolondaaji aduna on fow fesay sabu makko. Ko non woniri. Aamiina.
66001008	Allaahu Joomiraaɗo on daali: «Ko min woni Halfeere aranere nden e sakkitorde nden, ɗun ko Woodaaɗo on e Woodanooɗo on e Aroyoowo on, on Jom Bawgal.»
66001009	Ko min Yuuhanna oo musiɗɗo mon, tawdaaɗo e mon e tampere e laamateeri e ŋaɲɲaare e nder humondiral e Iisaa, hari miɗo e ndee suriire wi'eteende Patmuusa, sabu yottingol an daaluyee Alla on e seeditagol an fii Iisaa.
66001010	Ɲalaande Joomiraaɗo on, tawi Ruuhu Seniiɗo on no tippii e an, mi nani hawa tiiɗuka ɓaawo an wa hito liital,
66001011	no wi'a: «Ko yi'uɗaa woo windu e deftere, naɓanaa ɗun mofte jeeɗiɗi wonɗe ɗen e ɗee ca'e Efeesi e Simirna e Pergaama e Saayatiira e Sardiisa e Filadelfii e Laa'udiisa.»
66001012	Onsay mi yeƴƴitii fii ndaarugol on wonɗo lan wowlande, mi yi'i joɗɗinirɗe pitilli tafiraaɗe kaŋŋe jeeɗiɗi.
66001013	Tawi wa'uɗo wa Ɓii-Aaden no hakkunde ɗen joɗɗinirɗe pitilli, ɓorniiɗo kaftaane juutuɗo, haɓɓitii dattol kaŋŋe ka ɓernde,
66001014	tawi hoore makko nden no rawniri wa leeɓi baalii maa wa cuddi, gite makko ɗen no wa'ita wa joyngol yiite,
66001015	koyɗe ɗen no wa'i wa sila-dane wonɗo e nder beembal yiite, hito makko ngon no wa'iti wa hito jurnde ndiyan.
66001016	Tawi koode jeeɗiɗi no ka jungo makko ɲaamo, kaafa welka ka mbelɗe ɗiɗi no yalta ka hunduko makko. Awa kadi yeeso makko ngon no wa'ita wa nde naange jalbi tuma nge hatti e wulude.
66001017	Ɓay mi yi'ii mo, mi yaniri ka ley koyɗe makko wa mayɗo. Onsay o fawi jungo makko ɲaamo ngon e hoore an, o wi'i: «Wota a hulu. Ko min woni Arano on e Sakkitoro on,
66001018	awa kadi ko min woni Wuuruɗo on. Hari mi maayii, e hino miɗo wuuri haa poomaa, awa kadi miɗo jogii saabiije mayde e jahannama ɗen.»
66001019	O wi'immi kadi: «Awa jooni windu ko yi'uɗaa kon e ko fewndii kon e ko faandii arude kon.
66001020	Awa koode jeeɗiɗi ɗe yi'uɗaa ɗen ka jungo an ɲaamo, e joɗɗinirɗe pitilli tafiraaɗe kaŋŋe jeeɗiɗi ɗen, e hino ko ɗun firi kon: koode ɗen jeeɗiɗi ko malaa'ikaaɓe mofte ɗen jeeɗiɗi, awa joɗɗinirɗe pitilli ɗen jeeɗiɗi, ko mofte ɗen jeeɗiɗi.»
66002001	«Windan malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Efeesi ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko on tambiiɗo koode ɗen jeeɗiɗi ka jungo mun ɲaamo, on jindoowo e hakkunde joɗɗinirɗe pitilli tafiraaɗe kaŋŋe ɗen jeeɗiɗi wi'i moftal ngal kon:
66002002	‹Miɗo andi kuuɗe maa ɗen e yangi maa kin e ŋaɲɲaare maa nden. Miɗo andi kadi a jaɓataa muɲɲanaade bonɓe ɓen, awa kadi a ndarndike waɗitiiɓe sahaabaaɓe ɓen, hara hinaa ɓe ɗun, tawɗaa ko ɓe fenooɓe.
66002003	Hiɗa ŋaɲɲii, tampi sabu innde an nden, kono a haaɓaali.
66002004	‹Kono miɗo felu-maa huunde wootere: ko ko seluɗaa giggol ngol yiɗunoɗaa mi aranun ngol kon.
66002005	Anditu ka iwuɗaa ɗon yanuɗaa! Tuubaa, ruttoɗaa e golleeji maa arani ɗin. Si hinaa ɗun, mi artoyay e maa, mi sottinane joɗɗinirde pitilli maa nden ka nde woni ɗon, si hinaa hara a tuubu, ruttiɗaa.
66002006	Kono e hino ko mi weltani-maa fii mun kon: ko ko aɲuɗaa ɗee kuuɗe ɓee jokkuɓe laawol Nikola, ɗe mi aɲi min kadi.
66002007	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon. On fooluɗo, mi newnanay mo ɲaamugol ɓiɓɓe ngal leggal ngurndan wongal ka aljanna Allaahu on.› »
66002008	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Simirna ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko on Wonɗo Arano e Sakkitoro, on maynooɗo wuuriti, wi'i moftal ngal kon:
66002009	‹Miɗo andi tampere nde tampuɗaa nden e miskinankaaku maa ngun, hara-le ko a galo. Awa kadi miɗo andi hoyre nde ɓee wi'itiiɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe, hara hinaa ɓe ɗun, wonu-maa hoynude nden, hara ɓen ko ɓe moftal Ibuliisa.
66002010	Wota a hulu ko faandiɗaa tampude kon. Awa Ibuliisa no faandii bugaade woɓɓe e mon ka kaso fii no ndarndore ɗon. On heɓay ton tampere e nder balɗe sappo. Kono gomɗin haa maayaa, ɗun mi yeɗete meetelol ngurndan ngol.
66002011	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon. Kala fooluɗo, mayde ɗimmere nden hewtoytaa mo few.› »
66002012	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Pergaama ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko Jogiiɗo kaafa welka ka mbelɗe ɗiɗi kan wi'i moftal ngal kon:
66002013	‹Miɗo andi ka hoɗuɗaa ɗon, ko ɗon jullere Ibuliisa nden woni. Hiɗa jogitii innde an nden, awa kadi a hayfinaali ko gomɗinɗaa mi kon, hay ɲande oo seeditantooɗo lan sella-findeejo, wi'eteeɗo Antipaasu, waraa ka mon, ɗun ko e ndee wonunde Ibuliisa.
66002014	‹Kono no woodi ton ko mettimmi e maa. Hiɗa mari ton yimɓe jogitiiɓe jannde Bal'ama nden, on jannunooɗo oo wi'eteeɗo Balaka fegginirgol Banii-Isra'iila'en ɲammingol ɓe tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji, jokkina ɓe jinaa.
66002015	Wano non an kadi, hiɗa mari jogitiiɓe jannde jokkuɓe laawol Nikola ɓen.
66002016	Awa tuubu, si hinaa ɗun, miɗo ara e maa ko neeɓaa, mi haɓira ɓe kaafa hunduko an kon.
66002017	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon. Fooluɗo on, mi neeminay mo ‹manna› suuɗiiɗo, mi yeɗa mo kadi hayre raneere, hara no windii e nden hayre innde heyre nde hay gooto andaa si wonaa on hendiiɗo nde.› »
66002018	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Saayatiira ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, on mo gite mun wa'i wa joyngol yiite, koyɗe mun wa'i wa sila-dane wi'i moftal ngal kon:
66002019	‹Miɗo andi kuuɗe maa ɗen e giggol maa ngol e gomɗinal maa ngal e golle maa ɗen e ŋaɲɲaare maa nden. Awa kadi miɗo andi kuuɗe maa sakkitore ɗen no ɓuri arane ɗen ɗuuɗude.
66002020	‹Kono feloore nde mi jogani-maa nden, ko ko accuɗaa oo debbo wi'eteeɗo Yeezabeela, wi'itiiɗo ko annabaajo, janni faljini kurkaaɗi an ɗin kon fii yo ɓe jokku jinaa, ɓe ɲaama tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji.
66002021	Mi okkii mo saa'i fii no o tuubira, kono o faalaaka tuubude on jinaa makko.
66002022	E hino miɗo wallinirde mo tampere tiiɗunde, kanko e ɓe o jinidaynoo ɓen, si hinaa taw hara ɓe tuubu ɗen kuuɗe maɓɓe.
66002023	E hoore ɗun, mi waray iwtirɓe ɓaawo makko ɓen, ɗun mofte ɗen fow anday ko min woni liɲoowo miijooji e liɲoowo ɓerɗe, awa kadi mi yoɓay mo kala e mon njoddi kuuɗe mun.
66002024	‹Kono onon ɓee ɓe Saayatiira heddiiɓe, ɓe jokkaali nden jannde fenandeere, onon ɓe andaali ko woɓɓe wi'ata ko gundooji lugguɗi Ibuliisa kon, mi alaa fawude on dongal goo,
66002025	si wonaa yo on tamu ko jogiɗon kon satta haa nde mi aroyi.
66002026	-
66002028	‹Kala fooluɗo, ɲentini kuuɗe an ɗen haa ka rawnoode, mi okkay mo bawgal wano min kadi mi hendornoo non e juuɗe Ben an, o laamoo e hoore leƴƴi ɗin, o aynira ɗi labbooru njandi, hara ndun munciray ɗi wa payanɗe leydi, mi jonna mo kadi jaawiire subaka nden.
66002029	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon.› »
66003001	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Sardiisa ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko Jogiiɗo ruuhuuji Alla ɗin jeeɗiɗi e koode ɗen jeeɗiɗi wi'i moftal ngal kon: ‹Miɗo andi kuuɗe maa ɗen, miɗo andi kadi no wi'aa ko a wuuruɗo, kono ko a mayɗo.
66003002	Finu, tiiɗinaa ko heddii kon, ɗun ko ko faandii maayude kon, sabu mi yiiraali kuuɗe maa ɗen wa timmuɗe yeeso Alla an on.
66003003	Anditu no nanirɗaa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on non, e no hendorɗaa mo non. Ɗoftoɗaa mo, tuubaa! Si a finaali, mi arday wa ngujjo, awa kadi a andataa ko e saa'i hombo mi arata, mi juhe.
66003004	‹Kono hiɗa mari yimɓe seeɗaaɓe Sardiisa ɗon, ɓe tuuninaali conci mun ɗin. Ɓe yaaday e an, hara hiɓe ɓornii daneeji, ko fii hiɓe handi e ɗun.
66003005	Ko wano non kadi, fooluɗo on ko conci daneeji ɓornoytoo, awa kadi mi montoytaa innde makko nden ka deftere ngurndan. E hoore ɗun, mi qirritoyto innde makko nden yeeso Ben an e yeeso malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen.
66003006	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon.› »
66003007	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Filadelfii ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko Seniiɗo on daalani moftal ngal kon, ɗun ko on Goongaajo, jogiiɗo saabi Daawuuda on, on mo tawata ko o udditi kon, hay gooto waawataa sokude, e ko o soki kon, hay gooto waawataa udditude:
66003008	‹Miɗo andi kuuɗe maa ɗen. Awa e hino, mi waɗii baafal udditiingal yeeso maa, ngal hay gooto waawataa ombude. A ɗoftike daalol an ngol, a yeddaali innde an nden, wonaa fii kala a ɗuuɗaa fiira.
66003009	Awa mi addante ɓee yimɓe moftal Ibuliisa, wi'itiiɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe, hara ɓe fenay, hinaa ɓe ɗun. Mi adday ɓe haa ka ley koyɗe maa, ɓe jiccoo, ɓe anda wonde miɗo yiɗu-maa.
66003010	Ɓay a huutorii ŋaɲɲaare nde mi yamir-maa nden, min kadi mi dandoyte ndee tampere faandiinde arude e hoore aduna on fow fii ndarndagol hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen.
66003011	Miɗo ara ko neeɓaa. Tamu fota ko jogiɗaa kon fii wota hay gooto ƴettu meetelol maa ngol.
66003012	‹Kala fooluɗo, mi waɗay mo doosal ka suudu Alla an on, hara o yaltataa ɗon hande kadi. Mi winday innde Alla an on e hoore makko, e innde saare Alla an on, ɗun ko saare Yerusalaam heyre iwroore e Alla, tippoo iwrude ka kammu, mi winda kadi innde an heyre nden e hoore makko.
66003013	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon.› »
66003014	«Windan kadi malaa'ikaajo moftal wongal Laa'udiisa ngal, wi'aa: ‹E hino ko wi'eteeɗo Aamiina on, on seedeejo sella-findeejo goongaajo, ɗun-le ko on wonɗo ɓundu tageefo Alla ngon, wi'i moftal ngal kon:
66003015	‹Miɗo andi kuuɗe maa ɗen, a wulaa, a ɓuuɓaa. Sago an ko yo a wonu wuluɗo maa ɓuuɓuɗo.
66003016	Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay hinaa a hay huunde e ɗun, a wulaa, a ɓuuɓaa, mi tuutirte hunduko an kon.
66003017	Hiɗa wi'itii galo, alɗuɗo, mo ŋakkiraaka hay huunde, hara-le a andaa ko a tampuɗo, yurmuɗo, baaso, bunɗo, holɗo.
66003018	Min mi waajike ma soodugol kaŋŋe laɓɓiniraaɗe yiite e juuɗe an fii no laatoraa galo, soodaa kadi conci daneeji ko ɓornoɗaa e juuɗe an fii wota hersa kolngal maa ngal feeɲu, e lekki ko wujaa ka gite maa fii no yi'iraa.
66003019	‹Kala ɓen ɓe mi yiɗi, mi felay ɓe, mi wurta. Awa jooni wakkilo, tuubaa.
66003020	Awa e hino lan, miɗo darii ka takko baafal, miɗo hoɗɗaade. Kala on nanuɗo hawa an kan, udditi baafal mun, mi naatay ka ontigi, mi ɲaamida e makko, ontigi kadi ɲaamida e an.
66003021	‹Kala fooluɗo, mi yeɗay mo jooɗodugol e an ka jullere an laamu, wano min kadi mi fooliri non, mi jooɗodi e Ben an ka jullere makko laamu.
66003022	‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon.› »
66004001	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i dambugal no udditii ka kammu. Hawa ka mi adinoo nanude kan, ɗun ko hawa wa'itayka wa hawa liital, ka wi'immi: «Ƴawu ɗoo, mi holle ko saatii aroyde kon onsay.»
66004002	Tun Ruuhu Allaahu on tippii e an. Onsay mi yi'i jullere laamu ka kammu, tawi goɗɗo no jooɗii e nden jullere.
66004003	On Jooɗiiɗo ɗon no jalbiri wa hayre hittunde wi'eteende yasbe e hayre goo kadi no wi'ee sardiire. Tawi yaroowol ndiyan jalbirngol wa hayre hittunde goo wi'eteende zumuruudu no hundunoo nden jullere.
66004004	Tawi kadi julle laamu noogay e nay no hundunoo nden jullere laamu, awa kadi mawɓe noogay e nayo, ɓorniiɓe daneeji, taaruɓe meetelli kaŋŋe, no jooɗinoo e majje.
66004005	Tawi maƴanɗe no yalta e nden jullere laamu, wonduɗe e digge e parɲitte. Tawi kadi lampuuji jeeɗiɗi huɓɓuɗi no yeeso nden jullere laamu, ɗin-le ko ruuhuuji Alla ɗin jeeɗiɗi.
66004006	Tawi ko wa'i wa baharu laaɓirɗo wa biini, jalbiri wa jaaman, no yeeso nden jullere laamu. Tawi tagooje nay wuuruɗe, mari gite yeeso e ɓaawo, no taarii, hunditi nden jullere laamu.
66004007	Tagoore aranere nden no wa'i wa ngayuuri, ɗimmere nden no wa'i wa kalaldi nagge, yeeso tammere nden no wa'i wa yeeso aaden, nayaɓere nden no wa'i wa simbirre wiiraynde.
66004008	Nde kala e ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe no mari gabitanji jeegoo maruɗi gite nder e ɓaawo. Jemma e ɲalorma ɗe alaa taƴindirde wi'ugol: «Seniiɗo, Seniiɗo, Seniiɗo, ko Alla Joomiraaɗo Jom Bawgal on, ɗun ko on Woodaaɗo e on Woodanooɗo e on Aroyoowo.»
66004009	Nde ɗee tagooje nay wuuruɗe mawnini, teddini, jarni on Jooɗiiɗo e nden jullere laamu woo, ɗun ko on Wuuruɗo haa poomaa,
66004010	onsay ɓen mawɓe noogay e nayo kadi jiccoo yeeso on Jooɗiiɗo e nden jullere laamu, ɓe sujjana on Wuuruɗo haa poomaa, ɓe liɓa kadi meetelli maɓɓe ɗin yeeso nden jullere laamu, hara hiɓe wi'a:
66004011	«Yaa an Joomiraaɗo Alla amen, hiɗa handi e darja e teddungal e mbawdi, ko fii ko an tagi kala huunde. Awa kadi ko e faale maa ɗun fow tagiraa, woodaa.»
66005001	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i kadi on Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu no jogii ka jungo mun ɲaamo deftere windaande nder e ɓaawo, taggaa, notiraa toɓɓe kaaɲe jeeɗiɗi.
66005002	Tun mi yi'i malaa'ikaajo tiiɗuɗo no ewnoo ko tiiɗi, wi'a: «Ko hombo handi e hoɓɓitugol ɗee notanɗe ndee deftere taggaande, uddita nde?»
66005003	Tawi waawuɗo nde udditude ndaara alaa ka kammu, alaa ka hoore leydi maa ka nder leydi.
66005004	Onsay mi wulli fota, ɓay tawii hay gooto handaa e udditugol nden deftere taggaande, hinaa fere ndaara nde.
66005005	Onsay goɗɗo e ɓen mawɓe wonnooɓe ɗon wi'immi: «Wota a wullu. Awa e hino Ngayuuri bolondaa Yahuuda ndin, ɗun ko Geeƴol Daawuuda ngol, foolii haa waawii hoɓɓitude notanɗe ɗen jeeɗiɗi, uddita deftere taggaande nden.
66005006	Ontuma mi yi'i Baalun wa'itaykun wa waraakun, no darii hakkunde nden jullere laamu e tagooje nay wuuruɗe ɗen e mawɓe ɓen. Tawi hikun mari galaaɗi jeeɗiɗi e gite jeeɗiɗi, tawi ko ɗin woni ruuhuuji jeeɗiɗi ɗi Allaahu on immini e leydi ndin fow.
66005007	Kun Baalun ari, hendii nden deftere wonde ka jungo ɲaamo on Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu.
66005008	Ɓay Baalun kun hendike deftere nden, ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe e mawɓe ɓen noogay e nayo ari jiccii yeeso kun Baalun. Tawi mo kala e ɓen no jogii hoddu, e pelette kaŋŋe heewuɗe urngallooji, ɗi tawata ko torndeeji gomɗinɓe ɓen.
66005009	Hiɓe beytoraynoo beytol kesol, wi'a: «Hiɗa handi e hendagol ndee deftere, hoɓɓita notanɗe mayre ɗen, ko fii a waranooma. Awa kadi ko ƴiiƴan maa ɗan sottiranɗaa Alla yimɓe jeyaaɓe e kala bolondaa e kala haala e kala jamaa e kala leɲol.
66005010	A waɗii ɓe laamateeri e yottinooɓe sadaka fii kurkanagol Alla men on, awa ɓen laamoto ka aduna.»
66005011	Ɓawto ɗun mi nani hawa malaa'ikaaɓe ɗuuɗuɓe, mi yi'i kadi hiɓe hunditi jullere laamu nden e tagooje wuuruɗe ɗen e mawɓe ɓen, tawi ɗuuɗeendi maɓɓe ndin ko dente ɗe guluuje guluuje.
66005012	Tawi ɓen no ewnoo ko tiiɗi, wi'a: «Kun Baalun waraakun no handi e heɓugol bawgal e ngalu e faamu e doole e teddungal e darja e mantoore.»
66005013	Onsay mi nani kala ko tagaa, ko woni ka kammu e ka hoore leydi e ka nder leydi e ka baharu, e tagu ngun fow, no wi'a: «Mantoore e teddungal e mangu e bawgal yo wonan on Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu, e Baalun kun, haa poomaa!»
66005014	Tawi tagooje nay wuuruɗe ɗen no wi'a: «Aamiina!» Onsay tawi mawɓe ɓen kadi no jiccotonoo, sujja.
66006001	Onsay mi yi'i Baalun kun no hoɓɓita wonnde e ɗen notanɗe jeeɗiɗi. Mi nani wonnde e ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe no wowlira wa hawa farɲitere, wi'a: «Aru!»
66006002	Mi ndaari, mi tawi e hino puccu ranewu. Tawi waɗɗinooɗo ngu on no jogii laaɲal, o jonnaa meetelol, o yaari wa fooloowo e fii foolugol.
66006003	Ɓay kun hoɓɓitii notannde ɗimmere nden, mi nani tagoore ɗimmere wuurunde nden no wi'a: «Aru!»
66006004	Ɗon kadi puccu goo yalti, tawi hingu wojjiri wa yiite. Waɗɗinooɗo ngu on hendii bawgal ittugol ɓuttu ngun ka hoore leydi fii no yimɓe ɓen warindirira. O jonnaa kaafa njana.
66006005	Ɓay Baalun kun hoɓɓitii notannde tammere nden, mi nani tagoore tammere wuurunde nden no wi'a: «Aru!» Mi ndaari, mi tawi e hino puccu ɓalewu. Tawi waɗɗinooɗo ngu on no jogii balansi ka jungo mun.
66006006	Mi nani ko wa'itata wa hawa iwruka e hakkunde ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe, no wi'a: «Sariyaare wootere ngawri ko dinaruuru wooturu, awa kadi sariyaare tati muutiri ko dinaruuru wooturu, kono nebban ɗan e njaram ɗan wota a bonnu!»
66006007	Ɓay kun hoɓɓitii notannde nayaɓere nden, mi nani hawa tagoore nayaɓere wuurunde nden no wi'a: «Aru!»
66006008	Mi ndaari, mi tawi e hino puccu fultiingu. Waɗɗinooɗo ngu on no wi'ee Mayde, tawi jahannama no jokki mo. Ɓe jonnaa bawgal e hoore peccun nayaɓun kun ka leydi fii mulirgol yimɓe ɓen kaafa e heege e ɲabbeeli e kulle buruure ɗen ka leydi.
66006009	Ɓay kun hoɓɓitii notannde jowaɓere nden, mi yi'i ka ley layyorde wonkiiji waranooɓe ɓen sabu humagol maɓɓe e daaluyee Alla on e seeditoore nde ɓe waɗi nden.
66006010	Tawi hiɗi ewnotonoo ko tiiɗi, wi'a: «Yaa an Joomiraaɗo Seniiɗo, Goongaajo, e hara ko haa honde tuma nennotoɗaa ɲaawugol hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen, yottanoo ƴiiƴan amen ɗan?»
66006011	Mo kala e maɓɓe jonnaa dolokke daneejo, ɓe wi'aa yo ɓe fowto kadi e nder saa'ihun, haa tuma adadu gollidooɓe e maɓɓe ɓen e musiɓɓe maɓɓe wariroyteeɓe wa maɓɓe ɓen timmi.
66006012	Onsay mi yi'i Baalun kun no hoɓɓita notannde jeegaɓere nden. Dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde waɗi, naange ngen ɓawliri wa bagi sacciraaɗo leeɓi ɓaleeji, lewru ndun fow kadi wa'i wa ƴiiƴan.
66006013	Tawi koode ɗen ka kammu no saamude ka leydi, wa kuraaje wonɗe saamude nde hendu tiiɗundu dimbi kurahi.
66006014	Tawi kammu ngun no dira taggora wa gatal, awa kadi pelle ɗen e suriije ɗen fow dirti ka wonnoo ɗon.
66006015	Lamɓe aduna ɓen e tedduɓe ɓen e hooreeɓe suufaaɓe ɓen e alɗuɓe ɓen e dolnuɓe ɓen e jiyaaɓe ɓen fow e rimɓe ɓen no suuɗoyii ka pammeeje e ka lombi pete pelle,
66006016	e hoore hiɓe wi'a pelle ɗen e pete ɗen: «Yanee e hoore amen, suuɗon men gite oo Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu e tikkere Baalun kun!
66006017	Ko fii ɲalaande mawnde tikkere maɓɓe nden arii, e ko hombo waawata nde dartaade?»
66007001	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i malaa'ikaaɓe nayo no darii e coɓɓuli leydi ndin nay, hiɓe jogitii keneeli cenɗe aduna on nay fii wota hendu wifu e hoore leydi ndin e ka hoore baharu e hoore leggal woo kadi.
66007002	Onsay mi yi'i kadi malaa'ikaajo goo no iwra ka funnaange, himo wondi e maande Alla Wuuruɗo on. O ewnii ko tiiɗi ɓen malaa'ikaaɓe nayo, yeɗanooɓe waɗugol bone ka leydi e ka baharu, o wi'i:
66007003	«Wota on meemu leydi ndin e baharu on e leɗɗe ɗen, haa men waɗa maande ka tiiɗe kurkaaɗi Alla men on.»
66007004	Awa kadi mi nani adadu maandinaaɓe ɓen. Ko ɓe guluuje teemedere e cappanɗe nayo e nayo e nder bolondaaji Banii-Isra'iila'en ɓen fow:
66007005	Ka bolondaa Yahuuda, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo maandinaa, ka bolondaa Ruubaynu, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Gaada, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo,
66007006	ka bolondaa Asiira, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Naftali, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Manasse, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo,
66007007	ka bolondaa Sim'uunu, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Lewi, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Yassaakara, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo,
66007008	ka bolondaa Zabuluunu, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Yuusufu, ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo, ka bolondaa Buniyamiinu kadi, maandinaaɓe ɓen ko ɓe guluuje sappoo e ɗiɗo.
66007009	Ɓawto ɗun mi ndaari, mi tawi e hino jamaa moolanaaɗo, mo hay gooto waawataa limude, mo leƴƴi ɗin fow, mo bolondaaji ɗin fow, mo jamaaji ɗin fow e mo haalaaji ɗin fow, no darii yeeso jullere laamu nden e yeeso Baalun kun. Hiɓe ɓornii conci daneeji, hiɓe jogii baape tugi ka juuɗe maɓɓe,
66007010	hiɓe ewnoo ko tiiɗi, wi'a: «Kisiyee on ko e Alla men on iwri, on Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu, e Baalun kun!»
66007011	Tawi kadi malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen fow no darii hunditi jullere laamu nden e mawɓe ɓen e tagooje nay wuuruɗe ɗen, hiɓe jiccotonoo yeeso jullere laamu nden, ɓe sujjana Alla
66007012	e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Aamiina! Mantoore e mangu e faamu e jaaroore e teddungal e bawgal e doole, ko Alla men on wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!»
66007013	Onsay goɗɗo e mawɓe ɓen ƴetti haala kan, wi'immi: «Ko homɓe woni ɓee ɓorniiɓe conci daneeji, e ko honto ɓe iwi?»
66007014	Mi jaabii mo, mi wi'i: «Koohoojo an, an hiɗa andi.» Onsay o wi'immi: «Ko ɓen woni iwɓe e satteende mawnde nden, ɓe wuppii conci maɓɓe ɗin, ɓe rawnini ɗi ka ƴiiƴan Baalun kun.
66007015	Ko ɗun waɗi si: Hiɓe ka yeeso jullere laamu Alla, hiɓe rewa mo jemma e ɲalorma ka suudu makko. Jooɗiiɗo on ka jullere laamu ɗuwiray ɓe suudu mun ndun.
66007016	Ɓe weeletaake hande kadi, ɓe ɗonɗetaake hande kadi, naange ngen hewtataa ɓe hande kadi, nguleendi woo kadi hewtataa ɓe.
66007017	Ko fii Baalun wonkun kun ka tumbo jullere laamu ornay ɓe, ardoo ɓe ka ɓulli ndiyan ngurndan ɗan, awa kadi Alla fittay kala gonɗi wonɗi ka gite maɓɓe.»
66008001	Ɓay Baalun kun hoɓɓitii notannde jeeɗiɗaɓere nden, deeƴannde waɗi ka kammu wa feccere saa'i.
66008002	Mi yi'i malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo, dariiɓe yeeso Alla ɓen, no jonnee liite jeeɗiɗi.
66008003	Malaa'ikaajo goo ari, woni ka layyorde, tawi himo jogii tindohun sunnirkun urngallooji tafiraakun kaŋŋe. O jonnaa urngallooji buy fii sakkodugol ɗi e torndeeji gomɗinɓe ɓen fow ka layyorde tafiraande kaŋŋe wonde yeeso jullere laamu nden.
66008004	Curki urngallooji ɗin wondude e torndeeji gomɗinɓe ɓen ƴenti e juuɗe malaa'ikaajo on yeeso Alla.
66008005	Malaa'ikaajo on ƴetti tindohun sunnirkun urngallooji kun, hebbini kun yiite layyorde nden, o bugii ka hoore leydi. Parɲitte waɗi, e digge e maƴanɗe e dimbannde leydi.
66008006	Malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo, joginooɓe liite ɗen jeeɗiɗi, hebulanii wuttugol ɗe.
66008007	Arano on wutti liital mun ngal. Marmalle e yiite jillunge ƴiiƴan waɗi, bugaa ka leydi. Peccun tammun leydi ndin e peccun tammun leɗɗe ɗen sumi, huɗo hecco kon fow sumi.
66008008	Malaa'ikaajo ɗimmo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Ko nanditata e fello moolanaango huɓɓungo bugaa ka baharu. Feccere tammere baharu on wonti ƴiiƴan,
66008009	feccere tammere ko tagaa ko wuuri ka nder baharu kon muli, feccere tammere e laaɗe ɗen lancii.
66008010	Malaa'ikaajo tammo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Hoodere moolanaande huɓɓirnde wa jowlol iwi ka kammu, yani e feccere tammere maaje ɗen e ɓulli ndiyan ɗin.
66008011	Tawi innde nden hoodere ko Afsantiina. Feccere tammere di'e ɗen waylii, wonti ko haaɗi. Yimɓe buy maayiri sabu ɗan ndiyan haaɗuɗan.
66008012	Malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Feccere tammere naange ngen piyaa, wondude e feccere tammere lewru ndun e feccere tammere koode ɗen, fii no feccere tammere ɗin ndayguuji niɓɓitira, e no feccere tammere jalbeendi ɲallal ngal mutira, jemma on kadi wano non.
66008013	Mi ndaari, tawi simbirre no wiira ka weeyo dow. Mi nani hinde wi'a e hawa tiiɗuka: «Bone, bone, bone wonanii hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen sabu hito ɗeya liite ɗe malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen tato faandii wuttude!»
66009001	Malaa'ikaajo njowaɓo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Mi yi'i hoodere no iwi ka kammu, yani ka leydi. Nde jonnaa saabiwal gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin.
66009002	Nde udditi gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin, yalti ka nder gaygii ton curki, wa curki beembal yiite moolanaangal. Naange ngen e yaasi on niɓɓitiri sabu curki ngin gaygii.
66009003	Immorde e kin curki, kanuuji yalti ka leydi, ɗi jonnaa bawgal sifa bawgal jahe ɗen ka leydi.
66009004	Ɗi wi'aa, wota ɗi meemu kuɗol woo ka leydi e kala ko hecciɗi e kala leggal, kono ko yimɓe ɓe alaa maande Alla nden ka tiiɗe mun tun ɗi meemata.
66009005	Kono ɗi yamiraa wota ɗi waru ɓe, kono yo ɗi tampin ɓe e nder lebbi jowi, tawi tampere ko ɗi waɗaynoo kon ko wa tampere yaare si fiɗii goɗɗo.
66009006	E nder ɗen balɗe ɗon, yimɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓay mayde nden, kono ɓe yi'ataa nde few. Ɓe suɓoto mayde, kono mayde nden doga ɓe woɗɗitoo.
66009007	Ɗin kanuuji no nandita e pucci eltaaɗi fii hare. Tawi no ka ko'e majji ko nanditata e meetelli kaŋŋe, geece majji on no nandita e geece neɗɗanke.
66009008	Hiɗi mariri sukundu wa debbo, ɲiiƴe majji on kadi no nandita e ɲiiƴe ngayuuje.
66009009	Tawi hiwitorɗi ɓerɗe majji on no wa'i wa beɗi njandi, e hitooji gabitanji majji on kadi no nandita e hito giri-giriije ɗe pucci ɗuuɗuɗi pooɗata, no dogana hare.
66009010	Tawi bukki majji on no mari ndompe wa ɗe jahe ɗen, tawi bawgal ko ɗi tampiniraynoo yimɓe ɓen kon e nder lebbi jowi ko ka bukki majji woni.
66009011	Tawi ko wonani ɗi lanɗo ko malaa'ikaajo gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin, mo tawata innde mun e haala Yahuudiyanke ko «Abaduuna»,
66009012	Bone arano on feƴƴii, awa boneeji ɗiɗi no arude ɓawto ɗun.
66009013	Malaa'ikaajo jeegaɓo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal, mi nani hawa no iwa e coɓɓi nay layyorde tafiraande kaŋŋe wonde nden yeeso Alla,
66009014	no wi'a malaa'ikaajo njeegaɓo joginooɗo liital ngal: «Firtu malaa'ikaaɓe nayo haɓɓaaɓe ka maayo njano Furaatiwol ɓen!»
66009015	Ɓen malaa'ikaaɓe nayo, hebulaninooɓe fii on saa'i e nden ɲalaande e ndun lewru e nden hitaande, firtaa, fii warugol feccere tammere e yimɓe ɓen.
66009016	Mi nani adadu waɗɗinooɓe pucci fii hare ɓen ko ɓe guluuje noogayo laabi guluuje sappo.
66009017	E hino no mi yi'iri non pucci ɗin e waɗɗinooɓe ɗi ɓen e nder feɲɲinannde nden: tawi waɗɗinooɓe ɗi ɓen no jogii hiwitorɗe ɓerɗe wojjirayɗe wa yiite, mbulorɗe wa baka e wa'itayɗe wa nete. Tawi ko'e pucci ɗin no nandita e ko'e ngayuuje, yiite e curki e mbollan yiite no yalta ka kundule majji.
66009018	Peccun tammun e yimɓe ɓen wariraa ɗii albala'uuji ɗoo tati, ɗun ko koo ko yaltata ka kundule majji, ɗun ko yiite ngen e curki kin e mbollan yiite ɗan.
66009019	Ko fii bawgal pucci ɗin ko ka kundule majji e ka bukki majji woni. Bukki majji on no nandita e bolle, hiɗi mari ko'e ko ɗi waɗira bone.
66009020	Yimɓe heddinooɓe ɓe wariraaka ɗin albala'uuji ronki tuubude kuuɗe ɗe ɓe waɗiri juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen. Ɓe accaano sujjangol jinnaaji ɗin e sanamuuji tafiraaɗi kaŋŋe e kaalisi e sila e kaaƴe e leɗɗe, ɗi waawataa yi'ude maa wowlude maa yahude.
66009021	Ɓe ronki tuubude kadi fii ko ɓe itti ko'e kon, e mbilankaaku maɓɓe ngun e jeeno maɓɓe ngon e guyaale maɓɓe ɗen.
66010001	Mi yi'i malaa'ikaajo goo dolnuɗo no iwra ka kammu, no ɓornii duulere, no hippii yaroowol ndiyan ngol. Yeeso makko ngon no wa'ita wa naange ngen, koyɗe makko ɗen kadi no wa'ita wa tugaale yiite.
66010002	Himo jogii deftun udditaakun ka jungo makko. O tippi koyngal makko ɲaamal ngal ka baharu, nanal ngal ka leydi.
66010003	O ewnii ko tiiɗi wano ngayuuri riggorta. E nder ko o ewnii kon, parɲitte ɗen jeeɗiɗi waɗi hito.
66010004	Ɓay parɲitte ɗen jeeɗiɗi waɗii hito, tawi miɗo hebulanii windugol, kono mi nani hawa ka kammu, no wi'a: «Waɗu gundoo ko parɲitte ɗen jeeɗiɗi wi'i kon, hara a windaali.»
66010005	Awa kadi on malaa'ikaajo, mo mi yi'unoo no tippi ka ndiyan e ka leydi, towni jungo mun ɲaamo ngon, fewtini ka kammu.
66010006	O woondiri on Wuuruɗo haa poomaa, on Taguɗo kammu e ko woni ton, tagi leydi e ko woni e mun, tagi baharu e ko woni e mun kon, wonde uuda alaa hande kadi.
66010007	Kono e nder balɗe ɗe malaa'ikaajo njeeɗiɗaɓo on faandii wuttugol liital ngal, gundoo Alla on laatoto wano o feɲɲinirannoo non kurkaaɗi makko ɗin, ɗun ko annabaaɓe ɓen.
66010008	Onsay hawa, ka mi nanunoo kan iwrude ka kammu, wi'irimmi nii kadi: «Yahu, ƴettaa kun deftun udditaakun e jungo oo malaa'ikaajo tippuɗo ka baharu e ka leydi.»
66010009	Mi yahi ka malaa'ikaajo on, mi wi'i yo o jonnan deftun kun. O wi'immi: «Ƴettu kun, ɲaamaa. Kun hebbinay reedu maa ndun ko haaɗi, kono kun weliray wa njuuri ka hunduko maa.»
66010010	Mi ƴetti deftun kun e juuɗe malaa'ikaajo on, mi ɲaami. Kun weliri ka hunduko an wa njuuri, kono ɓay mi ɓennii kun, reedu an ndun heewi ko haaɗi.
66010011	Mi wi'aa kadi: «Hiɗa haani haalude kadi ko Alla longin maa ko yowitii e jamaaji buy e leƴƴi buy e haalaaji buy e lamɓe buy.»
66011001	Mi jonnaa kadi kuɗol kalin nanditayngol e sawru, mi wi'aa: «Immo etaa suudu Alla ndun e layyorde nden, limaa rewooɓe ton ɓen.
66011002	Kono dingiral suudu Alla ndun, accu ɗun feere, wota a etu ɗun, ko fii ɗon yeɗaama ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, ɓe yaaɓay saare hormorde nden e nder lebbi cappanɗe nay e ɗiɗi.
66011003	Mi newnanay seedeeɓe an ɓorniiɓe conci heynorɗi ɓen ɗiɗo, haalugol ko mi longini ɓe e nder balɗe wuluure e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jeego.»
66011004	Ko ɓen woni leɗɗe zaytuuni ɗen ɗiɗi e joɗɗinirɗe pitilli ɗen ɗiɗi wonɗe yeeso Joomiraaɗo leydi ndin.
66011005	Si goɗɗo no faalaa ɓe waɗude ko boni, yiite yaltay ka kundule maɓɓe, ɲaama ayɓe maɓɓe ɓen. Ko nii kala faalaaɗo ɓe waɗude ko boni warirte.
66011006	Hiɓe mari bawgal ombugol kammu ngun fii wota ndiyan aru e balɗe ɗe ɓe haalata ko Alla longini ɓe kon. Hiɓe mari kadi bawgal waylugol di'e ɗen ƴiiƴan, e libugol ka hoore leydi kala noone ɲabbeeli saa'i mo ɓe faalaa woo.
66011007	Nde ɓe timminoyi seeditoore maɓɓe nden, kullii iwroyayngii ka gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin haɓoyay ɓe, ngii foola ɓe, ngii wara.
66011008	Fureeji maɓɓe ɗin luttay ka ballangal nden saare mawnde nde Joomi maɓɓe on fempanoo e mun. Nden saare no jammaa Saduuma maa Misira.
66011009	Yimɓe jamaaji ɗin fow e bolondaaji ɗin fow e haalaaji ɗin fow e leƴƴi ɗin fow ndaaray fureeji maɓɓe ɗin e nder balɗe tati e feccere, ɓe saloo yo ɓe surre.
66011010	Hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen weltoyoo fii mayde maɓɓe nden, ɓe wona e nder weltaare, ɓe neldindira, ko fii ɓen annabaaɓe ɗiɗo lettii yimɓe ɓen ka leydi.
66011011	Ɓay balɗe tati e feccere ɗen feƴƴii, foofaango ngurndan iwrungo e Alla naati e ɗin fureeji, ɓe immii, ɓe darii, onsay kulol moolanaangol heɓi ɓen yi'unooɓe ɗun.
66011012	Ɓe nani hawa tiiɗuka ka kammu, no wi'a ɓe: «Ƴawee gaa!» Ɓe ƴawi ka kammu e nder duulere, ayɓe maɓɓe ɓen yi'i ɓe.
66011013	Ko e on saa'i ɗon, dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde waɗi, feccere sappaɓere e saare nden lancii. Yimɓe guluuje njeeɗiɗo maayiri sabu nden dimbannde leydi, heddiiɓe ɓen huli, mawnini Alla Jom kammu on.
66011014	Bone ɗimmo on feƴƴii, e hino tammo on no arude.
66011015	Malaa'ikaajo njeeɗiɗaɓo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Hawaaji tiiɗuɗi nanii ka kammu, no wi'a: «Laamateeri aduna on wontii e juuɗe Joomiraaɗo on e Toɗɗaaɗo makko on, ɗun ko Almasiihu on, o laamoto haa poomaa.»
66011016	Tawi mawɓe noogay e nayo, jooɗinooɓe ka julle mun laamu yeeso Alla ɓen, no jiccanii Alla sujjani mo,
66011017	e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Men jarnii ma, yo Alla Joomiraaɗo, Jom Bawgal, Woodaaɗo e Woodanooɗo, ko huutorɗaa bawgal maa tiiɗungal ngal kon e ko joɗɗinɗaa laamu maa ngun kon.
66011018	Hari leƴƴi ɗin seytinii, kono tikkere maa nden arii, wondude e saa'i ɲaawugol mayɓe ɓen, e yoɓugol kurkaaɗi maa ɗin, ɗun ko annabaaɓe ɓen, e laaɓuɓe ɓen e hulooɓe innde maa nden, gila e fanɗuɓe haa e njanɗuɓe, e mulugol mulooɓe leydi ndin ɓen.»
66011019	Onsay suudu Alla ndun ka kammu udditii, kankiranwal seeditoore makko nden feeɲi ka suudu makko. Maƴanɗe waɗi, e digge e parɲitte e dimbannde leydi e marmalle tiiɗuɗe.
66012001	Maande njannde feeɲi ka kammu: tawi ko debbo ɓorniiɗo naange ngen, lewru ndun no ka ley koyɗe makko, e meetelol ngol koode sappoo e ɗiɗi ka hoore makko.
66012002	Tawi ko sowiiɗo, himo sonkude fii muuseendi jibingol ngol.
66012003	Maande goo kadi feeɲi ka kammu: tawi e hino ningiwii njanin boɗewii, ngii ko'e jeeɗiɗi e galaaɗi sappo, tawi katanji jeeɗiɗi no e hoore ɗen ko'e.
66012004	Tawi bukkol maggii on no fitta feccere tammere koode ɗen ka kammu, bugoo ka leydi. Tawi ngin ningiwii no darii yeeso debbo wonɗo firtaade on fii moɗugol boobo on nde o firtori mo.
66012005	O firtii boobo gorko, ardortooɗo leƴƴi ɗin fow labbooru njandi. On boobo makko wippitaa, nawraa ka Alla, ka jullere makko laamu.
66012006	Onsay debbo on dogi, yaari ka wulaa, ka o joginoo nokkuure ka Alla eɓɓannoo mo, fii no o dankoree ɗon e nder balɗe wuluure e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe jeegoo.
66012007	Hare waɗi ka kammu, Miikaa'iilu e malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen piiridi e ngin ningiwii. Ningiwii ngin e malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen kadi piiridi e maɓɓe.
66012008	Kono ngii foolaali, tawi wonunde alanaa ngii ka kammu, kangii e malaa'ikaaɓe maggii ɓen.
66012009	Ngin ningiwii njanin, ɗun ko ndiya mboddi araniri wi'eteendi Ibuliisa maa Seytaane, ngin faljingii yimɓe aduna on fow, bugodaa e malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen ka leydi.
66012010	Onsay mi nani hawa tiiɗuka ka kammu, no wi'a: «Jooni kisiyee iwruɗo e Alla men on arii, wondude e bawgal mun ngal e laamu mun ngun, e laamu Toɗɗaaɗo makko on, ɗun ko Almasiihu on. Ko fii tooɲoowo musiɓɓe men ɓen, on wonnooɗo ɓe tooɲude yeeso Alla jemma e ɲalorma, bugaama.
66012011	Ɓe foolirii ngii ƴiiƴan Baalun kun, e sabu kongol seeditoore maɓɓe nden. Awa kadi ɓe ronkaali hebulaade hay yeebugol ngurndan maɓɓe ɗan haa ɓe maaya.
66012012	Ko ɗun waɗi, weltee yo kammuuli e onon hoɗuɓe ka kammuuli! Bone wonanii leydi ndin e baharu on, ko fii Ibuliisa tippike e mon. Himo heewi tikkere, ɓay o andii ko saa'ihun nii heddanii mo.»
66012013	Ɓay ngin ningiwii tawii bugaama ka leydi, ngii jokki debbo heɓunooɗo boobo gorko on.
66012014	Onsay debbo on yeɗaa gabitanji simbirre mawnde nden, fii ko o wiirira ka wulaa, ka nokkuure makko, ka o danketee ɗon e nder saa'i, e nder saa'iiji e feccere saa'i, ka woɗɗitii mboddi ndin.
66012015	Immorde ka sekko mayri, mboddi ndin furi ndiyan wa maayo ɓaawo debbo on, fii no o yoolora ka maayo.
66012016	Kono leydi ndin faabii debbo on, ndin leydi udditi hunduko mun kon, ndi yari maayo ngo ngin ningiwii furiri sekko mun kon.
66012017	Ngin ningiwii seytinani debbo on, ngii yahi haɓugol luttuɓe e jurriya makko on ɓen, ɗun ko ɓen ɗoftiiɓe yamirooje Alla ɗen, humii e seeditoore Iisaa nden.
66012018	Onsay ngii darii ka hoore njaareendi ka baharu.
66013001	Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i kullii no saafoo ka nder baharu marngii ko'e jeeɗiɗi e galaaɗi sappo, tawi katanji sappo no e hoore ɗin galaaɗi. Inɗe hoynuɗe Alla kadi no windii e hoore ɗen ko'e.
66013002	Ngin kullii ngii mi yi'i no nandita e buutoori, taape maggii on no nandita e taape kullii no wi'ee ursa, sekko maggii on kadi no nandita e sekko ngayuuri. Ningiwii ngin okki ngin kullii doole mun ɗen e jullere mun laamu nden, wondude e bawgal mawngal.
66013003	Tawi wonnde e ɗen ko'e maggii no wa'i wa wariraande soppannde, kono on barme waroowo sellinaa. Aduna on fow ŋalɗi, ɓe rewi ngin kullii.
66013004	Yimɓe ɓen fow sujjani ningiwii ngin, ɓay ngii jonnii ngin kullii bawgal maggii on. Ɓe sujjani ngin kullii kadi e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Ko hombo wa'i wa ngin kullii maa hara ko hombo waawi ngii haɓude?»
66013005	Tawi ngin kullii no yeɗaa sekko wowlayko haalaaji mawnintinaare, hoyna Alla, tawi hingii jonnaa bawgal e nder lebbi cappanɗe nay e ɗiɗi.
66013006	Hingii udditi sekko maggii on, hingii hoyna Alla, hoyna innde makko nden e wonirdu makko ndun, e ɓen hoɗuɓe ka kammuuli.
66013007	Tawi ngin kullii no newnanaa haɓidugol e yimɓe Alla ɓen, foola ɓe. Tawi hingii okkaa bawgal e hoore bolondaaji ɗin fow e jamaaji ɗin fow e kala haala, e hoore leƴƴi ɗin fow kadi.
66013008	Tawi hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen fow sujjanay ngii, ɗun ko ɓen ɓe innde mun windaaki gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna ka deftere ngurndan wonannde Baalun hettanookun layya kun.
66013009	Mo no mari noppi nanirɗi yo nanu!
66013010	On mo no hoddiranaa maccinɗinagol, bee o maccinɗinoo. On mo no hoddiranaa warireede kaafa, bee o wariree kaafa. Ko ɗun waɗi si yimɓe Alla ɓen no haani ŋaɲɲaade, gomɗina.
66013011	Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i kullii goo no sortoo ka nder leydi, marngii galaaɗi ɗiɗi nanditayɗi e galaaɗi ga'un baalun, hingii wowliraynoo wa ningiwii.
66013012	Tawi ngin kullii no waɗa bawɗe kullii aranii ngin fow e tawnde maggii. Ngii waɗi feere no leydi ndin e hoɗuɓe e hoore mayri ɓen sujjirana ngiya kullii aranii sellinananoongii barme waroowo.
66013013	Ngii waɗi maandeeji moolanaaɗi, haa hay ngii jippini ka leydi yiite iwnge ka kammu yeeso yimɓe ɓen.
66013014	Tawi ngin kullii no faljiniraynoo hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen maandeeji ɗi ngii yeɗanoo waɗugol ɗin yeeso ngiya kullii aranii, e hoore hingii yamira ɓen yimɓe wonɓe ka aduna yo ɓe waɗu nandolla ngiya kullii soppiranoongii kaafa, kono ngii wuuri.
66013015	Ngin kullii yeɗaa bawgal waɗangol ndun nandollaaru ngiya kullii foofaango ngurndan fii no ndun nandollaaru waawira wowlude, ndu wona sabu kala on mo jaɓaali sujjande ndu no wariree.
66013016	Ngii karhi kadi fow, gila e fanɗuɓe haa e njanɗuɓe, galo e baaso, dimo e maccuɗo waɗanegol maande ka jungo mun ɲaamo maa ka tiinde,
66013017	hara kadi hay gooto waawataa soodude maa yeeya si alaa nden maande, nden-le ko innde ngin kullii maa adadu innde maggii on.
66013018	Ɗoo non, maa faamu: On mo no mari hakkil, yo limu adadu innde ngin kullii, ko fii ko adadu neɗɗanke non. On adadu ko teemeɗɗe jeegoo e cappanɗe jeegoo e jeegoo.
66014001	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i Baalun kun no darii ka Fello Siyuuna, wondude e yimɓe guluuje teemedere e cappanɗe nayo e nayo, ɓe innde makkun e innde Ben makkun on windii e tiiɗe mun.
66014002	Mi nani hawa ka kammu, wa hawa di'e ɗuuɗuɗe maa wa hawa riggannde tiiɗunde, tawi kan hawa ka mi nani no nandita e hito korli ɗi hoɗooɓe hoɗata.
66014003	Tawi ɓen hoɗooɓe no beyta beytol kesol yeeso jullere laamu nden e yeeso tagooje nay wuuruɗe ɗen e yeeso mawɓe ɓen. Tawi hay gooto waawataa ekkitaade ngol beytol si hinaa ɓee guluuje teemedere e cappanɗe nayo e nayo, sottanooɓe ka aduna.
66014004	Ɗun ko ɓen ɓe tuuninoraali rewɓe, ɓe woni laaɓuɓe, ɓe andaali debbo. Ɓe jokki Baalun kun kala ka kun yaari. Ɓe woni sottaaɓe e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen, ɓe weeɓitanaa Alla e Baalun kun wa ko adaa soɲiteede.
66014005	Awa kadi karaaje maɓɓe jantaaki penaale, ɓen ko ɓe aldaa e feloore.
66014006	Mi yi'i kadi malaa'ikaajo goo no wiira ka weeyo dow, no jogii Kibaaru Moƴƴo poomayankeejo on fii feɲɲinangol mo hoɗuɓe ka leydi ɓen e kala leɲol e kala bolondaa e kala haala e kala jamaa.
66014007	Tawi on malaa'ikaajo no wowla hawa tiiɗuka, wi'a: «Hulee Alla, mawninon mo, ko fii saa'i mo o ɲaawata e mun on hewtii. Awa sujjanee on Taguɗo kammu ngun e leydi ndin e baharu on e ɓulli ndiyan ɗin!»
66014008	Malaa'ikaajo ɗimmo hikkiiɗo e arano on kadi wi'i: «Nde yanii! Ndee saare Baabiila mawnde mandilinirnde leƴƴi ɗin fow himmeeji jinaa mun, yanii!»
66014009	Malaa'ikaajo tammo hikkiiɗo e aranɓe ɓen ɗiɗo no wowla hawa tiiɗuka, wi'a: «Kala on sujjanɗo kullii ngin e nandolla maggii on, heɓi maande maggii on ka tiinde maa ka jungo mun,
66014010	yaray njaram tikkere Alla nden wancinaaɗan ka ɲeddukun tikkere makko hara ɗan jillaaka, o lettiree kadi mbollan yiite yeeso malaa'ikaaɓe laaɓuɓe ɓen e Baalun kun!
66014011	Curki lette maɓɓe ɗen ƴaway haa poomaa, e hoore fowtaare alanaa ɓe jemma e ɲalorma, ɗun non ko kala on sujjanɗo ngin kullii e nandolla maggii on, e kala on heɓuɗo maande innde maggii on.»
66014012	Ko ɗun waɗi si yimɓe Alla ɗoftiiɓe yamirooje Alla ɗen, duumii e gomɗingol Iisaa ɓen, no haani ŋaɲɲaade.
66014013	Mi nani kadi hawa ka kammu, no wi'a: «Windu wonde: ‹Mayɓe gila jooni no humondiri e Joomi on ɓen ko malaaɓe.› » Ruuhu Allaahu on wi'i: «Ko non woniri, ɓe fowtoto golleeji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓay kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen no jokki ɓe.»
66014014	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i duulere daneere, tawi nanditayɗo e ɓii-aaden no jooɗii e hoore nden duulere, tawi meetelol kaŋŋe no ka hoore makko, tawi wortowal welngal no ka jungo makko.
66014015	Tun malaa'ikaajo goo yalti e suudu Alla ndun ka kammu, no ewnoo ko tiiɗi, wi'a on jooɗiiɗo e nden duulere: «Ƴettu wortowal maa ngal, wa'aa, ko fii saa'i baagol ngol hewtii! Ko wa'etee kon ka hoore leydi ɓendii!»
66014016	Onsay on jooɗiiɗo e nden duulere fewtini wortowal mun ngal ka leydi, hayli, ko woni ka leydi kon wa'ii.
66014017	Malaa'ikaajo goo kadi yalti e suudu Alla wondu ka kammu ndun, tawi on kadi no jogii wortowal welngal.
66014018	Tun malaa'ikaajo goo kadi jogiiɗo bawɗe e hoore yiite ngen yalti ka layyorde, o ewnii oya malaa'ikaajo jogiiɗo wortowal welngal ko tiiɗi, o wi'i mo: «Ƴettu wortowal maa welngal ngal, tettaa dukke wiiɲu wonɗe ɗen ka leydi, ko fii ɓiɓɓe majje on ɓendii!»
66014019	On malaa'ikaajo fewtini wortowal mun ngal ka leydi, hayli, o tetti wiiɲuuje wonɗe ɗen ka leydi, o bugii ko o tetti kon ka nder wuugirgal njanal tikkere Allaahu on.
66014020	Ɗen wuugoyaa ka sera saare, ƴiiƴan yalti e ngal wuugirgal haa tooweendi majjan hewti lagambe pucci ɗin, junndi ilol majjan on hawri embere kilomeeterji teemeɗɗe tati.
66015001	Onsay mi yi'i maande moolanaande ŋalɗinnde goo kadi ka kammu, nden-le ko malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo jogiiɓe albala'uuji ɗin jeeɗiɗi. Ko ɗin albala'uuji woni sakkitori ɗin, ko fii ko kanji woni timmoode tikkere Alla nden.
66015002	Mi yi'i kadi ko wa'i wa baharu jalbirɗo wa jaaman, jilluɗo yiite. Tawi fooluɓe ngiya kullii e nandolla mun e adadu innde mun nden no darii e hoore on baharu jalbirɗo wa jaaman, hiɓe jogii korli Allaahu on.
66015003	Hiɓe beyta beytol Muusaa, on jiyaaɗo Alla, e beytol Baalun kun, hiɓe wi'a: «Yaa an Alla, Joomiraaɗo, Jom Bawgal, kuuɗe maa ɗen ko mawɗe, awa kadi ko hawniiɗe, laawi maa ɗin ko feewuɗi, goonginɗi, yo Lanɗo leƴƴi fow!
66015004	Yaa an Joomiraaɗo, hara ko hombo ronkay-maa hulude, maa ronkata mawninde innde maa nden? Ɓay ko an tun woni Seniiɗo! Ɓay leƴƴi ɗin fow aray sujjane! Ɓay kuuɗe maa feewuɗe ɗen feɲɲinaama!»
66015005	Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i kadi nokkuure hormorde wonde ka nder wonirdu ndu seeditoore nden woni e mun ndun, no udditoo ka kammu.
66015006	Tawi malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo jogiiɓe albala'uuji ɗin jeeɗiɗi no yalta e nden nokkuure. Tawi ɓen no ɓornii conci laaɓuɗi jalbuɗi, hiɓe daditii dattii kaŋŋe ka fewndo ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
66015007	Wonde e ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe jonni ɓen malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo pelette kaŋŋe jeeɗiɗi heewuɗe tikkere Allaahu on, ɗun ko on Wuuruɗo haa poomaa.
66015008	Onsay nden nokkuure hormorde heewi curki sabu mangu Allaahu on e bawgal makko ngal. Tawi hay gooto waawataa naatude e ndun suudu haa ɗin albala'uuji jeeɗiɗi ɗi malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen njeeɗiɗo jogii, timma.
66016001	Mi nani kadi hawa tiiɗuka iwrude ka nokkuure hormorde, no wi'a malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen njeeɗiɗo: «Yahee, hibboyon ka leydi ɗen pelette jeeɗiɗi tikkere Alla nden!»
66016002	Arano on yahi, hibbi feletere mun nden ka hoore leydi, tun temmeeje kaanuɗe muusuɗe heɓi ɓe nden maande ngin kullii wonnoo e mun, sujjani nandolla maggii on.
66016003	Ɗimmo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka baharu, on baharu wonti ƴiiƴan wa ƴiiƴan mayɗo. Kala ko wuurunoo ka baharu maayi.
66016004	Tammo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka maaje e ka ɓulli ndiyan, di'e ɗen wonti ƴiiƴan.
66016005	Tun mi nani malaa'ikaajo di'e ɗen no wi'a: «Ko a Feewuɗo, an oo Woodaaɗo e Woodanooɗo, an oo Seniiɗo, sabu ko ɲaawirɗaa nii kon.
66016006	Ko fii ɓe hibbiino ƴiiƴan yimɓe Alla ɓen wondude e ƴiiƴan annabaaɓe ɓen, awa jooni a yeɗii ɓe ƴiiƴan ko ɓe yara, hiɓe foddi e ɗun!»
66016007	Mi nani kadi layyorde nden no wi'a: «Hiiyii, yaa an Alla Joomiraaɗo, Jom Bawgal, ɲaawooje maa ɗen ko goongaaje, ko feewuɗe!»
66016008	Onsay nayaɓo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka naange, nge yeɗaa sunnirgol yimɓe ɓen yiite.
66016009	Yimɓe ɓen sunniraa nguleendi tiiɗundi, ɓe woni e hoynugol innde Alla nden, on marɗo bawgal e hoore ɗin albala'uuji, ɓe ronki tuubude fii no ɓe mawninira mo, kanko Alla.
66016010	Njowaɓo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka hoore jullere laamu kullii ngin, laamateeri maggii on niɓɓiti. Yimɓe ɓen ŋati ɗenɗe hakkee muuseendi,
66016011	ɓe woni e hoynugol Alla kammu ngun sabu muuseendiiji maɓɓe ɗin e temmeeje maɓɓe ɗen, kono ɓe ronki tuubude kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen.
66016012	Njeegaɓo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka maayo njano Furaatiwol. Ndiyan ɗan ɓeeɓi fii waɗangol lamɓe iwrayɓe funnaange ɓen ɗatal.
66016013	Mi yi'i ruuhuuji tati tuunuɗi nanditayɗi e toti-paccala no yalta ka sekko ngin ningiwii e ka sekko kullii ngin e ka hunduko waɗitiiɗo annabaajo on.
66016014	Tawi ko ruuhuuji jinnaaji wonɗi waɗude maandeeji, yaara ka lamɓe leydi ndin fow, fii mottindirgol ɓe fii hare ɲalaande mawnde Alla Jom Bawgal on.
66016015	«Awa miɗo ardude wa ngujjo! Maloore wonanii on hakkilanɗo, mari conci mun ɗin, fii wota o laato holɗo, e wota hersa makko kan ɓangu!»
66016016	Ɗin jinnaaji no mottindira ɓen lamɓe e ndee nokkuure wi'eteende Har-Magadaana e haala Yahuudiyanke.
66016017	Malaa'ikaajo njeeɗiɗaɓo on hibbi feletere mun nden ka hendu, hawa tiiɗuka yalti ka suudu Alla iwrude ka jullere laamu, no wi'a: «Timmii!»
66016018	Maƴanɗe e digge e parɲitte waɗi wondude e dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde, nde sifa mun e tiiɗude hari waɗaali gila yimɓe ɓen woni ka hoore leydi.
66016019	Saare njannde nden feccii pecce tati, ca'e leƴƴi ɗin yani. Alla anditi fii saare Baabiila mawnde nden, o yeɗi nde feletere njaram tikkere makko tiiɗunde nden.
66016020	Suriije ɗen fow dogi, pelle ɗen kadi ronkaa yiiteede.
66016021	Marmalle njane, ɗe tawata nde bee e majje ko wa kilooji cappanɗe nay, iwi ka kammu, yani e hoore yimɓe ɓen. Ɓe woni e hoynugol Alla sabu on albala'u iwruɗo e ɗen marmalle, ko fii hari on albala'u ko tiiɗuɗo haa feƴƴiti.
66017001	Ɓawto ɗun, goɗɗo e ɓen malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo joginooɓe pelette ɗen jeeɗiɗi ari, wi'immi: «Aru, mi hollete ɲaawoore debbo cagaajo mawɗo on, ka jooɗii ɗon ka di'e ɗuuɗuɗe.
66017002	Ko e makko, kanko on debbo cagaajo, lamɓe aduna ɓen jokkiri jinaa, e hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen mandiliri jinaa makko on!»
66017003	Onsay Ruuhu Allaahu on tippii e an, malaa'ikaajo on nawrimmi ka wulaa. Mi yi'i debbo no jooɗii e hoore kullii boɗewii heewungii inɗe hoynuɗe Alla ɗen, marngii ko'e jeeɗiɗi e galaaɗi sappo.
66017004	Tawi on debbo no ɓornii conci boɗeeji e firsinaaɗi, himo cuɗori kaŋŋe e kaaƴe hittuɗe e koɗe hittuɗe. Tawi himo jogii feletere kaŋŋe heewunde ko ɲiddinaa e tuuɗe jinaa makko on.
66017005	Tawi innde gundoore no windii ka tiinde makko, ko woni ɗun ko: «Saare Baabiila mawnde nden, neene cagaaɓe ɓen e ko ɲiddinaa kon ka hoore leydi.»
66017006	Mi yi'i on debbo no mandiliri ƴiiƴan yimɓe Alla ɓen, e ƴiiƴan seedeeɓe Iisaa ɓen. Ɓay mi yi'ii mo, mi ŋalɗi fota.
66017007	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'immi: «Ko honɗun ŋalɗuɗaa? Mi andinte gundoo debbo on e kullii ngii ko'e jeeɗiɗi e galaaɗi sappo ngii o waɗɗii ngin.
66017008	Kullii ngii yi'uɗaa ngin hari no woodanoo, kono jooni ngii woodaaka. Hingii faandii ƴawude ka gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin, ngii yaha ka hayrannde. Awa kadi hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen, ɓe tawata innde mun windaaka ka deftere ngurndan gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna, ɓe ŋalɗoyay yi'ugol ngin kullii, ko fii hari hingii woodanoo, kono jooni ngii woodaaka, awa kadi ngii feeɲitay.
66017009	«Ɗoo non, maa hakkil wonduki e faamu: Ko'e ɗen jeeɗiɗi ko pelle jeeɗiɗi ɗe debbo on jooɗii e hoore mun ɗen. Ko ɗe lamɓe ɓen njeeɗiɗo kadi:
66017010	njowo yanii, goɗɗo on no woodaa, oya on araali taho. Nde o aroyi, himo haani wonude seeɗa.
66017011	Kullii woodanoongii, ngii woodaaka jooni ngin, kangii tigi ko ngii lanɗo njeetataɓo, ko ngii goɗɗo kadi e njeeɗiɗooɓe ɓen, hingii yahude ka hayrannde.
66017012	«Galaaɗi sappo ɗi yi'uɗaa ɗin ko lamɓe sappo, ɓe fuɗɗaaki taho laamaade, kono ko hendorayɓe laamu wa lamɓe e nder saa'i gooto fii laamodugol e kullii ngin.
66017013	Kamɓe ko ɓe eɓɓoore wootere, ɓe jonnay doole maɓɓe e laamu maɓɓe kullii ngin.
66017014	Ɓe haɓay Baalun kun, Baalun kun foola ɓe, ko fii ko kun Koohoojo koohooɓe, Lanɗo lamɓe, ko wonduɓe e makkun ɓen woni noddaaɓe e suɓaaɓe e sella-findeeɓe.»
66017015	O wi'immi kadi: «Di'e ɗe yi'uɗaa cagaajo on no jooɗii e mun ɗen, ko jamaaji ɗin e dente moolanaaɗe ɗen e leƴƴi ɗin e haalaaji ɗin.
66017016	Galaaɗi sappo ɗi yi'uɗaa ɗin wondude e kullii ngin aɲoyay cagaajo on, ɗi ƴetta kala ko o jeyi, ɗi ɓoora mo, ɗi ɲaama ɓandu makko ndun, ɗi sunnira mo yiite.
66017017	Ko fii Alla waɗii ka ɓerɗe majji huuwugol eɓɓoore makko nden e nder miijo wooto fii yo ɗi okku laamu majji ngun kullii ngin haa tuma daaluyeeji Alla ɗin laatii.
66017018	Awa kadi debbo mo yi'uɗaa on ko saare mawnde marnde laamu e hoore lamɓe aduna ɓen.»
66018001	Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i malaa'ikaajo goo no iwra ka kammu, jogiiɗo bawgal njanal, aduna on jalbiri annoora makko on.
66018002	O ewnii ko tiiɗi, o wi'i: «Nde yanii! Saare Baabiila mawnde nden yanii! Nde wontii hoɗo jinnaaji, suuɗorde kala ruuhu tuunuɗo, e suuɗorde kala sondu harmundu e aɲaandu.
66018003	Ko fii leƴƴi ɗin fow mandilirii himme jinaa mayre on, lamɓe aduna ɓen kadi wattodi e mayre e nder jinaa mayre on, awa kadi njulaaɓe ɓen ka leydi alɗinorii ngalu mayre feƴƴitungu ngun.»
66018004	Mi nani kadi hawa goo ka kammu, no wi'a: «Yaltee e mayre, yo jamaa an, fii wota on tawde e junuubaaji mayre ɗin, e wota on heɓu geɓal albala'uuji mayre ɗin.
66018005	Ko fii junuubaaji mayre ɗin dewnondirii haa ka kammu, awa kadi Alla anditii angal peewal mayre on.
66018006	Waɗiranee nde wano nde waɗiri non, sowon kuuɗe mayre ɗen nde ɗiɗi, jonniton nde. Jardukun, kun nde yarniri kun, jonnitiree nde kun laabi ɗiɗi!
66018007	Wano nde mawninornoo non, e no nde yollornoo e mbeleeɗe non, jonnitiree nde wano non tampere e yoomere! Ko fii hinde wi'i ka ɓernde mayre: ‹Min miɗo jooɗii e nder laamu, hinaa mi heynotooɗo, awa kadi mi yoomataa few!›
66018008	Sabu ɗun, albala'uuji mayre ɗin yanay e hoore mayre ɲande wootere, ɗun ko mayde e yoomere e heege, nde sunniree kadi yiite. ko fii Alla Joomiraaɗo, Ɲaawuɗo nde on, ko Jom-doole!»
66018009	Lamɓe aduna ɓen fow, wattodunooɓe e mayre e nder jinaa e mbeleeɗe, wulloyay fesa fii mayre, nde ɓe yi'i curki sumugol mayre on.
66018010	Hiɓe darii ka woɗɗitii sabu kulol tampere mayre ngol, ɓe wi'oya: «Bone, bone wonanii saare Baabiila mawnde nden, ɗun ko saare dolnunde nden! E nder saa'ihun gootun pet ɲaawoore maa nden arii!»
66018011	Njulaaɓe ɓen ka leydi yooma, ɓe wulla fii mayre, ko fii hay gooto soodataa hande kadi ko ɓe yeeyata kon,
66018012	ɗun ko kaŋŋe e kaalisi e kaaƴe hittuɗe e koɗe hittuɗe e bagi ɗaatuɗo e bagi boɗe e bagi ɗewluɗo e bagi firsinaaɗo, e kala noone leɗɗe uuruɗe e kala piiji moƴƴiniraaɗi ɲiiƴe mawba, e kala piiji hittuɗi moƴƴiniraaɗi leɗɗe hittuɗe e sila e njanɗe e kaaƴe daneeje,
66018013	wondude e ceɓe leɗɗe kanel uuruɗe e urngallooji e angiriiji, e ɓuto leɗɗe no wi'ee mirri, e ɓuto leɗɗe no wi'ee libaana, e njaram wiiɲu e nebbe e ngawri e condi ngawri e na'i e baali e pucci e giri-giriije e maccuɓe e wonkiiji yimɓe.
66018014	No wi'a: «Piiji ɗi wonkii maa kin himmani ɗin woɗɗitike ma yo saare Baabiila! Piiji hittuɗi ɗin maa jalbuɗi ɗin fow fuutike ma, awa kadi ɓe hettataa ɗi hande kadi!»
66018015	Njulaaɓe alɗinorɓe nde ɓen wonay ka woɗɗitii sabu kulol tampere mayre ngol. Ɓe yoomoya, ɓe wulla,
66018016	ɓe wi'oya: «Bone, bone wonanii ndee saare mawnde, ɓorniinde conci ɗaatuɗi, boɗeeji e firsinaaɗi, cuɗori kaŋŋe e kaaƴe hittuɗe e koɗe hittuɗe!
66018017	E nder saa'ihun gootun pet, ngun ngalu mayre e mawnude caabii!» Hooreeɓe laaɗe ɓen fow e gollooɓe ton ɓen fow e doginooɓe ɓen e wuurirɓe baharu ɓen fow darii ka woɗɗitii.
66018018	Ɓay ɓe yi'ii curki sumugol mayre on, ɓe woni e ewnagol, wi'a: «Ko saare honde nanditaynoo e ndee saare mawnde!»
66018019	Tawi hiɓe bugotonoo mbullaari ka ko'e maɓɓe, yooma, wulla, hiɓe ewnoo wi'a: «Bone, bone wonanii ndee saare mawnde, nde kala on marɗo laana ka baharu alɗinori ngalu mun! E nder saa'ihun gootun pet nde caabii!»
66018020	Awa welto e hoore mayre, yo kammu, onon men kadi yo gomɗinɓe e sahaabaaɓe e annabaaɓe, ko fii Alla ɲaawii nde fii ko nde waɗi on kon!
66018021	Onsay malaa'ikaajo dolnuɗo ƴetti hayre nanditaynde e laggorde moolanaande, bugii ka baharu, e hoore himo wi'a: «Ko nii saare Baabiila mawnde nden bugortee doole, hara nde yiitetaake hande kadi!
66018022	Nanetaake hande kadi hito hoɗooɓe hoddu e yimooɓe e wuttooɓe ceri e liite! Hande kadi ɲeeɲo yi'etaake e maa, kala non noone mecce, awa nanetaake hande kadi hito undugal e maa.
66018023	Awa kadi ndaygu lampu jalbataa e maa hande kadi, hawa ƴettuɗo e ƴettaaɗo nanetaake hande kadi. Ko fii hari ko njulaaɓe maa ɓen woni tedduɓe ɓen ka leydi, awa kadi leƴƴi ɗin fow faljirii sabu mbilankaaku maa ngun!
66018024	Awa kadi ko e maa ƴiiƴan annabaaɓe ɓen e gomɗinɓe ɓen e kala waraaɗo ka hoore leydi hibbaa.»
66019001	Ɓawto ɗun, mi nani hawa tiiɗuka immorde e jamaa ɗuuɗuɗo ka kammu, no wi'a: «Mantoore wonanii Alla! Kisiyee e mangu e bawgal ko Alla men on wonani!
66019002	Ɲaawooje makko ɗen ko goongaaje feewuɗe! O ɲaawii cagaajo mawɗo on, faljiniraynooɗo yimɓe aduna on jinaa mun on. Alla kadi yottanike ƴiiƴan kurkaaɗi mun ɗan o hibbi ɗan.»
66019003	Ɓe wi'i kadi ɗimmun: «Mantoore wonanii Alla! Curki nden saare ƴaway haa poomaa!»
66019004	Tawi mawɓe ɓen noogay e nayo e tagooje nay wuuruɗe ɗen no jiccinoo, no sujjana Alla Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu on e nder wi'ugol: «Aamiina, mantoore wonanii Alla!»
66019005	Hawa kadi yalti ka jullere laamu no wi'a: «Ko onon yo jiyaaɓe makko, hulooɓe mo, fanɗuɓe e njanɗuɓe, on fow mantee Alla men on!»
66019006	Mi nani kadi wa hawa jamaa ɗuuɗuɗo e wa hito di'e ɗuuɗuɗe e wa hito rigganɗe tiiɗuɗe, no wi'a: «Mantoore wonanii Alla! Ko fii Alla Joomiraaɗo on, on Jom Bawgal, joɗɗinii laamu mun ngun.
66019007	Weltoɗen, wonen e nder welo-welo, mawninen mo, ko fii peera Baalun kun hewtii, jombajjo makkun on hebulike,
66019008	o yeɗaama ɓornagol conci ɗaatuɗi jalbuɗi laaɓuɗi.» (Ko kuuɗe feewuɗe yimɓe Alla ɓen woni ɗin conci.)
66019009	Malaa'ikaajo on wi'immi kadi yo mi windu wonde: «Maloore wonanii ɓen noddaaɓe ka nafakka peera Baalun kun.» O wi'i kadi: «Ɗii ko daaluyeeji Alla goongaaji.»
66019010	Onsay mi jiccii ka koyɗe makko fii sujjangol mo. Kono o wi'immi: «Accu, wota a waɗu ɗun! Ko mi kurkodoowo e maa e musiɓɓe maa ɓen, jogiiɓe seeditoore Iisaa nden. Sujjan Alla! Ko seeditoore Iisaa nden woni ruuhu longinoowo annabaaɓe ɓen.»
66019011	Mi yi'i kadi kammu ngun no udditii, mi tawi e hino puccu ranewu, tawi waɗɗiiɗo ngu on no wi'ee Sella-Findeejo e Goongaajo. Ko peewal o ɲaawirta, o haɓira.
66019012	Gite makko ɗen no wa'i wa joyngol yiite, meetelli buy no ka hoore makko. Innde no windii e makko nde hay gooto andaa si hinaa kanko.
66019013	Dolokke mo o ɓornii on no moddi ƴiiƴan. Himo wi'ee Daaluyee Alla on.
66019014	Tawi koneeli wonɗi ɗin ka kammu no waɗɗii pucci daneeji, no jokki mo, hiɓe ɓornii conci ɗaatuɗi daneeji laaɓuɗi.
66019015	Tawi kaafa welka no yalta ka hunduko makko fii foolugol leƴƴi ɗin, awa kadi o ayniroyay ɓe labbooru njandi, o yaaɓa, o munca wiiɲuuje ɗen ka wuugirde tikkere moolanaande Alla Jom Bawgal nden.
66019016	Tawi innde no windii ka dolokke makko e ka busal makko, ɗun ko: «Lanɗo Lamɓe e Koohoojo Koohooɓe.»
66019017	Mi yi'i kadi malaa'ikaajo no darii ka nder naange, no ewnoo colli wonɗi wiirude ka weeyo dow ɗin fow ko tiiɗi, wi'a: «Aree, mottondiron fii nafakka mawɗo Alla on!
66019018	Ɲaamon ɓalli lamɓe ɓen, e ɓalli hooreeɓe suufaaɓe ɓen, e ɓalli dolnuɓe ɓen, e ɓalli pucci e waɗɗotonooɓe ɗi ɓen, e ɓalli yimɓe ɓen fow, rimɓe e maccuɓe, fanɗuɓe e njanɗuɓe!»
66019019	Onsay mi yi'i kullii ngin e lamɓe aduna ɓen e koneeli mun ɗin no mottondiri fii haɓugol waɗɗiiɗo puccu ranewu ngun e konu mun ngun.
66019020	Kullii ngin nangidaa e waɗitiiɗo annabaajo on, ɗun ko on waɗunooɗo maandeeji yeeso maggii ɗi o ɗaynirnoo heɓunooɓe maande kullii ngin ɓen, sujjani nandolla maggii on. Ɓe ɗiɗoo non ɓe bugaa ka weendu yiite ko ɓe wurɓe, ɗun ko ka mbollan yiite.
66019021	Ɓeya wariraa kaafa yaltaynooka ka hunduko waɗɗinooɗo puccu ngun on, colli ɗin fow ɲaami ɓalli maɓɓe ɗin haa haari.
66020001	Onsay mi yi'i kadi malaa'ikaajo no iwra ka kammu, no jogii ka jungo mun saabiwal gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin wondude e jolokowal moolanaangal.
66020002	O nangi ningiwii ngin, e maanaa ndiya mboddi araniri, ɗun ko Ibuliisa maa Seytaane, o jolki ndi fii duuɓi wuluure.
66020003	O bugii ngin ka nder gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin, o soki, o ndoli kadi dow maggin, fii wota ngin faljin leƴƴi ɗin hande kadi haa duuɓi wuluure ɗin timma. Kono ɓawto ɗun, bee ngin jolkitoyee embere saa'i fahin.
66020004	Mi yi'i kadi julle laamu, tawi jooɗiiɓe e ɗen ɓen no yeɗaa bawgal ɲaawugol. Mi yi'i wonkiiji ɓe ko'e mun taƴiraa kaafa ɓen sabu seeditanagol Iisaa e daaluyee Alla on, ɓen ɓe sujjanaano ngiya kullii e nandolla mun on, ronki heɓude maande ka tiinde maa ka jungo. Ɓe wurnitaa, ɓe laamodi e Almasiihu on e nder duuɓi wuluure.
66020005	Ɗun ko ummutal aranal ngal non. Tawi ɓeya mayɓe heddiiɓe wurnitetaake haa tuma duuɓi wuluure ɗin timmi.
66020006	Maloore e senaare wonanay ɓen tawoyteeɓe e ummutal aranal ngal, ko fii mayde ɗimmere nden heɓoytaa bawgal e hoore ɓen. Ɓen-le ko ɓee yottinoyooɓe sadaka ka Alla e ka Almasiihu on. Ɓe laamodoya e makko e nder duuɓi wuluure.
66020007	Nde duuɓi wuluure ɗin timmoyi, Ibuliisa yaltinoyte ka kaso,
66020008	o yaltoya fii faljingol leƴƴi wonɗi e coɓɓuli aduna on nay, ɗin ko Yaajuuja e Maajuuja en, o mottindira ɓe fii waɗugol hare. Tawa ɗuuɗoral maɓɓe ngal no fota e njaareendi ndin ka baharu.
66020009	Ɓe hebbini hoore leydi ndin fow, ɓe hundi daakorde yimɓe Alla ɓen e saare ɓuraande yiɗeede nden, kono yiite iwri ka kammu, muli ɓe.
66020010	Onsay Ibuliisa, faljinnooɗo ɓen yimɓe on, bugaa e nder ndun weendu yiite e mbollan mun, ka ngiya kullii e waɗitiiɗo annabaajo on buganoo ɗon. Ɓe lettee ɗon jemma e ɲalorma haa poomaa.
66020011	Mi yi'i kadi jullere laamu moolanaande daneere e jooɗiiɗo e mayre on. Tun kammu ngun e leydi ndin dogi mo, ɗin ronki heɓude ka wona.
66020012	Mi yi'i kadi mayɓe ɓen, tawi ɓen no darii yeeso nden jullere laamu, ɗun non ko gila e fanɗuɓe haa e njanɗuɓe. Onsay defte udditaa. Ɓawto ɗun, deftere goo kadi udditaa, tawi nden ko deftere ngurndan ɗan. Ɓen mayɓe ɲaawiraa kuuɗe maɓɓe windiiɗe ɗen e ɗen defte.
66020013	Baharu on jonniti mayɓe wonnooɓe e makko ɓen. Mayde nden e jahannama kadi jonniti mayɓe wonnooɓe e mun ɓen, mo kala e ɓen ɲaawiraa kuuɗe mun ɗen.
66020014	Onsay mayde nden e jahannama bugaa ka weendu yiite, ko ndun weendu yiite woni mayde ɗimmere nden.
66020015	Kala mo innde mun windanooki e nder deftere ngurndan nden, bugaa ka nder weendu yiite.
66021001	Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i kammu hesu e aduna keso, ɓay hari nguya kammu hinngu e oya aduna kiɗɗo feƴƴii, tawi kadi baharu alaa.
66021002	Onsay mi yi'i saare hormorde nden, ɗun ko saare Yerusalaam heyre, no iwra ka kammu ka Alla, tawi nden no pariraa wano jombajjo parirtee fii moodi mun.
66021003	Mi nani kadi hawa tiiɗuka iwrude ka jullere laamu no wi'a: «Awa jooni wonunde Alla nden no e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen. O hoɗiday e maɓɓe, ɓe wona jamaa makko, kanko Alla tigi o wonday e maɓɓe, o wona Alla maɓɓe.
66021004	O fitta kala gongol ka gite maɓɓe, hara hande kadi mayde waɗitataa, yoometaake, fesetaake, muuseendi waɗitataa. Ko fii haray sifa ɗin piiji arani fow feƴƴiino.»
66021005	Onsay on Jooɗiiɗo e nden jullere laamu wi'i: «Miɗo heyɗintinde piiji ɗin fow!» O wi'immi kadi: «Windu, ko fii ɗii daaluyeeji ko holniiɗi e goongaaji!»
66021006	O wi'immi fahin: «Timmii! Ko min woni Halfeere aranere nden e sakkitorde nden, ko min woni Fuɗɗoode nden e Rawnoode nden. On mo no ɗonɗaa, mi okkoray mo ko o yara ka ɓundu ndiyan ngurndan, hara ontigi yoɓataa.
66021007	Ko ɗun wonata ndondi fooluɗo on. Mi wonay Alla makko, kanko o wona ɓiɗɗo an.
66021008	Kono waɗayɓe hula yiltitoo ɓen e ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen e tuunuɓe ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen e mbileeɓe ɓen e rewooɓe sanamu ɓen, e fenooɓe ɓen fow: geɓal ɓen ngal ko ka weendu yiite huɓɓundu e mbollan mun woni! Ko ndun non woni mayde ɗimmere nden!»
66021009	Ɓawto ɗun, goɗɗo e ɓen malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo, joginooɓe pelette jeeɗiɗi heewuɗe albala'uuji jeeɗiɗi sakkitori ɗin, ari, wi'immi: «Aru mi holle jombajjo on, ɗun ko sonnaajo Baalun kun.»
66021010	Ruuhu Allaahu on tippii e an, malaa'ikaajo on nawrimmi e hoore fello njano toowungo, o hayninimmi saare Yerusalaam hormorde nden ka iwrata ka kammu ka Alla.
66021011	Tawi nden saare no jalbiri annoora Alla on. Jalbeendi mayre ndin no nandita e jalbeendi hayre hittunde fota, wa hayre yasbe, jalbirnde wa jaaman.
66021012	Tawi tata mayre on no njanɗi, no toowi, hinde mari kadi dambuɗe sappoo e ɗiɗi. Malaa'ikaaɓe sappoo e ɗiɗo no e ɗen dambuɗe, tawi inɗe bolondaaji ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila ɓen sappoo e ɗiɗi no windii e majje.
66021013	E hino no dambuɗe mayre ɗen woniri: ko tati funnaange, tati ka nano, tati ka ɲaamo e tati ka hirnaange.
66021014	Tata nden saare ko kaaƴe sappoo e ɗiɗi didiraa, inɗe sappoo e ɗiɗi no e hoore ɗen kaaƴe. Ɗen inɗe-le ko inɗe sahaabaaɓe Baalun kun sappoo e ɗiɗo.
66021015	Tawi on wonnooɗo lan yewtude no joginoo sawru kaŋŋe fii ko o eɓɓira ittiri saare nden e dambuɗe mayre ɗen, wondude e tata mayre on.
66021016	Tawi mbaaloodi nden saare ko coɓɓuli nay fotayɗi, tawi junndi mayre on e yanji mayre on no fota. O eɓɓiri saare nden ndun sawru ndu o joginoo, ɗun hawri embere sagara yaaduuji guluuji sappoo e ɗiɗi. Tawi junndi mayre on e yanji mayre on e tooweendi mayre on no fota.
66021017	On malaa'ikaajo eɓɓiri tekkeendi tata on embere sogone neɗɗanke, ɗun hawri sogone teemedere e cappanɗe nay e nay.
66021018	Tawi on tata ko hayre yasbe darniraa. Tawi saare nden kaɲun ko kaŋŋe laaɓirɗo wa biini.
66021019	Tawi didoodiiji tata nden saare no fotiniraa kala noone kaaƴe hittuɗe. Didoodi araniri ndin ko yasbe, ɗimmiri ndin ko saafira, tammiri ndin ko kalseduwan, nayaɓiri ndin ko zumuruudu,
66021020	jowaɓiri ndin ko sardoniisi, jeegaɓiri ndin ko sardir, jeeɗiɗaɓiri ndin ko kirisooli, jeetataɓiri ndin ko beril, jeenayaɓiri ndin ko topaazi, sappaɓiri ndin ko kirisopaas, sappoo e go'aɓiri ndin ko hiyasinta, sappoo e ɗiɗaɓiri ndin ko ametiise.
66021021	Tawi dame ɗen sappoo e ɗiɗi fow ko moƴƴiniraaɗe koɗe hittuɗe, damal kala moƴƴiniraa hoɗere wootere. Tawi ballaŋal ngal ka saare ko ngal kaŋŋe laaɓirɗo wa biini jalɓuɗo.
66021022	Laatii mi yi'aali rewirdu e mayre, kono tawi ko Alla Joomiraaɗo Jom Bawgal on e Baalun kun woni rewirdu mayre ndun.
66021023	Tawi saare nden hatonjinaa e naange maa lewru ko jalbinana nde, ko fii annoora Alla on no hentini nde, awa kadi Baalun kun ko ndaygu mayre.
66021024	Ko jalbeendi mayre on leƴƴi ɗin yaarata, awa kadi lamɓe aduna ɓen addanay nde darjaaji mun ɗin.
66021025	Dame mayre ɗen ombetaake e nder ɲallal ngal few, ɓay ɗon kaɲun jemmataa.
66021026	Awa kadi nde addanoyte darja e teddungal leƴƴi ɗin.
66021027	Hay fus e ko tuuni e hay gooto waɗoowo ko ɲiddi maa fenaande naatataa ɗon. Ko naatata ɗon woo ko ɓe inɗe mun windii ɓen ka nder deftere ngurndan Baalun kun.
66022001	Ontuma malaa'ikaajo on hollimmi kadi maayo ndiyan ngurndan ɗan ka iwrata ka jullere laamu Alla e Baalun kun, laaɓuɗan jalbiri wa jaaman,
66022002	no ila ka hakkunde ballaŋal saare nden. Leggal ngurndan ɗan no darii e cenɗe ɗiɗi maayo ngon, rimoowal ɓiɓɓe laabi sappoo e ɗiɗi, tetteteeɓe lewru bee, ngal leƴƴi ɗin ɲawndorta haako mun.
66022003	Haray kuddi alaa hande kadi. Jullere laamu Alla nden e Baalun kun wonoyay e nden saare. Onsay jiyaaɓe makko ɓen kurkanto mo,
66022004	ɓe yi'a yeeso makko ngon, innde makko nden wona ka tiiɗe maɓɓe.
66022005	Hara jemmataa han kadi, ɓe hatonjintaa e ndaygu lampu maa jalbeendi naange, ko fii Alla Joomiraaɗo on jalbinanay ɓe. Awa ɓe laamoyto kadi haa poomaa.
66022006	O wi'immi: «Ɗii daaluyeeji ko holniiɗi e goongaaji. Joomiraaɗo on, on Alla Jom ruuhuuji annabaaɓe ɓen, imminii malaa'ikaajo mun on fii andingol jiyaaɓe makko ɓen fii kon ko saatii arude ko ɓooyaa.»
66022007	Iisaa wi'i: «Miɗo ara ko ɓooyaa! Haray maloore wonanii ɓen ɗoftotooɓe ɗii konguɗi feɲɲinaaɗi wonɗi e ndee deftere.»
66022008	Ko min Yuuhanna nani fii ɗii piiji, mi yi'i ɗi kadi. Nde mi nanunoo, mi yi'i ɗi, mi jiccino e ley koyɗe on malaa'ikaajo holluɗo lan ɗi fii sujjangol mo.
66022009	Kono o wi'immi: «Wota waɗu ɗun! Min kadi ko mi kurkodoowo e maa, kurkoda e musiɓɓe maa annabaaɓe ɓen, e ɓen ɗoftotooɓe ɗii konguɗi wonɗi e ndee deftere. Sujjan Alla!»
66022010	O wi'immi kadi: «Wota ombu notaa ndee deftere nde ɗii konguɗi feɲɲinaaɗi wonɗi e mun, ko fii saa'i on ko ɓadiiɗo.
66022011	Awa kadi ɓe feewaa ɓen yo duumo e jokkugol angal peewal mun, ɓe laaɓaa ɓen kadi duumoo e jokkugol angal laaɓal mun, feewuɓe ɓen duumoo e peewal mun, laaɓuɓe ɓen duumoo e laaɓal mun!»
66022012	Iisaa wi'i: «Miɗo ara ko ɓooyaa, mi arda e njoddi mo kala embere kuuɗe mun.
66022013	Awa kadi ko min woni Halfeere aranere nden e sakkitorde nden, ko min woni Arano on e Sakkitoro on, ko min woni Fuɗɗoode nden e Rawnoode nden.
66022014	«Maloore wonanii ɓen laɓɓinɓe conci mun fii heɓugol geɓal ka leggal ngurndan, e no ɓe naatira ka saare, hara ko ka dambuɗe ɓe rewi.
66022015	Kono dawaaɗi ɗin e mbileeɓe ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen e rewooɓe sanamu ɓen e kala on yiɗuɗo fenaande huutori yo wonu ka yaasi.
66022016	«Min Iisaa mi imminii malaa'ikaajo an on fii seeditanagol on ɗii piiji ka mofte. Min ngol Ɗaɗol e Geeƴol Daawuuda, awa kadi ko min woni Jaawiire Jalboore Subaka nden.»
66022017	Ruuhu Allaahu on e jombajjo on wi'ii: «Aree!» Awa, on nanuɗo ɗun kadi yo wi'u: «Aree!» Awa mo no ɗonɗaa yo aru, on faalaaɗo yo ƴettu ndiyan ngurndan ɗan, hara yoɓaali.
66022018	Awa mi fellintinanii kala on nanuɗo ɗii konguɗi feɲɲinaaɗi wonɗi e ndee deftere, si ɓeyditii goɗɗun e majji, Alla ɓeyditay e hoore makko ɗii albala'uuji ɗi fii mun windii e ndee deftere.
66022019	Awa kadi, si goɗɗo aru ittude goɗɗun e ɗii konguɗi ndee deftere feɲɲinannde, Alla kadi ittay geɓal makko wongal ngal ka leggal ngurndan e ka saare hormorde, ɗe fii mun windii e ndee deftere.
66022020	On Seediiɗo ɗun fow wi'i: «Ko goonga, miɗo ara ko ɓooyaa.» Aamiina! Aree, yo Joomi amen Iisaa!
66022021	Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Joomi on wonu e hoore fow.
